GE07mbh_05_u:001.000-0001_02: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayam udīrayet janamejaya uvāca
GE07mbh_05_u:001.000-0002_01: evaṃ nirvartya codvāhaṃ saṃgataḥ saha bandhubhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:001.000-0002_02: kāḥ kathāś ca cakārāsau vaiśaṃpāyana kīrtaya
GE07mbh_05_u:001.000-0004_01: vṛtte vivāhe hṛṣṭātmā yad uvāca yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:001.000-0004_02: tat sarvaṃ kathayasveha kṛtavanto yad uttaram
GE07mbh_05_u:001.000-0006_01: oṃ vyāsaṃ vasiṣṭhanaptāraṃ śakteḥ pautram akalmaṣam
GE07mbh_05_u:001.000-0006_04: namo vai brahmanidhaye vāsiṣṭhāya namo namaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:001.001a: kṛtvā vivāhaṃ tu kurupravīrās; tadābhimanyor muditasvapakṣāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:001.001c: viśramya catvāry uṣasaḥ pratītāḥ; sabhāṃ virāṭasya tato 'bhijagmuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:001.002a: sabhā tu sā matsyapateḥ samṛddhā; maṇipravekottamaratnacitrā
GE07mbh_05_u:001.002c: nyastāsanā mālyavatī sugandhā; tām abhyayus te nararājavaryāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:001.003a: athāsanāny āviśatāṃ purastād; ubhau virāṭadrupadau narendrau
GE07mbh_05_u:001.003c: vṛddhaś ca mānyaḥ pṛthivīpatīnāṃ; pitāmaho rāmajanārdanābhyām
GE07mbh_05_u:001.004c: matsyasya rājñas tu susaṃnikṛṣṭau; janārdanaś caiva yudhiṣṭhiraś ca
GE07mbh_05_u:001.005a: sutāś ca sarve drupadasya rājño; bhīmārjunau mādravatīsutau ca
GE07mbh_05_u:001.005c: pradyumnasāmbau ca yudhi pravīrau; virāṭaputraś ca sahābhimanyuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:001.006a: sarve ca śūrāḥ pitṛbhiḥ samānā; vīryeṇa rūpeṇa balena caiva
GE07mbh_05_u:001.007c: rarāja sā rājavatī samṛddhā; grahair iva dyaur vimalair upetā
GE07mbh_05_u:001.008a: tataḥ kathās te samavāyayuktāḥ; kṛtvā vicitrāḥ puruṣapravīrāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:001.008c: tasthur muhūrtaṃ paricintayantaḥ; kṛṣṇaṃ nṛpās te samudīkṣamāṇāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:001.009a: kathāntam āsādya ca mādhavena; saṃghaṭṭitāḥ pāṇḍavakāryahetoḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:001.009c: te rājasiṃhāḥ sahitā hy aśṛṇvan; vākyaṃ mahārthaṃ ca mahodayaṃ ca
GE07mbh_05_u:001.010a: sarvair bhavadbhir viditaṃ yathāyaṃ; yudhiṣṭhiraḥ saubalenākṣavatyām
GE07mbh_05_u:001.010c: jito nikṛtyāpahṛtaṃ ca rājyaṃ; punaḥ pravāse samayaḥ kṛtaś ca
GE07mbh_05_u:001.011a: śaktair vijetuṃ tarasā mahīṃ ca; satye sthitais tac caritaṃ yathāvat
GE07mbh_05_u:001.011c: pāṇḍoḥ sutais tad vratam ugrarūpaṃ; varṣāṇi ṣaṭ sapta ca bhāratāgryaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:001.012a: trayodaśaś caiva sudustaro 'yam; ajñāyamānair bhavatāṃ samīpe
GE07mbh_05_u:001.012c: kleśān asahyāṃś ca titikṣamāṇair; yathoṣitaṃ tad viditaṃ ca sarvam
GE07mbh_05_u:001.013a: evaṃ gate dharmasutasya rājño; duryodhanasyāpi ca yad dhitaṃ syāt
GE07mbh_05_u:001.013c: tac cintayadhvaṃ kurupāṇḍavānāṃ; dharmyaṃ ca yuktaṃ ca yaśaskaraṃ ca
GE07mbh_05_u:001.014a: adharmayuktaṃ ca na kāmayeta; rājyaṃ surāṇām api dharmarājaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:001.014c: dharmārthayuktaṃ ca mahīpatitvaṃ; grāme 'pi kasmiṃś cid ayaṃ bubhūṣet
GE07mbh_05_u:001.015a: pitryaṃ hi rājyaṃ viditaṃ nṛpāṇāṃ; yathāpakṛṣṭaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭraputraiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:001.015c: mithyopacāreṇa tathāpy anena; kṛcchraṃ mahat prāptam asahyarūpam
GE07mbh_05_u:001.016a: na cāpi pārtho vijito raṇe taiḥ; svatejasā dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putraiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:001.016c: tathāpi rājā sahitaḥ suhṛdbhir; abhīpsate 'nāmayam eva teṣām
GE07mbh_05_u:001.017a: yat tat svayaṃ pāṇḍusutair vijitya; samāhṛtaṃ bhūmipatīn nipīḍya
GE07mbh_05_u:001.017c: tat prārthayante puruṣapravīrāḥ; kuntīsutā mādravatīsutau ca
GE07mbh_05_u:001.018a: bālās tv ime tair vividhair upāyaiḥ; saṃprārthitā hantum amitrasāhāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:001.018c: rājyaṃ jihīrṣadbhir asadbhir ugraiḥ; sarvaṃ ca tad vo viditaṃ yathāvat
GE07mbh_05_u:001.019a: teṣāṃ ca lobhaṃ prasamīkṣya vṛddhaṃ; dharmātmatāṃ cāpi yudhiṣṭhirasya
GE07mbh_05_u:001.019c: saṃbandhitāṃ cāpi samīkṣya teṣāṃ; matiṃ kurudhvaṃ sahitāḥ pṛthak ca
GE07mbh_05_u:001.020a: ime ca satye 'bhiratāḥ sadaiva; taṃ pārayitvā samayaṃ yathāvat
GE07mbh_05_u:001.020c: ato 'nyathā tair upacaryamāṇā; hanyuḥ sametān dhṛtarāṣṭraputrān
GE07mbh_05_u:001.021a: tair viprakāraṃ ca niśamya rājñaḥ; suhṛjjanās tān parivārayeyuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:001.021c: yuddhena bādheyur imāṃs tathaiva; tair vadhyamānā yudhi tāṃś ca hanyuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:001.022a: tathāpi neme 'lpatayā samarthās; teṣāṃ jayāyeti bhaven mataṃ vaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:001.022c: sametya sarve sahitāḥ suhṛdbhis; teṣāṃ vināśāya yateyur eva
GE07mbh_05_u:001.023a: duryodhanasyāpi mataṃ yathāvan; na jñāyate kiṃ nu kariṣyatīti
GE07mbh_05_u:001.023c: ajñāyamāne ca mate parasya; kiṃ syāt samārabhyatamaṃ mataṃ vaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:001.024a: tasmād ito gacchatu dharmaśīlaḥ; śuciḥ kulīnaḥ puruṣo 'pramattaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:001.024c: dūtaḥ samarthaḥ praśamāya teṣāṃ; rājyārdhadānāya yudhiṣṭhirasya
GE07mbh_05_u:001.025a: niśamya vākyaṃ tu janārdanasya; dharmārthayuktaṃ madhuraṃ samaṃ ca
GE07mbh_05_u:001.025c: samādade vākyam athāgrajo 'sya; saṃpūjya vākyaṃ tad atīva rājan
GE07mbh_05_u:002.001a: śrutaṃ bhavadbhir gadapūrvajasya; vākyaṃ yathā dharmavad arthavac ca
GE07mbh_05_u:002.001c: ajātaśatroś ca hitaṃ hitaṃ ca; duryodhanasyāpi tathaiva rājñaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:002.002a: ardhaṃ hi rājyasya visṛjya vīrāḥ; kuntīsutās tasya kṛte yatante
GE07mbh_05_u:002.002c: pradāya cārdhaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭraputraḥ; sukhī sahāsmābhir atīva modet
GE07mbh_05_u:002.003a: labdhvā hi rājyaṃ puruṣapravīrāḥ; samyak pravṛtteṣu pareṣu caiva
GE07mbh_05_u:002.003c: dhruvaṃ praśāntāḥ sukham āviśeyus; teṣāṃ praśāntiś ca hitaṃ prajānām
GE07mbh_05_u:002.004a: duryodhanasyāpi mataṃ ca vettuṃ; vaktuṃ ca vākyāni yudhiṣṭhirasya
GE07mbh_05_u:002.004c: priyaṃ mama syād yadi tatra kaś cid; vrajec chamārthaṃ kurupāṇḍavānām
GE07mbh_05_u:002.005a: sa bhīṣmam āmantrya kurupravīraṃ; vaicitravīryaṃ ca mahānubhāvam
GE07mbh_05_u:002.005c: droṇaṃ saputraṃ viduraṃ kṛpaṃ ca; gāndhārarājaṃ ca sasūtaputram
GE07mbh_05_u:002.006a: sarve ca ye 'nye dhṛtarāṣṭraputrā; balapradhānā nigamapradhānāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:002.006c: sthitāś ca dharmeṣu yathā svakeṣu; lokapravīrāḥ śrutakālavṛddhāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:002.007a: eteṣu sarveṣu samāgateṣu; paureṣu vṛddheṣu ca saṃgateṣu
GE07mbh_05_u:002.007c: bravītu vākyaṃ praṇipātayuktaṃ; kuntīsutasyārthakaraṃ yathā syāt
GE07mbh_05_u:002.008a: sarvāsv avasthāsu ca te na kauṭyād; grasto hi so 'rtho balam āśritais taiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:002.008c: priyābhyupetasya yudhiṣṭhirasya; dyūte pramattasya hṛtaṃ ca rājyam
GE07mbh_05_u:002.009a: nivāryamāṇaś ca kurupravīraiḥ; sarvaiḥ suhṛdbhir hy ayam apy atajjñaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:002.009c: gāndhārarājasya sutaṃ matākṣaṃ; samāhvayed devitum ājamīḍhaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:002.009c-0015_01: hitvā hi karṇaṃ ca suyodhanaṃ ca
GE07mbh_05_u:002.010a: durodarās tatra sahasraśo 'nye; yudhiṣṭhiro yān viṣaheta jetum
GE07mbh_05_u:002.010c: utsṛjya tān saubalam eva cāyaṃ; samāhvayat tena jito 'kṣavatyām
GE07mbh_05_u:002.011a: sa dīvyamānaḥ pratidevanena; akṣeṣu nityaṃ suparāṅmukheṣu
GE07mbh_05_u:002.011c: saṃrambhamāṇo vijitaḥ prasahya; tatrāparādhaḥ śakuner na kaś cit
GE07mbh_05_u:002.012a: tasmāt praṇamyaiva vaco bravītu; vaicitravīryaṃ bahusāmayuktam
GE07mbh_05_u:002.012c: tathā hi śakyo dhṛtarāṣṭraputraḥ; svārthe niyoktuṃ puruṣeṇa tena
GE07mbh_05_u:002.013a: evaṃ bruvaty eva madhupravīre; śinipravīraḥ sahasotpapāta
GE07mbh_05_u:002.013c: tac cāpi vākyaṃ parinindya tasya; samādade vākyam idaṃ samanyuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:003.002a: santi vai puruṣāḥ śūrāḥ santi kāpuruṣās tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:003.002c: ubhāv etau dṛḍhau pakṣau dṛśyete puruṣān prati
GE07mbh_05_u:003.004c: ye tu śṛṇvanti te vākyaṃ tān asūyāmi mādhava
GE07mbh_05_u:003.005a: kathaṃ hi dharmarājasya doṣam alpam api bruvan
GE07mbh_05_u:003.007a: yadi kuntīsutaṃ gehe krīḍantaṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_05_u:003.007c: abhigamya jayeyus te tat teṣāṃ dharmato bhavet
GE07mbh_05_u:003.008c: nikṛtyā jitavantas te kiṃ nu teṣāṃ paraṃ śubham
GE07mbh_05_u:003.009a: kathaṃ praṇipatec cāyam iha kṛtvā paṇaṃ param
GE07mbh_05_u:003.009c: vanavāsād vimuktas tu prāptaḥ paitāmahaṃ padam
GE07mbh_05_u:003.010c: evam apy ayam atyantaṃ parān nārhati yācitum
GE07mbh_05_u:003.011a: kathaṃ ca dharmayuktās te na ca rājyaṃ jihīrṣavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:003.011c: nivṛttavāsān kaunteyān ya āhur viditā iti
GE07mbh_05_u:003.012a: anunītā hi bhīṣmeṇa droṇena ca mahātmanā
GE07mbh_05_u:003.012c: na vyavasyanti pāṇḍūnāṃ pradātuṃ paitṛkaṃ vasu
GE07mbh_05_u:003.013a: ahaṃ tu tāñ śitair bāṇair anunīya raṇe balāt
GE07mbh_05_u:003.014a: atha te na vyavasyanti praṇipātāya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:003.014d-0017_02: vijiṣṇuṃ manyate loko yudhyantaṃ ca mahītale
GE07mbh_05_u:003.014d-0017_04: chinadmi yadi khaḍgena bhīṣmādīnāṃ śirāṃsy aham
GE07mbh_05_u:003.015a: na hi te yuyudhānasya saṃrabdhasya yuyutsataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:003.016a: ko hi gāṇḍīvadhanvānaṃ kaś ca cakrāyudhaṃ yudhi
GE07mbh_05_u:003.016c: māṃ cāpi viṣahet ko nu kaś ca bhīmaṃ durāsadam
GE07mbh_05_u:003.017c: ko jijīviṣur āsīded dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca pārṣatam
GE07mbh_05_u:003.019a: saubhadraṃ ca maheṣvāsam amarair api duḥsaham
GE07mbh_05_u:003.020a: te vayaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putraṃ śakuninā saha
GE07mbh_05_u:003.021a: nādharmo vidyate kaś cic chatrūn hatvātatāyinaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:003.021d-0019_02: kṣetradāraharaś caiva ṣaḍ ete hy ātatāyinaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:003.021d-0019_04: jighāṃsantaṃ jighāṃsīyān na tena brahmahā bhavet
GE07mbh_05_u:003.022a: hṛdgatas tasya yaḥ kāmas taṃ kurudhvam atandritāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:003.023a: adya pāṇḍusuto rājyaṃ labhatāṃ vā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:003.023c: nihatā vā raṇe sarve svapsyanti vasudhātale
GE07mbh_05_u:004.001a: evam etan mahābāho bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:004.001c: na hi duryodhano rājyaṃ madhureṇa pradāsyati
GE07mbh_05_u:004.003a: baladevasya vākyaṃ tu mama jñāne na yujyate
GE07mbh_05_u:004.003c: etad dhi puruṣeṇāgre kāryaṃ sunayam icchatā
GE07mbh_05_u:004.004a: na tu vācyo mṛdu vaco dhārtarāṣṭraḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:004.004c: na hi mārdavasādhyo 'sau pāpabuddhir mato mama
GE07mbh_05_u:004.005a: gardabhe mārdavaṃ kuryād goṣu tīkṣṇaṃ samācaret
GE07mbh_05_u:004.005c: mṛdu duryodhane vākyaṃ yo brūyāt pāpacetasi
GE07mbh_05_u:004.005d-0020_01: aham eko 'pi jeṣyāmi prāk caiva prahiṇomi tam
GE07mbh_05_u:004.005d-0020_02: nāhaṃ kuryāṃ yad etad vai viśvāsād eva śāśvatam
GE07mbh_05_u:004.005d-0021_01: aham eko vijeṣyāmi prāhatān saṃvidhāya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:004.006a: mṛdu vai manyate pāpo bhāṣyamāṇam aśaktijam
GE07mbh_05_u:004.006c: jitam arthaṃ vijānīyād abudho mārdave sati
GE07mbh_05_u:004.007a: etac caiva kariṣyāmo yatnaś ca kriyatām iha
GE07mbh_05_u:004.008c: kekayānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ dūtā gacchantu śīghragāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:004.009a: sa tu duryodhano nūnaṃ preṣayiṣyati sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:004.009b-0022_01: tāvad dūtān vayaṃ tūrṇaṃ preṣayiṣyāma māciram
GE07mbh_05_u:004.009b-0022_02: sa tu duryodhano nūnaṃ preṣayiṣyati tān nṛpān
GE07mbh_05_u:004.010a: tat tvaradhvaṃ narendrāṇāṃ pūrvam eva pracodane
GE07mbh_05_u:004.010c: mahad dhi kāryaṃ voḍhavyam iti me vartate matiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:004.011a: śalyasya preṣyatāṃ śīghraṃ ye ca tasyānugā nṛpāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:004.013a: ānīyatāṃ bṛhantaś ca senābinduś ca pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:004.014a: bāhlīko muñjakeśaś ca caidyādhipatir eva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:004.014c: supārśvaś ca subāhuś ca pauravaś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:004.015a: śakānāṃ pahlavānāṃ ca daradānāṃ ca ye nṛpāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:004.015c: kāmbojā ṛṣikā ye ca paścimānūpakāś ca ye
GE07mbh_05_u:004.016a: jayatsenaś ca kāśyaś ca tathā pañcanadā nṛpāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:004.016c: krāthaputraś ca durdharṣaḥ pārvatīyāś ca ye nṛpāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:004.017a: jānakiś ca suśarmā ca maṇimān pautimatsyakaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:004.018a: auḍraś ca daṇḍadhāraś ca bṛhatsenaś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_05_u:004.018c: aparājito niṣādaś ca śreṇimān vasumān api
GE07mbh_05_u:004.019c: samudraseno rājā ca saha putreṇa vīryavān
GE07mbh_05_u:004.020a: adāriś ca nadījaś ca karṇaveṣṭaś ca pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:004.020c: samarthaś ca suvīraś ca mārjāraḥ kanyakas tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:004.021a: mahāvīraś ca kadruś ca nikaras tumulaḥ krathaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:004.021c: nīlaś ca vīradharmā ca bhūmipālaś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_05_u:004.022a: durjayo dantavaktraś ca rukmī ca janamejayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:004.022c: āṣāḍho vāyuvegaś ca pūrvapālī ca pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:004.022d-0025_01: ārṣo devā budhaḥ sūtas tathā harihayopamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:004.023c: kārūṣakāś ca rājānaḥ kṣemadhūrtiś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_05_u:004.024a: udbhavaḥ kṣemakaś caiva vāṭadhānaś ca pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:004.024c: śrutāyuś ca dṛḍhāyuś ca śālvaputraś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_05_u:004.025c: eteṣāṃ preṣyatāṃ śīghram etad dhi mama rocate
GE07mbh_05_u:004.026a: ayaṃ ca brāhmaṇaḥ śīghraṃ mama rājan purohitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:004.027a: yathā duryodhano vācyo yathā śāṃtanavo nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:004.027c: dhṛtarāṣṭro yathā vācyo droṇaś ca viduṣāṃ varaḥ vaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:005.002a: etac ca pūrvakāryaṃ naḥ sunītam abhikāṅkṣatām
GE07mbh_05_u:005.002c: anyathā hy ācaran karma puruṣaḥ syāt subāliśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:005.003a: kiṃ tu saṃbandhakaṃ tulyam asmākaṃ kurupāṇḍuṣu
GE07mbh_05_u:005.003c: yatheṣṭaṃ vartamāneṣu pāṇḍaveṣu ca teṣu ca
GE07mbh_05_u:005.004a: te vivāhārtham ānītā vayaṃ sarve yathā bhavān
GE07mbh_05_u:005.004c: kṛte vivāhe muditā gamiṣyāmo gṛhān prati
GE07mbh_05_u:005.005a: bhavān vṛddhatamo rājñāṃ vayasā ca śrutena ca
GE07mbh_05_u:005.005c: śiṣyavat te vayaṃ sarve bhavāmeha na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:005.006a: bhavantaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭraś ca satataṃ bahu manyate
GE07mbh_05_u:005.006c: ācāryayoḥ sakhā cāsi droṇasya ca kṛpasya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:005.006d-0027_01: tasmād yad anurūpaṃ hi sāṃprataṃ tv iha manyase
GE07mbh_05_u:005.007a: sa bhavān preṣayatv adya pāṇḍavārthakaraṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:005.007c: sarveṣāṃ niścitaṃ tan naḥ preṣayiṣyati yad bhavān
GE07mbh_05_u:005.008a: yadi tāvac chamaṃ kuryān nyāyena kurupuṃgavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:005.008b-0028_01: kṛtam ity eva saubhrātram ācariṣyanti pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:005.008c: na bhavet kurupāṇḍūnāṃ saubhrātreṇa mahān kṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:005.009a: atha darpānvito mohān na kuryād dhṛtarāṣṭrajaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:005.009c: anyeṣāṃ preṣayitvā ca paścād asmān samāhvayeḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:005.012c: cakruḥ sāṃgrāmikaṃ sarvaṃ virāṭaś ca mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:005.013a: tataḥ saṃpreṣayām āsa virāṭaḥ saha bāndhavaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:005.015a: tac chrutvā pāṇḍuputrāṇāṃ samāgacchan mahad balam
GE07mbh_05_u:005.017a: balāni teṣāṃ vīrāṇām āgacchanti tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:006.001c: buddhimatsu narāḥ śreṣṭhā narāṇāṃ tu dvijātayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:006.002c: sa bhavān kṛtabuddhīnāṃ pradhāna iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:006.003a: kulena ca viśiṣṭo 'si vayasā ca śrutena ca
GE07mbh_05_u:006.004a: viditaṃ cāpi te sarvaṃ yathāvṛttaḥ sa kauravaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:006.006c: anakṣajñaṃ matākṣaḥ san kṣatravṛtte sthitaṃ śucim
GE07mbh_05_u:006.007a: te tathā vañcayitvā tu dharmaputraṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_05_u:006.007c: na kasyāṃ cid avasthāyāṃ rājyaṃ dāsyanti vai svayam
GE07mbh_05_u:006.008a: bhavāṃs tu dharmasaṃyuktaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ bruvan vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:006.009a: viduraś cāpi tad vākyaṃ sādhayiṣyati tāvakam
GE07mbh_05_u:006.010a: amātyeṣu ca bhinneṣu yodheṣu vimukheṣu ca
GE07mbh_05_u:006.012a: bhidyamāneṣu ca sveṣu lambamāne ca vai tvayi
GE07mbh_05_u:006.012c: na tathā te kariṣyanti senākarma na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:006.013c: saṃgatyā dhṛtarāṣṭraś ca kuryād dharmyaṃ vacas tava
GE07mbh_05_u:006.014a: sa bhavān dharmayuktaś ca dharmyaṃ teṣu samācaran
GE07mbh_05_u:006.015a: vṛddheṣu kuladharmaṃ ca bruvan pūrvair anuṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_05_u:006.015c: vibhetsyati manāṃsy eṣām iti me nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:006.016a: na ca tebhyo bhayaṃ te 'sti brāhmaṇo hy asi vedavit
GE07mbh_05_u:006.016c: dūtakarmaṇi yuktaś ca sthaviraś ca viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:006.017a: sa bhavān puṣyayogena muhūrtena jayena ca
GE07mbh_05_u:006.018d-0031_02: pāṇḍavānāṃ hitārthāya kauravān prati jagmivān vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_05_u:007.001-0032_02: dūtān prasthāpayām āsuḥ pārthivebhyas tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:007.001a: gate dvāravatīṃ kṛṣṇe baladeve ca mādhave
GE07mbh_05_u:007.001c: saha vṛṣṇyandhakaiḥ sarvair bhojaiś ca śataśas tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:007.003a: sa śrutvā mādhavaṃ yātaṃ sadaśvair anilopamaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:007.004a: tam eva divasaṃ cāpi kaunteyaḥ pāṇḍunandanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:007.007c: paścārdhe ca sa kṛṣṇasya prahvo 'tiṣṭhat kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:007.008b-0035_01: paścād duryodhanaṃ bhūpam ucchīrṣe saṃsthitaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:007.008c: sa tayoḥ svāgataṃ kṛtvā yathārhaṃ pratipūjya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:007.009a: tato duryodhanaḥ kṛṣṇam uvāca prahasann iva
GE07mbh_05_u:007.009c: vigrahe 'smin bhavān sāhyaṃ mama dātum ihārhati
GE07mbh_05_u:007.010a: samaṃ hi bhavataḥ sakhyaṃ mayi caivārjune 'pi ca
GE07mbh_05_u:007.010c: tathā saṃbandhakaṃ tulyam asmākaṃ tvayi mādhava
GE07mbh_05_u:007.011a: ahaṃ cābhigataḥ pūrvaṃ tvām adya madhusūdana
GE07mbh_05_u:007.012a: tvaṃ ca śreṣṭhatamo loke satām adya janārdana
GE07mbh_05_u:007.012c: satataṃ saṃmataś caiva sadvṛttam anupālaya śrībhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_05_u:007.012d-0038_01: svāgataṃ tava gāndhāre na mayā vidito bhavān duryodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:007.012d-0038_02: kiṃ cāgamanakṛtyaṃ te kasmin kāle tvam āgataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:007.012d-0038_04: prītyarthī sa bhavān sāhyaṃ mama dātum ihārhati
GE07mbh_05_u:007.012d-0039_02: puruṣottamas tv idaṃ vākyaṃ duryodhanam abhāṣata
GE07mbh_05_u:007.013a: bhavān abhigataḥ pūrvam atra me nāsti saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:007.013c: dṛṣṭas tu prathamaṃ rājan mayā pārtho dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:007.014a: tava pūrvābhigamanāt pūrvaṃ cāpy asya darśanāt
GE07mbh_05_u:007.015a: pravāraṇaṃ tu bālānāṃ pūrvaṃ kāryam iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:007.015c: tasmāt pravāraṇaṃ pūrvam arhaḥ pārtho dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:007.017a: te vā yudhi durādharṣā bhavantv ekasya sainikāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:007.017d-0040_01: etad viditvā kaunteya vicārya ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:007.017d-0040_02: tān vā varaya sāhāyye māṃ sācivyena vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:007.018a: ābhyām anyataraṃ pārtha yat te hṛdyataraṃ matam
GE07mbh_05_u:007.018c: tad vṛṇītāṃ bhavān agre pravāryas tvaṃ hi dharmataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:007.019a: evam uktas tu kṛṣṇena kuntīputro dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:007.019d-0041_01: nārāyaṇam amitraghnaṃ kāmāj jātam ajaṃ nṛṣu
GE07mbh_05_u:007.019d-0042_01: duryodhanas tu tat sainyaṃ sarvam āvarayat tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:007.020a: sahasrāṇāṃ sahasraṃ tu yodhānāṃ prāpya bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:007.020c: kṛṣṇaṃ cāpahṛtaṃ jñātvā saṃprāpa paramāṃ mudam
GE07mbh_05_u:007.021a: duryodhanas tu tat sainyaṃ sarvam ādāya pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:007.022a: sarvaṃ cāgamane hetuṃ sa tasmai saṃnyavedayat
GE07mbh_05_u:007.022c: pratyuvāca tataḥ śaurir dhārtarāṣṭram idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:007.023a: viditaṃ te naravyāghra sarvaṃ bhavitum arhati
GE07mbh_05_u:007.023c: yan mayoktaṃ virāṭasya purā vaivāhike tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:007.024c: mayā saṃbandhakaṃ tulyam iti rājan punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:007.025a: na ca tad vākyam uktaṃ vai keśavaḥ pratyapadyata
GE07mbh_05_u:007.025c: na cāham utsahe kṛṣṇaṃ vinā sthātum api kṣaṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:007.026a: nāhaṃ sahāyaḥ pārthānāṃ nāpi duryodhanasya vai
GE07mbh_05_u:007.026c: iti me niścitā buddir vāsudevam avekṣya ha
GE07mbh_05_u:007.028a: ity evam uktaḥ sa tadā pariṣvajya halāyudham
GE07mbh_05_u:007.028c: kṛṣṇaṃ cāpahṛtaṃ jñātvā yuddhān mene jitaṃ jayam
GE07mbh_05_u:007.029c: kṛtavarmā dadau tasya senām akṣauhiṇīṃ tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:007.031c: ayudhyamānaḥ kāṃ buddhim āsthāyāhaṃ tvayā vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:007.032a: bhavān samarthas tān sarvān nihantuṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:007.032c: nihantum aham apy ekaḥ samarthaḥ puruṣottama
GE07mbh_05_u:007.033a: bhavāṃs tu kīrtimāṃl loke tad yaśas tvāṃ gamiṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:007.033c: yaśasā cāham apy arthī tasmād asi mayā vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:007.034a: sārathyaṃ tu tvayā kāryam iti me mānasaṃ sadā
GE07mbh_05_u:007.034c: cirarātrepsitaṃ kāmaṃ tad bhavān kartum arhati
GE07mbh_05_u:007.035a: upapannam idaṃ pārtha yat spardhethā mayā saha
GE07mbh_05_u:007.035c: sārathyaṃ te kariṣyāmi kāmaḥ saṃpadyatāṃ tava
GE07mbh_05_u:007.036a: evaṃ pramuditaḥ pārthaḥ kṛṣṇena sahitas tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:008.001a: śalyaḥ śrutvā tu dūtānāṃ sainyena mahatā vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:008.001c: abhyayāt pāṇḍavān rājan saha putrair mahārathaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:008.002c: tathā hi bahulāṃ senāṃ sa bibharti nararṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:008.005a: vyathayann iva bhūtāni kampayann iva medinīm
GE07mbh_05_u:008.005c: śanair viśrāmayan senāṃ sa yayau yena pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:008.006d-0046_02: avijñātaṃ ca śalyasya hṛdayasya priyaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_05_u:008.007a: kārayām āsa pūjārthaṃ tasya duryodhanaḥ sabhāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:008.007d-0047_01: śilpibhir vividhaiś caiva krīḍās tatra prayojitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:008.007d-0047_02: tatra mālyāni māṃsāni bhakṣyaṃ peyaṃ ca satkṛtam
GE07mbh_05_u:008.007d-0047_04: vāpyaś ca vividhākārā audakāni gṛhāṇi ca
GE07mbh_05_u:008.008a: sa tāḥ sabhāḥ samāsādya pūjyamāno yathāmaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:008.008f-0048_01: tatra vāsāṃsi mālyāni bhakṣyaṃ peyaṃ ca puṣkalam
GE07mbh_05_u:008.009a: sa tatra viṣayair yuktaḥ kalyāṇair atimānuṣaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:008.010a: papraccha sa tataḥ preṣyān prahṛṣṭaḥ kṣatriyarṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:008.010c: yudhiṣṭhirasya puruṣāḥ ke nu cakruḥ sabhā imāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:008.010e: ānīyantāṃ sabhākārāḥ pradeyārhā hi me matāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:008.010f-0049_02: duryodhanāya tat sarvaṃ kathayanti sma vismitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:008.010f-0049_03: saṃprahṛṣṭo yadā śalyo diditsur api jīvitam
GE07mbh_05_u:008.010f-0050_01: tataḥ prahṛṣṭaṃ rājānaṃ jñātvā te sacivās tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:008.011a: gūḍho duryodhanas tatra darśayām āsa mātulam
GE07mbh_05_u:008.011c: taṃ dṛṣṭvā madrarājas tu jñātvā yatnaṃ ca tasya tam
GE07mbh_05_u:008.011d-0051_01: dṛṣṭvā duryodhanaṃ rājā vismitaḥ sa narottamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:008.011d-0051_03: duryodhanena te rājañ śuśrūṣitam idaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_05_u:008.011d-0051_04: priyaṃ priyārhasya sataḥ kartum arhasi bhūmipa
GE07mbh_05_u:008.011d-0051_05: tam aṅkam upaveśyāśu mūrdhni cāghrāya madrarāṭ
GE07mbh_05_u:008.012a: satyavāg bhava kalyāṇa varo vai mama dīyatām
GE07mbh_05_u:008.012d-0052_01: yathaiva pāṇḍavās tubhyaṃ tathaiva bhavato hy aham śalyaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:008.012d-0052_02: anumānyaṃ ca pālyaṃ ca bhaktaṃ ca bhaja māṃ vibho
GE07mbh_05_u:008.012d-0052_03: evam etan mahārāja yathā vadasi bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:008.012d-0052_04: varaṃ dadāmi te prīta evam etad bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:008.013a: kṛtam ity abravīc chalyaḥ kim anyat kriyatām iti
GE07mbh_05_u:008.013c: kṛtam ity eva gāndhāriḥ pratyuvāca punaḥ punaḥ śalya uvāca
GE07mbh_05_u:008.013d-0053_02: ahaṃ gamiṣye draṣṭuṃ vai yudhiṣṭhiram ariṃdamam
GE07mbh_05_u:008.013d-0053_03: dṛṣṭvā yudhiṣṭhiraṃ rājan kṣipram eṣye narādhipa duryodhana uvāca
GE07mbh_05_u:008.013d-0053_05: kṣipram āgamyatāṃ rājan pāṇḍavaṃ vīkṣya pārthiva śalya uvāca
GE07mbh_05_u:008.013d-0053_06: tvayy adhīnāḥ sma rājendra varadānaṃ smarasva naḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:008.013d-0053_07: kṣipram eṣyāmi bhadraṃ te gacchasva svapuraṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_05_u:008.013d-0054_01: dṛṣṭvā tu pāṇḍavān rājan na mithyā kartum utsahe
GE07mbh_05_u:008.014a: sa tathā śalyam āmantrya punar āyāt svakaṃ puram
GE07mbh_05_u:008.014c: śalyo jagāma kaunteyān ākhyātuṃ karma tasya tat
GE07mbh_05_u:008.015a: upaplavyaṃ sa gatvā tu skandhāvāraṃ praviśya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:008.015c: pāṇḍavān atha tān sarvāñ śalyas tatra dadarśa ha
GE07mbh_05_u:008.015d-0055_01: cirāt tu dṛṣṭvā rājānaṃ mātulaṃ samitiṃjayam
GE07mbh_05_u:008.016a: sametya tu mahābāhuḥ śalyaḥ pāṇḍusutais tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:008.016c: pādyam arghyaṃ ca gāṃ caiva pratyagṛhṇād yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_05_u:008.016d-0056_02: svāgataṃ te 'stu vai rājann etad āsanam āsyatām
GE07mbh_05_u:008.016d-0056_03: tato nyaṣīdac chalyaś ca kāñcane paramāsane
GE07mbh_05_u:008.016d-0056_04: tatra pādyam athārghyaṃ ca nyavedayata pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:008.016d-0057_03: sa taiḥ parivṛtaḥ sarvaiḥ pāṇḍavair dharmacāribhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:008.018a: tathā bhīmārjunau hṛṣṭau svasrīyau ca yamāv ubhau
GE07mbh_05_u:008.018b-0058_01: draupadī ca subhadrā ca abhimanyuś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:008.018c: āsane copaviṣṭas tu śalyaḥ pārtham uvāca ha
GE07mbh_05_u:008.020a: suduṣkaraṃ kṛtaṃ rājan nirjane vasatā vane
GE07mbh_05_u:008.020c: bhrātṛbhiḥ saha rājendra kṛṣṇayā cānayā saha
GE07mbh_05_u:008.021a: ajñātavāsaṃ ghoraṃ ca vasatā duṣkaraṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_05_u:008.021c: duḥkham eva kutaḥ saukhyaṃ rājyabhraṣṭasya bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:008.022c: avāpsyasi sukhaṃ rājan hatvā śatrūn paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_05_u:008.023c: tasmāl lobhakṛtaṃ kiṃ cit tava tāta na vidyate
GE07mbh_05_u:008.023d-0059_02: dāne tapasi satye ca bhava tāta yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_05_u:008.023d-0059_03: kṣamā damaś ca satyaṃ ca ahiṃsā ca yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_05_u:008.023d-0059_04: adbhutaś ca punar lokas tvayi rājan pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:008.023d-0059_06: dharmās te viditā rājan bahavo lokasākṣikāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:008.023d-0059_07: sarvaṃ jagad idaṃ tāta viditaṃ te paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_05_u:008.023d-0059_08: diṣṭyā kṛcchram idaṃ rājan pāritaṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:008.023d-0059_10: nistīrṇaṃ duṣkaraṃ rājaṃs tvāṃ dharmanicayaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_05_u:008.023d-0060_01: utthānaṃ saṃyamo dākṣyam apramādo dhṛtiḥ smṛtiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:008.024c: tac ca śuśrūṣitaṃ sarvaṃ varadānaṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:008.025c: duryodhanasya yad vīra tvayā vācā pratiśrutam
GE07mbh_05_u:008.025e: ekaṃ tv icchāmi bhadraṃ te kriyamāṇaṃ mahīpate
GE07mbh_05_u:008.025f-0062_01: rājann akartavyam api kartum arhasi sattama
GE07mbh_05_u:008.025f-0062_02: mama tv avekṣayā vīra śṛṇu vijñāpayāmi te
GE07mbh_05_u:008.025f-0063_01: spardhate hi sadā karṇaḥ pārthena raṇamūrdhani
GE07mbh_05_u:008.026e: karṇasya bhavatā kāryaṃ sārathyaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:008.027a: tatra pālyo 'rjuno rājan yadi matpriyam icchasi
GE07mbh_05_u:008.027c: tejovadhaś ca te kāryaḥ sauter asmajjayāvahaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:008.027e: akartavyam api hy etat kartum arhasi mātula
GE07mbh_05_u:008.028a: śṛṇu pāṇḍava bhadraṃ te yad bravīṣi durātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:008.028d-0065_01: tejovadhanimittaṃ māṃ tat kariṣyāmi te priyam
GE07mbh_05_u:008.029a: ahaṃ tasya bhaviṣyāmi saṃgrāme sārathir dhruvam
GE07mbh_05_u:008.029c: vāsudevena hi samaṃ nityaṃ māṃ sa hi manyate
GE07mbh_05_u:008.031a: yathā sa hṛtadarpaś ca hṛtatejāś ca pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_05_u:008.031c: bhaviṣyati sukhaṃ hantuṃ satyam etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_05_u:008.032a: evam etat kariṣyāmi yathā tāta tvam āttha mām
GE07mbh_05_u:008.032c: yac cānyad api śakṣyāmi tat kariṣyāmi te priyam
GE07mbh_05_u:008.033a: yac ca duḥkhaṃ tvayā prāptaṃ dyūte vai kṛṣṇayā saha
GE07mbh_05_u:008.035a: sarvaṃ duḥkham idaṃ vīra sukhodarkaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:008.035c: nātra manyus tvayā kāryo vidhir hi balavattaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:008.036c: devair api hi duḥkhāni prāptāni jagatīpate
GE07mbh_05_u:008.036d-0067_02: duḥkhaṃ prāptā yathā rājaṃs tac chṛṇuṣva narādhipa
GE07mbh_05_u:009.001c: duḥkhaṃ prāptaṃ paraṃ ghoram etad icchāmi veditum
GE07mbh_05_u:009.002a: śṛṇu rājan purā vṛttam itihāsaṃ purātanam
GE07mbh_05_u:009.002c: sabhāryeṇa yathā prāptaṃ duḥkham indreṇa bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:009.003a: tvaṣṭā prajāpatir hy āsīd devaśreṣṭho mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:009.003c: sa putraṃ vai triśirasam indradrohāt kilāsṛjat
GE07mbh_05_u:009.004a: aindraṃ sa prārthayat sthānaṃ viśvarūpo mahādyutiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:009.005a: vedān ekena so 'dhīte surām ekena cāpibat
GE07mbh_05_u:009.005c: ekena ca diśaḥ sarvāḥ pibann iva nirīkṣate
GE07mbh_05_u:009.006a: sa tapasvī mṛdur dānto dharme tapasi codyataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:009.007c: viṣādam agamac chakra indro 'yaṃ mā bhaved iti
GE07mbh_05_u:009.008a: kathaṃ sajjeta bhogeṣu na ca tapyen mahat tapaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:009.010a: yathā sa sajjet triśirāḥ kāmabhogeṣu vai bhṛśam
GE07mbh_05_u:009.011c: pralobhayata bhadraṃ vaḥ śamayadhvaṃ bhayaṃ mama
GE07mbh_05_u:009.011d-0069_01: prajāpatir bhaved eṣa candro vaiśravaṇo yamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:009.011d-0069_02: varuṇaḥ pāśahasto vā dharma eva bhavet svayam
GE07mbh_05_u:009.013a: tathā yatnaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ śakra tasya pralobhane
GE07mbh_05_u:009.014a: nirdahann iva cakṣurbhyāṃ yo 'sāv āste taponidhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:009.014c: taṃ pralobhayituṃ deva gacchāmaḥ sahitā vayam
GE07mbh_05_u:009.014e: yatiṣyāmo vaśe kartuṃ vyapanetuṃ ca te bhayam
GE07mbh_05_u:009.015a: indreṇa tās tv anujñātā jagmus triśiraso 'ntikam
GE07mbh_05_u:009.015c: tatra tā vividhair bhāvair lobhayantyo varāṅganāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:009.017a: tās tu yatnaṃ paraṃ kṛtvā punaḥ śakram upasthitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:009.018a: na sa śakyaḥ sudurdharṣo dhairyāc cālayituṃ prabho
GE07mbh_05_u:009.018c: yat te kāryaṃ mahābhāga kriyatāṃ tadanantaram
GE07mbh_05_u:009.020a: sa tūṣṇīṃ cintayan vīro devarājaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_05_u:009.021a: vajram asya kṣipāmy adya sa kṣipraṃ na bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:009.022a: śāstrabuddhyā viniścitya kṛtvā buddhiṃ vadhe dṛḍhām
GE07mbh_05_u:009.022e: mumoca vajraṃ saṃkruddhaḥ śakras triśirasaṃ prati
GE07mbh_05_u:009.023a: sa papāta hatas tena vajreṇa dṛḍham āhataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:009.024a: taṃ tu vajrahataṃ dṛṣṭvā śayānam acalopamam
GE07mbh_05_u:009.024c: na śarma lebhe devendro dīpitas tasya tejasā
GE07mbh_05_u:009.024e: hato 'pi dīptatejāḥ sa jīvann iva ca dṛśyate
GE07mbh_05_u:009.024f-0072_01: śirāṃsi tasya jāyante trīṇy eva śakunās trayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:009.024f-0072_02: tittiriḥ kalaviṅkaś ca tathaiva ca kapiñjalaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:009.025e: kṣipraṃ chindhi śirāṃsy asya kuruṣva vacanaṃ mama takṣovāca
GE07mbh_05_u:009.026a: mahāskandho bhṛśaṃ hy eṣa paraśur na tariṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:009.026c: kartuṃ cāhaṃ na śakṣyāmi karma sadbhir vigarhitam
GE07mbh_05_u:009.027a: mā bhais tvaṃ kṣipram etad vai kuruṣva vacanaṃ mama
GE07mbh_05_u:009.027c: matprasādād dhi te śastraṃ vajrakalpaṃ bhaviṣyati takṣovāca
GE07mbh_05_u:009.028a: kaṃ bhavantam ahaṃ vidyāṃ ghorakarmāṇam adya vai
GE07mbh_05_u:009.028c: etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ tattvena kathayasva me
GE07mbh_05_u:009.029a: aham indro devarājas takṣan viditam astu te
GE07mbh_05_u:009.029c: kuruṣvaitad yathoktaṃ me takṣan mā tvaṃ vicāraya
GE07mbh_05_u:009.029d-0073_01: mayā hi nihataḥ śete triśirās tvaṃ ca viddhi vai
GE07mbh_05_u:009.029d-0073_02: sa prahvaḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā idaṃ vacanam abravīt takṣovāca
GE07mbh_05_u:009.030c: ṛṣiputram imaṃ hatvā brahmahatyābhayaṃ na te
GE07mbh_05_u:009.031c: śatrur eṣa mahāvīryo vajreṇa nihato mayā
GE07mbh_05_u:009.032a: adyāpi cāham udvignas takṣann asmād bibhemi vai
GE07mbh_05_u:009.032c: kṣipraṃ chindhi śirāṃsi tvaṃ kariṣye 'nugrahaṃ tava
GE07mbh_05_u:009.033a: śiraḥ paśos te dāsyanti bhāgaṃ yajñeṣu mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:009.033c: eṣa te 'nugrahas takṣan kṣipraṃ kuru mama priyam
GE07mbh_05_u:009.034a: etac chrutvā tu takṣā sa mahendravacanaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:009.035a: nikṛtteṣu tatas teṣu niṣkrāmaṃs triśirās tv atha
GE07mbh_05_u:009.035c: kapiñjalās tittirāś ca kalaviṅkāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:009.036a: yena vedān adhīte sma pibate somam eva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:009.036c: tasmād vaktrān viniṣpetuḥ kṣipraṃ tasya kapiñjalāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:009.037a: yena sarvā diśo rājan pibann iva nirīkṣate
GE07mbh_05_u:009.037c: tasmād vaktrād viniṣpetus tittirās tasya pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_05_u:009.038a: yat surāpaṃ tu tasyāsīd vaktraṃ triśirasas tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:009.039a: tatas teṣu nikṛtteṣu vijvaro maghavān abhūt
GE07mbh_05_u:009.039b-0074_01: takṣṇe caiva varaṃ dattvā prahṛṣṭas tridaśeśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:009.039c: jagāma tridivaṃ hṛṣṭas takṣāpi svagṛhān yayau
GE07mbh_05_u:009.039d-0075_01: takṣāpi svagṛhaṃ gatvā naiva śaṃsati kasya cit
GE07mbh_05_u:009.039d-0075_03: atha saṃvatsare pūrṇe bhūtāḥ paśupateḥ prabho
GE07mbh_05_u:009.039d-0075_04: te cākrośanta maghavān naḥ prabhur brahmahā iti
GE07mbh_05_u:009.039d-0075_05: tata indro vrataṃ ghoram acarat pākaśāsanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:009.039d-0075_06: tapasā ca susaṃyuktaḥ saha devair marudgaṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:009.039d-0075_07: samudre ca pṛthivyāṃ ca vanaspatiṣu strīṣu ca
GE07mbh_05_u:009.039d-0075_08: vibhajya brahmahatyāṃ ca tāṃś ca saṃyojayad varaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:009.039d-0075_09: varadas tu varaṃ dattvā pṛthivyai sāgarāya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:009.039d-0075_10: vanaspatibhyaḥ strībhyaś ca brahmahatyāṃ nunoda tām
GE07mbh_05_u:009.039d-0075_11: tatas tu śuddho bhagavān devair lokaiś ca pūjitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:009.039d-0076_01: mene kṛtārtham ātmānaṃ hatvā śatruṃ surārihā
GE07mbh_05_u:009.040a: tvaṣṭā prajāpatiḥ śrutvā śakreṇātha hataṃ sutam
GE07mbh_05_u:009.041a: tapyamānaṃ tapo nityaṃ kṣāntaṃ dāntaṃ jitendriyam
GE07mbh_05_u:009.042c: lokāḥ paśyantu me vīryaṃ tapasaś ca balaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_05_u:009.042e: sa ca paśyatu devendro durātmā pāpacetanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:009.043c: agniṃ hutvā samutpādya ghoraṃ vṛtram uvāca ha
GE07mbh_05_u:009.044e: śakraṃ jahīti cāpy ukto jagāma tridivaṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:009.045d-0077_01: grastā lokāś ca vṛtreṇa sarve bharatasattama
GE07mbh_05_u:009.045d-0077_03: sarve gandhendriyarasā hṛtā bhārata tena vai
GE07mbh_05_u:009.045d-0077_04: pṛthivī vāyur ākāśa āpo jyotiś ca pañcamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:009.046a: tato jagrāha devendraṃ vṛtro vīraḥ śatakratum
GE07mbh_05_u:009.047a: graste vṛtreṇa śakre tu saṃbhrāntās tridaśās tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:009.049a: jahṛṣuś ca surāḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā śakraṃ viniḥsṛtam
GE07mbh_05_u:009.050c: tvaṣṭus tapobalād vidvāṃs tadā śakro nyavartata
GE07mbh_05_u:009.051a: nivṛtte tu tadā devā viṣādam agaman param
GE07mbh_05_u:009.051c: sametya śakreṇa ca te tvaṣṭus tejovimohitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:009.051e: amantrayanta te sarve munibhiḥ saha bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:009.052a: kiṃ kāryam iti te rājan vicintya bhayamohitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:009.052c: jagmuḥ sarve mahātmānaṃ manobhir viṣṇum avyayam
GE07mbh_05_u:010.001-0078_02: śṛṇu me bhrātṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ draupadyā ca jayāvaham
GE07mbh_05_u:010.001-0080_01: sarvaṃ vyāptaṃ jagat tena vṛtreṇetīha naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_05_u:010.001-0080_03: athendro hi mahātejāḥ sametya saha devataiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:010.001a: sarvaṃ vyāptam idaṃ devā vṛtreṇa jagad avyayam
GE07mbh_05_u:010.001c: na hy asya sadṛśaṃ kiṃ cit pratighātāya yad bhavet
GE07mbh_05_u:010.002a: samartho hy abhavaṃ pūrvam asamartho 'smi sāṃpratam
GE07mbh_05_u:010.002c: kathaṃ kuryāṃ nu bhadraṃ vo duṣpradharṣaḥ sa me mataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:010.003a: tejasvī ca mahātmā ca yuddhe cāmitavikramaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:010.004a: tasmād viniścayam imaṃ śṛṇudhvaṃ me divaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:010.004c: viṣṇoḥ kṣayam upāgamya sametya ca mahātmanā
GE07mbh_05_u:010.005a: evam ukte maghavatā devāḥ sarṣigaṇās tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:010.005c: śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ devaṃ jagmur viṣṇuṃ mahābalam
GE07mbh_05_u:010.006a: ūcuś ca sarve deveśaṃ viṣṇuṃ vṛtrabhayārditāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:010.006c: tvayā lokās trayaḥ krāntās tribhir vikramaṇaiḥ prabho
GE07mbh_05_u:010.007a: amṛtaṃ cāhṛtaṃ viṣṇo daityāś ca nihatā raṇe
GE07mbh_05_u:010.007c: baliṃ baddhvā mahādaityaṃ śakro devādhipaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:010.008a: tvaṃ prabhuḥ sarvalokānāṃ tvayā sarvam idaṃ tatam
GE07mbh_05_u:010.009a: gatir bhava tvaṃ devānāṃ sendrāṇām amarottama
GE07mbh_05_u:010.010a: avaśyaṃ karaṇīyaṃ me bhavatāṃ hitam uttamam
GE07mbh_05_u:010.010c: tasmād upāyaṃ vakṣyāmi yathāsau na bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:010.011c: sāma tasya prayuñjadhvaṃ tata enaṃ vijeṣyatha
GE07mbh_05_u:010.012a: bhaviṣyati gatir devāḥ śakrasya mama tejasā
GE07mbh_05_u:010.013a: gacchadhvam ṛṣibhiḥ sārdhaṃ gandharvaiś ca surottamāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:010.013c: vṛtrasya saha śakreṇa saṃdhiṃ kuruta māciram
GE07mbh_05_u:010.014a: evam uktās tu devena ṛṣayas tridaśās tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:010.014c: yayuḥ sametya sahitāḥ śakraṃ kṛtvā puraḥsaram
GE07mbh_05_u:010.015a: samīpam etya ca tadā sarva eva mahaujasaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:010.015c: taṃ tejasā prajvalitaṃ pratapantaṃ diśo daśa
GE07mbh_05_u:010.016a: grasantam iva lokāṃs trīn sūryācandramasau yathā
GE07mbh_05_u:010.016c: dadṛśus tatra te vṛtraṃ śakreṇa saha devatāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:010.017a: ṛṣayo 'tha tato 'bhyetya vṛtram ūcuḥ priyaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:010.017c: vyāptaṃ jagad idaṃ sarvaṃ tejasā tava durjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:010.018a: na ca śaknoṣi nirjetuṃ vāsavaṃ bhūrivikramam
GE07mbh_05_u:010.018c: yudhyatoś cāpi vāṃ kālo vyatītaḥ sumahān iha
GE07mbh_05_u:010.019c: sakhyaṃ bhavatu te vṛtra śakreṇa saha nityadā
GE07mbh_05_u:010.019e: avāpsyasi sukhaṃ tvaṃ ca śakralokāṃś ca śāśvatān
GE07mbh_05_u:010.020c: uvāca tāṃs tadā sarvān praṇamya śirasāsuraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:010.021a: sarve yūyaṃ mahābhāgā gandharvāś caiva sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:010.021c: yad brūta tac chrutaṃ sarvaṃ mamāpi śṛṇutānaghāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:010.022a: saṃdhiḥ kathaṃ vai bhavitā mama śakrasya cobhayoḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:010.022c: tejasor hi dvayor devāḥ sakhyaṃ vai bhavitā katham
GE07mbh_05_u:010.023a: sakṛt satāṃ saṃgataṃ lipsitavyaṃ; tataḥ paraṃ bhavitā bhavyam eva
GE07mbh_05_u:010.023c: nātikramet satpuruṣeṇa saṃgataṃ; tasmāt satāṃ saṃgataṃ lipsitavyam
GE07mbh_05_u:010.024a: dṛḍhaṃ satāṃ saṃgataṃ cāpi nityaṃ; brūyāc cārthaṃ hy arthakṛcchreṣu dhīraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:010.024c: mahārthavat satpuruṣeṇa saṃgataṃ; tasmāt santaṃ na jighāṃseta dhīraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:010.025a: indraḥ satāṃ saṃmataś ca nivāsaś ca mahātmanām
GE07mbh_05_u:010.025c: satyavādī hy adīnaś ca dharmavit suviniścitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:010.026a: tena te saha śakreṇa saṃdhir bhavatu śāśvataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:010.026c: evaṃ viśvāsam āgaccha mā te bhūd buddhir anyathā
GE07mbh_05_u:010.028a: bravīmi yad ahaṃ devās tat sarvaṃ kriyatām iha
GE07mbh_05_u:010.028c: tataḥ sarvaṃ kariṣyāmi yad ūcur māṃ dvijarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:010.029a: na śuṣkeṇa na cārdreṇa nāśmanā na ca dāruṇā
GE07mbh_05_u:010.029c: na śastreṇa na vajreṇa na divā na tathā niśi
GE07mbh_05_u:010.030a: vadhyo bhaveyaṃ viprendrāḥ śakrasya saha daivataiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:010.030c: evaṃ me rocate saṃdhiḥ śakreṇa saha nityadā
GE07mbh_05_u:010.031a: bāḍham ity eva ṛṣayas tam ūcur bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:010.031c: evaṃ kṛte tu saṃdhāne vṛtraḥ pramudito 'bhavat
GE07mbh_05_u:010.031d-0085_01: tataḥ saṃdhiṃ mithaḥ kṛtvā ṛṣayo dīptatejasaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:010.031d-0085_02: śakrasya saha vṛtreṇa punar jagmur yathāgatam
GE07mbh_05_u:010.031d-0086_01: atha dīrghasya kālasya śakraḥ saṃcintya bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:010.032f-0087_02: ṛṣibhis tv īritaṃ yac ca mahendras tad anusmaran
GE07mbh_05_u:010.033a: sa kadā cit samudrānte tam apaśyan mahāsuram
GE07mbh_05_u:010.034c: saṃdhyeyaṃ vartate raudrā na rātrir divasaṃ na ca
GE07mbh_05_u:010.034d-0088_01: varaś cānena saṃprāpto hy avadhyo daivatair api
GE07mbh_05_u:010.034d-0088_02: tat kathaṃ tv iha kartavyam upāyaṃ cintaye sadā
GE07mbh_05_u:010.035a: yadi vṛtraṃ na hanmy adya vañcayitvā mahāsuram
GE07mbh_05_u:010.035c: mahābalaṃ mahākāyaṃ na me śreyo bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:010.036a: evaṃ saṃcintayann eva śakro viṣṇum anusmaran
GE07mbh_05_u:010.037a: nāyaṃ śuṣko na cārdro 'yaṃ na ca śastram idaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:010.037c: enaṃ kṣepsyāmi vṛtrasya kṣaṇād eva naśiṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:010.038a: savajram atha phenaṃ taṃ kṣipraṃ vṛtre nisṛṣṭavān
GE07mbh_05_u:010.038b-0089_01: jagrāha ca sa taṃ phenam indro vṛtranibarhaṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:010.038c: praviśya phenaṃ taṃ viṣṇur atha vṛtraṃ vyanāśayat
GE07mbh_05_u:010.039a: nihate tu tato vṛtre diśo vitimirābhavan
GE07mbh_05_u:010.039c: pravavau ca śivo vāyuḥ prajāś ca jahṛṣus tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:010.040c: ṛṣayaś ca mahendraṃ tam astuvan vividhaiḥ stavaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:010.042f-0090_01: mahādevasya bhūtaiś ca sa punar brahmahann iti
GE07mbh_05_u:010.043c: na prājñāyata devendras tv abhibhūtaḥ svakalmaṣaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:010.045c: devāś cāpi bhṛśaṃ trastās tathā sarve maharṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:010.046b-0091_01: rājā vā kriyatām adya mahendro vātha mṛgyatām
GE07mbh_05_u:010.046c: tato bhītābhavan devāḥ ko no rājā bhaved iti
GE07mbh_05_u:010.047c: na ca sma kaś cid devānāṃ rājyāya kurute manaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:011.001d-0092_01: tejasvī ca yaśasvī ca dhārmikaś caiva nityadā
GE07mbh_05_u:011.001e: te gatvāthābruvan sarve rājā no bhava pārthiva
GE07mbh_05_u:011.002a: sa tān uvāca nahuṣo devān ṛṣigaṇāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:011.002c: pitṛbhiḥ sahitān rājan parīpsan hitam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:011.003a: durbalo 'haṃ na me śaktir bhavatāṃ paripālane
GE07mbh_05_u:011.003c: balavāñ jāyate rājā balaṃ śakre hi nityadā
GE07mbh_05_u:011.004a: tam abruvan punaḥ sarve devāḥ sarṣipurogamāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:011.004c: asmākaṃ tapasā yuktaḥ pāhi rājyaṃ triviṣṭape
GE07mbh_05_u:011.005a: parasparabhayaṃ ghoram asmākaṃ hi na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:011.006e: teja ādāsyase paśyan balavāṃś ca bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_05_u:011.007c: brahmarṣīṃś cāpi devāṃś ca gopāyasva triviṣṭape
GE07mbh_05_u:011.007d-0094_01: abhiṣiktaḥ sa rājendra tato rājā triviṣṭape
GE07mbh_05_u:011.008a: sudurlabhaṃ varaṃ labdhvā prāpya rājyaṃ triviṣṭape
GE07mbh_05_u:011.009e: sahye mahendre malaye samudreṣu saritsu ca
GE07mbh_05_u:011.010c: nahuṣo devarājaḥ san krīḍan bahuvidhaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:011.011c: vāditrāṇi ca sarvāṇi gītaṃ ca madhurasvaram
GE07mbh_05_u:011.012c: ṛtavaḥ ṣaṭ ca devendraṃ mūrtimanta upasthitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:011.013a: evaṃ hi krīḍatas tasya nahuṣasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:011.013c: saṃprāptā darśanaṃ devī śakrasya mahiṣī priyā
GE07mbh_05_u:011.014a: sa tāṃ saṃdṛśya duṣṭātmā prāha sarvān sabhāsadaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:011.014c: indrasya mahiṣī devī kasmān māṃ nopatiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_05_u:011.015a: aham indro 'smi devānāṃ lokānāṃ ca tatheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:011.015c: āgacchatu śacī mahyaṃ kṣipram adya niveśanam
GE07mbh_05_u:011.016a: tac chrutvā durmanā devī bṛhaspatim uvāca ha
GE07mbh_05_u:011.016c: rakṣa māṃ nahuṣād brahmaṃs tavāsmi śaraṇaṃ gatā
GE07mbh_05_u:011.018c: uktavān asi māṃ pūrvam ṛtāṃ tāṃ kuru vai giram
GE07mbh_05_u:011.019a: noktapūrvaṃ ca bhagavan mṛṣā te kiṃ cid īśvara
GE07mbh_05_u:011.019c: tasmād etad bhavet satyaṃ tvayoktaṃ dvijasattama
GE07mbh_05_u:011.020c: yad uktāsi mayā devi satyaṃ tad bhavitā dhruvam
GE07mbh_05_u:011.021c: na bhetavyaṃ ca nahuṣāt satyam etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_05_u:011.022a: atha śuśrāva nahuṣa indrāṇīṃ śaraṇaṃ gatām
GE07mbh_05_u:011.022c: bṛhaspater aṅgirasaś cukrodha sa nṛpas tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:012.001a: kruddhaṃ tu nahuṣaṃ jñātvā devāḥ sarṣipurogamāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:012.002a: devarāja jahi krodhaṃ tvayi kruddhe jagadvibho
GE07mbh_05_u:012.003a: jahi krodham imaṃ sādho na krudhyanti bhavadvidhāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:012.003c: parasya patnī sā devī prasīdasva sureśvara
GE07mbh_05_u:012.004c: devarājo 'si bhadraṃ te prajā dharmeṇa pālaya
GE07mbh_05_u:012.005a: evam ukto na jagrāha tad vacaḥ kāmamohitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:012.005c: atha devān uvācedam indraṃ prati surādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:012.006c: jīvato bhartur indreṇa sa vaḥ kiṃ na nivāritaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:012.007a: bahūni ca nṛśaṃsāni kṛtānīndreṇa vai purā
GE07mbh_05_u:012.007c: vaidharmyāṇy upadhāś caiva sa vaḥ kiṃ na nivāritaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:012.008a: upatiṣṭhatu māṃ devī etad asyā hitaṃ param
GE07mbh_05_u:012.008c: yuṣmākaṃ ca sadā devāḥ śivam evaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:012.009c: jahi krodham imaṃ vīra prīto bhava sureśvara
GE07mbh_05_u:012.010a: ity uktvā te tadā devā ṛṣibhiḥ saha bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:012.010c: jagmur bṛhaspatiṃ vaktum indrāṇīṃ cāśubhaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:012.011a: jānīmaḥ śaraṇaṃ prāptam indrāṇīṃ tava veśmani
GE07mbh_05_u:012.012a: te tvāṃ devāḥ sagandharvā ṛṣayaś ca mahādyute
GE07mbh_05_u:012.014a: evam ukte tu sā devī bāṣpam utsṛjya sasvaram
GE07mbh_05_u:012.014c: uvāca rudatī dīnā bṛhaspatim idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:012.015a: nāham icchāmi nahuṣaṃ patim anvāsya taṃ prabhum
GE07mbh_05_u:012.015c: śaraṇāgatāsmi te brahmaṃs trāhi māṃ mahato bhayāt
GE07mbh_05_u:012.015d-0096_01: evam uktas tayā devyā vākyam āha bṛhaspatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:012.016a: śaraṇāgatāṃ na tyajeyam indrāṇi mama niścitam
GE07mbh_05_u:012.016c: dharmajñāṃ dharmaśīlāṃ ca na tyaje tvām anindite
GE07mbh_05_u:012.017a: nākāryaṃ kartum icchāmi brāhmaṇaḥ san viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:012.018a: nāham etat kariṣyāmi gacchadhvaṃ vai surottamāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:012.018c: asmiṃś cārthe purā gītaṃ brahmaṇā śrūyatām idam
GE07mbh_05_u:012.019a: na tasya bījaṃ rohati bījakāle; na cāsya varṣaṃ varṣati varṣakāle
GE07mbh_05_u:012.019c: bhītaṃ prapannaṃ pradadāti śatrave; na so 'ntaraṃ labhate trāṇam icchan
GE07mbh_05_u:012.020a: mogham annaṃ vindati cāpy acetāḥ; svargāl lokād bhraśyati naṣṭaceṣṭaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:012.020c: bhītaṃ prapannaṃ pradadāti yo vai; na tasya havyaṃ pratigṛhṇanti devāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:012.021a: pramīyate cāsya prajā hy akāle; sadā vivāsaṃ pitaro 'sya kurvate
GE07mbh_05_u:012.021c: bhītaṃ prapannaṃ pradadāti śatrave; sendrā devāḥ praharanty asya vajram
GE07mbh_05_u:012.022a: etad evaṃ vijānan vai na dāsyāmi śacīm imām
GE07mbh_05_u:012.022c: indrāṇīṃ viśrutāṃ loke śakrasya mahiṣīṃ priyām
GE07mbh_05_u:012.023a: asyā hitaṃ bhaved yac ca mama cāpi hitaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_05_u:012.023c: kriyatāṃ tat suraśreṣṭhā na hi dāsyāmy ahaṃ śacīm
GE07mbh_05_u:012.024a: atha devās tam evāhur gurum aṅgirasāṃ varam
GE07mbh_05_u:012.024c: kathaṃ sunītaṃ tu bhaven mantrayasva bṛhaspate
GE07mbh_05_u:012.025a: nahuṣaṃ yācatāṃ devī kiṃ cit kālāntaraṃ śubhā
GE07mbh_05_u:012.027a: tatas tena tathokte tu prītā devās tam abruvan
GE07mbh_05_u:012.027c: brahman sādhv idam uktaṃ te hitaṃ sarvadivaukasām
GE07mbh_05_u:012.027e: evam etad dvijaśreṣṭha devī ceyaṃ prasādyatām
GE07mbh_05_u:012.029a: tvayā jagad idaṃ sarvaṃ dhṛtaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamam
GE07mbh_05_u:012.029c: ekapatny asi satyā ca gacchasva nahuṣaṃ prati
GE07mbh_05_u:012.030a: kṣipraṃ tvām abhikāmaś ca vinaśiṣyati pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:012.030c: nahuṣo devi śakraś ca suraiśvaryam avāpsyati
GE07mbh_05_u:013.001a: atha tām abravīd dṛṣṭvā nahuṣo devarāṭ tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:013.001c: trayāṇām api lokānām aham indraḥ śucismite
GE07mbh_05_u:013.002a: evam uktā tu sā devī nahuṣeṇa pativratā
GE07mbh_05_u:013.003a: namasya sā tu brahmāṇaṃ kṛtvā śirasi cāñjalim
GE07mbh_05_u:013.004a: kālam icchāmy ahaṃ labdhuṃ kiṃ cit tvattaḥ sureśvara
GE07mbh_05_u:013.004c: na hi vijñāyate śakraḥ prāptaḥ kiṃ vā kva vā gataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:013.005a: tattvam etat tu vijñāya yadi na jñāyate prabho
GE07mbh_05_u:013.005c: tato 'haṃ tvām upasthāsye satyam etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_05_u:013.005e: evam uktaḥ sa indrāṇyā nahuṣaḥ prītimān abhūt
GE07mbh_05_u:013.006a: evaṃ bhavatu suśroṇi yathā mām abhibhāṣase
GE07mbh_05_u:013.006c: jñātvā cāgamanaṃ kāryaṃ satyam etad anusmareḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:013.007a: nahuṣeṇa visṛṣṭā ca niścakrāma tataḥ śubhā
GE07mbh_05_u:013.008a: tasyāḥ saṃśrutya ca vaco devāḥ sāgnipurogamāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:013.010b-0097_01: kva gato neti jānīmo devadeva jagatpate
GE07mbh_05_u:013.010b-0098_01: avijñātaḥ suragaṇair gato na jñāyate prabho
GE07mbh_05_u:013.010c: gatiś ca nas tvaṃ deveśa pūrvajo jagataḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:013.012a: teṣāṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā devānāṃ viṣṇur abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:013.012c: mām eva yajatāṃ śakraḥ pāvayiṣyāmi vajriṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:013.014a: svakarmabhiś ca nahuṣo nāśaṃ yāsyati durmatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:013.014c: kaṃ cit kālam imaṃ devā marṣayadhvam atandritāḥ śalya uvāca
GE07mbh_05_u:013.015a: śrutvā viṣṇoḥ śubhāṃ satyāṃ tāṃ vāṇīm amṛtopamām
GE07mbh_05_u:013.015e: yatra śakro bhayodvignas taṃ deśam upacakramuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:013.017a: vibhajya brahmahatyāṃ tu vṛkṣeṣu ca nadīṣu ca
GE07mbh_05_u:013.017c: parvateṣu pṛthivyāṃ ca strīṣu caiva yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_05_u:013.018a: saṃvibhajya ca bhūteṣu visṛjya ca sureśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:013.019a: akampyaṃ nahuṣaṃ sthānād dṛṣṭvā ca balasūdanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:013.020a: tataḥ śacīpatir vīraḥ punar eva vyanaśyata
GE07mbh_05_u:013.021a: pranaṣṭe tu tataḥ śakre śacī śokasamanvitā
GE07mbh_05_u:013.021c: hā śakreti tadā devī vilalāpa suduḥkhitā
GE07mbh_05_u:013.022a: yadi dattaṃ yadi hutaṃ guravas toṣitā yadi
GE07mbh_05_u:013.022c: ekabhartṛtvam evāstu satyaṃ yady asti vā mayi
GE07mbh_05_u:013.023a: puṇyāṃ cemām ahaṃ divyāṃ pravṛttām uttarāyaṇe
GE07mbh_05_u:013.023c: devīṃ rātriṃ namasyāmi sidhyatāṃ me manorathaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:013.024a: prayatā ca niśāṃ devīm upātiṣṭhata tatra sā
GE07mbh_05_u:013.024d-0100_01: sā dṛṣṭvā tāṃ tato devīṃ pratyuvāca yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_05_u:013.025a: yatrāste devarājo 'sau taṃ deśaṃ darśayasva me
GE07mbh_05_u:013.025c: ity āhopaśrutiṃ devī satyaṃ satyena dṛśyatām
GE07mbh_05_u:014.002c: icchāmi tvām ahaṃ jñātuṃ kā tvaṃ brūhi varānane
GE07mbh_05_u:014.002d-0101_01: evam uktā tathendrāṇyā devī vākyam athābravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:014.003c: darśanaṃ caiva saṃprāptā tava satyena toṣitā
GE07mbh_05_u:014.004a: pativratāsi yuktā ca yamena niyamena ca
GE07mbh_05_u:014.004e: kṣipram anvehi bhadraṃ te drakṣyase surasattamam
GE07mbh_05_u:014.005a: tatas tāṃ prasthitāṃ devīm indrāṇī sā samanvagāt
GE07mbh_05_u:014.005c: devāraṇyāny atikramya parvatāṃś ca bahūṃs tataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:014.008d-0102_01: sarasas tasya madhye tu padminī mahatī śubhā
GE07mbh_05_u:014.009a: padmasya bhittvā nālaṃ ca viveśa sahitā tayā
GE07mbh_05_u:014.010a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā ca susūkṣmeṇa rūpeṇāvasthitaṃ prabhum
GE07mbh_05_u:014.011c: stūyamānas tato devaḥ śacīm āha puraṃdaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:014.012a: kimartham asi saṃprāptā vijñātaś ca kathaṃ tv aham
GE07mbh_05_u:014.012c: tataḥ sā kathayām āsa nahuṣasya viceṣṭitam
GE07mbh_05_u:014.013c: darpāviṣṭaś ca duṣṭātmā mām uvāca śatakrato
GE07mbh_05_u:014.013e: upatiṣṭha mām iti krūraḥ kālaṃ ca kṛtavān mama
GE07mbh_05_u:014.014a: yadi na trāsyasi vibho kariṣyati sa māṃ vaśe
GE07mbh_05_u:014.014c: etena cāhaṃ saṃtaptā prāptā śakra tavāntikam
GE07mbh_05_u:014.015c: tejaḥ samāpnuhi vibho devarājyaṃ praśādhi ca
GE07mbh_05_u:014.015d-0104_01: yathaiva ca mahārāja tvayā vṛtro niṣūditaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:015.001a: evam uktaḥ sa bhagavāñ śacyā punar athābravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:015.002a: vivardhitaś ca ṛṣibhir havyaiḥ kavyaiś ca bhāmini
GE07mbh_05_u:015.002c: nītim atra vidhāsyāmi devi tāṃ kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_05_u:015.003a: guhyaṃ caitat tvayā kāryaṃ nākhyātavyaṃ śubhe kva cit
GE07mbh_05_u:015.004c: evaṃ tava vaśe prītā bhaviṣyāmīti taṃ vada
GE07mbh_05_u:015.005a: ity uktā devarājena patnī sā kamalekṣaṇā
GE07mbh_05_u:015.005c: evam astv ity athoktvā tu jagāma nahuṣaṃ prati
GE07mbh_05_u:015.006a: nahuṣas tāṃ tato dṛṣṭvā vismito vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:015.006c: svāgataṃ te varārohe kiṃ karomi śucismite
GE07mbh_05_u:015.007a: bhaktaṃ māṃ bhaja kalyāṇi kim icchasi manasvini
GE07mbh_05_u:015.007c: tava kalyāṇi yat kāryaṃ tat kariṣye sumadhyame
GE07mbh_05_u:015.008a: na ca vrīḍā tvayā kāryā suśroṇi mayi viśvasa
GE07mbh_05_u:015.008c: satyena vai śape devi kartāsmi vacanaṃ tava
GE07mbh_05_u:015.009a: yo me tvayā kṛtaḥ kālas tam ākāṅkṣe jagatpate
GE07mbh_05_u:015.009c: tatas tvam eva bhartā me bhaviṣyasi surādhipa
GE07mbh_05_u:015.010a: kāryaṃ ca hṛdi me yat tad devarājāvadhāraya
GE07mbh_05_u:015.010c: vakṣyāmi yadi me rājan priyam etat kariṣyasi
GE07mbh_05_u:015.010e: vākyaṃ praṇayasaṃyuktaṃ tataḥ syāṃ vaśagā tava
GE07mbh_05_u:015.011a: indrasya vājino vāhā hastino 'tha rathās tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:015.011c: icchāmy aham ihāpūrvaṃ vāhanaṃ te surādhipa
GE07mbh_05_u:015.011e: yan na viṣṇor na rudrasya nāsurāṇāṃ na rakṣasām
GE07mbh_05_u:015.012a: vahantu tvāṃ mahārāja ṛṣayaḥ saṃgatā vibho
GE07mbh_05_u:015.012c: sarve śibikayā rājann etad dhi mama rocate
GE07mbh_05_u:015.013a: nāsureṣu na deveṣu tulyo bhavitum arhasi
GE07mbh_05_u:015.013c: sarveṣāṃ teja ādatsva svena vīryeṇa darśanāt
GE07mbh_05_u:015.013e: na te pramukhataḥ sthātuṃ kaś cid icchati vīryavān
GE07mbh_05_u:015.014a: evam uktas tu nahuṣaḥ prāhṛṣyata tadā kila
GE07mbh_05_u:015.014c: uvāca vacanaṃ cāpi surendras tām aninditām
GE07mbh_05_u:015.015c: dṛḍhaṃ me rucitaṃ devi tvadvaśo 'smi varānane
GE07mbh_05_u:015.016a: na hy alpavīryo bhavati yo vāhān kurute munīn
GE07mbh_05_u:015.017a: mayi kruddhe jagan na syān mayi sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_05_u:015.018a: na me kruddhasya paryāptāḥ sarve lokāḥ śucismite
GE07mbh_05_u:015.018c: cakṣuṣā yaṃ prapaśyāmi tasya tejo harāmy aham
GE07mbh_05_u:015.018d-0105_01: aham indro 'smi devānāṃ lokānāṃ ca maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:015.018d-0105_02: mayi havyaṃ ca kavyaṃ ca lokāś caiva sanātanāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:015.019a: tasmāt te vacanaṃ devi kariṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:015.019c: saptarṣayo māṃ vakṣyanti sarve brahmarṣayas tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:015.019e: paśya māhātmyam asmākam ṛddhiṃ ca varavarṇini
GE07mbh_05_u:015.019f-0106_02: yad yasya tejaḥ paśyāmi tasya tejo harāmy aham
GE07mbh_05_u:015.020a: evam uktvā tu tāṃ devīṃ visṛjya ca varānanām
GE07mbh_05_u:015.020b-0107_02: visṛjya supratīkaṃ ca nāgam airāvataṃ tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:015.020b-0107_03: haṃsayuktaṃ vimānaṃ ca hariyuktaṃ tathā ratham
GE07mbh_05_u:015.020b-0107_04: sa tu darpeṇa mahatā paribhūya mahāmunīn
GE07mbh_05_u:015.020c: vimāne yojayitvā sa ṛṣīn niyamam āsthitān
GE07mbh_05_u:015.021c: kāmavṛttaḥ sa duṣṭātmā vāhayām āsa tān ṛṣīn
GE07mbh_05_u:015.022a: nahuṣeṇa visṛṣṭā ca bṛhaspatim uvāca sā
GE07mbh_05_u:015.022e: śakraṃ mṛgaya śīghraṃ tvaṃ bhaktāyāḥ kuru me dayām
GE07mbh_05_u:015.023a: bāḍham ity eva bhagavān bṛhaspatir uvāca tām
GE07mbh_05_u:015.023c: na bhetavyaṃ tvayā devi nahuṣād duṣṭacetasaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:015.024a: na hy eṣa sthāsyati ciraṃ gata eṣa narādhamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:015.024c: adharmajño maharṣīṇāṃ vāhanāc ca hataḥ śubhe
GE07mbh_05_u:015.025c: śakraṃ cādhigamiṣyāmi mā bhais tvaṃ bhadram astu te
GE07mbh_05_u:015.026a: tataḥ prajvālya vidhivaj juhāva paramaṃ haviḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:015.026d-0108_01: hutvāgniṃ so 'bravīd rājañ chakram anviṣyatām iti
GE07mbh_05_u:015.027a: tasmāc ca bhagavān devaḥ svayam eva hutāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:015.028a: sa diśaḥ pradiśaś caiva parvatāṃś ca vanāni ca
GE07mbh_05_u:015.029a: bṛhaspate na paśyāmi devarājam ahaṃ kva cit
GE07mbh_05_u:015.029c: āpaḥ śeṣāḥ sadā cāpaḥ praveṣṭuṃ notsahāmy aham
GE07mbh_05_u:015.029e: na me tatra gatir brahman kim anyat karavāṇi te
GE07mbh_05_u:015.030a: tam abravīd devagurur apo viśa mahādyute
GE07mbh_05_u:015.031a: nāpaḥ praveṣṭuṃ śakṣyāmi kṣayo me 'tra bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:015.031c: śaraṇaṃ tvāṃ prapanno 'smi svasti te 'stu mahādyute
GE07mbh_05_u:015.032a: adbhyo 'gnir brahmataḥ kṣatram aśmano loham utthitam
GE07mbh_05_u:015.032c: teṣāṃ sarvatragaṃ tejaḥ svāsu yoniṣu śāmyati
GE07mbh_05_u:016.001a: tvam agne sarvadevānāṃ mukhaṃ tvam asi havyavāṭ
GE07mbh_05_u:016.001c: tvam antaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ gūḍhaś carasi sākṣivat
GE07mbh_05_u:016.002a: tvām āhur ekaṃ kavayas tvām āhus trividhaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:016.002c: tvayā tyaktaṃ jagac cedaṃ sadyo naśyed dhutāśana
GE07mbh_05_u:016.003a: kṛtvā tubhyaṃ namo viprāḥ svakarmavijitāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_05_u:016.003c: gacchanti saha patnībhiḥ sutair api ca śāśvatīm
GE07mbh_05_u:016.004a: tvam evāgne havyavāhas tvam eva paramaṃ haviḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:016.004c: yajanti satrais tvām eva yajñaiś ca paramādhvare
GE07mbh_05_u:016.005a: sṛṣṭvā lokāṃs trīn imān havyavāha; prāpte kāle pacasi punaḥ samiddhaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:016.005c: sarvasyāsya bhuvanasya prasūtis; tvam evāgne bhavasi punaḥ pratiṣṭhā
GE07mbh_05_u:016.006a: tvām agne jaladān āhur vidyutaś ca tvam eva hi
GE07mbh_05_u:016.007a: tvayy āpo nihitāḥ sarvās tvayi sarvam idaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_05_u:016.007c: na te 'sty aviditaṃ kiṃ cit triṣu lokeṣu pāvaka
GE07mbh_05_u:016.008c: ahaṃ tvāṃ vardhayiṣyāmi brāhmair mantraiḥ sanātanaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:016.009a: evaṃ stuto havyavāho bhagavān kavir uttamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:016.009e: darśayiṣyāmi te śakraṃ satyam etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_05_u:016.010c: ājagāma saras tac ca gūḍho yatra śatakratuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:016.012a: āgatya ca tatas tūrṇaṃ tam ācaṣṭa bṛhaspateḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:016.014a: mahāsuro hataḥ śakra namucir dāruṇas tvayā
GE07mbh_05_u:016.014c: śambaraś ca balaś caiva tathobhau ghoravikramau
GE07mbh_05_u:016.015c: uttiṣṭha vajrin saṃpaśya devarṣīṃś ca samāgatān
GE07mbh_05_u:016.016a: mahendra dānavān hatvā lokās trātās tvayā vibho
GE07mbh_05_u:016.016e: tvayā vṛtro hataḥ pūrvaṃ devarāja jagatpate
GE07mbh_05_u:016.017a: tvaṃ sarvabhūteṣu vareṇya īḍyas; tvayā samaṃ vidyate neha bhūtam
GE07mbh_05_u:016.017c: tvayā dhāryante sarvabhūtāni śakra; tvaṃ devānāṃ mahimānaṃ cakartha
GE07mbh_05_u:016.018a: pāhi devān salokāṃś ca mahendra balam āpnuhi
GE07mbh_05_u:016.018c: evaṃ saṃstūyamānaś ca so 'vardhata śanaiḥ śanaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:016.019a: svaṃ caiva vapur āsthāya babhūva sa balānvitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:016.019c: abravīc ca guruṃ devo bṛhaspatim upasthitam
GE07mbh_05_u:016.020a: kiṃ kāryam avaśiṣṭaṃ vo hatas tvāṣṭro mahāsuraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:016.020c: vṛtraś ca sumahākāyo grastuṃ lokān iyeṣa yaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:016.021c: devarājyam anuprāptaḥ sarvān no bādhate bhṛśam
GE07mbh_05_u:016.022a: kathaṃ nu nahuṣo rājyaṃ devānāṃ prāpa durlabham
GE07mbh_05_u:016.022c: tapasā kena vā yuktaḥ kiṃvīryo vā bṛhaspate
GE07mbh_05_u:016.022d-0109_01: tat sarvaṃ kathayadhvaṃ me yathendratvam upeyivān bṛhaspatir uvāca
GE07mbh_05_u:016.023a: devā bhītāḥ śakram akāmayanta; tvayā tyaktaṃ mahad aindraṃ padaṃ tat
GE07mbh_05_u:016.023c: tadā devāḥ pitaro 'tharṣayaś ca; gandharvasaṃghāś ca sametya sarve
GE07mbh_05_u:016.024a: gatvābruvan nahuṣaṃ śakra tatra; tvaṃ no rājā bhava bhuvanasya goptā
GE07mbh_05_u:016.024c: tān abravīn nahuṣo nāsmi śakta; āpyāyadhvaṃ tapasā tejasā ca
GE07mbh_05_u:016.025a: evam uktair vardhitaś cāpi devai; rājābhavan nahuṣo ghoravīryaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:016.025c: trailokye ca prāpya rājyaṃ tapasvinaḥ; kṛtvā vāhān yāti lokān durātmā
GE07mbh_05_u:016.026a: tejoharaṃ dṛṣṭiviṣaṃ sughoraṃ; mā tvaṃ paśyer nahuṣaṃ vai kadā cit
GE07mbh_05_u:016.026c: devāś ca sarve nahuṣaṃ bhayārtā; na paśyanto gūḍharūpāś caranti
GE07mbh_05_u:016.027a: evaṃ vadaty aṅgirasāṃ variṣṭhe; bṛhaspatau lokapālaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:016.027c: vaivasvataś caiva yamaḥ purāṇo; devaś ca somo varuṇaś cājagāma
GE07mbh_05_u:016.028a: te vai samāgamya mahendram ūcur; diṣṭyā tvāṣṭro nihataś caiva vṛtraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:016.028c: diṣṭyā ca tvāṃ kuśalinam akṣataṃ ca; paśyāmo vai nihatāriṃ ca śakra
GE07mbh_05_u:016.029a: sa tān yathāvat pratibhāṣya śakraḥ; saṃcodayan nahuṣasyāntareṇa
GE07mbh_05_u:016.029c: rājā devānāṃ nahuṣo ghorarūpas; tatra sāhyaṃ dīyatāṃ me bhavadbhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:016.030a: te cābruvan nahuṣo ghorarūpo; dṛṣṭīviṣas tasya bibhīma deva
GE07mbh_05_u:016.030c: tvaṃ ced rājan nahuṣaṃ parājayes; tad vai vayaṃ bhāgam arhāma śakra
GE07mbh_05_u:016.031a: indro 'bravīd bhavatu bhavān apāṃ patir; yamaḥ kuberaś ca mahābhiṣekam
GE07mbh_05_u:016.031c: saṃprāpnuvantv adya sahaiva tena; ripuṃ jayāmo nahuṣaṃ ghoradṛṣṭim
GE07mbh_05_u:016.032a: tataḥ śakraṃ jvalano 'py āha bhāgaṃ; prayaccha mahyaṃ tava sāhyaṃ kariṣye
GE07mbh_05_u:016.032c: tam āha śakro bhavitāgne tavāpi; aindrāgno vai bhāga eko mahākratau
GE07mbh_05_u:016.033c: kuberaṃ sarvayakṣāṇāṃ dhanānāṃ ca prabhuṃ tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:016.034a: vaivasvataṃ pitṝṇāṃ ca varuṇaṃ cāpy apāṃ tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:016.034c: ādhipatyaṃ dadau śakraḥ satkṛtya varadas tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:017.002a: so 'bravīd arcya devendraṃ diṣṭyā vai vardhate bhavān
GE07mbh_05_u:017.002d-0112_02: diṣṭyā dharmaḥ sthito loke diṣṭyā lokāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:017.002d-0113_01: diṣṭyā paśyāma devendra diṣṭyā lokān punarnavān
GE07mbh_05_u:017.003a: diṣṭyā ca nahuṣo bhraṣṭo devarājyāt puraṃdara
GE07mbh_05_u:017.004a: svāgataṃ te maharṣe 'stu prīto 'haṃ darśanāt tava
GE07mbh_05_u:017.004c: pādyam ācamanīyaṃ ca gām arghyaṃ ca pratīccha me
GE07mbh_05_u:017.007a: śṛṇu śakra priyaṃ vākyaṃ yathā rājā durātmavān
GE07mbh_05_u:017.008a: śramārtās tu vahantas taṃ nahuṣaṃ pāpakāriṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:017.008e: papracchuḥ saṃśayaṃ deva nahuṣaṃ jayatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_05_u:017.009a: ya ime brahmaṇā proktā mantrā vai prokṣaṇe gavām
GE07mbh_05_u:017.009c: ete pramāṇaṃ bhavata utāho neti vāsava
GE07mbh_05_u:017.009e: nahuṣo neti tān āha tamasā mūḍhacetanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:017.010a: adharme saṃpravṛttas tvaṃ dharmaṃ na pratipadyase
GE07mbh_05_u:017.010c: pramāṇam etad asmākaṃ pūrvaṃ proktaṃ maharṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:017.011a: tato vivadamānaḥ sa munibhiḥ saha vāsava
GE07mbh_05_u:017.012a: tenābhūd dhatatejāḥ sa niḥśrīkaś ca śacīpate
GE07mbh_05_u:017.012c: tatas tam aham āvignam avocaṃ bhayapīḍitam
GE07mbh_05_u:017.013a: yasmāt pūrvaiḥ kṛtaṃ brahma brahmarṣibhir anuṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_05_u:017.013c: aduṣṭaṃ dūṣayasi vai yac ca mūrdhny aspṛśaḥ padā
GE07mbh_05_u:017.014a: yac cāpi tvam ṛṣīn mūḍha brahmakalpān durāsadān
GE07mbh_05_u:017.014c: vāhān kṛtvā vāhayasi tena svargād dhataprabhaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:017.016a: evaṃ bhraṣṭo durātmā sa devarājyād ariṃdama
GE07mbh_05_u:017.018c: pitaraś caiva yakṣāś ca bhujagā rākṣasās tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:017.019a: gandharvā devakanyāś ca sarve cāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:017.019c: sarāṃsi saritaḥ śailāḥ sāgarāś ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_05_u:017.020c: hataś ca nahuṣaḥ pāpo diṣṭyāgastyena dhīmatā
GE07mbh_05_u:018.002a: pāvakaś ca mahātejā maharṣiś ca bṛhaspatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:018.002c: yamaś ca varuṇaś caiva kuberaś ca dhaneśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:018.003c: gandharvair apsarobhiś ca yātas tribhuvanaṃ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:018.004c: mudā paramayā yuktaḥ pālayām āsa devarāṭ
GE07mbh_05_u:018.005a: tataḥ sa bhagavāṃs tatra aṅgirāḥ samadṛśyata
GE07mbh_05_u:018.006a: tatas tu bhagavān indraḥ prahṛṣṭaḥ samapadyata
GE07mbh_05_u:018.006c: varaṃ ca pradadau tasmai atharvāṅgirase tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:018.007c: udāharaṇam etad dhi yajñabhāgaṃ ca lapsyase
GE07mbh_05_u:018.009a: saṃpūjya sarvāṃs tridaśān ṛṣīṃś cāpi tapodhanān
GE07mbh_05_u:018.010a: evaṃ duḥkham anuprāptam indreṇa saha bhāryayā
GE07mbh_05_u:018.011a: nātra manyus tvayā kāryo yat kliṣṭo 'si mahāvane
GE07mbh_05_u:018.011c: draupadyā saha rājendra bhrātṛbhiś ca mahātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:018.012a: evaṃ tvam api rājendra rājyaṃ prāpsyasi bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:018.012c: vṛtraṃ hatvā yathā prāptaḥ śakraḥ kauravanandana
GE07mbh_05_u:018.015c: bhrātṛbhiḥ sahito vīra draupadyā ca sahābhibho
GE07mbh_05_u:018.016c: rājñā vyūḍheṣv anīkeṣu śrotavyaṃ jayam icchatā
GE07mbh_05_u:018.017a: tasmāt saṃśrāvayāmi tvāṃ vijayaṃ jayatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_05_u:018.018d-0117_01: saṃgrāme saṃkṣayo ghoro bhaviṣyaty acirād iva
GE07mbh_05_u:018.019a: ākhyānam indravijayaṃ ya idaṃ niyataḥ paṭhet
GE07mbh_05_u:018.019c: dhūtapāpmā jitasvargaḥ sa pretyeha ca modate
GE07mbh_05_u:018.020a: na cārijaṃ bhayaṃ tasya na cāputro bhaven naraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:018.020c: nāpadaṃ prāpnuyāt kāṃ cid dīrgham āyuś ca vindati
GE07mbh_05_u:018.020e: sarvatra jayam āpnoti na kadā cit parājayam
GE07mbh_05_u:018.021c: pūjayām āsa vidhivac chalyaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:018.023a: bhavān karṇasya sārathyaṃ kariṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:018.023c: tatra tejovadhaḥ kāryaḥ karṇasya mama saṃstavaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:018.024a: evam etat kariṣyāmi yathā māṃ saṃprabhāṣase
GE07mbh_05_u:018.024c: yac cānyad api śakṣyāmi tat kariṣyāmy ahaṃ tava
GE07mbh_05_u:018.025a: tata āmantrya kaunteyāñ śalyo madrādhipas tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:018.025c: jagāma sabalaḥ śrīmān duryodhanam ariṃdamaḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_05_u:019.001-0118_01: tataḥ śalyaḥ sahānīkaḥ kampayann iva medinīm
GE07mbh_05_u:019.004c: tailadhautaiḥ prakāśadbhis tad aśobhata vai balam
GE07mbh_05_u:019.005a: tasya meghaprakāśasya śastrais taiḥ śobhitasya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:019.006a: akṣauhiṇī hi senā sā tadā yaudhiṣṭhiraṃ balam
GE07mbh_05_u:019.011c: śobhitā puruṣaiḥ śūraiḥ putraiś cāsya mahārathaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:019.013a: itaś cetaś ca pāṇḍūnāṃ samājagmur mahātmanām
GE07mbh_05_u:019.015a: tasya cīnaiḥ kirātaiś ca kāñcanair iva saṃvṛtam
GE07mbh_05_u:019.016a: tathā bhūriśravāḥ śūraḥ śalyaś ca kurunandana
GE07mbh_05_u:019.018c: aśobhata yathā mattair vanaṃ prakrīḍitair gajaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:019.020a: teṣām akṣauhiṇī senā bahulā vibabhau tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:019.021a: sudakṣiṇaś ca kāmbojo yavanaiś ca śakais tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:019.022c: sa ca saṃprāpya kauravyaṃ tatraivāntardadhe tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:019.025a: kekayāś ca naravyāghrāḥ sodaryāḥ pañca pārthivāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:019.026a: itaś cetaś ca sarveṣāṃ bhūmipānāṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_05_u:019.029a: tataḥ pañcanadaṃ caiva kṛtsnaṃ ca kurujāṅgalam
GE07mbh_05_u:019.030c: vāraṇā vāṭadhānaṃ ca yāmunaś caiva parvataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:019.032a: tatra sainyaṃ tathāyuktaṃ dadarśa sa purohitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:019.032c: yaḥ sa pāñcālarājena preṣitaḥ kauravān prati
GE07mbh_05_u:020.001a: sa tu kauravyam āsādya drupadasya purohitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:020.002a: sarvaṃ kauśalyam uktvādau pṛṣṭvā caivam anāmayam
GE07mbh_05_u:020.004a: dhṛtarāṣṭraś ca pāṇḍuś ca sutāv ekasya viśrutau
GE07mbh_05_u:020.004c: tayoḥ samānaṃ draviṇaṃ paitṛkaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:020.005a: dhṛtarāṣṭrasya ye putrās te prāptāḥ paitṛkaṃ vasu
GE07mbh_05_u:020.005c: pāṇḍuputrāḥ kathaṃ nāma na prāptāḥ paitṛkaṃ vasu
GE07mbh_05_u:020.006a: evaṃ gate pāṇḍaveyair viditaṃ vaḥ purā yathā
GE07mbh_05_u:020.006c: na prāptaṃ paitṛkaṃ dravyaṃ dhārtarāṣṭreṇa saṃvṛtam
GE07mbh_05_u:020.008a: punaś ca vardhitaṃ rājyaṃ svabalena mahātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:020.009a: tad apy anumataṃ karma tathāyuktam anena vai
GE07mbh_05_u:020.010a: sabhāyāṃ kleśitair vīraiḥ sahabhāryais tathā bhṛśam
GE07mbh_05_u:020.010c: araṇye vividhāḥ kleśāḥ saṃprāptās taiḥ sudāruṇāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:020.012a: te sarve pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā tat sarvaṃ pūrvakilbiṣam
GE07mbh_05_u:020.013a: teṣāṃ ca vṛttam ājñāya vṛttaṃ duryodhanasya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:020.014a: na hi te vigrahaṃ vīrāḥ kurvanti kurubhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_05_u:020.015a: yaś cāpi dhārtarāṣṭrasya hetuḥ syād vigrahaṃ prati
GE07mbh_05_u:020.015c: sa ca hetur na mantavyo balīyāṃsas tathā hi te
GE07mbh_05_u:020.017c: sātyakir bhīmasenaś ca yamau ca sumahābalau
GE07mbh_05_u:020.020a: bahulatvaṃ ca senānāṃ vikramaṃ ca kirīṭinaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:020.020c: buddhimattāṃ ca kṛṣṇasya buddhvā yudhyeta ko naraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:020.021a: te bhavanto yathādharmaṃ yathāsamayam eva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:020.021c: prayacchantu pradātavyaṃ mā vaḥ kālo 'tyagād ayam
GE07mbh_05_u:021.001a: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā prajñāvṛddho mahādyutiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:021.002a: diṣṭyā kuśalinaḥ sarve pāṇḍavāḥ saha bāndhavaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:021.002c: diṣṭyā sahāyavantaś ca diṣṭyā dharme ca te ratāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:021.003a: diṣṭyā ca saṃdhikāmās te bhrātaraḥ kurunandanāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:021.003c: diṣṭyā na yuddhamanasaḥ saha dāmodareṇa te
GE07mbh_05_u:021.004a: bhavatā satyam uktaṃ ca sarvam etan na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:021.004c: atitīkṣṇaṃ tu te vākyaṃ brāhmaṇyād iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:021.005a: asaṃśayaṃ kleśitās te vane ceha ca pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:021.005c: prāptāś ca dharmataḥ sarvaṃ pitur dhanam asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_05_u:021.006a: kirīṭī balavān pārthaḥ kṛtāstraś ca mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:021.006c: ko hi pāṇḍusutaṃ yuddhe viṣaheta dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_05_u:021.007a: api vajradharaḥ sākṣāt kim utānye dhanurbhṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:021.007c: trayāṇām api lokānāṃ samartha iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:021.008a: bhīṣme bruvati tad vākyaṃ dhṛṣṭam ākṣipya manyumān
GE07mbh_05_u:021.009a: na tan na viditaṃ brahmaṃl loke bhūtena kena cit
GE07mbh_05_u:021.009c: punaruktena kiṃ tena bhāṣitena punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:021.011a: na taṃ samayam ādṛtya rājyam icchati paitṛkam
GE07mbh_05_u:021.011c: balam āśritya matsyānāṃ pāñcālānāṃ ca pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:021.012a: duryodhano bhayād vidvan na dadyāt padam antataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:021.012c: dharmatas tu mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ pradadyāc chatrave 'pi ca
GE07mbh_05_u:021.013a: yadi kāṅkṣanti te rājyaṃ pitṛpaitāmahaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:021.013c: yathāpratijñaṃ kālaṃ taṃ carantu vanam āśritāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:021.014c: adhārmikām imāṃ buddhiṃ kuryur maurkhyād dhi kevalam
GE07mbh_05_u:021.015a: atha te dharmam utsṛjya yuddham icchanti pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:021.016a: kiṃ nu rādheya vācā te karma tat smartum arhasi
GE07mbh_05_u:021.016c: eka eva yadā pārthaḥ ṣaḍ rathāñ jitavān yudhi
GE07mbh_05_u:021.016d-0120_01: bahuśo jīyamānasya karma dṛṣṭaṃ tadaiva te
GE07mbh_05_u:021.016d-0121_01: virāṭanagare dhīraḥ kiṃ tvaṃ tatraiva nāgataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:021.017a: na ced evaṃ kariṣyāmo yad ayaṃ brāhmaṇo 'bravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:021.017c: dhruvaṃ yudhi hatās tena bhakṣayiṣyāma pāṃsukān
GE07mbh_05_u:021.018a: dhṛtarāṣṭras tato bhīṣmam anumānya prasādya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:021.018c: avabhartsya ca rādheyam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:021.019b-0124_01: asmad dhitam idaṃ vākyaṃ bhīṣmeṇoktaṃ mahātmanā
GE07mbh_05_u:021.019c: pāṇḍavānāṃ hitaṃ caiva sarvasya jagatas tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:021.020c: sa bhavān pratiyātv adya pāṇḍavān eva māciram
GE07mbh_05_u:021.021a: sa taṃ satkṛtya kauravyaḥ preṣayām āsa pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_05_u:022.001a: prāptān āhuḥ saṃjaya pāṇḍuputrān; upaplavye tān vijānīhi gatvā
GE07mbh_05_u:022.001c: ajātaśatruṃ ca sabhājayethā; diṣṭyānagha grāmam upasthitas tvam
GE07mbh_05_u:022.002a: sarvān vadeḥ saṃjaya svastimantaḥ; kṛcchraṃ vāsam atadarhā niruṣya
GE07mbh_05_u:022.002c: teṣāṃ śāntir vidyate 'smāsu śīghraṃ; mithyopetānām upakāriṇāṃ satām
GE07mbh_05_u:022.003a: nāhaṃ kva cit saṃjaya pāṇḍavānāṃ; mithyāvṛttiṃ kāṃ cana jātv apaśyam
GE07mbh_05_u:022.003c: sarvāṃ śriyaṃ hy ātmavīryeṇa labdhvā; paryākārṣuḥ pāṇḍavā mahyam eva
GE07mbh_05_u:022.004a: doṣaṃ hy eṣāṃ nādhigacche parikṣan; nityaṃ kaṃ cid yena garheya pārthān
GE07mbh_05_u:022.004c: dharmārthābhyāṃ karma kurvanti nityaṃ; sukhapriyā nānurudhyanti kāmān
GE07mbh_05_u:022.005a: gharmaṃ śītaṃ kṣutpipāse tathaiva; nidrāṃ tandrīṃ krodhaharṣau pramādam
GE07mbh_05_u:022.005c: dhṛtyā caiva prajñayā cābhibhūya; dharmārthayogān prayatanti pārthāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:022.006a: tyajanti mitreṣu dhanāni kāle; na saṃvāsāj jīryati maitram eṣām
GE07mbh_05_u:022.006c: yathārhamānārthakarā hi pārthās; teṣāṃ dveṣṭā nāsty ājamīḍhasya pakṣe
GE07mbh_05_u:022.007a: anyatra pāpād viṣamān mandabuddher; duryodhanāt kṣudratarāc karṇāt
GE07mbh_05_u:022.007c: teṣāṃ hīme hīnasukhapriyāṇāṃ; mahātmanāṃ saṃjanayanti tejaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:022.008a: utthānavīryaḥ sukham edhamāno; duryodhanaḥ sukṛtaṃ manyate tat
GE07mbh_05_u:022.008c: teṣāṃ bhāgaṃ yac ca manyeta bālaḥ; śakyaṃ hartuṃ jīvatāṃ pāṇḍavānām
GE07mbh_05_u:022.009a: yasyārjunaḥ padavīṃ keśavaś ca; vṛkodaraḥ sātyako 'jātaśatroḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:022.009c: mādrīputrau sṛñjayāś cāpi sarve; purā yuddhāt sādhu tasya pradānam
GE07mbh_05_u:022.010a: sa hy evaikaḥ pṛthivīṃ savyasācī; gāṇḍīvadhanvā praṇuded rathasthaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:022.010c: tathā viṣṇuḥ keśavo 'py apradhṛṣyo; lokatrayasyādhipatir mahātmā
GE07mbh_05_u:022.011a: tiṣṭheta kas tasya martyaḥ purastād; yaḥ sarvadeveṣu vareṇya īḍyaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:022.011c: parjanyaghoṣān pravapañ śaraughān; pataṃgasaṃghān iva śīghravegān
GE07mbh_05_u:022.012a: diśaṃ hy udīcīm api cottarān kurūn; gāṇḍīvadhanvaikaratho jigāya
GE07mbh_05_u:022.012c: dhanaṃ caiṣām āharat savyasācī; senānugān balidāṃś caiva cakre
GE07mbh_05_u:022.013a: yaś caiva devān khāṇḍave savyasācī; gāṇḍīvadhanvā prajigāya sendrān
GE07mbh_05_u:022.013c: upāharat phalguno jātavedase; yaśo mānaṃ vardhayan pāṇḍavānām
GE07mbh_05_u:022.014a: gadābhṛtāṃ nādya samo 'sti bhīmād; dhastyāroho nāsti samaś ca tasya
GE07mbh_05_u:022.014c: rathe 'rjunād āhur ahīnam enaṃ; bāhvor bale cāyutanāgavīryam
GE07mbh_05_u:022.015a: suśikṣitaḥ kṛtavairas tarasvī; dahet kruddhas tarasā dhārtarāṣṭrān
GE07mbh_05_u:022.015c: sadātyamarṣī balavān na śakyo; yuddhe jetuṃ vāsavenāpi sākṣāt
GE07mbh_05_u:022.016a: sucetasau balinau śīghrahastau; suśikṣitau bhrātarau phalgunena
GE07mbh_05_u:022.016c: śyenau yathā pakṣipūgān rujantau; mādrīputrau neha kurūn viśetām
GE07mbh_05_u:022.017a: teṣāṃ madhye vartamānas tarasvī; dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ pāṇḍavānām ihaikaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:022.017c: sahāmātyaḥ somakānāṃ prabarhaḥ; saṃtyaktātmā pāṇḍavānāṃ jayāya
GE07mbh_05_u:022.018a: sahoṣitaś caritārtho vayaḥsthaḥ; śālveyānām adhipo vai virāṭaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:022.018c: saha putraiḥ pāṇḍavārthe ca śaśvad; yudhiṣṭhiraṃ bhakta iti śrutaṃ me
GE07mbh_05_u:022.019a: avaruddhā balinaḥ kekayebhyo; maheṣvāsā bhrātaraḥ pañca santi
GE07mbh_05_u:022.019c: kekayebhyo rājyam ākāṅkṣamāṇā; yuddhārthinaś cānuvasanti pārthān
GE07mbh_05_u:022.020a: sarve ca vīrāḥ pṛthivīpatīnāṃ; samānītāḥ pāṇḍavārthe niviṣṭāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:022.020c: śūrān ahaṃ bhaktimataḥ śṛṇomi; prītyā yuktān saṃśritān dharmarājam
GE07mbh_05_u:022.021a: giryāśrayā durganivāsinaś ca; yodhāḥ pṛthivyāṃ kulajā viśuddhāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:022.021c: mlecchāś ca nānāyudhavīryavantaḥ; samāgatāḥ pāṇḍavārthe niviṣṭāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:022.022a: pāṇḍyaś ca rājāmita indrakalpo; yudhi pravīrair bahubhiḥ sametaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:022.023a: astraṃ droṇād arjunād vāsudevāt; kṛpād bhīṣmād yena kṛtaṃ śṛṇomi
GE07mbh_05_u:022.023c: yaṃ taṃ kārṣṇipratimaṃ prāhur ekaṃ; sa sātyakiḥ pāṇḍavārthe niviṣṭaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:022.024a: apāśritāś cedikarūṣakāś ca; sarvotsāhair bhūmipālaiḥ sametāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:022.024c: teṣāṃ madhye sūryam ivātapantaṃ; śriyā vṛtaṃ cedipatiṃ jvalantam
GE07mbh_05_u:022.025a: astambhanīyaṃ yudhi manyamānaṃ; jyākarṣatāṃ śreṣṭhatamaṃ pṛthivyām
GE07mbh_05_u:022.025c: sarvotsāhaṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ nihatya; prasahya kṛṣṇas tarasā mamarda
GE07mbh_05_u:022.026a: yaśomānau vardhayan yādavānāṃ; purābhinac chiśupālaṃ samīke
GE07mbh_05_u:022.026c: yasya sarve vardhayanti sma mānaṃ; karūṣarājapramukhā narendrāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:022.027a: tam asahyaṃ keśavaṃ tatra matvā; sugrīvayuktena rathena kṛṣṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:022.027c: saṃprādravaṃś cedipatiṃ vihāya; siṃhaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣudramṛgā ivānye
GE07mbh_05_u:022.028a: yas taṃ pratīpas tarasā pratyudīyād; āśaṃsamāno dvairathe vāsudevam
GE07mbh_05_u:022.028c: so 'śeta kṛṣṇena hataḥ parāsur; vātenevonmathitaḥ karṇikāraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:022.029a: parākramaṃ me yad avedayanta; teṣām arthe saṃjaya keśavasya
GE07mbh_05_u:022.029c: anusmaraṃs tasya karmāṇi viṣṇor; gāvalgaṇe nādhigacchāmi śāntim
GE07mbh_05_u:022.030a: na jātu tāñ śatrur anyaḥ saheta; yeṣāṃ sa syād agraṇīr vṛṣṇisiṃhaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:022.030c: pravepate me hṛdayaṃ bhayena; śrutvā kṛṣṇāv ekarathe sametau
GE07mbh_05_u:022.031a: no ced gacchet saṃgaraṃ mandabuddhis; tābhyāṃ suto me viparītacetāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:022.031c: no cet kurūn saṃjaya nirdahetām; indrāviṣṇū daityasenāṃ yathaiva
GE07mbh_05_u:022.031e: mato hi me śakrasamo dhanaṃjayaḥ; sanātano vṛṣṇivīraś ca viṣṇuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:022.032c: duryodhanena nikṛto manasvī; no cet kruddhaḥ pradahed dhārtarāṣṭrān
GE07mbh_05_u:022.033a: nāhaṃ tathā hy arjunād vāsudevād; bhīmād vāpi yamayor vā bibhemi
GE07mbh_05_u:022.033c: yathā rājñaḥ krodhadīptasya sūta; manyor ahaṃ bhītataraḥ sadaiva
GE07mbh_05_u:022.034a: alaṃ tapobrahmacaryeṇa yuktaḥ; saṃkalpo 'yaṃ mānasas tasya sidhyet
GE07mbh_05_u:022.034c: tasya krodhaṃ saṃjayāhaṃ samīke; sthāne jānan bhṛśam asmy adya bhītaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:022.035a: sa gaccha śīghraṃ prahito rathena; pāñcālarājasya camūṃ paretya
GE07mbh_05_u:022.035c: ajātaśatruṃ kuśalaṃ sma pṛccheḥ; punaḥ punaḥ prītiyuktaṃ vades tvam
GE07mbh_05_u:022.036a: janārdanaṃ cāpi sametya tāta; mahāmātraṃ vīryavatām udāram
GE07mbh_05_u:022.036c: anāmayaṃ madvacanena pṛccher; dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ śāntim īpsuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:022.037a: na tasya kiṃ cid vacanaṃ na kuryāt; kuntīputro vāsudevasya sūta
GE07mbh_05_u:022.037c: priyaś caiṣām ātmasamaś ca kṛṣṇo; vidvāṃś caiṣāṃ karmaṇi nityayuktaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:022.038a: samānīya pāṇḍavān sṛñjayāṃś ca; janārdanaṃ yuyudhānaṃ virāṭam
GE07mbh_05_u:022.038c: anāmayaṃ madvacanena pṛccheḥ; sarvāṃs tathā draupadeyāṃś ca pañca
GE07mbh_05_u:022.039a: yad yat tatra prāptakālaṃ parebhyas; tvaṃ manyethā bhāratānāṃ hitaṃ ca
GE07mbh_05_u:022.039c: tat tad bhāṣethāḥ saṃjaya rājamadhye; na mūrchayed yan na bhavec ca
GE07mbh_05_u:023.001a: rājñas tu vacanaṃ śrutvā dhṛtarāṣṭrasya saṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:023.002a: sa tu rājānam āsādya dharmātmānaṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_05_u:023.003a: gāvalgaṇiḥ saṃjayaḥ sūtasūnur; ajātaśatrum avadat pratītaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:023.003c: diṣṭyā rājaṃs tvām arogaṃ prapaśye; sahāyavantaṃ ca mahendrakalpam
GE07mbh_05_u:023.004a: anāmayaṃ pṛcchati tvāmbikeyo; vṛddho rājā dhṛtarāṣṭro manīṣī
GE07mbh_05_u:023.004c: kaccid bhīmaḥ kuśalī pāṇḍavāgryo; dhanaṃjayas tau ca mādrītanūjau
GE07mbh_05_u:023.005a: kaccit kṛṣṇā draupadī rājaputrī; satyavratā vīrapatnī saputrā
GE07mbh_05_u:023.005c: manasvinī yatra ca vāñchasi tvam; iṣṭān kāmān bhārata svastikāmaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:023.006a: gāvalgaṇe saṃjaya svāgataṃ te; prītātmāhaṃ tvābhivadāmi
GE07mbh_05_u:023.006c: anāmayaṃ pratijāne tavāhaṃ; sahānujaiḥ kuśalī cāsmi vidvan
GE07mbh_05_u:023.007a: cirād idaṃ kuśalaṃ bhāratasya; śrutvā rājñaḥ kuruvṛddhasya sūta
GE07mbh_05_u:023.007c: manye sākṣād dṛṣṭam ahaṃ narendraṃ; dṛṣṭvaiva tvāṃ saṃjaya prītiyogāt
GE07mbh_05_u:023.008a: pitāmaho naḥ sthaviro manasvī; mahāprājñaḥ sarvadharmopapannaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:023.008c: sa kauravyaḥ kuśalī tāta bhīṣmo; yathāpūrvaṃ vṛttir apy asya kaccit
GE07mbh_05_u:023.009a: kaccid rājā dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ saputro; vaicitravīryaḥ kuśalī mahātmā
GE07mbh_05_u:023.009c: mahārājo bāhlikaḥ prātipeyaḥ; kaccid vidvān kuśalī sūtaputra
GE07mbh_05_u:023.010a: sa somadattaḥ kuśalī tāta kaccid; bhūriśravāḥ satyasaṃdhaḥ śalaś ca
GE07mbh_05_u:023.010c: droṇaḥ saputraś ca kṛpaś ca vipro; maheṣvāsāḥ kaccid ete 'py arogāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:023.011c: kaccin mānaṃ tāta labhanta ete; dhanurbhṛtaḥ kaccid ete 'py arogāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:023.012a: sarve kurubhyaḥ spṛhayanti saṃjaya; dhanurdharā ye pṛthivyāṃ yuvānaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:023.012c: yeṣāṃ rāṣṭre nivasati darśanīyo; maheṣvāsaḥ śīlavān droṇaputraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:023.013a: vaiśyāputraḥ kuśalī tāta kaccin; mahāprājño rājaputro yuyutsuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:023.013c: karṇo 'mātyaḥ kuśalī tāta kaccit; suyodhano yasya mando vidheyaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:023.014a: striyo vṛddhā bhāratānāṃ jananyo; mahānasyo dāsabhāryāś ca sūta
GE07mbh_05_u:023.014c: vadhvaḥ putrā bhāgineyā bhaginyo; dauhitrā vā kaccid apy avyalīkāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:023.015a: kaccid rājā brāhmaṇānāṃ yathāvat; pravartate pūrvavat tāta vṛttim
GE07mbh_05_u:023.015c: kaccid dāyān māmakān dhārtarāṣṭro; dvijātīnāṃ saṃjaya nopahanti
GE07mbh_05_u:023.016a: kaccid rājā dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ saputra; upekṣate brāhmaṇātikramān vai
GE07mbh_05_u:023.016c: kaccin na hetor iva vartmabhūta; upekṣate teṣu sa nyūnavṛttim
GE07mbh_05_u:023.017a: etaj jyotir uttamaṃ jīvaloke; śuklaṃ prajānāṃ vihitaṃ vidhātrā
GE07mbh_05_u:023.017c: te cel lobhaṃ na niyacchanti mandāḥ; kṛtsno nāśo bhavitā kauravāṇām
GE07mbh_05_u:023.018a: kaccid rājā dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ saputro; bubhūṣate vṛttim amātyavarge
GE07mbh_05_u:023.018c: kaccin na bhedena jijīviṣanti; suhṛdrūpā durhṛdaś caikamitrāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:023.019a: kaccin na pāpaṃ kathayanti tāta; te pāṇḍavānāṃ kuravaḥ sarva eva
GE07mbh_05_u:023.019b-0130_01: droṇaḥ saputraś ca kṛpaś ca vīro
GE07mbh_05_u:023.019c: kaccid dṛṣṭvā dasyusaṃghān sametān; smaranti pārthasya yudhāṃ praṇetuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:023.020d-0131_01: na taṃ dṛṣṭvā kaccid atra pratīpaṃ
GE07mbh_05_u:023.021a: na hy apaśyaṃ kaṃ cid ahaṃ pṛthivyāṃ; śrutaṃ samaṃ vādhikam arjunena
GE07mbh_05_u:023.021c: yasyaikaṣaṣṭir niśitās tīkṣṇadhārāḥ; suvāsasaḥ saṃmato hastavāpaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:023.022a: gadāpāṇir bhīmasenas tarasvī; pravepayañ śatrusaṃghān anīke
GE07mbh_05_u:023.022c: nāgaḥ prabhinna iva naḍvalāsu; caṅkramyate kaccid enaṃ smaranti
GE07mbh_05_u:023.023a: mādrīputraḥ sahadevaḥ kaliṅgān; samāgatān ajayad dantakūre
GE07mbh_05_u:023.023c: vāmenāsyan dakṣiṇenaiva yo vai; mahābalaṃ kaccid enaṃ smaranti
GE07mbh_05_u:023.024a: udyann ayaṃ nakulaḥ preṣito vai; gāvalgaṇe saṃjaya paśyatas te
GE07mbh_05_u:023.024c: diśaṃ pratīcīṃ vaśam ānayan me; mādrīsutaṃ kaccid enaṃ smaranti
GE07mbh_05_u:023.025a: abhyābhavo dvaitavane ya āsīd; durmantrite ghoṣayātrāgatānām
GE07mbh_05_u:023.025c: yatra mandāñ śatruvaśaṃ prayātān; amocayad bhīmaseno jayaś ca
GE07mbh_05_u:023.026a: ahaṃ paścād arjunam abhyarakṣaṃ; mādrīputrau bhīmasenaś ca cakre
GE07mbh_05_u:023.026c: gāṇḍīvabhṛc chatrusaṃghān udasya; svasty āgamat kaccid enaṃ smaranti
GE07mbh_05_u:023.027a: na karmaṇā sādhunaikena nūnaṃ; kartuṃ śakyaṃ bhavatīha saṃjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:023.027c: sarvātmanā parijetuṃ vayaṃ cen; na śaknumo dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putram
GE07mbh_05_u:024.001a: yathārhase pāṇḍava tat tathaiva; kurūn kuruśreṣṭha janaṃ ca pṛcchasi
GE07mbh_05_u:024.001c: anāmayās tāta manasvinas te; kuruśreṣṭhān pṛcchasi pārtha yāṃs tvam
GE07mbh_05_u:024.002a: santy eva vṛddhāḥ sādhavo dhārtarāṣṭre; santy eva pāpāḥ pāṇḍava tasya viddhi
GE07mbh_05_u:024.002c: dadyād ripoś cāpi hi dhārtarāṣṭraḥ; kuto dāyāṃl lopayed brāhmaṇānām
GE07mbh_05_u:024.003a: yad yuṣmākaṃ vartate 'sau na dharmyam; adrugdheṣu drugdhavat tan na sādhu
GE07mbh_05_u:024.003c: mitradhruk syād dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ saputro; yuṣmān dviṣan sādhuvṛttān asādhuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:024.004a: na cānujānāti bhṛśaṃ ca tapyate; śocaty antaḥ sthaviro 'jātaśatro
GE07mbh_05_u:024.004c: śṛṇoti hi brāhmaṇānāṃ sametya; mitradrohaḥ pātakebhyo garīyān
GE07mbh_05_u:024.005a: smaranti tubhyaṃ naradeva saṃgame; yuddhe ca jiṣṇoś ca yudhāṃ praṇetuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:024.006a: mādrīsutau cāpi raṇājimadhye; sarvā diśaḥ saṃpatantau smaranti
GE07mbh_05_u:024.006c: senāṃ varṣantau śaravarṣair ajasraṃ; mahārathau samare duṣprakampyau
GE07mbh_05_u:024.007a: na tv eva manye puruṣasya rājann; anāgataṃ jñāyate yad bhaviṣyam
GE07mbh_05_u:024.007c: tvaṃ ced imaṃ sarvadharmopapannaḥ; prāptaḥ kleśaṃ pāṇḍava kṛcchrarūpam
GE07mbh_05_u:024.008a: tvam evaitat sarvam ataś ca bhūyaḥ; samīkuryāḥ prajñayājātaśatro
GE07mbh_05_u:024.008c: na kāmārthaṃ saṃtyajeyur hi dharmaṃ; pāṇḍoḥ sutāḥ sarva evendrakalpāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:024.009a: tvam evaitat prajñayājātaśatro; śamaṃ kuryā yena śarmāpnuyus te
GE07mbh_05_u:024.009c: dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ sṛñjayāś ca; ye cāpy anye pārthivāḥ saṃniviṣṭāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:024.010a: yan mābravīd dhṛtarāṣṭro niśāyām; ajātaśatro vacanaṃ pitā te
GE07mbh_05_u:024.010c: sahāmātyaḥ sahaputraś ca rājan; sametya tāṃ vācam imāṃ nibodha
GE07mbh_05_u:025.001a: samāgatāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ sṛñjayāś ca; janārdano yuyudhāno virāṭaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:025.001c: yat te vākyaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrānuśiṣṭaṃ; gāvalgaṇe brūhi tat sūtaputra
GE07mbh_05_u:025.002a: ajātaśatruṃ ca vṛkodaraṃ ca; dhanaṃjayaṃ mādravatīsutau
GE07mbh_05_u:025.002c: āmantraye vāsudevaṃ ca śauriṃ; yuyudhānaṃ cekitānaṃ virāṭam
GE07mbh_05_u:025.003a: pāñcālānām adhipaṃ caiva vṛddhaṃ; dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ pārṣataṃ yājñasenim
GE07mbh_05_u:025.003c: sarve vācaṃ śṛṇutemāṃ madīyāṃ; vakṣyāmi yāṃ bhūtim icchan kurūṇām
GE07mbh_05_u:025.004a: śamaṃ rājā dhṛtarāṣṭro 'bhinandann; ayojayat tvaramāṇo rathaṃ me
