GE07mbh_05_u:025.004c: sabhrātṛputrasvajanasya rājñas; tad rocatāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ śamo 'stu
GE07mbh_05_u:025.005a: sarvair dharmaiḥ samupetāḥ stha pārthāḥ; prasthānena mārdavenārjavena
GE07mbh_05_u:025.005c: jātāḥ kule anṛśaṃsā vadānyā; hrīniṣedhāḥ karmaṇāṃ niścayajñāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:025.006a: na yujyate karma yuṣmāsu hīnaṃ; sattvaṃ hi vas tādṛśaṃ bhīmasenāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:025.006c: udbhāsate hy añjanabinduvat tac; chukle vastre yad bhavet kilbiṣaṃ vaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:025.007a: sarvakṣayo dṛśyate yatra kṛtsnaḥ; pāpodayo nirayo 'bhāvasaṃsthaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:025.007c: kas tat kuryāj jātu karma prajānan; parājayo yatra samo jayaś ca
GE07mbh_05_u:025.008a: te vai dhanyā yaiḥ kṛtaṃ jñātikāryaṃ; ye vaḥ putrāḥ suhṛdo bāndhavāś ca
GE07mbh_05_u:025.008c: upakruṣṭaṃ jīvitaṃ saṃtyajeyus; tataḥ kurūṇāṃ niyato vai bhavaḥ syāt
GE07mbh_05_u:025.009a: te cet kurūn anuśāsya stha pārthā; ninīya sarvān dviṣato nigṛhya
GE07mbh_05_u:025.009c: samaṃ vas taj jīvitaṃ mṛtyunā syād; yaj jīvadhvaṃ jñātivadhe na sādhu
GE07mbh_05_u:025.010a: ko hy eva yuṣmān saha keśavena; sacekitānān pārṣatabāhuguptān
GE07mbh_05_u:025.010c: sasātyakīn viṣaheta prajetuṃ; labdhvāpi devān sacivān sahendrān
GE07mbh_05_u:025.011a: ko vā kurūn droṇabhīṣmābhiguptān; aśvatthāmnā śalyakṛpādibhiś ca
GE07mbh_05_u:025.011c: raṇe prasoḍhuṃ viṣaheta rājan; rādheyaguptān saha bhūmipālaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:025.012a: mahad balaṃ dhārtarāṣṭrasya rājñaḥ; ko vai śakto hantum akṣīyamāṇaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:025.012c: so 'haṃ jaye caiva parājaye ca; niḥśreyasaṃ nādhigacchāmi kiṃ cit
GE07mbh_05_u:025.013a: kathaṃ hi nīcā iva dauṣkuleyā; nirdharmārthaṃ karma kuryuś ca pārthāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:025.013c: so 'haṃ prasādya praṇato vāsudevaṃ; pāñcālānām adhipaṃ caiva vṛddham
GE07mbh_05_u:025.014a: kṛtāñjaliḥ śaraṇaṃ vaḥ prapadye; kathaṃ svasti syāt kurusṛñjayānām
GE07mbh_05_u:025.014c: na hy eva te vacanaṃ vāsudevo; dhanaṃjayo vā jātu kiṃ cin na kuryāt
GE07mbh_05_u:025.015a: prāṇān ādau yācyamānaḥ kuto 'nyad; etad vidvan sādhanārthaṃ bravīmi
GE07mbh_05_u:025.015c: etad rājño bhīṣmapurogamasya; mataṃ yad vaḥ śāntir ihottamā syāt
GE07mbh_05_u:026.001a: kāṃ nu vācaṃ saṃjaya me śṛṇoṣi; yuddhaiṣiṇīṃ yena bibheṣi
GE07mbh_05_u:026.001c: ayuddhaṃ vai tāta yuddhād garīyaḥ; kas tal labdhvā jātu yudhyeta sūta
GE07mbh_05_u:026.002a: akurvataś cet puruṣasya saṃjaya; sidhyet saṃkalpo manasā yaṃ yam icchet
GE07mbh_05_u:026.002c: na karma kuryād viditaṃ mamaitad; anyatra yuddhād bahu yal laghīyaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:026.003a: kuto yuddhaṃ jātu naraḥ prajānan; ko daivaśapto 'bhivṛṇīta yuddham
GE07mbh_05_u:026.003c: sukhaiṣiṇaḥ karma kurvanti pārthā; dharmād ahīnaṃ yac ca lokasya pathyam
GE07mbh_05_u:026.004a: karmodayaṃ sukham āśaṃsamānaḥ; kṛcchropāyaṃ tattvataḥ karma duḥkham
GE07mbh_05_u:026.004c: sukhaprepsur vijighāṃsuś ca duḥkhaṃ; ya indriyāṇāṃ prītivaśānugāmī
GE07mbh_05_u:026.004e: kāmābhidhyā svaśarīraṃ dunoti; yayā prayukto 'nukaroti duḥkham
GE07mbh_05_u:026.005a: yathedhyamānasya samiddhatejaso; bhūyo balaṃ vardhate pāvakasya
GE07mbh_05_u:026.005c: kāmārthalābhena tathaiva bhūyo; na tṛpyate sarpiṣevāgnir iddhaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:026.005e: saṃpaśyemaṃ bhogacayaṃ mahāntaṃ; sahāsmābhir dhṛtarāṣṭrasya rājñaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:026.006a: nāśreyasām īśvaro vigrahāṇāṃ; nāśreyasāṃ gītaśabdaṃ śṛṇoti
GE07mbh_05_u:026.006c: nāśreyasaḥ sevate mālyagandhān; na cāpy aśreyāṃsy anulepanāni
GE07mbh_05_u:026.007a: nāśreyasaḥ prāvarān adhyavaste; kathaṃ tv asmān saṃpraṇudet kurubhyaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:026.007c: atraiva ca syād avadhūya eṣa; kāmaḥ śarīre hṛdayaṃ dunoti
GE07mbh_05_u:026.008a: svayaṃ rājā viṣamasthaḥ pareṣu; sāmasthyam anvicchati tan na sādhu
GE07mbh_05_u:026.008c: yathātmanaḥ paśyati vṛttam eva; tathā pareṣām api so 'bhyupaiti
GE07mbh_05_u:026.009a: āsannam agniṃ tu nidāghakāle; gambhīrakakṣe gahane visṛjya
GE07mbh_05_u:026.009c: yathā vṛddhaṃ vāyuvaśena śocet; kṣemaṃ mumukṣuḥ śiśiravyapāye
GE07mbh_05_u:026.010a: prāptaiśvaryo dhṛtarāṣṭro 'dya rājā; lālapyate saṃjaya kasya hetoḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:026.010c: pragṛhya durbuddhim anārjave rataṃ; putraṃ mandaṃ mūḍham amantriṇaṃ tu
GE07mbh_05_u:026.011a: anāptaḥ sann āptatamasya vācaṃ; suyodhano vidurasyāvamanya
GE07mbh_05_u:026.011c: sutasya rājā dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ priyaiṣī; saṃbudhyamāno viśate 'dharmam eva
GE07mbh_05_u:026.012a: medhāvinaṃ hy arthakāmaṃ kurūṇāṃ; bahuśrutaṃ vāgminaṃ śīlavantam
GE07mbh_05_u:026.012c: sūta rājā dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ kurubhyo; na so 'smarad viduraṃ putrakāmyāt
GE07mbh_05_u:026.014c: sutasya rājā dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ priyaiṣī; prapaśyamānaḥ prajahād dharmakāmau
GE07mbh_05_u:026.015a: tadaiva me saṃjaya dīvyato 'bhūn; no cet kurūn āgataḥ syād abhāvaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:026.015c: kāvyāṃ vācaṃ viduro bhāṣamāṇo; na vindate dhṛtarāṣṭrāt praśaṃsām
GE07mbh_05_u:026.016a: kṣattur yadā anvavartanta buddhiṃ; kṛcchraṃ kurūn na tadābhyājagāma
GE07mbh_05_u:026.016c: yāvat prajñām anvavartanta tasya; tāvat teṣāṃ rāṣṭravṛddhir babhūva
GE07mbh_05_u:026.017a: tadarthalubdhasya nibodha me 'dya; ye mantriṇo dhārtarāṣṭrasya sūta
GE07mbh_05_u:026.017c: duḥśāsanaḥ śakuniḥ sūtaputro; gāvalgaṇe paśya saṃmoham asya
GE07mbh_05_u:026.018a: so 'haṃ na paśyāmi parīkṣamāṇaḥ; kathaṃ svasti syāt kurusṛñjayānām
GE07mbh_05_u:026.018c: āttaiśvaryo dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ parebhyaḥ; pravrājite vidure dīrghadṛṣṭau
GE07mbh_05_u:026.019a: āśaṃsate vai dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ saputro; mahārājyam asapatnaṃ pṛthivyām
GE07mbh_05_u:026.019c: tasmiñ śamaḥ kevalaṃ nopalabhyo; atyāsannaṃ madgataṃ manyate 'rtham
GE07mbh_05_u:026.020a: yat tat karṇo manyate pāraṇīyaṃ; yuddhe gṛhītāyudham arjunena
GE07mbh_05_u:026.020c: āsaṃś ca yuddhāni purā mahānti; kathaṃ karṇo nābhavad dvīpa eṣām
GE07mbh_05_u:026.021a: karṇaś ca jānāti suyodhanaś ca; droṇaś ca jānāti pitāmahaś ca
GE07mbh_05_u:026.021c: anye ca ye kuravas tatra santi; yathārjunān nāsty aparo dhanurdharaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:026.022a: jānanty ete kuravaḥ sarva eva; ye cāpy anye bhūmipālāḥ sametāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:026.023a: tenārthabaddhaṃ manyate dhārtarāṣṭraḥ; śakyaṃ hartuṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ mamatvam
GE07mbh_05_u:026.023c: kirīṭinā tālamātrāyudhena; tadvedinā saṃyugaṃ tatra gatvā
GE07mbh_05_u:026.024c: kruddhasya ced bhīmasenasya vegāt; suyodhano manyate siddham artham
GE07mbh_05_u:026.025a: indro 'py etan notsahet tāta hartum; aiśvaryaṃ no jīvati bhīmasene
GE07mbh_05_u:026.025c: dhanaṃjaye nakule caiva sūta; tathā vīre sahadeve madīye
GE07mbh_05_u:026.026a: sa ced etāṃ pratipadyeta buddhiṃ; vṛddho rājā saha putreṇa sūta
GE07mbh_05_u:026.026c: evaṃ raṇe pāṇḍavakopadagdhā; na naśyeyuḥ saṃjaya dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:026.027a: jānāsi tvaṃ kleśam asmāsu vṛttaṃ; tvāṃ pūjayan saṃjayāhaṃ kṣameyam
GE07mbh_05_u:026.027c: yac cāsmākaṃ kauravair bhūtapūrvaṃ; yā no vṛttir dhārtarāṣṭre tadāsīt
GE07mbh_05_u:026.028a: adyāpi tat tatra tathaiva vartatāṃ; śāntiṃ gamiṣyāmi yathā tvam āttha
GE07mbh_05_u:026.028c: indraprasthe bhavatu mamaiva rājyaṃ; suyodhano yacchatu bhāratāgryaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:027.001a: dharme nityā pāṇḍava te viceṣṭā; loke śrutā dṛśyate cāpi pārtha
GE07mbh_05_u:027.001c: mahāsrāvaṃ jīvitaṃ cāpy anityaṃ; saṃpaśya tvaṃ pāṇḍava mā vinīnaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:027.002a: na ced bhāgaṃ kuravo 'nyatra yuddhāt; prayacchante tubhyam ajātaśatro
GE07mbh_05_u:027.002c: bhaikṣacaryām andhakavṛṣṇirājye; śreyo manye na tu yuddhena rājyam
GE07mbh_05_u:027.003a: alpakālaṃ jīvitaṃ yan manuṣye; mahāsrāvaṃ nityaduḥkhaṃ calaṃ ca
GE07mbh_05_u:027.003c: bhūyaś ca tad vayaso nānurūpaṃ; tasmāt pāpaṃ pāṇḍava mā prasārṣīḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:027.004a: kāmā manuṣyaṃ prasajanta eva; dharmasya ye vighnamūlaṃ narendra
GE07mbh_05_u:027.004c: pūrvaṃ naras tān dhṛtimān vinighnaṃl; loke praśaṃsāṃ labhate 'navadyām
GE07mbh_05_u:027.005a: nibandhanī hy arthatṛṣṇeha pārtha; tām eṣato bādhyate dharma eva
GE07mbh_05_u:027.005c: dharmaṃ tu yaḥ pravṛṇīte sa buddhaḥ; kāme gṛddho hīyate 'rthānurodhāt
GE07mbh_05_u:027.006a: dharmaṃ kṛtvā karmaṇāṃ tāta mukhyaṃ; mahāpratāpaḥ saviteva bhāti
GE07mbh_05_u:027.006c: hānena dharmasya mahīm apīmāṃ; labdhvā naraḥ sīdati pāpabuddhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:027.007a: vedo 'dhītaś caritaṃ brahmacaryaṃ; yajñair iṣṭaṃ brāhmaṇebhyaś ca dattam
GE07mbh_05_u:027.007c: paraṃ sthānaṃ manyamānena bhūya; ātmā datto varṣapūgaṃ sukhebhyaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:027.008a: sukhapriye sevamāno 'tivelaṃ; yogābhyāse yo na karoti karma
GE07mbh_05_u:027.009a: evaṃ punar arthacaryāprasakto; hitvā dharmaṃ yaḥ prakaroty adharmam
GE07mbh_05_u:027.009c: aśraddadhat paralokāya mūḍho; hitvā dehaṃ tapyate pretya mandaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:027.010a: na karmaṇāṃ vipraṇāśo 'sty amutra; puṇyānāṃ vāpy atha vā pāpakānām
GE07mbh_05_u:027.010c: pūrvaṃ kartur gacchati puṇyapāpaṃ; paścāt tv etad anuyāty eva kartā
GE07mbh_05_u:027.012a: iha kṣetre kriyate pārtha kāryaṃ; na vai kiṃ cid vidyate pretya kāryam
GE07mbh_05_u:027.012c: kṛtaṃ tvayā pāralokyaṃ ca kāryaṃ; puṇyaṃ mahat sadbhir anupraśastam
GE07mbh_05_u:027.013a: jahāti mṛtyuṃ ca jarāṃ bhayaṃ ca; na kṣutpipāse manasaś cāpriyāṇi
GE07mbh_05_u:027.013c: na kartavyaṃ vidyate tatra kiṃ cid; anyatra vai indriyaprīṇanārthāt
GE07mbh_05_u:027.014a: evaṃrūpaṃ karmaphalaṃ narendra; mātrāvatā hṛdayasya priyeṇa
GE07mbh_05_u:027.014c: sa krodhajaṃ pāṇḍava harṣajaṃ ca; lokāv ubhau mā prahāsīś cirāya
GE07mbh_05_u:027.015a: antaṃ gatvā karmaṇāṃ yā praśaṃsā; satyaṃ damaś cārjavam ānṛśaṃsyam
GE07mbh_05_u:027.015c: aśvamedho rājasūyas tatheṣṭaḥ; pāpasyāntaṃ karmaṇo mā punar gāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:027.016a: tac ced evaṃ deśarūpeṇa pārthāḥ; kariṣyadhvaṃ karma pāpaṃ cirāya
GE07mbh_05_u:027.016c: nivasadhvaṃ varṣapūgān vaneṣu; duḥkhaṃ vāsaṃ pāṇḍavā dharmahetoḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:027.017a: apravrajye yojayitvā purastād; ātmādhīnaṃ yad balaṃ te tadāsīt
GE07mbh_05_u:027.017c: nityaṃ pāñcālāḥ sacivās taveme; janārdano yuyudhānaś ca vīraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:027.018a: matsyo rājā rukmarathaḥ saputraḥ; prahāribhiḥ saha putrair virāṭaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:027.018c: rājānaś ca ye vijitāḥ purastāt; tvām eva te saṃśrayeyuḥ samastāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:027.019c: varān haniṣyan dviṣato raṅgamadhye; vyaneṣyathā dhārtarāṣṭrasya darpam
GE07mbh_05_u:027.020a: balaṃ kasmād vardhayitvā parasya; nijān kasmāt karśayitvā sahāyān
GE07mbh_05_u:027.020c: niruṣya kasmād varṣapūgān vaneṣu; yuyutsase pāṇḍava hīnakālam
GE07mbh_05_u:027.021a: aprajño vā pāṇḍava yudhyamāno; adharmajño vā bhūtipathād vyapaiti
GE07mbh_05_u:027.021c: prajñāvān vā budhyamāno 'pi dharmaṃ; saṃrambhād vā so 'pi bhūter apaiti
GE07mbh_05_u:027.022a: nādharme te dhīyate pārtha buddhir; na saṃrambhāt karma cakartha pāpam
GE07mbh_05_u:027.022c: addhā kiṃ tat kāraṇaṃ yasya hetoḥ; prajñāviruddhaṃ karma
GE07mbh_05_u:027.023a: avyādhijaṃ kaṭukaṃ śīrṣarogaṃ; yaśomuṣaṃ pāpaphalodayaṃ ca
GE07mbh_05_u:027.023c: satāṃ peyaṃ yan na pibanty asanto; manyuṃ mahārāja piba praśāmya
GE07mbh_05_u:027.024a: pāpānubandhaṃ ko nu taṃ kāmayeta; kṣamaiva te jyāyasī nota bhogāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:027.024c: yatra bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavo hataḥ syād; yatra droṇaḥ sahaputro hataḥ syāt
GE07mbh_05_u:027.025a: kṛpaḥ śalyaḥ saumadattir vikarṇo; viviṃśatiḥ karṇaduryodhanau ca
GE07mbh_05_u:027.025c: etān hatvā kīdṛśaṃ tat sukhaṃ syād; yad vindethās tad anubrūhi pārtha
GE07mbh_05_u:027.026a: labdhvāpīmāṃ pṛthivīṃ sāgarāntāṃ; jarāmṛtyū naiva hi tvaṃ prajahyāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:027.026c: priyāpriye sukhaduḥkhe ca rājann; evaṃ vidvān naiva yuddhaṃ kuruṣva
GE07mbh_05_u:027.027a: amātyānāṃ yadi kāmasya hetor; evaṃyuktaṃ karma cikīrṣasi tvam
GE07mbh_05_u:027.027c: apākrameḥ saṃpradāya svam ebhyo; mā gās tvaṃ vai devayānāt patho 'dya
GE07mbh_05_u:028.001a: asaṃśayaṃ saṃjaya satyam etad; dharmo varaḥ karmaṇāṃ yat tvam āttha
GE07mbh_05_u:028.001c: jñātvā tu māṃ saṃjaya garhayes tvaṃ; yadi dharmaṃ yady adharmaṃ carāmi
GE07mbh_05_u:028.002a: yatrādharmo dharmarūpāṇi bibhrad; dharmaḥ kṛtsno dṛśyate 'dharmarūpaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:028.002c: tathā dharmo dhārayan dharmarūpaṃ; vidvāṃsas taṃ saṃprapaśyanti buddhyā
GE07mbh_05_u:028.003a: evam etāv āpadi liṅgam etad; dharmādharmau vṛttinityau bhajetām
GE07mbh_05_u:028.003c: ādyaṃ liṅgaṃ yasya tasya pramāṇam; āpaddharmaṃ saṃjaya taṃ nibodha
GE07mbh_05_u:028.004a: luptāyāṃ tu prakṛtau yena karma; niṣpādayet tat parīpsed vihīnaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:028.004c: prakṛtisthaś cāpadi vartamāna; ubhau garhyau bhavataḥ saṃjayaitau
GE07mbh_05_u:028.005a: avilopam icchatāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ; prāyaścittaṃ vihitaṃ yad vidhātrā
GE07mbh_05_u:028.005c: āpady athākarmasu vartamānān; vikarmasthān saṃjaya garhayeta
GE07mbh_05_u:028.006a: manīṣiṇāṃ tattvavicchedanāya; vidhīyate satsu vṛttiḥ sadaiva
GE07mbh_05_u:028.006c: abrāhmaṇāḥ santi tu ye na vaidyāḥ; sarvocchedaṃ sādhu manyeta tebhyaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:028.007a: tadarthā naḥ pitaro ye ca pūrve; pitāmahā ye ca tebhyaḥ pare 'nye
GE07mbh_05_u:028.007c: prajñaiṣiṇo ye ca hi karma cakrur; nāsty antato nāsti nāstīti manye
GE07mbh_05_u:028.008a: yat kiṃ cid etad vittam asyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ; yad devānāṃ tridaśānāṃ paratra
GE07mbh_05_u:028.008c: prājāpatyaṃ tridivaṃ brahmalokaṃ; nādharmataḥ saṃjaya kāmaye tat
GE07mbh_05_u:028.009a: dharmeśvaraḥ kuśalo nītimāṃś cāpy; upāsitā brāhmaṇānāṃ manīṣī
GE07mbh_05_u:028.009c: nānāvidhāṃś caiva mahābalāṃś ca; rājanyabhojān anuśāsti kṛṣṇaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:028.010a: yadi hy ahaṃ visṛjan syām agarhyo; yudhyamāno yadi jahyāṃ svadharmam
GE07mbh_05_u:028.010c: mahāyaśāḥ keśavas tad bravītu; vāsudevas tūbhayor arthakāmaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:028.011a: śaineyā hi caitrakāś cāndhakāś ca; vārṣṇeyabhojāḥ kaukurāḥ sṛñjayāś ca
GE07mbh_05_u:028.011c: upāsīnā vāsudevasya buddhiṃ; nigṛhya śatrūn suhṛdo nandayanti
GE07mbh_05_u:028.012a: vṛṣṇyandhakā hy ugrasenādayo vai; kṛṣṇapraṇītāḥ sarva evendrakalpāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:028.012c: manasvinaḥ satyaparākramāś ca; mahābalā yādavā bhogavantaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:028.013a: kāśyo babhruḥ śriyam uttamāṃ gato; labdhvā kṛṣṇaṃ bhrātaram īśitāram
GE07mbh_05_u:028.013c: yasmai kāmān varṣati vāsudevo; grīṣmātyaye megha iva prajābhyaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:028.014a: īdṛśo 'yaṃ keśavas tāta bhūyo; vidmo hy enaṃ karmaṇāṃ niścayajñam
GE07mbh_05_u:028.014c: priyaś ca naḥ sādhutamaś ca kṛṣṇo; nātikrame vacanaṃ keśavasya
GE07mbh_05_u:029.001a: avināśaṃ saṃjaya pāṇḍavānām; icchāmy ahaṃ bhūtim eṣāṃ priyaṃ ca
GE07mbh_05_u:029.001c: tathā rājño dhṛtarāṣṭrasya sūta; sadāśaṃse bahuputrasya vṛddhim
GE07mbh_05_u:029.002a: kāmo hi me saṃjaya nityam eva; nānyad brūyāṃ tān prati śāmyateti
GE07mbh_05_u:029.002c: rājñaś ca hi priyam etac chṛṇomi; manye caitat pāṇḍavānāṃ samartham
GE07mbh_05_u:029.003a: suduṣkaraś cātra śamo hi nūnaṃ; pradarśitaḥ saṃjaya pāṇḍavena
GE07mbh_05_u:029.003c: yasmin gṛddho dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ saputraḥ; kasmād eṣāṃ kalaho nātra mūrcchet
GE07mbh_05_u:029.004a: tattvaṃ dharmaṃ vicaran saṃjayeha; mattaś ca jānāsi yudhiṣṭhirāc ca
GE07mbh_05_u:029.004c: atho kasmāt saṃjaya pāṇḍavasya; utsāhinaḥ pūrayataḥ svakarma
GE07mbh_05_u:029.004e: yathākhyātam āvasataḥ kuṭumbaṃ; purākalpāt sādhu vilopam āttha
GE07mbh_05_u:029.005a: asmin vidhau vartamāne yathāvad; uccāvacā matayo brāhmaṇānām
GE07mbh_05_u:029.005c: karmaṇāhuḥ siddhim eke paratra; hitvā karma vidyayā siddhim eke
GE07mbh_05_u:029.005e: nābhuñjāno bhakṣyabhojyasya tṛpyed; vidvān apīha viditaṃ brāhmaṇānām
GE07mbh_05_u:029.006a: yā vai vidyāḥ sādhayantīha karma; tāsāṃ phalaṃ vidyate netarāsām
GE07mbh_05_u:029.006c: tatreha vai dṛṣṭaphalaṃ tu karma; pītvodakaṃ śāmyati tṛṣṇayārtaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:029.007a: so 'yaṃ vidhir vihitaḥ karmaṇaiva; tad vartate saṃjaya tatra karma
GE07mbh_05_u:029.007c: tatra yo 'nyat karmaṇaḥ sādhu manyen; moghaṃ tasya lapitaṃ durbalasya
GE07mbh_05_u:029.008a: karmaṇāmī bhānti devāḥ paratra; karmaṇaiveha plavate mātariśvā
GE07mbh_05_u:029.008c: ahorātre vidadhat karmaṇaiva; atandrito nityam udeti sūryaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:029.009a: māsārdhamāsān atha nakṣatrayogān; atandritaś candramā abhyupaiti
GE07mbh_05_u:029.009c: atandrito dahate jātavedāḥ; samidhyamānaḥ karma kurvan prajābhyaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:029.010a: atandritā bhāram imaṃ mahāntaṃ; bibharti devī pṛthivī balena
GE07mbh_05_u:029.010c: atandritāḥ śīghram apo vahanti; saṃtarpayantyaḥ sarvabhūtāni nadyaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:029.011a: atandrito varṣati bhūritejāḥ; saṃnādayann antarikṣaṃ divaṃ ca
GE07mbh_05_u:029.011c: atandrito brahmacaryaṃ cacāra; śreṣṭhatvam icchan balabhid devatānām
GE07mbh_05_u:029.012a: hitvā sukhaṃ manasaś ca priyāṇi; tena śakraḥ karmaṇā śraiṣṭhyam āpa
GE07mbh_05_u:029.012c: satyaṃ dharmaṃ pālayann apramatto; damaṃ titikṣāṃ samatāṃ priyaṃ ca
GE07mbh_05_u:029.012e: etāni sarvāṇy upasevamāno; devarājyaṃ maghavān prāpa mukhyam
GE07mbh_05_u:029.013a: bṛhaspatir brahmacaryaṃ cacāra; samāhitaḥ saṃśitātmā yathāvat
GE07mbh_05_u:029.013c: hitvā sukhaṃ pratirudhyendriyāṇi; tena devānām agamad gauravaṃ saḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:029.014a: nakṣatrāṇi karmaṇāmutra bhānti; rudrādityā vasavo 'thāpi viśve
GE07mbh_05_u:029.014c: yamo rājā vaiśravaṇaḥ kubero; gandharvayakṣāpsarasaś ca śubhrāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:029.014e: brahmacaryaṃ vedavidyāḥ kriyāś ca; niṣevamāṇā munayo 'mutra bhānti
GE07mbh_05_u:029.015a: jānann imaṃ sarvalokasya dharmaṃ; brāhmaṇānāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ viśāṃ ca
GE07mbh_05_u:029.015c: sa kasmāt tvaṃ jānatāṃ jñānavān san; vyāyacchase saṃjaya kauravārthe
GE07mbh_05_u:029.016a: āmnāyeṣu nityasaṃyogam asya; tathāśvamedhe rājasūye ca viddhi
GE07mbh_05_u:029.016c: saṃyujyate dhanuṣā varmaṇā ca; hastatrāṇai rathaśastraiś ca bhūyaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:029.017a: te ced ime kauravāṇām upāyam; adhigaccheyur avadhenaiva pārthāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:029.017c: dharmatrāṇaṃ puṇyam eṣāṃ kṛtaṃ syād; ārye vṛtte bhīmasenaṃ nigṛhya
GE07mbh_05_u:029.018a: te cet pitrye karmaṇi vartamānā; āpadyeran diṣṭavaśena mṛtyum
GE07mbh_05_u:029.018c: yathāśaktyā pūrayantaḥ svakarma; tad apy eṣāṃ nidhanaṃ syāt praśastam
GE07mbh_05_u:029.019a: utāho tvaṃ manyase sarvam eva; rājñāṃ yuddhe vartate dharmatantram
GE07mbh_05_u:029.019c: ayuddhe vā vartate dharmatantraṃ; tathaiva te vācam imāṃ śṛṇomi
GE07mbh_05_u:029.020a: cāturvarṇyasya prathamaṃ vibhāgam; avekṣya tvaṃ saṃjaya svaṃ ca karma
GE07mbh_05_u:029.020c: niśamyātho pāṇḍavānāṃ svakarma; praśaṃsa vā ninda vā yā matis te
GE07mbh_05_u:029.021a: adhīyīta brāhmaṇo 'tho yajeta; dadyād iyāt tīrthamukhyāni caiva
GE07mbh_05_u:029.021c: adhyāpayed yājayec cāpi yājyān; pratigrahān vā viditān pratīcchet
GE07mbh_05_u:029.021d-0139_02: dadyād dhanaṃ na tu yāceta kiṃ cit
GE07mbh_05_u:029.022a: tathā rājanyo rakṣaṇaṃ vai prajānāṃ; kṛtvā dharmeṇāpramatto 'tha dattvā
GE07mbh_05_u:029.022c: yajñair iṣṭvā sarvavedān adhītya; dārān kṛtvā puṇyakṛd āvased gṛhān
GE07mbh_05_u:029.023a: vaiśyo 'dhītya kṛṣigorakṣapaṇyair; vittaṃ cinvan pālayann apramattaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:029.023c: priyaṃ kurvan brāhmaṇakṣatriyāṇāṃ; dharmaśīlaḥ puṇyakṛd āvased gṛhān
GE07mbh_05_u:029.024a: paricaryā vandanaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ; nādhīyīta pratiṣiddho 'sya yajñaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:029.024c: nityotthito bhūtaye 'tandritaḥ syād; eṣa smṛtaḥ śūdradharmaḥ purāṇaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:029.025a: etān rājā pālayann apramatto; niyojayan sarvavarṇān svadharme
GE07mbh_05_u:029.025c: akāmātmā samavṛttiḥ prajāsu; nādhārmikān anurudhyeta kāmān
GE07mbh_05_u:029.026a: śreyāṃs tasmād yadi vidyeta kaś cid; abhijñātaḥ sarvadharmopapannaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:029.026c: sa taṃ duṣṭam anuśiṣyāt prajānan; na ced gṛdhyed iti tasmin na sādhu
GE07mbh_05_u:029.027a: yadā gṛdhyet parabhūmiṃ nṛśaṃso; vidhiprakopād balam ādadānaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:029.027c: tato rājñāṃ bhavitā yuddham etat; tatra jātaṃ varma śastraṃ dhanuś ca
GE07mbh_05_u:029.027e: indreṇedaṃ dasyuvadhāya karma; utpāditaṃ varma śastraṃ dhanuś ca
GE07mbh_05_u:029.028a: steno hared yatra dhanaṃ hy adṛṣṭaḥ; prasahya vā yatra hareta dṛṣṭaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:029.028c: ubhau garhyau bhavataḥ saṃjayaitau; kiṃ vai pṛthak tvaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putre
GE07mbh_05_u:029.028e: yo 'yaṃ lobhān manyate dharmam etaṃ; yam icchate manyuvaśānugāmī
GE07mbh_05_u:029.029a: bhāgaḥ punaḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ niviṣṭas; taṃ no 'kasmād ādadīran pare vai
GE07mbh_05_u:029.029c: asmin pade yudhyatāṃ no vadho 'pi; ślāghyaḥ pitryaḥ pararājyād viśiṣṭaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:029.029e: etān dharmān kauravāṇāṃ purāṇān; ācakṣīthāḥ saṃjaya rājyamadhye
GE07mbh_05_u:029.030a: ye te mandā mṛtyuvaśābhipannāḥ; samānītā dhārtarāṣṭreṇa mūḍhāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:029.030c: idaṃ punaḥ karma pāpīya eva; sabhāmadhye paśya vṛttaṃ kurūṇām
GE07mbh_05_u:029.031a: priyāṃ bhāryāṃ draupadīṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ; yaśasvinīṃ śīlavṛttopapannām
GE07mbh_05_u:029.031c: yad upekṣanta kuravo bhīṣmamukhyāḥ; kāmānugenoparuddhāṃ rudantīm
GE07mbh_05_u:029.032a: taṃ cet tadā te sakumāravṛddhā; avārayiṣyan kuravaḥ sametāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:029.032c: mama priyaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭro 'kariṣyat; putrāṇāṃ ca kṛtam asyābhaviṣyat
GE07mbh_05_u:029.033a: duḥśāsanaḥ prātilomyān nināya; sabhāmadhye śvaśurāṇāṃ ca kṛṣṇām
GE07mbh_05_u:029.033c: sā tatra nītā karuṇāny avocan; nānyaṃ kṣattur nātham adṛṣṭa kaṃ cit
GE07mbh_05_u:029.034a: kārpaṇyād eva sahitās tatra rājño; nāśaknuvan prativaktuṃ sabhāyām
GE07mbh_05_u:029.034c: ekaḥ kṣattā dharmyam arthaṃ bruvāṇo; dharmaṃ buddhvā pratyuvācālpabuddhim
GE07mbh_05_u:029.035a: anuktvā tvaṃ dharmam evaṃ sabhāyām; athecchase pāṇḍavasyopadeṣṭum
GE07mbh_05_u:029.035c: kṛṣṇā tv etat karma cakāra śuddhaṃ; suduṣkaraṃ tad dhi sabhāṃ sametya
GE07mbh_05_u:029.035e: yena kṛcchrāt pāṇḍavān ujjahāra; tathātmānaṃ naur iva sāgaraughāt
GE07mbh_05_u:029.036a: yatrābravīt sūtaputraḥ sabhāyāṃ; kṛṣṇāṃ sthitāṃ śvaśurāṇāṃ samīpe
GE07mbh_05_u:029.036c: na te gatir vidyate yājñaseni; prapadyedānīṃ dhārtarāṣṭrasya veśma
GE07mbh_05_u:029.036e: parājitās te patayo na santi; patiṃ cānyaṃ bhāmini tvaṃ vṛṇīṣva
GE07mbh_05_u:029.037a: yo bībhatsor hṛdaye prauḍha āsīd; asthipracchinmarmaghātī sughoraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:029.037c: karṇāc charo vāṅmayas tigmatejāḥ; pratiṣṭhito hṛdaye phalgunasya
GE07mbh_05_u:029.038a: kṛṣṇājināni paridhit samānān; duḥśāsanaḥ kaṭukāny abhyabhāṣat
GE07mbh_05_u:029.038c: ete sarve ṣaṇḍhatilā vinaṣṭāḥ; kṣayaṃ gatā narakaṃ dīrghakālam
GE07mbh_05_u:029.039a: gāndhārarājaḥ śakunir nikṛtyā; yad abravīd dyūtakāle sa pārthān
GE07mbh_05_u:029.039c: parājito nakulaḥ kiṃ tavāsti; kṛṣṇayā tvaṃ dīvya vai yājñasenyā
GE07mbh_05_u:029.040a: jānāsi tvaṃ saṃjaya sarvam etad; dyūte 'vācyaṃ vākyam evaṃ yathoktam
GE07mbh_05_u:029.040c: svayaṃ tv ahaṃ prārthaye tatra gantuṃ; samādhātuṃ kāryam etad vipannam
GE07mbh_05_u:029.041a: ahāpayitvā yadi pāṇḍavārthaṃ; śamaṃ kurūṇām atha cec careyam
GE07mbh_05_u:029.041c: puṇyaṃ ca me syāc caritaṃ mahodayaṃ; mucyeraṃś ca kuravo mṛtyupāśāt
GE07mbh_05_u:029.042a: api vācaṃ bhāṣamāṇasya kāvyāṃ; dharmārāmām arthavatīm ahiṃsrām
GE07mbh_05_u:029.042c: avekṣeran dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ samakṣaṃ; māṃ ca prāptaṃ kuravaḥ pūjayeyuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:029.043c: parāsiktān dhārtarāṣṭrāṃs tu viddhi; pradahyamānān karmaṇā svena mandān
GE07mbh_05_u:029.044a: parājitān pāṇḍaveyāṃs tu vāco; raudrarūpā bhāṣate dhārtarāṣṭraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:029.044c: gadāhasto bhīmaseno 'pramatto; duryodhanaṃ smārayitvā hi kāle
GE07mbh_05_u:029.045a: suyodhano manyumayo mahādrumaḥ; skandhaḥ karṇaḥ śakunis tasya śākhāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:029.045c: duḥśāsanaḥ puṣpaphale samṛddhe; mūlaṃ rājā dhṛtarāṣṭro 'manīṣī
GE07mbh_05_u:029.046a: yudhiṣṭhiro dharmamayo mahādrumaḥ; skandho 'rjuno bhīmaseno 'sya śākhāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:029.046c: mādrīputrau puṣpaphale samṛddhe; mūlaṃ tv ahaṃ brahma ca brāhmaṇāś ca
GE07mbh_05_u:029.047a: vanaṃ rājā dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ saputro; vyāghrā vane saṃjaya pāṇḍaveyāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:029.047b-0146_01: dhārtarāṣṭro vanaṃ rājā vyāghrāḥ pāṇḍusutā matāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:029.047b-0149_01: vanaṃ rājā dhṛtarāṣṭro vane vyāghrāś ca pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:029.047c: mā vanaṃ chindhi savyāghraṃ mā vyāghrān nīnaśo vanāt
GE07mbh_05_u:029.048a: nirvano vadhyate vyāghro nirvyāghraṃ chidyate vanam
GE07mbh_05_u:029.048c: tasmād vyāghro vanaṃ rakṣed vanaṃ vyāghraṃ ca pālayet
GE07mbh_05_u:029.049c: na latā vardhate jātu anāśritya mahādrumam
GE07mbh_05_u:029.050a: sthitāḥ śuśrūṣituṃ pārthāḥ sthitā yoddhum ariṃdamāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:029.051c: yodhāḥ samṛddhās tad vidvan nācakṣīthā yathātatham
GE07mbh_05_u:030.001a: āmantraye tvā naradevadeva; gacchāmy ahaṃ pāṇḍava svasti te 'stu
GE07mbh_05_u:030.001c: kaccin na vācā vṛjinaṃ hi kiṃ cid; uccāritaṃ me manaso 'bhiṣaṅgāt
GE07mbh_05_u:030.002a: janārdanaṃ bhīmasenārjunau ca; mādrīsutau sātyakiṃ cekitānam
GE07mbh_05_u:030.002c: āmantrya gacchāmi śivaṃ sukhaṃ vaḥ; saumyena māṃ paśyata cakṣuṣā nṛpāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:030.003a: anujñātaḥ saṃjaya svasti gaccha; na no 'kārṣīr apriyaṃ jātu kiṃ cit
GE07mbh_05_u:030.003c: vidmaś ca tvā te ca vayaṃ ca sarve; śuddhātmānaṃ madhyagataṃ sabhāstham
GE07mbh_05_u:030.004a: āpto dūtaḥ saṃjaya supriyo 'si; kalyāṇavāk śīlavān dṛṣṭimāṃś ca
GE07mbh_05_u:030.004c: na muhyes tvaṃ saṃjaya jātu matyā; na ca krudhyer ucyamāno 'pi tathyam
GE07mbh_05_u:030.005a: na marmagāṃ jātu vaktāsi rūkṣāṃ; nopastutiṃ kaṭukāṃ nota śuktām
GE07mbh_05_u:030.005c: dharmārāmām arthavatīm ahiṃsrām; etāṃ vācaṃ tava jānāmi sūta
GE07mbh_05_u:030.006a: tvam eva naḥ priyatamo 'si dūta; ihāgacched viduro vā dvitīyaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:030.006c: abhīkṣṇadṛṣṭo 'si purā hi nas tvaṃ; dhanaṃjayasyātmasamaḥ sakhāsi
GE07mbh_05_u:030.007a: ito gatvā saṃjaya kṣipram eva; upātiṣṭhethā brāhmaṇān ye tadarhāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:030.008a: svādhyāyino brāhmaṇā bhikṣavaś ca; tapasvino ye ca nityā vaneṣu
GE07mbh_05_u:030.008c: abhivādyā vai madvacanena vṛddhās; tathetareṣāṃ kuśalaṃ vadethāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:030.009a: purohitaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrasya rājña; ācāryāś ca ṛtvijo ye ca tasya
GE07mbh_05_u:030.009c: taiś ca tvaṃ tāta sahitair yathārhaṃ; saṃgacchethāḥ kuśalenaiva sūta
GE07mbh_05_u:030.010a: ācārya iṣṭo 'napago vidheyo; vedān īpsan brahmacaryaṃ cacāra
GE07mbh_05_u:030.010c: yo 'straṃ catuṣpāt punar eva cakre; droṇaḥ prasanno 'bhivādyo yathārham
GE07mbh_05_u:030.011a: adhītavidyaś caraṇopapanno; yo 'straṃ catuṣpāt punar eva cakre
GE07mbh_05_u:030.011c: gandharvaputrapratimaṃ tarasvinaṃ; tam aśvatthāmānaṃ kuśalaṃ sma pṛccheḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:030.012c: tvaṃ mām abhīkṣṇaṃ parikīrtayan vai; kṛpasya pādau saṃjaya pāṇinā spṛśeḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:030.013a: yasmiñ śauryam ānṛśaṃsyaṃ tapaś ca; prajñā śīlaṃ śrutisattve dhṛtiś ca
GE07mbh_05_u:030.013c: pādau gṛhītvā kurusattamasya; bhīṣmasya māṃ tatra nivedayethāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:030.014a: prajñācakṣur yaḥ praṇetā kurūṇāṃ; bahuśruto vṛddhasevī manīṣī
GE07mbh_05_u:030.014c: tasmai rājñe sthavirāyābhivādya; ācakṣīthāḥ saṃjaya mām arogam
GE07mbh_05_u:030.015a: jyeṣṭhaḥ putro dhṛtarāṣṭrasya mando; mūrkhaḥ śaṭhaḥ saṃjaya pāpaśīlaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:030.015c: praśāstā vai pṛthivī yena sarvā; suyodhanaṃ kuśalaṃ tāta pṛccheḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:030.016a: bhrātā kanīyān api tasya mandas; tathāśīlaḥ saṃjaya so 'pi śaśvat
GE07mbh_05_u:030.016c: maheṣvāsaḥ śūratamaḥ kurūṇāṃ; duḥśāsanaṃ kuśalaṃ tāta pṛccheḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:030.016d-0155_02: ye cāpy anye pārthivāś ca pradhānāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:030.017a: vṛndārakaṃ kavim artheṣv amūḍhaṃ; mahāprajñaṃ sarvadharmopapannam
GE07mbh_05_u:030.017c: na tasya yuddhaṃ rocate vai kadā cid; vaiśyāputraṃ kuśalaṃ tāta pṛccheḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:030.018a: nikartane devane yo 'dvitīyaś; channopadhaḥ sādhudevī matākṣaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:030.018c: yo durjayo devitavyena saṃkhye; sa citrasenaḥ kuśalaṃ tāta vācyaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:030.019a: yasya kāmo vartate nityam eva; nānyaḥ śamād bhāratānām iti sma
GE07mbh_05_u:030.019c: sa bāhlikānām ṛṣabho manasvī; purā yathā mābhivadet prasannaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:030.020a: guṇair anekaiḥ pravaraiś ca yukto; vijñānavān naiva ca niṣṭhuro yaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:030.020c: snehād amarṣaṃ sahate sadaiva; sa somadattaḥ pūjanīyo mato me
GE07mbh_05_u:030.021a: arhattamaḥ kuruṣu saumadattiḥ; sa no bhrātā saṃjaya matsakhā ca
GE07mbh_05_u:030.021c: maheṣvāso rathinām uttamo yaḥ; sahāmātyaḥ kuśalaṃ tasya pṛccheḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:030.022a: ye caivānye kurumukhyā yuvānaḥ; putrāḥ pautrā bhrātaraś caiva ye naḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:030.022c: yaṃ yam eṣāṃ yena yenābhigaccher; anāmayaṃ madvacanena vācyaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:030.023a: ye rājānaḥ pāṇḍavāyodhanāya; samānītā dhārtarāṣṭreṇa ke cit
GE07mbh_05_u:030.023c: vasātayaḥ śālvakāḥ kekayāś ca; tathāmbaṣṭhā ye trigartāś ca mukhyāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:030.024a: prācyodīcyā dākṣiṇātyāś ca śūrās; tathā pratīcyāḥ pārvatīyāś ca sarve
GE07mbh_05_u:030.024c: anṛśaṃsāḥ śīlavṛttopapannās; teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ kuśalaṃ tāta pṛccheḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:030.025a: hastyārohā rathinaḥ sādinaś ca; padātayaś cāryasaṃghā mahāntaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:030.025c: ākhyāya māṃ kuśalinaṃ sma teṣām; anāmayaṃ paripṛccheḥ samagrān
GE07mbh_05_u:030.026a: tathā rājño hy arthayuktān amātyān; dauvārikān ye ca senāṃ nayanti
GE07mbh_05_u:030.026c: āyavyayaṃ ye gaṇayanti yuktā; arthāṃś ca ye mahataś cintayanti
GE07mbh_05_u:030.027c: mānaṃ kurvan dhārtarāṣṭrasya sūta; mithyābuddheḥ kuśalaṃ tāta pṛccheḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:030.028a: yaḥ pāṇḍavān ekarathena vīraḥ; samutsahaty apradhṛṣyān vijetum
GE07mbh_05_u:030.028c: yo muhyatāṃ mohayitādvitīyo; vaikartanaṃ kuśalaṃ tāta pṛccheḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:030.029a: sa eva bhaktaḥ sa guruḥ sa bhṛtyaḥ; sa vai pitā sa ca mātā suhṛc ca
GE07mbh_05_u:030.029c: agādhabuddhir viduro dīrghadarśī; sa no mantrī kuśalaṃ tāta pṛccheḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:030.030a: vṛddhāḥ striyo yāś ca guṇopapannā; yā jñāyante saṃjaya mātaras tāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:030.030c: tābhiḥ sarvābhiḥ sahitābhiḥ sametya; strībhir vṛddhābhir abhivādaṃ vadethāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:030.031a: kaccit putrā jīvaputrāḥ susamyag; vartante vo vṛttim anṛśaṃsarūpām
GE07mbh_05_u:030.031c: iti smoktvā saṃjaya brūhi paścād; ajātaśatruḥ kuśalī saputraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:030.032a: yā no bhāryāḥ saṃjaya vettha tatra; tāsāṃ sarvāsāṃ kuśalaṃ tāta pṛccheḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:030.033a: kaccid vṛttiṃ śvaśureṣu bhadrāḥ; kalyāṇīṃ vartadhvam anṛśaṃsarūpām
GE07mbh_05_u:030.033c: yathā ca vaḥ syuḥ patayo 'nukūlās; tathā vṛttim ātmanaḥ sthāpayadhvam
GE07mbh_05_u:030.034a: yā naḥ snuṣāḥ saṃjaya vettha tatra; prāptāḥ kulebhyaś ca guṇopapannāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:030.034c: prajāvatyo brūhi sametya tāś ca; yudhiṣṭhiro vo 'bhyavadat prasannaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:030.035a: kanyāḥ svajethāḥ sadaneṣu saṃjaya; anāmayaṃ madvacanena pṛṣṭvā
GE07mbh_05_u:030.035c: kalyāṇā vaḥ santu patayo 'nukūlā; yūyaṃ patīnāṃ bhavatānukūlāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:030.036a: alaṃkṛtā vastravatyaḥ sugandhā; abībhatsāḥ sukhitā bhogavatyaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:030.036c: laghu yāsāṃ darśanaṃ vāk ca laghvī; veśastriyaḥ kuśalaṃ tāta pṛccheḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:030.037a: dāsīputrā ye ca dāsāḥ kurūṇāṃ; tadāśrayā bahavaḥ kubjakhañjāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:030.037c: ākhyāya māṃ kuśalinaṃ sma tebhyo; anāmayaṃ paripṛccher jaghanyam
GE07mbh_05_u:030.038a: kaccid vṛttir vartate vai purāṇī; kaccid bhogān dhārtarāṣṭro dadāti
GE07mbh_05_u:030.038c: aṅgahīnān kṛpaṇān vāmanāṃś ca; ānṛśaṃsyād dhṛtarāṣṭro bibharti
GE07mbh_05_u:030.039a: andhāś ca sarve sthavirās tathaiva; hastājīvā bahavo ye 'tra santi
GE07mbh_05_u:030.039c: ākhyāya māṃ kuśalinaṃ sma teṣām; anāmayaṃ paripṛccher jaghanyam
GE07mbh_05_u:030.040a: mā bhaiṣṭa duḥkhena kujīvitena; nūnaṃ kṛtaṃ paralokeṣu pāpam
GE07mbh_05_u:030.040c: nigṛhya śatrūn suhṛdo 'nugṛhya; vāsobhir annena ca vo bhariṣye
GE07mbh_05_u:030.040d-0159_01: na cāpy etac chakyam ekena vaktuṃ
GE07mbh_05_u:030.040d-0159_05: te me yathā vācam imāṃ yathoktāṃ
GE07mbh_05_u:030.041a: santy eva me brāhmaṇebhyaḥ kṛtāni; bhāvīny atho no bata vartayanti
GE07mbh_05_u:030.041c: paśyāmy ahaṃ yuktarūpāṃs tathaiva; tām eva siddhiṃ śrāvayethā nṛpaṃ tam
GE07mbh_05_u:030.042a: ye cānāthā durbalāḥ sarvakālam; ātmany eva prayatante 'tha mūḍhāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:030.042c: tāṃś cāpi tvaṃ kṛpaṇān sarvathaiva; asmadvākyāt kuśalaṃ tāta pṛccheḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:030.043a: ye cāpy anye saṃśritā dhārtarāṣṭrān; nānādigbhyo 'bhyāgatāḥ sūtaputra
GE07mbh_05_u:030.043c: dṛṣṭvā tāṃś caivārhataś cāpi sarvān; saṃpṛcchethāḥ kuśalaṃ cāvyayaṃ ca
GE07mbh_05_u:030.044a: evaṃ sarvānāgatābhyāgatāṃś ca; rājño dūtān sarvadigbhyo 'bhyupetān
GE07mbh_05_u:030.044c: pṛṣṭvā sarvān kuśalaṃ tāṃś ca sūta; paścād ahaṃ kuśalī teṣu vācyaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:030.045a: na hīdṛśāḥ santy apare pṛthivyāṃ; ye yodhakā dhārtarāṣṭreṇa labdhāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:030.045c: dharmas tu nityo mama dharma eva; mahābalaḥ śatrunibarhaṇāya
GE07mbh_05_u:030.046a: idaṃ punar vacanaṃ dhārtarāṣṭraṃ; suyodhanaṃ saṃjaya śrāvayethāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:030.046c: yas te śarīre hṛdayaṃ dunoti; kāmaḥ kurūn asapatno 'nuśiṣyām
GE07mbh_05_u:030.047a: na vidyate yuktir etasya kā cin; naivaṃvidhāḥ syāma yathā priyaṃ te
GE07mbh_05_u:030.047c: dadasva vā śakrapuraṃ mamaiva; yudhyasva vā bhāratamukhya vīra
GE07mbh_05_u:031.001a: uta santam asantaṃ ca bālaṃ vṛddhaṃ ca saṃjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:031.002c: dadāti sarvam īśānaḥ purastāc chukram uccaran
GE07mbh_05_u:031.005a: brūyāś cainaṃ tvam āsīnaṃ kurubhiḥ parivāritam
GE07mbh_05_u:031.005c: tavaiva rājan vīryeṇa sukhaṃ jīvanti pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:031.006a: tava prasādād bālās te prāptā rājyam ariṃdama
GE07mbh_05_u:031.007a: sarvam apy etad ekasya nālaṃ saṃjaya kasya cit
GE07mbh_05_u:031.007c: tāta saṃhatya jīvāmo mā dviṣadbhyo vaśaṃ gamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:031.009c: bhavatā śaṃtanor vaṃśo nimagnaḥ punar uddhṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:031.010a: sa tvaṃ kuru tathā tāta svamatena pitāmaha
GE07mbh_05_u:031.010c: yathā jīvanti te pautrāḥ prītimantaḥ parasparam
GE07mbh_05_u:031.012c: madhye kurūṇām āsīnam anunīya punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:031.013a: apaśyan mām upekṣantaṃ kṛṣṇām ekāṃ sabhāgatām
GE07mbh_05_u:031.013c: tadduḥkham atitikṣāma mā vadhīṣma kurūn iti
GE07mbh_05_u:031.014c: yathā balīyasaḥ santas tat sarvaṃ kuravo viduḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:031.015a: yan naḥ prāvrājayaḥ saumya ajinaiḥ prativāsitān
GE07mbh_05_u:031.015c: tadduḥkham atitikṣāma mā vadhīṣma kurūn iti
GE07mbh_05_u:031.016a: yat tat sabhāyām ākramya kṛṣṇāṃ keśeṣv adharṣayat
GE07mbh_05_u:031.018a: śāntir evaṃ bhaved rājan prītiś caiva parasparam
GE07mbh_05_u:031.018c: rājyaikadeśam api naḥ prayaccha śamam icchatām
GE07mbh_05_u:031.019c: avasānaṃ bhaved atra kiṃ cid eva tu pañcamam
GE07mbh_05_u:031.020a: bhrātṝṇāṃ dehi pañcānāṃ grāmān pañca suyodhana
GE07mbh_05_u:031.020c: śāntir no 'stu mahāprājña jñātibhiḥ saha saṃjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:031.021a: bhrātā bhrātaram anvetu pitā putreṇa yujyatām
GE07mbh_05_u:031.023a: alam eva śamāyāsmi tathā yuddhāya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:031.023c: dharmārthayor alaṃ cāhaṃ mṛdave dāruṇāya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:032.001d-0160_01: tatas tu saṃjayaḥ kṣipram ekāhnaiva paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_05_u:032.002a: saṃprāpya hāstinapuraṃ śīghraṃ ca praviveśa ha
GE07mbh_05_u:032.003a: ācakṣva māṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrāya dvāḥstha; upāgataṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ sakāśāt
GE07mbh_05_u:032.003b-0161_02: sakāśāt pāṇḍuputrāṇāṃ saṃjayaṃ mā ciraṃ kṛthāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:032.003c: jāgarti ced abhivades tvaṃ hi kṣattaḥ; praviśeyaṃ vidito bhūmipasya
GE07mbh_05_u:032.004a: saṃjayo 'yaṃ bhūmipate namas te; didṛkṣayā dvāram upāgatas te
GE07mbh_05_u:032.004c: prāpto dūtaḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ sakāśāt; praśādhi rājan kim ayaṃ karotu
GE07mbh_05_u:032.005a: ācakṣva māṃ sukhinaṃ kālyam asmai; praveśyatāṃ svāgataṃ saṃjayāya
GE07mbh_05_u:032.005c: na cāham etasya bhavāmy akālyaḥ; sa me kasmād dvāri tiṣṭheta kṣattaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:032.006a: tataḥ praviśyānumate nṛpasya; mahad veśma prājñaśūrāryaguptam
GE07mbh_05_u:032.006c: siṃhāsanasthaṃ pārthivam āsasāda; vaicitravīryaṃ prāñjaliḥ sūtaputraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:032.007a: saṃjayo 'haṃ bhūmipate namas te; prāpto 'smi gatvā naradeva pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_05_u:032.007c: abhivādya tvāṃ pāṇḍuputro manasvī; yudhiṣṭhiraḥ kuśalaṃ cānvapṛcchat
GE07mbh_05_u:032.008a: sa te putrān pṛcchati prīyamāṇaḥ; kaccit putraiḥ prīyase naptṛbhiś ca
GE07mbh_05_u:032.008c: tathā suhṛdbhiḥ sacivaiś ca rājan; ye cāpi tvām upajīvanti taiś
GE07mbh_05_u:032.009a: abhyetya tvāṃ tāta vadāmi saṃjaya; ajātaśatruṃ ca sukhena pārtham
GE07mbh_05_u:032.009c: kaccit sa rājā kuśalī saputraḥ; sahāmātyaḥ sānujaḥ kauravāṇām
GE07mbh_05_u:032.010a: sahāmātyaḥ kuśalī pāṇḍuputro; bhūyaś cāto yac ca te 'gre mano 'bhūt
GE07mbh_05_u:032.010c: nirṇiktadharmārthakaro manasvī; bahuśruto dṛṣṭimāñ śīlavāṃś ca
GE07mbh_05_u:032.011a: paraṃ dharmāt pāṇḍavasyānṛśaṃsyaṃ; dharmaḥ paro vittacayān mato 'sya
GE07mbh_05_u:032.011c: sukhapriye dharmahīne na pārtho; 'nurudhyate bhārata tasya viddhi
GE07mbh_05_u:032.012a: paraprayuktaḥ puruṣo viceṣṭate; sūtraprotā dārumayīva yoṣā
GE07mbh_05_u:032.012c: imaṃ dṛṣṭvā niyamaṃ pāṇḍavasya; manye paraṃ karma daivaṃ manuṣyāt
GE07mbh_05_u:032.013a: imaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā tava karmadoṣaṃ; pādodarkaṃ ghoram avarṇarūpam
GE07mbh_05_u:032.013c: yāvan naraḥ kāmayate 'tikālyaṃ; tāvan naro 'yaṃ labhate praśaṃsām
GE07mbh_05_u:032.014a: ajātaśatrus tu vihāya pāpaṃ; jīrṇāṃ tvacaṃ sarpa ivāsamarthām
GE07mbh_05_u:032.014c: virocate 'hāryavṛttena dhīro; yudhiṣṭhiras tvayi pāpaṃ visṛjya
GE07mbh_05_u:032.015a: aṅgātmanaḥ karma nibodha rājan; dharmārthayuktād āryavṛttād apetam
GE07mbh_05_u:032.015c: upakrośaṃ ceha gato 'si rājan; noheś ca pāpaṃ prasajed amutra
GE07mbh_05_u:032.016a: sa tvam arthaṃ saṃśayitaṃ vinā tair; āśaṃsase putravaśānugo 'dya
GE07mbh_05_u:032.016c: adharmaśabdaś ca mahān pṛthivyāṃ; nedaṃ karma tvatsamaṃ bhāratāgrya
GE07mbh_05_u:032.017a: hīnaprajño dauṣkuleyo nṛśaṃso; dīrghavairī kṣatravidyāsv adhīraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:032.017c: evaṃdharmā nāpadaḥ saṃtitīrṣed; dhīnavīryo yaś ca bhaved aśiṣṭaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:032.018a: kule jāto dharmavān yo yaśasvī; bahuśrutaḥ sukhajīvī yatātmā
GE07mbh_05_u:032.018c: dharmārthayor grathitayor bibharti; nānyatra diṣṭasya vaśād upaiti
GE07mbh_05_u:032.019a: kathaṃ hi mantrāgryadharo manīṣī; dharmārthayor āpadi saṃpraṇetā
GE07mbh_05_u:032.019c: evaṃyuktaḥ sarvamantrair ahīno; anānṛśaṃsyaṃ karma kuryād amūḍhaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:032.020a: tavāpīme mantravidaḥ sametya; samāsate karmasu nityayuktāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:032.020c: teṣām ayaṃ balavān niścayaś ca; kurukṣayārthe nirayo vyapādi
GE07mbh_05_u:032.021a: akālikaṃ kuravo nābhaviṣyan; pāpena cet pāpam ajātaśatruḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:032.021c: icchej jātu tvayi pāpaṃ visṛjya; nindā ceyaṃ tava loke 'bhaviṣyat
GE07mbh_05_u:032.022a: kim anyatra viṣayād īśvarāṇāṃ; yatra pārthaḥ paralokaṃ dadarśa
GE07mbh_05_u:032.022c: atyakrāmat sa tathā saṃmataḥ syān; na saṃśayo nāsti manuṣyakāraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:032.023a: etān guṇān karmakṛtān avekṣya; bhāvābhāvau vartamānāv anityau
GE07mbh_05_u:032.023c: balir hi rājā pāram avindamāno; nānyat kālāt kāraṇaṃ tatra mene
GE07mbh_05_u:032.024a: cakṣuḥ śrotre nāsikā tvak ca jihvā; jñānasyaitāny āyatanāni jantoḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:032.024c: tāni prītāny eva tṛṣṇākṣayānte; tāny avyatho duḥkhahīnaḥ praṇudyāt
GE07mbh_05_u:032.025a: na tv eva manye puruṣasya karma; saṃvartate suprayuktaṃ yathāvat
GE07mbh_05_u:032.025c: mātuḥ pituḥ karmaṇābhiprasūtaḥ; saṃvardhate vidhivad bhojanena
GE07mbh_05_u:032.026a: priyāpriye sukhaduḥkhe ca rājan; nindāpraśaṃse ca bhajeta enam
GE07mbh_05_u:032.026c: paras tv enaṃ garhayate 'parādhe; praśaṃsate sādhuvṛttaṃ tam eva
GE07mbh_05_u:032.027a: sa tvā garhe bhāratānāṃ virodhād; anto nūnaṃ bhavitāyaṃ prajānām
GE07mbh_05_u:032.027c: no ced idaṃ tava karmāparādhāt; kurūn dahet kṛṣṇavartmeva kakṣam
GE07mbh_05_u:032.028a: tvam evaiko jātaputreṣu rājan; vaśaṃ gantā sarvaloke narendra
GE07mbh_05_u:032.028c: kāmātmanāṃ ślāghase dyūtakāle; nānyac chamāt paśya vipākam asya
GE07mbh_05_u:032.029a: anāptānāṃ pragrahāt tvaṃ narendra; tathāptānāṃ nigrahāc caiva rājan
GE07mbh_05_u:032.029c: bhūmiṃ sphītāṃ durbalatvād anantāṃ; na śaktas tvaṃ rakṣituṃ kauraveya
GE07mbh_05_u:032.030a: anujñāto rathavegāvadhūtaḥ; śrānto nipadye śayanaṃ nṛsiṃha
GE07mbh_05_u:032.030c: prātaḥ śrotāraḥ kuravaḥ sabhāyām; ajātaśatror vacanaṃ sametāḥ dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
GE07mbh_05_u:033.001c: viduraṃ draṣṭum icchāmi tam ihānaya māciram
GE07mbh_05_u:033.003a: evam uktas tu viduraḥ prāpya rājaniveśanam
GE07mbh_05_u:033.004c: draṣṭum icchati te pādau kiṃ karotu praśādhi mām
GE07mbh_05_u:033.005c: ahaṃ hi vidurasyāsya nākālyo jātu darśane
GE07mbh_05_u:033.006c: na hi te darśane 'kālyo jātu rājā bravīti mām
GE07mbh_05_u:033.007d-0166_01: evam uktaḥ praviśyātha kṣattā rājānam abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:033.008c: yadi kiṃ cana kartavyam ayam asmi praśādhi mām
GE07mbh_05_u:033.009a: saṃjayo vidura prāpto garhayitvā ca māṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.009c: ajātaśatroḥ śvo vākyaṃ sabhāmadhye sa vakṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:033.010a: tasyādya kuruvīrasya na vijñātaṃ vaco mayā
GE07mbh_05_u:033.010c: tan me dahati gātrāṇi tad akārṣīt prajāgaram
GE07mbh_05_u:033.011a: jāgrato dahyamānasya śreyo yad iha paśyasi
GE07mbh_05_u:033.011c: tad brūhi tvaṃ hi nas tāta dharmārthakuśalo hy asi
GE07mbh_05_u:033.012a: yataḥ prāptaḥ saṃjayaḥ pāṇḍavebhyo; na me yathāvan manasaḥ praśāntiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.012c: sarvendriyāṇy aprakṛtiṃ gatāni; kiṃ vakṣyatīty eva hi me 'dya cintā
GE07mbh_05_u:033.012d-0167_01: tan me brūhi vidura sarvaṃ yathāvat
GE07mbh_05_u:033.012d-0167_03: yathā ca nas tāta hitaṃ bhaveta
GE07mbh_05_u:033.014a: kaccid etair mahādoṣair na spṛṣṭo 'si narādhipa
GE07mbh_05_u:033.015a: śrotum icchāmi te dharmyaṃ paraṃ naiḥśreyasaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.015c: asmin rājarṣivaṃśe hi tvam ekaḥ prājñasaṃmataḥ vidura uvāca
GE07mbh_05_u:033.016-0168_02: preṣyas te preṣitaś caiva dhṛtarāṣṭra yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.016-0168_06: gurutvaṃ tvayi saṃprekṣya bahūn kleśāṃs titikṣate
GE07mbh_05_u:033.016-0168_08: eteṣv aiśvaryam ādhāya kathaṃ tvaṃ bhūtim icchasi
GE07mbh_05_u:033.016-0169_01: vāksaṃyamaś ca dānaṃ ca naiteṣv etāni kṛtsnaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.016-0169_03: sruk ca droṇī voḍhanī pīḍanī ca
GE07mbh_05_u:033.016-0169_05: ekasmāt puruṣāj jāyate 'sac ca sac ca
GE07mbh_05_u:033.017a: krodho harṣaś ca darpaś ca hrīstambho mānyamānitā
GE07mbh_05_u:033.017c: yam arthān nāpakarṣanti sa vai paṇḍita ucyate
GE07mbh_05_u:033.018a: yasya kṛtyaṃ na jānanti mantraṃ vā mantritaṃ pare
GE07mbh_05_u:033.018c: kṛtam evāsya jānanti sa vai paṇḍita ucyate
GE07mbh_05_u:033.019a: yasya kṛtyaṃ na vighnanti śītam uṣṇaṃ bhayaṃ ratiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.019c: samṛddhir asamṛddhir vā sa vai paṇḍita ucyate
GE07mbh_05_u:033.020c: kāmād arthaṃ vṛṇīte yaḥ sa vai paṇḍita ucyate
GE07mbh_05_u:033.020d-0171_01: kāmād arthaṃ vṛṇīte yo mokṣād arthaṃ sa vindati
GE07mbh_05_u:033.020d-0171_02: rājanītiṃ samīkṣyātha sa vai paṇḍita ucyate
GE07mbh_05_u:033.021c: na kiṃ cid avamanyante paṇḍitā bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:033.022a: kṣipraṃ vijānāti ciraṃ śṛṇoti; vijñāya cārthaṃ bhajate na kāmāt
GE07mbh_05_u:033.022c: nāsaṃpṛṣṭo vyupayuṅkte parārthe; tat prajñānaṃ prathamaṃ paṇḍitasya
GE07mbh_05_u:033.023c: āpatsu ca na muhyanti narāḥ paṇḍitabuddhayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.024a: niścitya yaḥ prakramate nāntar vasati karmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.024c: avandhyakālo vaśyātmā sa vai paṇḍita ucyate
GE07mbh_05_u:033.026c: gāṅgo hrada ivākṣobhyo yaḥ sa paṇḍita ucyate
GE07mbh_05_u:033.028c: āśu granthasya vaktā ca sa vai paṇḍita ucyate
GE07mbh_05_u:033.029a: śrutaṃ prajñānugaṃ yasya prajñā caiva śrutānugā
GE07mbh_05_u:033.030a: aśrutaś ca samunnaddho daridraś ca mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.030c: arthāṃś cākarmaṇā prepsur mūḍha ity ucyate budhaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.031a: svam arthaṃ yaḥ parityajya parārtham anutiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_05_u:033.031c: mithyā carati mitrārthe yaś ca mūḍhaḥ sa ucyate
GE07mbh_05_u:033.031d-0172_01: yaḥ prāpya mānuṣaṃ janma mokṣadvāram apāvṛtam
GE07mbh_05_u:033.031d-0172_02: gṛheṣu sajjate mūḍhas tam ārūḍhacyutaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.032c: balavantaṃ ca yo dveṣṭi tam āhur mūḍhacetasam
GE07mbh_05_u:033.033a: amitraṃ kurute mitraṃ mitraṃ dveṣṭi hinasti ca
GE07mbh_05_u:033.033c: karma cārabhate duṣṭaṃ tam āhur mūḍhacetasam
GE07mbh_05_u:033.034c: ciraṃ karoti kṣiprārthe sa mūḍho bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:033.034d-0173_01: śrāddhaṃ pitṛbhyo na dadāti daivatāni na cārcati
GE07mbh_05_u:033.034d-0173_02: suhṛn mitraṃ na labhate tam āhur mūḍhalakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:033.036a: paraṃ kṣipati doṣeṇa vartamānaḥ svayaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:033.036c: yaś ca krudhyaty anīśaḥ san sa ca mūḍhatamo naraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.038a: aśiṣyaṃ śāsti yo rājan yaś ca śūnyam upāsate
GE07mbh_05_u:033.038c: kadaryaṃ bhajate yaś ca tam āhur mūḍhacetasam
GE07mbh_05_u:033.039a: arthaṃ mahāntam āsādya vidyām aiśvaryam eva vā
GE07mbh_05_u:033.039c: vicaraty asamunnaddho yaḥ sa paṇḍita ucyate
GE07mbh_05_u:033.040a: ekaḥ saṃpannam aśnāti vas te vāsaś ca śobhanam
GE07mbh_05_u:033.041a: ekaḥ pāpāni kurute phalaṃ bhuṅkte mahājanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.042a: ekaṃ hanyān na vā hanyād iṣur mukto dhanuṣmatā
GE07mbh_05_u:033.043a: ekayā dve viniścitya trīṃś caturbhir vaśe kuru
GE07mbh_05_u:033.043c: pañca jitvā viditvā ṣaṭ sapta hitvā sukhī bhava
GE07mbh_05_u:033.044a: ekaṃ viṣaraso hanti śastreṇaikaś ca vadhyate
GE07mbh_05_u:033.045a: ekaḥ svādu na bhuñjīta ekaś cārthān na cintayet
GE07mbh_05_u:033.045c: eko na gacched adhvānaṃ naikaḥ supteṣu jāgṛyāt
GE07mbh_05_u:033.046a: ekam evādvitīyaṃ tad yad rājan nāvabudhyase
GE07mbh_05_u:033.046c: satyaṃ svargasya sopānaṃ pārāvārasya naur iva
GE07mbh_05_u:033.047c: yad enaṃ kṣamayā yuktam aśaktaṃ manyate janaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.047d-0174_01: so 'sya doṣo na mantavyaḥ kṣamā hi paramaṃ balam
GE07mbh_05_u:033.047d-0175_01: kṣamā guṇo hy aśaktānāṃ śaktānāṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ kṣamā
GE07mbh_05_u:033.047d-0175_02: kṣamā vaśīkṛtir loke kṣamayā kiṃ na sādhyate
GE07mbh_05_u:033.047d-0175_03: śāntikhaḍgaḥ kare yasya kiṃ kariṣyati durjanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.047d-0176_01: akṣamāvān paraṃ doṣair ātmānaṃ caiva yojayet
GE07mbh_05_u:033.048a: eko dharmaḥ paraṃ śreyaḥ kṣamaikā śāntir uttamā
GE07mbh_05_u:033.049a: dvāv imau grasate bhūmiḥ sarpo bilaśayān iva
GE07mbh_05_u:033.050a: dve karmaṇī naraḥ kurvann asmiṃl loke virocate
GE07mbh_05_u:033.050c: abruvan paruṣaṃ kiṃ cid asato nārthayaṃs tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:033.052c: yaś cādhanaḥ kāmayate yaś ca kupyaty anīśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.052d-0179_01: dvāv imau na virājete viparītena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_05_u:033.052d-0179_02: gṛhasthaś ca nirārambhaḥ kāryavāṃś caiva bhikṣukaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.053a: dvāv imau puruṣau rājan svargasyopari tiṣṭhataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.053c: prabhuś ca kṣamayā yukto daridraś ca pradānavān
GE07mbh_05_u:033.054d-0180_01: dvāv ambhasi niveṣṭavyau gale baddhvā dṛḍhāṃ śilām
GE07mbh_05_u:033.055c: kanīyān madhyamaḥ śreṣṭha iti vedavido viduḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.056c: niyojayed yathāvat tāṃs trividheṣv eva karmasu
GE07mbh_05_u:033.057a: traya evādhanā rājan bhāryā dāsas tathā sutaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.057c: yat te samadhigacchanti yasya te tasya tad dhanam
GE07mbh_05_u:033.057d-0181_02: suhṛdaś ca parityāgas trayo doṣāḥ kṣayāvahāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.057d-0181_04: kāmaḥ krodhas tathā lobhas tasmād etat trayaṃ tyajet
GE07mbh_05_u:033.057d-0181_05: bhaktaṃ ca bhajamānaṃ ca tavāsmīti ca vādinam
GE07mbh_05_u:033.057d-0181_06: trīn etāñ śaraṇaṃ prāptān viṣame 'pi na saṃtyajet
GE07mbh_05_u:033.057d-0181_07: varapradānaṃ rājyaṃ ca putrajanma ca bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:033.057d-0181_08: śatroś ca mokṣaṇaṃ kṛcchrāt trīṇi caikaṃ ca tatsamam
GE07mbh_05_u:033.058a: catvāri rājñā tu mahābalena; varjyāny āhuḥ paṇḍitas tāni vidyāt
GE07mbh_05_u:033.058c: alpaprajñaiḥ saha mantraṃ na kuryān; na dīrghasūtrair alasaiś cāraṇaiś ca
GE07mbh_05_u:033.059a: catvāri te tāta gṛhe vasantu; śriyābhijuṣṭasya gṛhasthadharme
GE07mbh_05_u:033.059c: vṛddho jñātir avasannaḥ kulīnaḥ; sakhā daridro bhaginī cānapatyā
GE07mbh_05_u:033.061a: devatānāṃ ca saṃkalpam anubhāvaṃ ca dhīmatām
GE07mbh_05_u:033.062c: pitā mātāgnir ātmā ca guruś ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:033.063a: pañcaiva pūjayaṃl loke yaśaḥ prāpnoti kevalam
GE07mbh_05_u:033.063c: devān pitṝn manuṣyāṃś ca bhikṣūn atithipañcamān
GE07mbh_05_u:033.065a: pañcendriyasya martyasya chidraṃ ced ekam indriyam
GE07mbh_05_u:033.065c: tato 'sya sravati prajñā dṛteḥ pādād ivodakam
GE07mbh_05_u:033.066a: ṣaḍ doṣāḥ puruṣeṇeha hātavyā bhūtim icchatā
GE07mbh_05_u:033.066c: nidrā tandrī bhayaṃ krodha ālasyaṃ dīrghasūtratā
GE07mbh_05_u:033.067a: ṣaḍ imān puruṣo jahyād bhinnāṃ nāvam ivārṇave
GE07mbh_05_u:033.068c: grāmakāmaṃ ca gopālaṃ vanakāmaṃ ca nāpitam
GE07mbh_05_u:033.069a: ṣaḍ eva tu guṇāḥ puṃsā na hātavyāḥ kadā cana
GE07mbh_05_u:033.069c: satyaṃ dānam anālasyam anasūyā kṣamā dhṛtiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.069d-0183_02: gāvaḥ sevā kṛṣir bhāryā vidyā vṛṣalasaṃgatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.069d-0183_03: ṣaḍ ete hy avamanyante nityaṃ pūrvopakāriṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:033.069d-0183_04: ācāryaṃ śikṣitāḥ śiṣyāḥ kṛtadārāś ca mātaram
GE07mbh_05_u:033.069d-0183_05: nārīṃ vigatakāmās tu kṛtārthāś ca prayojanam
GE07mbh_05_u:033.069d-0183_11: īrṣur ghṛṇī na saṃtuṣṭaḥ krodhano nityaśaṅkitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.070c: na sa pāpaiḥ kuto 'narthair yujyate vijitendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.071a: ṣaḍ ime ṣaṭsu jīvanti saptamo nopalabhyate
GE07mbh_05_u:033.073a: sapta doṣāḥ sadā rājñā hātavyā vyasanodayāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.073c: prāyaśo yair vinaśyanti kṛtamūlāś ca pārthivāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.074a: striyo 'kṣā mṛgayā pānaṃ vākpāruṣyaṃ ca pañcamam
GE07mbh_05_u:033.074c: mahac ca daṇḍapāruṣyam arthadūṣaṇam eva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:033.075c: brāhmaṇān prathamaṃ dveṣṭi brāhmaṇaiś ca virudhyate
GE07mbh_05_u:033.077c: etān doṣān naraḥ prājño buddhyā buddhvā vivarjayet
GE07mbh_05_u:033.078c: vartamānāni dṛśyante tāny eva susukhāny api
GE07mbh_05_u:033.079a: samāgamaś ca sakhibhir mahāṃś caiva dhanāgamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.079c: putreṇa ca pariṣvaṅgaḥ saṃnipātaś ca maithune
GE07mbh_05_u:033.080a: samaye ca priyālāpaḥ svayūtheṣu ca saṃnatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.080c: abhipretasya lābhaś ca pūjā ca janasaṃsadi
GE07mbh_05_u:033.081c: kṣetrajñādhiṣṭhitaṃ vidvān yo veda sa paraḥ kaviḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.082a: daśa dharmaṃ na jānanti dhṛtarāṣṭra nibodha tān
GE07mbh_05_u:033.082c: mattaḥ pramatta unmattaḥ śrāntaḥ kruddho bubhukṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.083a: tvaramāṇaś ca bhīruś ca lubdhaḥ kāmī ca te daśa
GE07mbh_05_u:033.083c: tasmād eteṣu bhāveṣu na prasajjeta paṇḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.085a: yaḥ kāmamanyū prajahāti rājā; pātre pratiṣṭhāpayate dhanaṃ ca
GE07mbh_05_u:033.085c: viśeṣavic chrutavān kṣiprakārī; taṃ sarvalokaḥ kurute pramāṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:033.086a: jānāti viśvāsayituṃ manuṣyān; vijñātadoṣeṣu dadhāti daṇḍam
GE07mbh_05_u:033.086c: jānāti mātrāṃ ca tathā kṣamāṃ ca; taṃ tādṛśaṃ śrīr juṣate samagrā
GE07mbh_05_u:033.087a: sudurbalaṃ nāvajānāti kaṃ cid; yukto ripuṃ sevate buddhipūrvam
GE07mbh_05_u:033.087c: na vigrahaṃ rocayate balasthaiḥ; kāle ca yo vikramate sa dhīraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.088a: prāpyāpadaṃ na vyathate kadā cid; udyogam anvicchati cāpramattaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.088c: duḥkhaṃ ca kāle sahate jitātmā; dhuraṃdharas tasya jitāḥ sapatnāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.089a: anarthakaṃ vipravāsaṃ gṛhebhyaḥ; pāpaiḥ saṃdhiṃ paradārābhimarśam
GE07mbh_05_u:033.089c: dambhaṃ stainyaṃ paiśunaṃ madyapānaṃ; na sevate yaḥ sa sukhī sadaiva
GE07mbh_05_u:033.090a: na saṃrambheṇārabhate 'rthavargam; ākāritaḥ śaṃsati tathyam eva
GE07mbh_05_u:033.090c: na mātrārthe rocayate vivādaṃ; nāpūjitaḥ kupyati cāpy amūḍhaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.091a: na yo 'bhyasūyaty anukampate ca; na durbalaḥ prātibhāvyaṃ karoti
GE07mbh_05_u:033.091c: nātyāha kiṃ cit kṣamate vivādaṃ; sarvatra tādṛg labhate praśaṃsām
GE07mbh_05_u:033.092a: yo noddhataṃ kurute jātu veṣaṃ; na pauruṣeṇāpi vikatthate 'nyān
GE07mbh_05_u:033.092c: na mūrcchitaḥ kaṭukāny āha kiṃ cit; priyaṃ sadā taṃ kurute jano 'pi
GE07mbh_05_u:033.093a: na vairam uddīpayati praśāntaṃ; na darpam ārohati nāstam eti
GE07mbh_05_u:033.093c: na durgato 'smīti karoti manyuṃ; tam āryaśīlaṃ param āhur agryam
GE07mbh_05_u:033.094a: na sve sukhe vai kurute praharṣaṃ; nānyasya duḥkhe bhavati pratītaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.094c: dattvā na paścāt kurute 'nutāpaṃ; na katthate satpuruṣāryaśīlaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.095a: deśācārān samayāñ jātidharmān; bubhūṣate yas tu parāvarajñaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.095c: sa tatra tatrādhigataḥ sadaiva; mahājanasyādhipatyaṃ karoti
GE07mbh_05_u:033.096a: dambhaṃ mohaṃ matsaraṃ pāpakṛtyaṃ; rājadviṣṭaṃ paiśunaṃ pūgavairam
GE07mbh_05_u:033.096c: mattonmattair durjanaiś cāpi vādaṃ; yaḥ prajñāvān varjayet sa pradhānaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.097a: damaṃ śaucaṃ daivataṃ maṅgalāni; prāyaścittaṃ vividhāṃl lokavādān
GE07mbh_05_u:033.097c: etāni yaḥ kurute naityakāni; tasyotthānaṃ devatā rādhayanti
GE07mbh_05_u:033.098a: samair vivāhaṃ kurute na hīnaiḥ; samaiḥ sakhyaṃ vyavahāraṃ kathāś ca
GE07mbh_05_u:033.098c: guṇair viśiṣṭāṃś ca purodadhāti; vipaścitas tasya nayāḥ sunītāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.099a: mitaṃ bhuṅkte saṃvibhajyāśritebhyo; mitaṃ svapity amitaṃ karma kṛtvā
GE07mbh_05_u:033.099c: dadāty amitreṣv api yācitaḥ saṃs; tam ātmavantaṃ prajahaty anarthāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.100a: cikīrṣitaṃ viprakṛtaṃ ca yasya; nānye janāḥ karma jānanti kiṃ cit
GE07mbh_05_u:033.100c: mantre gupte samyag anuṣṭhite ca; svalpo nāsya vyathate kaś cid arthaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.101a: yaḥ sarvabhūtapraśame niviṣṭaḥ; satyo mṛdur dānakṛc chuddhabhāvaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.101c: atīva saṃjñāyate jñātimadhye; mahāmaṇir jātya iva prasannaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.102a: ya ātmanāpatrapate bhṛśaṃ naraḥ; sa sarvalokasya gurur bhavaty uta
GE07mbh_05_u:033.102c: anantatejāḥ sumanāḥ samāhitaḥ; svatejasā sūrya ivāvabhāsate
GE07mbh_05_u:033.103a: vane jātāḥ śāpadagdhasya rājñaḥ; pāṇḍoḥ putrāḥ pañca pañcendrakalpāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.103c: tvayaiva bālā vardhitāḥ śikṣitāś ca; tavādeśaṃ pālayanty āmbikeya
GE07mbh_05_u:033.104a: pradāyaiṣām ucitaṃ tāta rājyaṃ; sukhī putraiḥ sahito modamānaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:033.104c: na devānāṃ nāpi ca mānuṣāṇāṃ; bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ tarkaṇīyo narendra
GE07mbh_05_u:034.001c: tad brūhi tvaṃ hi nas tāta dharmārthakuśalaḥ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:034.002a: tvaṃ māṃ yathāvad vidura praśādhi; prajñāpūrvaṃ sarvam ajātaśatroḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:034.002c: yan manyase pathyam adīnasattva; śreyaskaraṃ brūhi tad vai kurūṇām
GE07mbh_05_u:034.003a: pāpāśaṅkī pāpam evānupaśyan; pṛcchāmi tvāṃ vyākulenātmanāham
GE07mbh_05_u:034.003c: kave tan me brūhi sarvaṃ yathāvan; manīṣitaṃ sarvam ajātaśatroḥ vidura uvāca
GE07mbh_05_u:034.004-0186_02: apriyasya ca pathyasya vaktā śrotā ca durlabhaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:034.004a: śubhaṃ vā yadi vā pāpaṃ dveṣyaṃ vā yadi vā priyam
GE07mbh_05_u:034.004c: apṛṣṭas tasya tad brūyād yasya necchet parābhavam
GE07mbh_05_u:034.005a: tasmād vakṣyāmi te rājan bhavam icchan kurūn prati
GE07mbh_05_u:034.005c: vacaḥ śreyaskaraṃ dharmyaṃ bruvatas tan nibodha me
GE07mbh_05_u:034.006c: anupāyaprayuktāni mā sma teṣu manaḥ kṛthāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:034.007a: tathaiva yogavihitaṃ na sidhyet karma yan nṛpa
GE07mbh_05_u:034.007c: upāyayuktaṃ medhāvī na tatra glapayen manaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:034.008c: saṃpradhārya ca kurvīta na vegena samācaret
GE07mbh_05_u:034.009a: anubandhaṃ ca saṃprekṣya vipākāṃś caiva karmaṇām
GE07mbh_05_u:034.009c: utthānam ātmanaś caiva dhīraḥ kurvīta vā na vā
GE07mbh_05_u:034.010a: yaḥ pramāṇaṃ na jānāti sthāne vṛddhau tathā kṣaye
GE07mbh_05_u:034.010c: kośe janapade daṇḍe na sa rājye 'vatiṣṭhate
GE07mbh_05_u:034.011a: yas tv etāni pramāṇāni yathoktāny anupaśyati
GE07mbh_05_u:034.011c: yukto dharmārthayor jñāne sa rājyam adhigacchati
GE07mbh_05_u:034.012a: na rājyaṃ prāptam ity eva vartitavyam asāṃpratam
GE07mbh_05_u:034.012c: śriyaṃ hy avinayo hanti jarā rūpam ivottamam
GE07mbh_05_u:034.014a: yac chakyaṃ grasituṃ grasyaṃ grastaṃ pariṇamec ca yat
GE07mbh_05_u:034.014c: hitaṃ ca pariṇāme yat tad adyaṃ bhūtim icchatā
GE07mbh_05_u:034.015c: sa nāpnoti rasaṃ tebhyo bījaṃ cāsya vinaśyati
GE07mbh_05_u:034.016a: yas tu pakvam upādatte kāle pariṇataṃ phalam
GE07mbh_05_u:034.016c: phalād rasaṃ sa labhate bījāc caiva phalaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:034.017a: yathā madhu samādatte rakṣan puṣpāṇi ṣaṭpadaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:034.018a: puṣpaṃ puṣpaṃ vicinvīta mūlacchedaṃ na kārayet
GE07mbh_05_u:034.019a: kiṃ nu me syād idaṃ kṛtvā kiṃ nu me syād akurvataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:034.019c: iti karmāṇi saṃcintya kuryād vā puruṣo na vā
GE07mbh_05_u:034.020a: anārabhyā bhavanty arthāḥ ke cin nityaṃ tathāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:034.020d-0187_01: anarthe caiva niratam arthe caiva parāṅmukham
GE07mbh_05_u:034.021a: kāṃś cid arthān naraḥ prājño laghumūlān mahāphalān
GE07mbh_05_u:034.021c: kṣipram ārabhate kartuṃ na vighnayati tādṛśān
GE07mbh_05_u:034.022a: ṛju paśyati yaḥ sarvaṃ cakṣuṣānupibann iva
GE07mbh_05_u:034.022c: āsīnam api tūṣṇīkam anurajyanti taṃ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:034.022d-0188_01: supuṣpitaḥ syād aphalaḥ phalitaḥ syād durāruhaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:034.022d-0188_02: apakvaḥ pakvasaṃkāśo na tu śīryeta karhi cit
GE07mbh_05_u:034.023a: cakṣuṣā manasā vācā karmaṇā ca caturvidham
GE07mbh_05_u:034.024a: yasmāt trasyanti bhūtāni mṛgavyādhān mṛgā iva
GE07mbh_05_u:034.024c: sāgarāntām api mahīṃ labdhvā sa parihīyate
GE07mbh_05_u:034.025c: vāyur abhram ivāsādya bhraṃśayaty anaye sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:034.026a: dharmam ācarato rājñaḥ sadbhiś caritam āditaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:034.029c: dharmamūlāṃ śriyaṃ prāpya na jahāti na hīyate
GE07mbh_05_u:034.030a: apy unmattāt pralapato bālāc ca parisarpataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:034.030c: sarvataḥ sāram ādadyād aśmabhya iva kāñcanam
GE07mbh_05_u:034.031c: saṃcinvan dhīra āsīta śilāhārī śilaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_05_u:034.032a: gandhena gāvaḥ paśyanti vedaiḥ paśyanti brāhmaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:034.032c: cāraiḥ paśyanti rājānaś cakṣurbhyām itare janāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:034.033a: bhūyāṃsaṃ labhate kleśaṃ yā gaur bhavati durduhā
GE07mbh_05_u:034.033c: atha yā suduhā rājan naiva tāṃ vinayanty api
GE07mbh_05_u:034.034a: yad ataptaṃ praṇamati na tat saṃtāpayanty api
GE07mbh_05_u:034.034c: yac ca svayaṃ nataṃ dāru na tat saṃnāmayanty api
GE07mbh_05_u:034.035c: indrāya sa praṇamate namate yo balīyase
GE07mbh_05_u:034.037a: satyena rakṣyate dharmo vidyā yogena rakṣyate
GE07mbh_05_u:034.037c: mṛjayā rakṣyate rūpaṃ kulaṃ vṛttena rakṣyate
GE07mbh_05_u:034.038a: mānena rakṣyate dhānyam aśvān rakṣaty anukramaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:034.039a: na kulaṃ vṛttahīnasya pramāṇam iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:034.039c: antyeṣv api hi jātānāṃ vṛttam eva viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_05_u:034.040a: ya īrṣyuḥ paravitteṣu rūpe vīrye kulānvaye
GE07mbh_05_u:034.041c: akāle mantrabhedāc ca yena mādyen na tat pibet
GE07mbh_05_u:034.042c: ete madāvaliptānām eta eva satāṃ damāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:034.043a: asanto 'bhyarthitāḥ sadbhiḥ kiṃ cit kāryaṃ kadā cana
GE07mbh_05_u:034.043b-0189_01: tāvan na tasya sukṛtaṃ kiṃ cit kāryaṃ kadā cana
GE07mbh_05_u:034.043c: manyante santam ātmānam asantam api viśrutam
GE07mbh_05_u:034.044a: gatir ātmavatāṃ santaḥ santa eva satāṃ gatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:034.044c: asatāṃ ca gatiḥ santo na tv asantaḥ satāṃ gatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:034.045a: jitā sabhā vastravatā samāśā gomatā jitā
GE07mbh_05_u:034.045c: adhvā jito yānavatā sarvaṃ śīlavatā jitam
GE07mbh_05_u:034.046a: śīlaṃ pradhānaṃ puruṣe tad yasyeha praṇaśyati
GE07mbh_05_u:034.046c: na tasya jīvitenārtho na dhanena na bandhubhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:034.048c: kṣut svādutāṃ janayati sā cāḍhyeṣu sudurlabhā
GE07mbh_05_u:034.049a: prāyeṇa śrīmatāṃ loke bhoktuṃ śaktir na vidyate
GE07mbh_05_u:034.049c: daridrāṇāṃ tu rājendra api kāṣṭhaṃ hi jīryate
GE07mbh_05_u:034.049d-0190_01: yathā yathā mahat tantraṃ vistaraś ca yathā yathā
GE07mbh_05_u:034.049d-0190_02: tathā tathā mahad duḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ tu na tathā tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:034.050a: avṛttir bhayam antyānāṃ madhyānāṃ maraṇād bhayam
GE07mbh_05_u:034.050c: uttamānāṃ tu martyānām avamānāt paraṃ bhayam
GE07mbh_05_u:034.052c: tair ayaṃ tāpyate loko nakṣatrāṇi grahair iva
GE07mbh_05_u:034.055a: ātmānam eva prathamaṃ deśarūpeṇa yo jayet
GE07mbh_05_u:034.055c: tato 'mātyān amitrāṃś ca na moghaṃ vijigīṣate
GE07mbh_05_u:034.057a: rathaḥ śarīraṃ puruṣasya rājan; nātmā niyantendriyāṇy asya cāśvāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:034.057c: tair apramattaḥ kuśalaḥ sadaśvair; dāntaiḥ sukhaṃ yāti rathīva dhīraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:034.059a: anartham arthataḥ paśyann arthaṃ caivāpy anarthataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:034.059c: indriyaiḥ prasṛto bālaḥ suduḥkhaṃ manyate sukham
GE07mbh_05_u:034.061a: arthānām īśvaro yaḥ syād indriyāṇām anīśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:034.061c: indriyāṇām anaiśvaryād aiśvaryād bhraśyate hi saḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:034.062c: ātmaiva hy ātmano bandhur ātmaiva ripur ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:034.062d-0191_02: sa eva niyato bandhuḥ sa eva niyato ripuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:034.063c: kāmaś ca rājan krodhaś ca tau prajñānaṃ vilumpataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:034.064c: sa vai saṃbhṛtasaṃbhāraḥ satataṃ sukham edhate
GE07mbh_05_u:034.067a: asaṃtyāgāt pāpakṛtām apāpāṃs; tulyo daṇḍaḥ spṛśate miśrabhāvāt
GE07mbh_05_u:034.067c: śuṣkeṇārdraṃ dahyate miśrabhāvāt; tasmāt pāpaiḥ saha saṃdhiṃ na kuryāt
GE07mbh_05_u:034.068c: yo mohān na nigṛhṇāti tam āpad grasate naram
GE07mbh_05_u:034.069c: damaḥ satyam anāyāso na bhavanti durātmanām
GE07mbh_05_u:034.070c: vāk caiva guptā dānaṃ ca naitāny antyeṣu bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:034.072a: hiṃsā balam asādhūnāṃ rājñāṃ daṇḍavidhir balam
GE07mbh_05_u:034.072c: śuśrūṣā tu balaṃ strīṇāṃ kṣamā guṇavatāṃ balam
GE07mbh_05_u:034.073c: arthavac ca vicitraṃ ca na śakyaṃ bahu bhāṣitum
GE07mbh_05_u:034.075a: saṃrohati śarair viddhaṃ vanaṃ paraśunā hatam
GE07mbh_05_u:034.075c: vācā duruktaṃ bībhatsaṃ na saṃrohati vākkṣatam
GE07mbh_05_u:034.076c: vākśalyas tu na nirhartuṃ śakyo hṛdiśayo hi saḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:034.077a: vāksāyakā vadanān niṣpatanti; yair āhataḥ śocati rātryahāni
GE07mbh_05_u:034.077c: parasya nāmarmasu te patanti; tān paṇḍito nāvasṛjet pareṣu
GE07mbh_05_u:034.079d-0192_01: na devā yaṣṭim ādāya rakṣanti paśupālavat
GE07mbh_05_u:034.079d-0192_02: yaṃ hi rakṣitum icchanti buddhyā saṃyojayanti tam
GE07mbh_05_u:034.080a: seyaṃ buddhiḥ parītā te putrāṇāṃ tava bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:034.081c: śiṣyas te śāsitā so 'stu dhṛtarāṣṭra yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:034.083c: gauravāt tava rājendra bahūn kleśāṃs titikṣati
GE07mbh_05_u:035.001c: śṛṇvato nāsti me tṛptir vicitrāṇīha bhāṣase
GE07mbh_05_u:035.002c: ubhe ete same syātām ārjavaṃ vā viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_05_u:035.003c: iha kīrtiṃ parāṃ prāpya pretya svargam avāpsyasi
GE07mbh_05_u:035.004a: yāvat kīrtir manuṣyasya puṇyā lokeṣu gīyate
GE07mbh_05_u:035.005d-0193_01: svayaṃvare sthitā kanyā keśinī nāma nāmataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:035.005d-0193_04: prāptum icchaṃs tatas tatra daityendraṃ prāha keśinī
GE07mbh_05_u:035.006a: kiṃ brāhmaṇāḥ svic chreyāṃso ditijāḥ svid virocana
GE07mbh_05_u:035.006c: atha kena sma paryaṅkaṃ sudhanvā nādhirohati
GE07mbh_05_u:035.007a: prājāpatyā hi vai śreṣṭhā vayaṃ keśini sattamāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:035.007c: asmākaṃ khalv ime lokāḥ ke devāḥ ke dvijātayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:035.008c: sudhanvā prātar āgantā paśyeyaṃ vāṃ samāgatau
GE07mbh_05_u:035.009a: tathā bhadre kariṣyāmi yathā tvaṃ bhīru bhāṣase
GE07mbh_05_u:035.009c: sudhanvānaṃ ca māṃ caiva prātar draṣṭāsi saṃgatau
GE07mbh_05_u:035.009d-0196_01: virocano yatra vibho keśinyā sahitaḥ sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:035.009d-0197_01: sudhanvā ca samāgacchat prāhlādiṃ keśinīṃ tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:035.009d-0197_03: pratyutthāyāsanaṃ tasmai pādyam arghyaṃ dadau punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:035.009d-0198_02: iti hovāca vacanaṃ virocanam anuttamam sudhanvovāca
GE07mbh_05_u:035.010c: ekatvam upasaṃpanno na tv āseyaṃ tvayā saha
GE07mbh_05_u:035.011a: anvāharantu phalakaṃ kūrcaṃ vāpy atha vā bṛsīm
GE07mbh_05_u:035.011b-0199_01: na matto hy adhiko 'si tvaṃ guṇato janmato 'pi vā
GE07mbh_05_u:035.011c: sudhanvan na tvam arho 'si mayā saha samāsanam sudhanvovāca
GE07mbh_05_u:035.012-0200_01: pitāputrau sahāsītāṃ dvau viprau dvau ca pārthivau
GE07mbh_05_u:035.012-0200_02: dvau caiva vaiśyau śūdrau ca na tv anyāv itaretaraṃ
GE07mbh_05_u:035.012a: pitāpi te samāsīnam upāsītaiva mām adhaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:035.012c: bālaḥ sukhaidhito gehe na tvaṃ kiṃ cana budhyase
GE07mbh_05_u:035.013a: hiraṇyaṃ ca gavāśvaṃ ca yad vittam asureṣu naḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:035.013c: sudhanvan vipaṇe tena praśnaṃ pṛcchāva ye viduḥ sudhanvovāca
GE07mbh_05_u:035.014a: hiraṇyaṃ ca gavāśvaṃ ca tavaivāstu virocana
GE07mbh_05_u:035.014c: prāṇayos tu paṇaṃ kṛtvā praśnaṃ pṛcchāva ye viduḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:035.015a: āvāṃ kutra gamiṣyāvaḥ prāṇayor vipaṇe kṛte
GE07mbh_05_u:035.015c: na hi deveṣv ahaṃ sthātā na manuṣyeṣu karhi cit sudhanvovāca
GE07mbh_05_u:035.016a: pitaraṃ te gamiṣyāvaḥ prāṇayor vipaṇe kṛte
GE07mbh_05_u:035.016c: putrasyāpi sa hetor hi prahrādo nānṛtaṃ vadet vidura uvāca
GE07mbh_05_u:035.016d-0202_01: ity uktvā jagmatus tau tu prahrādasya gṛhaṃ prati
GE07mbh_05_u:035.016d-0202_02: gatvā taṃ dadṛśus tatra daityānām īśvaraṃ tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:035.016d-0202_03: tāv āgatāv abhiprekṣya prahrādo vismitas tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:035.017a: imau tau saṃpradṛśyete yābhyāṃ na caritaṃ saha
GE07mbh_05_u:035.018a: kiṃ vai sahaiva carato na purā carataḥ saha
GE07mbh_05_u:035.018b-0203_01: tat tvāṃ sudhanvan pṛcchāmi mā pṛṣṭam anṛtaṃ vadīḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:035.018c: virocanaitat pṛcchāmi kiṃ te sakhyaṃ sudhanvanā
GE07mbh_05_u:035.019a: na me sudhanvanā sakhyaṃ prāṇayor vipaṇāvahe
GE07mbh_05_u:035.019c: prahrāda tat tvāṃ pṛcchāmi mā praśnam anṛtaṃ vadīḥ prahlādaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:035.019d-0204_01: na kalmāṣo na kapilo na kṛṣṇo na ca lohitaḥ sudhanvā
GE07mbh_05_u:035.019d-0204_02: aṇīyān kṣuradhārāyāḥ ko dharmaṃ vaktum arhati
GE07mbh_05_u:035.019d-0204_03: yad yat tattvaṃ vakṣyasi tvaṃ yadi vā nāpi vakṣyasi
GE07mbh_05_u:035.019d-0204_04: prahlāda praśnam anaghaṃ mūrdhnā te viphaliṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:035.020c: brahmann abhyarcanīyo 'si śvetā gauḥ pīvarīkṛtā sudhanvovāca
GE07mbh_05_u:035.021a: udakaṃ madhuparkaṃ ca patha evārpitaṃ mama
GE07mbh_05_u:035.021c: prahrāda tvaṃ tu nau praśnaṃ tathyaṃ prabrūhi pṛcchatoḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:035.021d-0205_01: kiṃ brāhmaṇāḥ svic chreyāṃsa utāho svid virocanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:035.021d-0206_01: satyaṃ prabrūhi daityendra satyaṃ hi paramaṃ tapaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:035.022a: putro vānyo bhavān brahman sākṣye caiva bhavet sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:035.022c: tayor vivadatoḥ praśnaṃ katham asmadvidho vadet viduraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:035.022d-0207_01: ādityena sahāyāntaṃ prahlādo haṃsam abravīt prahlādaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:035.022d-0207_03: putravān yo bhaved brahman sākṣye cāpi bhavet sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:035.022d-0207_04: tayor vivadator haṃsa kathaṃ dharmaḥ pravartate sudhanvovāca
GE07mbh_05_u:035.022d-0208_01: gāṃ pradadyās tv aurasāya yad vānyat syāt priyaṃ dhanam
GE07mbh_05_u:035.022d-0208_02: dvayor vivadatos tathyaṃ vācyaṃ ca matimaṃs tvayā
GE07mbh_05_u:035.023a: atha yo naiva prabrūyāt satyaṃ vā yadi vānṛtam
GE07mbh_05_u:035.023c: etat sudhanvan pṛcchāmi durvivaktā sma kiṃ vaset haṃsaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:035.023d-0209_01: pṛṣṭo dharmaṃ na vibrūyād gokarṇaśithilaṃ caran
GE07mbh_05_u:035.023d-0209_02: dharmād bhraśyati rājaṃs tu nāsya loko 'sti na prajāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:035.023d-0209_03: dharma etān saṃrujati yathā nady anukūlajān
GE07mbh_05_u:035.023d-0209_04: ye dharmam anupaśyantas tūṣṇīṃ dhyāyanta āsate
GE07mbh_05_u:035.023d-0209_05: śreṣṭho 'rdhaṃ tu haret tatra bhavet pādaś ca kartari
GE07mbh_05_u:035.023d-0209_06: pādas teṣu sabhāsatsu yatra nindyo na nindyate
GE07mbh_05_u:035.023d-0209_07: anenā bhavati śreṣṭho mucyante ca sabhāsadaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:035.023d-0209_08: kartāram eno gacchec ca nindyo yatra hi nindyate 05,035.023d*0209_08
GE07mbh_05_u:035.023d-0209_09: mohād vā caiva kāmād vā mithyāvādaṃ yadi bruvan
GE07mbh_05_u:035.023d-0209_10: dhṛtarāṣṭra tvāṃ pṛcchāmi durvivaktā tu kāṃ vaset sudhanvovāca
GE07mbh_05_u:035.024a: yāṃ rātrim adhivinnā strī yāṃ caivākṣaparājitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:035.024c: yāṃ ca bhārābhitaptāṅgo durvivaktā sma tāṃ vaset
GE07mbh_05_u:035.025c: amitrān bhūyasaḥ paśyan durvivaktā sma tāṃ vaset
GE07mbh_05_u:035.025d-0210_01: yāṃ ca rātrim abhidrugdho yāṃ ca mitre priye mṛte
GE07mbh_05_u:035.025d-0210_02: sarvasvena ca yo hīno durvivaktā tu tāṃ vaset
GE07mbh_05_u:035.026a: pañca paśvanṛte hanti daśa hanti gavānṛte
GE07mbh_05_u:035.027a: hanti jātān ajātāṃś ca hiraṇyārthe 'nṛtaṃ vadan
GE07mbh_05_u:035.027c: sarvaṃ bhūmyanṛte hanti mā sma bhūmyanṛtaṃ vadīḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:035.028a: mattaḥ śreyān aṅgirā vai sudhanvā tvad virocana
GE07mbh_05_u:035.028c: mātāsya śreyasī mātus tasmāt tvaṃ tena vai jitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:035.029c: sudhanvan punar icchāmi tvayā dattaṃ virocanam sudhanvovāca
GE07mbh_05_u:035.030a: yad dharmam avṛṇīthās tvaṃ na kāmād anṛtaṃ vadīḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:035.030c: punar dadāmi te tasmāt putraṃ prahrāda durlabham
GE07mbh_05_u:035.031a: eṣa prahrāda putras te mayā datto virocanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:035.032a: tasmād rājendra bhūmyarthe nānṛtaṃ vaktum arhasi
GE07mbh_05_u:035.033a: na devā yaṣṭim ādāya rakṣanti paśupālavat
GE07mbh_05_u:035.033c: yaṃ tu rakṣitum icchanti buddhyā saṃvibhajanti tam
GE07mbh_05_u:035.034a: yathā yathā hi puruṣaḥ kalyāṇe kurute manaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:035.034c: tathā tathāsya sarvārthāḥ sidhyante nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:035.035a: na chandāṃsi vṛjināt tārayanti; māyāvinaṃ māyayā vartamānam
GE07mbh_05_u:035.035c: nīḍaṃ śakuntā iva jātapakṣāś; chandāṃsy enaṃ prajahaty antakāle
GE07mbh_05_u:035.036a: mattāpānaṃ kalahaṃ pūgavairaṃ; bhāryāpatyor antaraṃ jñātibhedam
GE07mbh_05_u:035.036c: rājadviṣṭaṃ strīpumāṃsor vivādaṃ; varjyāny āhur yaś ca panthāḥ praduṣṭaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:035.037a: sāmudrikaṃ vaṇijaṃ corapūrvaṃ; śalākadhūrtaṃ ca cikitsakaṃ ca
GE07mbh_05_u:035.037c: ariṃ ca mitraṃ ca kuśīlavaṃ ca; naitān sākṣyeṣv adhikurvīta sapta
GE07mbh_05_u:035.038a: mānāgnihotram uta mānamaunaṃ; mānenādhītam uta mānayajñaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:035.038c: etāni catvāry abhayaṃkarāṇi; bhayaṃ prayacchanty ayathākṛtāni
GE07mbh_05_u:035.039c: parvakāraś ca sūcī ca mitradhruk pāradārikaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:035.040a: bhrūṇahā gurutalpī ca yaś ca syāt pānapo dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:035.040c: atitīkṣṇaś ca kākaś ca nāstiko vedanindakaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:035.041c: rakṣety uktaś ca yo hiṃsyāt sarve brahmahaṇaiḥ samāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:035.042a: tṛṇolkayā jñāyate jātarūpaṃ; yuge bhadro vyavahāreṇa sādhuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:035.042c: śūro bhayeṣv arthakṛcchreṣu dhīraḥ; kṛcchrāsv āpatsu suhṛdaś cārayaś ca
GE07mbh_05_u:035.043a: jarā rūpaṃ harati hi dhairyam āśā; mṛtyuḥ prāṇān dharmacaryām asūyā
GE07mbh_05_u:035.043c: krodhaḥ śriyaṃ śīlam anāryasevā; hriyaṃ kāmaḥ sarvam evābhimānaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:035.043d-0211_02: krūrasya na strī sukhino na vidyā
GE07mbh_05_u:035.044c: dākṣyāt tu kurute mūlaṃ saṃyamāt pratitiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_05_u:035.045a: aṣṭau guṇāḥ puruṣaṃ dīpayanti; prajñā ca kaulyaṃ ca damaḥ śrutaṃ ca
GE07mbh_05_u:035.045c: parākramaś cābahubhāṣitā ca; dānaṃ yathāśakti kṛtajñatā ca
GE07mbh_05_u:035.046a: etān guṇāṃs tāta mahānubhāvān; eko guṇaḥ saṃśrayate prasahya
GE07mbh_05_u:035.046c: rājā yadā satkurute manuṣyaṃ; sarvān guṇān eṣa guṇo 'tibhāti
GE07mbh_05_u:035.047a: aṣṭau nṛpemāni manuṣyaloke; svargasya lokasya nidarśanāni
GE07mbh_05_u:035.047c: catvāry eṣām anvavetāni sadbhiś; catvāry eṣām anvavayanti santaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:035.048a: yajño dānam adhyayanaṃ tapaś ca; catvāry etāny anvavetāni sadbhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:035.048c: damaḥ satyam ārjavam ānṛśaṃsyaṃ; catvāry etāny anvavayanti santaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:035.049a: na sā sabhā yatra na santi vṛddhā; na te vṛddhā ye na vadanti dharmam
GE07mbh_05_u:035.049c: nāsau dharmo yatra na satyam asti; na tat satyaṃ yac chalenānuviddham
GE07mbh_05_u:035.050a: satyaṃ rūpaṃ śrutaṃ vidyā kaulyaṃ śīlaṃ balaṃ dhanam
GE07mbh_05_u:035.050c: śauryaṃ ca citrabhāṣyaṃ ca daśa saṃsargayonayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:035.050d-0214_01: atha yo naiva vibrūyān na satyaṃ nānṛtaṃ vadet
GE07mbh_05_u:035.050d-0214_02: ye dharmam abhyasūyantas tūṣṇīṃ dhyāyanta āsate
GE07mbh_05_u:035.050d-0214_03: śreṣṭhaḥ pādaṃ haret tatra bhavet pādaś ca kartari
GE07mbh_05_u:035.050d-0214_04: pādas teṣu sabhāsatsu yatra nindyo na nindyate
GE07mbh_05_u:035.050d-0214_06: eno gacchati kartāraṃ nindārho yatra nindyate
GE07mbh_05_u:035.051a: pāpaṃ kurvan pāpakīrtiḥ pāpam evāśnute phalam
GE07mbh_05_u:035.051c: puṇyaṃ kurvan puṇyakīrtiḥ puṇyam evāśnute phalam
GE07mbh_05_u:035.051d-0215_01: tasmāt pāpaṃ na kurvīta puruṣaḥ śaṃsitavrataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:035.052a: pāpaṃ prajñāṃ nāśayati kriyamāṇaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:035.052c: naṣṭaprajñaḥ pāpam eva nityam ārabhate naraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:035.053a: puṇyaṃ prajñāṃ vardhayati kriyamāṇaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:035.053c: vṛddhaprajñaḥ puṇyam eva nityam ārabhate naraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:035.053d-0216_01: puṇyaṃ kurvan puṇyakīrtiḥ puṇyaṃ sthānaṃ sma gacchati
GE07mbh_05_u:035.054c: sa kṛcchraṃ mahad āpnoti nacirāt pāpam ācaran
GE07mbh_05_u:035.055b-0218_01: pūjāṃ ca mahatīṃ prāpya sa sarvatra virocate
GE07mbh_05_u:035.055c: akṛcchrāt sukham āpnoti sarvatra ca virājate
GE07mbh_05_u:035.056a: prajñām evāgamayati yaḥ prājñebhyaḥ sa paṇḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:035.056c: prājño hy avāpya dharmārthau śaknoti sukham edhitum
GE07mbh_05_u:035.057a: divasenaiva tat kuryād yena rātrau sukhaṃ vaset
GE07mbh_05_u:035.057c: aṣṭamāsena tat kuryād yena varṣāḥ sukhaṃ vaset
GE07mbh_05_u:035.058a: pūrve vayasi tat kuryād yena vṛddhaḥ sukhaṃ vaset
GE07mbh_05_u:035.058c: yāvajjīvena tat kuryād yena pretya sukhaṃ vaset
GE07mbh_05_u:035.059a: jīrṇam annaṃ praśaṃsanti bhāryāṃ ca gatayauvanām
GE07mbh_05_u:035.061a: gurur ātmavatāṃ śāstā śāstā rājā durātmanām
GE07mbh_05_u:035.062a: ṛṣīṇāṃ ca nadīnāṃ ca kulānāṃ ca mahātmanām
GE07mbh_05_u:035.063c: kṣatriyaḥ svargabhāg rājaṃś ciraṃ pālayate mahīm
GE07mbh_05_u:035.064c: śūraś ca kṛtavidyaś ca yaś ca jānāti sevitum
GE07mbh_05_u:035.066a: duryodhane ca śakunau mūḍhe duḥśāsane tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:035.066c: karṇe caiśvaryam ādhāya kathaṃ tvaṃ bhūtim icchasi
GE07mbh_05_u:035.067a: sarvair guṇair upetāś ca pāṇḍavā bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:035.067c: pitṛvat tvayi vartante teṣu vartasva putravat
GE07mbh_05_u:036.001c: ātreyasya ca saṃvādaṃ sādhyānāṃ ceti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_05_u:036.002c: sādhyā devā mahāprājñaṃ paryapṛcchanta vai purā
GE07mbh_05_u:036.003a: sādhyā devā vayam asmo maharṣe; dṛṣṭvā bhavantaṃ na śaknumo 'numātum
GE07mbh_05_u:036.003c: śrutena dhīro buddhimāṃs tvaṃ mato naḥ; kāvyāṃ vācaṃ vaktum arhasy udārām
GE07mbh_05_u:036.004a: etat kāryam amarāḥ saṃśrutaṃ me; dhṛtiḥ śamaḥ satyadharmānuvṛttiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:036.004c: granthiṃ vinīya hṛdayasya sarvaṃ; priyāpriye cātmavaśaṃ nayīta
GE07mbh_05_u:036.005b-0219_01: punāti hy ātmanātmānaṃ sukṛtaṃ cāsya vindati
GE07mbh_05_u:036.006a: nākrośī syān nāvamānī parasya; mitradrohī nota nīcopasevī
GE07mbh_05_u:036.006c: na cātimānī na ca hīnavṛtto; rūkṣāṃ vācaṃ ruśatīṃ varjayīta
GE07mbh_05_u:036.007a: marmāṇy asthīni hṛdayaṃ tathāsūn; ghorā vāco nirdahantīha puṃsām
GE07mbh_05_u:036.007c: tasmād vācaṃ ruśatīṃ rūkṣarūpāṃ; dharmārāmo nityaśo varjayīta
GE07mbh_05_u:036.008a: aruṃtudaṃ paruṣaṃ rūkṣavācaṃ; vākkaṇṭakair vitudantaṃ manuṣyān
GE07mbh_05_u:036.008c: vidyād alakṣmīkatamaṃ janānāṃ; mukhe nibaddhāṃ nirṛtiṃ vahantam
GE07mbh_05_u:036.009a: paraś ced enam adhividhyeta bāṇair; bhṛśaṃ sutīkṣṇair analārkadīptaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:036.009c: viricyamāno 'py atiricyamāno; vidyāt kaviḥ sukṛtaṃ me dadhāti
GE07mbh_05_u:036.010a: yadi santaṃ sevate yady asantaṃ; tapasvinaṃ yadi vā stenam eva
GE07mbh_05_u:036.010c: vāso yathā raṅgavaśaṃ prayāti; tathā sa teṣāṃ vaśam abhyupaiti
GE07mbh_05_u:036.011a: vādaṃ tu yo na pravaden na vādayed; yo nāhataḥ pratihanyān na ghātayet
GE07mbh_05_u:036.011c: yo hantukāmasya na pāpam icchet; tasmai devāḥ spṛhayanty āgatāya
GE07mbh_05_u:036.012a: avyāhṛtaṃ vyāhṛtāc chreya āhuḥ; satyaṃ vaded vyāhṛtaṃ tad dvitīyam
GE07mbh_05_u:036.012c: priyaṃ vaded vyāhṛtaṃ tat tṛtīyaṃ; dharmyaṃ vaded vyāhṛtaṃ tac caturtham
GE07mbh_05_u:036.013c: yādṛg icchec ca bhavituṃ tādṛg bhavati pūruṣaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:036.014a: yato yato nivartate tatas tato vimucyate
GE07mbh_05_u:036.014c: nivartanād dhi sarvato na vetti duḥkham aṇv api
GE07mbh_05_u:036.015a: na jīyate nota jigīṣate 'nyān; na vairakṛc cāpratighātakaś ca
GE07mbh_05_u:036.015c: nindāpraśaṃsāsu samasvabhāvo; na śocate hṛṣyati naiva cāyam
GE07mbh_05_u:036.016a: bhāvam icchati sarvasya nābhāve kurute matim
GE07mbh_05_u:036.016c: satyavādī mṛdur dānto yaḥ sa uttamapūruṣaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:036.018a: duḥśāsanas tūpahantā na śāstā; nāvartate manyuvaśāt kṛtaghnaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:036.018c: na kasya cin mitram atho durātmā; kalāś caitā adhamasyeha puṃsaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:036.020a: uttamān eva seveta prāpte kāle tu madhyamān
GE07mbh_05_u:036.020c: adhamāṃs tu na seveta ya icchec chreya ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:036.021a: prāpnoti vai vittam asadbalena; nityotthānāt prajñayā pauruṣeṇa
GE07mbh_05_u:036.021c: na tv eva samyag labhate praśaṃsāṃ; na vṛttam āpnoti mahākulānām
GE07mbh_05_u:036.022a: mahākulānāṃ spṛhayanti devā; dharmārthavṛddhāś ca bahuśrutāś ca
GE07mbh_05_u:036.022c: pṛcchāmi tvāṃ vidura praśnam etaṃ; bhavanti vai kāni mahākulāni
GE07mbh_05_u:036.023a: tapo damo brahmavit tvaṃ vitānāḥ; puṇyā vivāhāḥ satatānnadānam
GE07mbh_05_u:036.023c: yeṣv evaite sapta guṇā bhavanti; samyag vṛttās tāni mahākulāni
GE07mbh_05_u:036.024a: yeṣāṃ na vṛttaṃ vyathate na yonir; vṛttaprasādena caranti dharmam
GE07mbh_05_u:036.024c: ye kīrtim icchanti kule viśiṣṭāṃ; tyaktānṛtās tāni mahākulāni
GE07mbh_05_u:036.028c: kulasaṃkhyāṃ na gacchanti yāni hīnāni vṛttataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:036.029a: vṛttatas tv avihīnāni kulāny alpadhanāny api
GE07mbh_05_u:036.029c: kulasaṃkhyāṃ tu gacchanti karṣanti ca mahad yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:036.029d-0220_01: vṛttaṃ yatnena saṃrakṣed vittam eti ca yāti ca
GE07mbh_05_u:036.029d-0220_02: akṣīṇo vittataḥ kṣīṇo vṛttatas tu hato hataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:036.029d-0220_03: gobhiḥ paśubhir aśvaiś ca kṛṣyā ca susamṛddhayā
GE07mbh_05_u:036.029d-0220_04: kulāni na prarohanti yāni hīnāni vṛttataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:036.030a: mā naḥ kule vairakṛt kaś cid astu; rājāmātyo mā parasvāpahārī
GE07mbh_05_u:036.030c: mitradrohī naikṛtiko 'nṛtī vā; pūrvāśī vā pitṛdevātithibhyaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:036.031a: yaś ca no brāhmaṇaṃ hanyād yaś ca no brāhmaṇān dviṣet
GE07mbh_05_u:036.031c: na naḥ sa samitiṃ gacched yaś ca no nirvapet kṛṣim
GE07mbh_05_u:036.032a: tṛṇāni bhūmir udakaṃ vāk caturthī ca sūnṛtā
GE07mbh_05_u:036.032c: satām etāni geheṣu nocchidyante kadā cana
GE07mbh_05_u:036.034a: sūkṣmo 'pi bhāraṃ nṛpate syandano vai; śakto voḍhuṃ na tathānye mahījāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:036.034c: evaṃ yuktā bhārasahā bhavanti; mahākulīnā na tathānye manuṣyāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:036.035a: na tan mitraṃ yasya kopād bibheti; yad vā mitraṃ śaṅkitenopacaryam
GE07mbh_05_u:036.035c: yasmin mitre pitarīvāśvasīta; tad vai mitraṃ saṃgatānītarāṇi
GE07mbh_05_u:036.036a: yadi ced apy asaṃbandho mitrabhāvena vartate
GE07mbh_05_u:036.036c: sa eva bandhus tan mitraṃ sā gatis tatparāyaṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:036.038c: arthāḥ samativartante haṃsāḥ śuṣkaṃ saro yathā
GE07mbh_05_u:036.039c: śīlam etad asādhūnām abhraṃ pāriplavaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_05_u:036.040a: satkṛtāś ca kṛtārthāś ca mitrāṇāṃ na bhavanti ye
GE07mbh_05_u:036.040c: tān mṛtān api kravyādāḥ kṛtaghnān nopabhuñjate
GE07mbh_05_u:036.041a: arthayed eva mitrāṇi sati vāsati vā dhane
GE07mbh_05_u:036.042a: saṃtāpād bhraśyate rūpaṃ saṃtāpād bhraśyate balam
GE07mbh_05_u:036.042c: saṃtāpād bhraśyate jñānaṃ saṃtāpād vyādhim ṛcchati
GE07mbh_05_u:036.043c: amitrāś ca prahṛṣyanti mā sma śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:036.044a: punar naro mriyate jāyate ca; punar naro hīyate vardhate punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:036.044c: punar naro yācati yācyate ca; punar naraḥ śocati śocyate punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:036.045a: sukhaṃ ca duḥkhaṃ ca bhavābhavau ca; lābhālābhau maraṇaṃ jīvitaṃ ca
GE07mbh_05_u:036.045c: paryāyaśaḥ sarvam iha spṛśanti; tasmād dhīro naiva hṛṣyen na śocet
GE07mbh_05_u:036.046a: calāni hīmāni ṣaḍindriyāṇi; teṣāṃ yad yad vartate yatra yatra
GE07mbh_05_u:036.046c: tatas tataḥ sravate buddhir asya; chidrodakumbhād iva nityam ambhaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:036.047a: tanur ucchaḥ śikhī rājā mithyopacarito mayā
GE07mbh_05_u:036.048a: nityodvignam idaṃ sarvaṃ nityodvignam idaṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:036.048c: yat tat padam anudvignaṃ tan me vada mahāmate
GE07mbh_05_u:036.050a: buddhyā bhayaṃ praṇudati tapasā vindate mahat
GE07mbh_05_u:036.052c: tapasaś ca sutaptasya tasyānte sukham edhate
GE07mbh_05_u:036.053a: svāstīrṇāni śayanāni prapannā; na vai bhinnā jātu nidrāṃ labhante
GE07mbh_05_u:036.053c: na strīṣu rājan ratim āpnuvanti; na māgadhaiḥ stūyamānā na sūtaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:036.054a: na vai bhinnā jātu caranti dharmaṃ; na vai sukhaṃ prāpnuvantīha bhinnāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:036.054c: na vai bhinnā gauravaṃ mānayanti; na vai bhinnāḥ praśamaṃ rocayanti
GE07mbh_05_u:036.055a: na vai teṣāṃ svadate pathyam uktaṃ; yogakṣemaṃ kalpate nota teṣām
GE07mbh_05_u:036.055c: bhinnānāṃ vai manujendra parāyaṇaṃ; na vidyate kiṃ cid anyad vināśāt
GE07mbh_05_u:036.056a: saṃbhāvyaṃ goṣu saṃpannaṃ saṃbhāvyaṃ brāhmaṇe tapaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:036.056c: saṃbhāvyaṃ strīṣu cāpalyaṃ saṃbhāvyaṃ jñātito bhayam
GE07mbh_05_u:036.057a: tantavo 'py āyatā nityaṃ tantavo bahulāḥ samāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:036.057c: bahūn bahutvād āyāsān sahantīty upamā satām
GE07mbh_05_u:036.059a: brāhmaṇeṣu ca ye śūrāḥ strīṣu jñātiṣu goṣu ca
GE07mbh_05_u:036.059c: vṛntād iva phalaṃ pakvaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭra patanti te
GE07mbh_05_u:036.060a: mahān apy ekajo vṛkṣo balavān supratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:036.061a: atha ye sahitā vṛkṣāḥ saṃghaśaḥ supratiṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:036.062a: evaṃ manuṣyam apy ekaṃ guṇair api samanvitam
GE07mbh_05_u:036.062c: śakyaṃ dviṣanto manyante vāyur drumam ivaikajam
GE07mbh_05_u:036.064a: avadhyā brāhmaṇā gāvaḥ striyo bālāś ca jñātayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:036.064c: yeṣāṃ cānnāni bhuñjīta ye ca syuḥ śaraṇāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:036.064d-0221_01: mahaty apy aparādhe 'pi teṣāṃ daṇḍo visarjanam
GE07mbh_05_u:036.065a: na manuṣye guṇaḥ kaś cid anyo dhanavatām api
GE07mbh_05_u:036.065c: anāturatvād bhadraṃ te mṛtakalpā hi rogiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:036.066a: avyādhijaṃ kaṭukaṃ śīrṣarogaṃ; pāpānubandhaṃ paruṣaṃ tīkṣṇam ugram
GE07mbh_05_u:036.066c: satāṃ peyaṃ yan na pibanty asanto; manyuṃ mahārāja piba praśāmya
GE07mbh_05_u:036.067a: rogārditā na phalāny ādriyante; na vai labhante viṣayeṣu tattvam
GE07mbh_05_u:036.067c: duḥkhopetā rogiṇo nityam eva; na budhyante dhanabhogān na saukhyam
GE07mbh_05_u:036.068a: purā hy ukto nākaros tvaṃ vaco me; dyūte jitāṃ draupadīṃ prekṣya rājan
GE07mbh_05_u:036.068c: duryodhanaṃ vārayety akṣavatyāṃ; kitavatvaṃ paṇḍitā varjayanti
GE07mbh_05_u:036.069a: na tad balaṃ yan mṛdunā virudhyate; miśro dharmas tarasā sevitavyaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:036.069c: pradhvaṃsinī krūrasamāhitā śrīr; mṛduprauḍhā gacchati putrapautrān
