GE07mbh_05_u:036.070a: dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ pāṇḍavān pālayantu; pāṇḍoḥ sutās tava putrāṃś ca pāntu
GE07mbh_05_u:036.070c: ekārimitrāḥ kuravo hy ekamantrā; jīvantu rājan sukhinaḥ samṛddhāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:036.071a: meḍhībhūtaḥ kauravāṇāṃ tvam adya; tvayy ādhīnaṃ kurukulam ājamīḍha
GE07mbh_05_u:036.071c: pārthān bālān vanavāsaprataptān; gopāyasva svaṃ yaśas tāta rakṣan
GE07mbh_05_u:036.072a: saṃdhatsva tvaṃ kauravān pāṇḍuputrair; mā te 'ntaraṃ ripavaḥ prārthayantu
GE07mbh_05_u:036.072c: satye sthitās te naradeva sarve; duryodhanaṃ sthāpaya tvaṃ narendra
GE07mbh_05_u:037.002a: tān evendrasya hi dhanur anāmyaṃ namato 'bravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:037.002c: atho marīcinaḥ pādān anāmyān namatas tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:037.003a: yaś cāśiṣyaṃ śāsati yaś ca kupyate; yaś cātivelaṃ bhajate dviṣantam
GE07mbh_05_u:037.003c: striyaś ca yo 'rakṣati bhadram astu te; yaś cāyācyaṃ yācati yaś ca katthate
GE07mbh_05_u:037.004a: yaś cābhijātaḥ prakaroty akāryaṃ; yaś cābalo balinā nityavairī
GE07mbh_05_u:037.004c: aśraddadhānāya ca yo bravīti; yaś cākāmyaṃ kāmayate narendra
GE07mbh_05_u:037.005a: vadhvā hāsaṃ śvaśuro yaś ca manyate; vadhvā vasann uta yo mānakāmaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:037.005c: parakṣetre nirvapati yaś ca bījaṃ; striyaṃ ca yaḥ parivadate 'tivelam
GE07mbh_05_u:037.006a: yaś caiva labdhvā na smarāmīty uvāca; dattvā ca yaḥ katthati yācyamānaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:037.006c: yaś cāsataḥ sāntvam upāsatīha; ete 'nuyānty anilaṃ pāśahastāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:037.007a: yasmin yathā vartate yo manuṣyas; tasmiṃs tathā vartitavyaṃ sa dharmaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:037.007c: māyācāro māyayā vartitavyaḥ; sādhv ācāraḥ sādhunā pratyudeyaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:037.007d-0222_01: jarā rūpaṃ harati hi dhairyam āśā
GE07mbh_05_u:037.008a: śatāyur uktaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvavedeṣu vai yadā
GE07mbh_05_u:037.008c: nāpnoty atha ca tat sarvam āyuḥ keneha hetunā
GE07mbh_05_u:037.009c: krodhaś cātivivitsā ca mitradrohaś ca tāni ṣaṭ
GE07mbh_05_u:037.010a: eta evāsayas tīkṣṇāḥ kṛntanty āyūṃṣi dehinām
GE07mbh_05_u:037.010c: etāni mānavān ghnanti na mṛtyur bhadram astu te
GE07mbh_05_u:037.011a: viśvastasyaiti yo dārān yaś cāpi gurutalpagaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:037.011c: vṛṣalīpatir dvijo yaś ca pānapaś caiva bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:037.011d-0223_01: ādeśakṛd vṛttihantā dvijānāṃ preṣakaś ca yaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:037.012c: etaiḥ sametya kartavyaṃ prāyaścittam iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:037.013c: nānarthakṛt tyaktakaliḥ kṛtajñaḥ; satyo mṛduḥ svargam upaiti vidvān
GE07mbh_05_u:037.014c: apriyasya tu pathyasya vaktā śrotā ca durlabhaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:037.015a: yo hi dharmaṃ vyapāśritya hitvā bhartuḥ priyāpriye
GE07mbh_05_u:037.015c: apriyāṇy āha pathyāni tena rājā sahāyavān
GE07mbh_05_u:037.016a: tyajet kulārthe puruṣaṃ grāmasyārthe kulaṃ tyajet
GE07mbh_05_u:037.017a: āpadarthaṃ dhanaṃ rakṣed dārān rakṣed dhanair api
GE07mbh_05_u:037.017c: ātmānaṃ satataṃ rakṣed dārair api dhanair api
GE07mbh_05_u:037.017d-0224_01: dyūtam etat purākalpe dṛṣṭaṃ vairakaraṃ nṛṇām
GE07mbh_05_u:037.017d-0224_02: tasmād dyūtaṃ na seveta hāsyārtham api buddhimān
GE07mbh_05_u:037.018a: uktaṃ mayā dyūtakāle 'pi rājan; naivaṃ yuktaṃ vacanaṃ prātipīya
GE07mbh_05_u:037.018c: tadauṣadhaṃ pathyam ivāturasya; na rocate tava vaicitravīrya
GE07mbh_05_u:037.019a: kākair imāṃś citrabarhān mayūrān; parājaiṣṭhāḥ pāṇḍavān dhārtarāṣṭraiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:037.019c: hitvā siṃhān kroṣṭukān gūhamānaḥ; prāpte kāle śocitā tvaṃ narendra
GE07mbh_05_u:037.020a: yas tāta na krudhyati sarvakālaṃ; bhṛtyasya bhaktasya hite ratasya
GE07mbh_05_u:037.020c: tasmin bhṛtyā bhartari viśvasanti; na cainam āpatsu parityajanti
GE07mbh_05_u:037.021a: na bhṛtyānāṃ vṛttisaṃrodhanena; bāhyaṃ janaṃ saṃjighṛkṣed apūrvam
GE07mbh_05_u:037.021c: tyajanti hy enam ucitāvaruddhāḥ; snigdhā hy amātyāḥ parihīnabhogāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:037.022a: kṛtyāni pūrvaṃ parisaṃkhyāya sarvāṇy; āyavyayāv anurūpāṃ ca vṛttim
GE07mbh_05_u:037.022c: saṃgṛhṇīyād anurūpān sahāyān; sahāyasādhyāni hi duṣkarāṇi
GE07mbh_05_u:037.023a: abhiprāyaṃ yo viditvā tu bhartuḥ; sarvāṇi kāryāṇi karoty atandrīḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:037.023c: vaktā hitānām anurakta āryaḥ; śaktijña ātmeva hi so 'nukampyaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:037.023d-0225_02: sadyorogī vivādī ca saptaitān sevakāṃs tyajet
GE07mbh_05_u:037.024a: vākyaṃ tu yo nādriyate 'nuśiṣṭaḥ; pratyāha yaś cāpi niyujyamānaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:037.024c: prajñābhimānī pratikūlavādī; tyājyaḥ sa tādṛk tvarayaiva bhṛtyaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:037.025a: astabdham aklībam adīrghasūtraṃ; sānukrośaṃ ślakṣṇam ahāryam anyaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:037.026a: na viśvāsāj jātu parasya gehaṃ; gacchen naraś cetayāno vikāle
GE07mbh_05_u:037.026c: na catvare niśi tiṣṭhen nigūḍho; na rājanyāṃ yoṣitaṃ prārthayīta
GE07mbh_05_u:037.027a: na nihnavaṃ satragatasya gacchet; saṃsṛṣṭamantrasya kusaṃgatasya
GE07mbh_05_u:037.027c: na ca brūyān nāśvasāmi tvayīti; sakāraṇaṃ vyapadeśaṃ tu kuryāt
GE07mbh_05_u:037.028a: ghṛṇī rājā puṃścalī rājabhṛtyaḥ; putro bhrātā vidhavā bālaputrā
GE07mbh_05_u:037.028c: senājīvī coddhṛtabhakta eva; vyavahāre vai varjanīyāḥ syur ete
GE07mbh_05_u:037.029a: guṇā daśa snānaśīlaṃ bhajante; balaṃ rūpaṃ svaravarṇapraśuddhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:037.029c: sparśaś ca gandhaś ca viśuddhatā ca; śrīḥ saukumāryaṃ pravarāś ca nāryaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:037.030a: guṇāś ca ṣaṇmitabhuktaṃ bhajante; ārogyam āyuś ca sukhaṃ balaṃ ca
GE07mbh_05_u:037.030c: anāvilaṃ cāsya bhaved apatyaṃ; na cainam ādyūna iti kṣipanti
GE07mbh_05_u:037.031a: akarmaśīlaṃ ca mahāśanaṃ ca; lokadviṣṭaṃ bahumāyaṃ nṛśaṃsam
GE07mbh_05_u:037.031c: adeśakālajñam aniṣṭaveṣam; etān gṛhe na prativāsayīta
GE07mbh_05_u:037.032a: kadaryam ākrośakam aśrutaṃ ca; varākasaṃbhūtam amānyamāninam
GE07mbh_05_u:037.032c: niṣṭhūriṇaṃ kṛtavairaṃ kṛtaghnam; etān bhṛśārto 'pi na jātu yācet
GE07mbh_05_u:037.033c: vikṛṣṭarāgaṃ bahumāninaṃ cāpy; etān na seveta narādhamān ṣaṭ
GE07mbh_05_u:037.035a: utpādya putrān anṛṇāṃś ca kṛtvā; vṛttiṃ ca tebhyo 'nuvidhāya kāṃ cit
GE07mbh_05_u:037.035c: sthāne kumārīḥ pratipādya sarvā; araṇyasaṃstho munivad bubhūṣet
GE07mbh_05_u:037.036a: hitaṃ yat sarvabhūtānām ātmanaś ca sukhāvaham
GE07mbh_05_u:037.036c: tat kuryād īśvaro hy etan mūlaṃ dharmārthasiddhaye
GE07mbh_05_u:037.037a: buddhiḥ prabhāvas tejaś ca sattvam utthānam eva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:037.037c: vyavasāyaś ca yasya syāt tasyāvṛttibhayaṃ kutaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:037.038a: paśya doṣān pāṇḍavair vigrahe tvaṃ; yatra vyatherann api devāḥ saśakrāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:037.038c: putrair vairaṃ nityam udvignavāso; yaśaḥpraṇāśo dviṣatāṃ ca harṣaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:037.039a: bhīṣmasya kopas tava cendrakalpa; droṇasya rājñaś ca yudhiṣṭhirasya
GE07mbh_05_u:037.039c: utsādayel lokam imaṃ pravṛddhaḥ; śveto grahas tiryag ivāpatan khe
GE07mbh_05_u:037.040a: tava putraśataṃ caiva karṇaḥ pañca ca pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:037.041a: dhārtarāṣṭrā vanaṃ rājan vyāghrāḥ pāṇḍusutā matāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:037.041c: mā vanaṃ chindhi savyāghraṃ mā vyāghrān nīnaśo vanāt
GE07mbh_05_u:037.042a: na syād vanam ṛte vyāghrān vyāghrā na syur ṛte vanam
GE07mbh_05_u:037.042c: vanaṃ hi rakṣyate vyāghrair vyāghrān rakṣati kānanam
GE07mbh_05_u:037.043a: na tathecchanty akalyāṇāḥ pareṣāṃ vedituṃ guṇān
GE07mbh_05_u:037.044a: arthasiddhiṃ parām icchan dharmam evāditaś caret
GE07mbh_05_u:037.044c: na hi dharmād apaity arthaḥ svargalokād ivāmṛtam
GE07mbh_05_u:037.045a: yasyātmā virataḥ pāpāt kalyāṇe ca niveśitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:037.045c: tena sarvam idaṃ buddhaṃ prakṛtir vikṛtiś ca yā
GE07mbh_05_u:037.046a: yo dharmam arthaṃ kāmaṃ ca yathākālaṃ niṣevate
GE07mbh_05_u:037.047c: sa śriyo bhājanaṃ rājan yaś cāpatsu na muhyati
GE07mbh_05_u:037.048a: balaṃ pañcavidhaṃ nityaṃ puruṣāṇāṃ nibodha me
GE07mbh_05_u:037.048c: yat tu bāhubalaṃ nāma kaniṣṭhaṃ balam ucyate
GE07mbh_05_u:037.049a: amātyalābho bhadraṃ te dvitīyaṃ balam ucyate
GE07mbh_05_u:037.049c: dhanalābhas tṛtīyaṃ tu balam āhur jigīṣavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:037.050a: yat tv asya sahajaṃ rājan pitṛpaitāmahaṃ balam
GE07mbh_05_u:037.050c: abhijātabalaṃ nāma tac caturthaṃ balaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_05_u:037.051a: yena tv etāni sarvāṇi saṃgṛhītāni bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:037.051c: yad balānāṃ balaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ tat prajñābalam ucyate
GE07mbh_05_u:037.053c: bhoge cāyuṣi viśvāsaṃ kaḥ prājñaḥ kartum arhati
GE07mbh_05_u:037.054a: prajñāśareṇābhihatasya jantoś; cikitsakāḥ santi na cauṣadhāni
GE07mbh_05_u:037.054c: na homamantrā na ca maṅgalāni; nātharvaṇā nāpy agadāḥ susiddhāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:037.055a: sarpaś cāgniś ca siṃhaś ca kulaputraś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:037.055c: nāvajñeyā manuṣyeṇa sarve te hy atitejasaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:037.056a: agnis tejo mahal loke gūḍhas tiṣṭhati dāruṣu
GE07mbh_05_u:037.056c: na copayuṅkte tad dāru yāvan no dīpyate paraiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:037.057a: sa eva khalu dārubhyo yadā nirmathya dīpyate
GE07mbh_05_u:037.057c: tadā tac ca vanaṃ cānyan nirdahaty āśu tejasā
GE07mbh_05_u:037.059a: latādharmā tvaṃ saputraḥ śālāḥ pāṇḍusutā matāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:037.059c: na latā vardhate jātu mahādrumam anāśritā
GE07mbh_05_u:037.060a: vanaṃ rājaṃs tvaṃ saputro 'mbikeya; siṃhān vane pāṇḍavāṃs tāta viddhi
GE07mbh_05_u:037.060c: siṃhair vihīnaṃ hi vanaṃ vinaśyet; siṃhā vinaśyeyur ṛte vanena
GE07mbh_05_u:038.001a: ūrdhvaṃ prāṇā hy utkrāmanti yūnaḥ sthavira āyati
GE07mbh_05_u:038.002a: pīṭhaṃ dattvā sādhave 'bhyāgatāya; ānīyāpaḥ parinirṇijya pādau
GE07mbh_05_u:038.002c: sukhaṃ pṛṣṭvā prativedyātmasaṃsthaṃ; tato dadyād annam avekṣya dhīraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:038.003a: yasyodakaṃ madhuparkaṃ ca gāṃ ca; namantravit pratigṛhṇāti gehe
GE07mbh_05_u:038.003c: lobhād bhayād arthakārpaṇyato vā; tasyānarthaṃ jīvitam āhur āryāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:038.004a: cikitsakaḥ śalyakartāvakīrṇī; stenaḥ krūro madyapo bhrūṇahā ca
GE07mbh_05_u:038.004c: senājīvī śrutivikrāyakaś ca; bhṛśaṃ priyo 'py atithir nodakārhaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:038.005a: avikreyaṃ lavaṇaṃ pakvam annaṃ; dadhi kṣīraṃ madhu tailaṃ ghṛtaṃ ca
GE07mbh_05_u:038.005c: tilā māṃsaṃ mūlaphalāni śākaṃ; raktaṃ vāsaḥ sarvagandhā guḍaś ca
GE07mbh_05_u:038.006c: nindāpraśaṃsoparataḥ priyāpriye; carann udāsīnavad eṣa bhikṣukaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:038.007c: vane vasann atithiṣv apramatto; dhuraṃdharaḥ puṇyakṛd eṣa tāpasaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:038.008c: dīrghau buddhimato bāhū yābhyāṃ hiṃsati hiṃsitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:038.009c: viśvāsād bhayam utpannaṃ mūlāny api nikṛntati
GE07mbh_05_u:038.010c: ślakṣṇo madhuravāk strīṇāṃ na cāsāṃ vaśago bhavet
GE07mbh_05_u:038.011c: striyaḥ śriyo gṛhasyoktās tasmād rakṣyā viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:038.012a: pitur antaḥpuraṃ dadyān mātur dadyān mahānasam
GE07mbh_05_u:038.012c: goṣu cātmasamaṃ dadyāt svayam eva kṛṣiṃ vrajet
GE07mbh_05_u:038.012e: bhṛtyair vaṇijyācāraṃ ca putraiḥ seveta brāhmaṇān
GE07mbh_05_u:038.013a: adbhyo 'gnir brahmataḥ kṣatram aśmano loham utthitam
GE07mbh_05_u:038.013c: teṣāṃ sarvatragaṃ tejaḥ svāsu yoniṣu śāmyati
GE07mbh_05_u:038.015a: yasya mantraṃ na jānanti bāhyāś cābhyantarāś ca ye
GE07mbh_05_u:038.015c: sa rājā sarvataścakṣuś ciram aiśvaryam aśnute
GE07mbh_05_u:038.016a: kariṣyan na prabhāṣeta kṛtāny eva ca darśayet
GE07mbh_05_u:038.017c: araṇye niḥśalāke vā tatra mantro vidhīyate
GE07mbh_05_u:038.018c: apaṇḍito vāpi suhṛt paṇḍito vāpy anātmavān
GE07mbh_05_u:038.018e: amātye hy arthalipsā ca mantrarakṣaṇam eva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:038.019a: kṛtāni sarvakāryāṇi yasya vā pārṣadā viduḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:038.019b-0227_01: dharme cārthe ca kāme ca sa rājā rājasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:038.020c: sa teṣāṃ viparibhraṃśe bhraśyate jīvitād api
GE07mbh_05_u:038.021d-0228_01: anadhītya yathā vedān na vipraḥ śrāddham arhati
GE07mbh_05_u:038.021d-0228_02: evam aśrutaṣāḍguṇyo na mantraṃ śrotum arhati
GE07mbh_05_u:038.024c: bhṛtyebhyo visṛjed arthān naikaḥ sarvaharo bhavet
GE07mbh_05_u:038.025a: brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇaṃ veda bhartā veda striyaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:038.025c: amātyaṃ nṛpatir veda rājā rājānam eva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:038.026a: na śatrur aṅkam āpanno moktavyo vadhyatāṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:038.026b-0229_01: nyag bhūtvā paryupāsīta vadhyaṃ hanyād bale sati
GE07mbh_05_u:038.026b-0230_01: ahanyamāno bhayakṛn na hatāj jāyate bhayam
GE07mbh_05_u:038.026c: ahatād dhi bhayaṃ tasmāj jāyate nacirād iva
GE07mbh_05_u:038.027a: daivateṣu ca yatnena rājasu brāhmaṇeṣu ca
GE07mbh_05_u:038.028c: kīrtiṃ ca labhate loke na cānarthena yujyate
GE07mbh_05_u:038.029a: prasādo niṣphalo yasya krodhaś cāpi nirarthakaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:038.029c: na taṃ bhartāram icchanti ṣaṇḍhaṃ patim iva striyaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:038.030a: na buddhir dhanalābhāya na jāḍyam asamṛddhaye
GE07mbh_05_u:038.032c: anarthāḥ kṣipram āyānti vāgduṣṭaṃ krodhanaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:038.033c: āvartayanti bhūtāni samyak praṇihitā ca vāk
GE07mbh_05_u:038.035a: dhṛtiḥ śamo damaḥ śaucaṃ kāruṇyaṃ vāg aniṣṭhurā
GE07mbh_05_u:038.037a: na sa rātrau sukhaṃ śete sasarpa iva veśmani
GE07mbh_05_u:038.038a: yeṣu duṣṭeṣu doṣaḥ syād yogakṣemasya bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:038.039c: ye cānāryasamāsaktāḥ sarve te saṃśayaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:038.040a: yatra strī yatra kitavo yatra bālo 'nuśāsti ca
GE07mbh_05_u:038.040c: majjanti te 'vaśā deśā nadyām aśmaplavā iva
GE07mbh_05_u:038.041a: prayojaneṣu ye saktā na viśeṣeṣu bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:038.041c: tān ahaṃ paṇḍitān manye viśeṣā hi prasaṅginaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:038.042a: yaṃ praśaṃsanti kitavā yaṃ praśaṃsanti cāraṇāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:038.042c: yaṃ praśaṃsanti bandhakyo na sa jīvati mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:038.044a: taṃ drakṣyasi paribhraṣṭaṃ tasmāt tvaṃ nacirād iva
GE07mbh_05_u:039.001c: dhātrā tu diṣṭasya vaśe kilāyaṃ; tasmād vada tvaṃ śravaṇe dhṛto 'ham
GE07mbh_05_u:039.003c: mantraṃ mūlabalenānyo yaḥ priyaḥ priya eva saḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:039.004a: dveṣyo na sādhur bhavati na medhāvī na paṇḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:039.004c: priye śubhāni karmāṇi dveṣye pāpāni bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:039.004d-0231_05: na vṛddhir bahumantavyā yā vṛddhiḥ kṣayam āvahet
GE07mbh_05_u:039.004d-0231_06: kṣayo 'pi bahumantavyo yaḥ kṣayo vṛddhim āvahet
GE07mbh_05_u:039.005a: na sa kṣayo mahārāja yaḥ kṣayo vṛddhim āvahet
GE07mbh_05_u:039.005c: kṣayaḥ sa tv iha mantavyo yaṃ labdhvā bahu nāśayet
GE07mbh_05_u:039.006a: samṛddhā guṇataḥ ke cid bhavanti dhanato 'pare
GE07mbh_05_u:039.007c: na cotsahe sutaṃ tyaktuṃ yato dharmas tato jayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:039.010a: sadoṣaṃ darśanaṃ yeṣāṃ saṃvāse sumahad bhayam
GE07mbh_05_u:039.010c: arthādāne mahān doṣaḥ pradāne ca mahad bhayam
GE07mbh_05_u:039.010d-0232_01: ye vai bhedanaśīlās tu sakāmā nistrapāḥ śaṭhāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:039.011a: ye pāpā iti vikhyātāḥ saṃvāse parigarhitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:039.011c: yuktāś cānyair mahādoṣair ye narās tān vivarjayet
GE07mbh_05_u:039.012c: yā caiva phalanirvṛttiḥ sauhṛde caiva yat sukham
GE07mbh_05_u:039.013c: alpe 'py apakṛte mohān na śāntim upagacchati
GE07mbh_05_u:039.014c: niśāmya nipuṇaṃ buddhyā vidvān dūrād vivarjayet
GE07mbh_05_u:039.015a: yo jñātim anugṛhṇāti daridraṃ dīnam āturam
GE07mbh_05_u:039.015c: sa putrapaśubhir vṛddhiṃ yaśaś cāvyayam aśnute
GE07mbh_05_u:039.016a: jñātayo vardhanīyās tair ya icchanty ātmanaḥ śubham
GE07mbh_05_u:039.016c: kulavṛddhiṃ ca rājendra tasmāt sādhu samācara
GE07mbh_05_u:039.017c: viguṇā hy api saṃrakṣyā jñātayo bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:039.018c: prasādaṃ kuru dīnānāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_05_u:039.019a: dīyantāṃ grāmakāḥ ke cit teṣāṃ vṛttyartham īśvara
GE07mbh_05_u:039.020a: vṛddhena hi tvayā kāryaṃ putrāṇāṃ tāta rakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:039.020c: mayā cāpi hitaṃ vācyaṃ viddhi māṃ tvaddhitaiṣiṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:039.021a: jñātibhir vigrahas tāta na kartavyo bhavārthinā
GE07mbh_05_u:039.022c: jñātibhiḥ saha kāryāṇi na virodhaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:039.024a: suvṛtto bhava rājendra pāṇḍavān prati mānada
GE07mbh_05_u:039.024c: adharṣaṇīyaḥ śatrūṇāṃ tair vṛtas tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_05_u:039.025a: śrīmantaṃ jñātim āsādya yo jñātir avasīdati
GE07mbh_05_u:039.025b-0233_01: sīdatā yat kṛtaṃ tena tat pāpaṃ samam aśnute
GE07mbh_05_u:039.025c: digdhahastaṃ mṛga iva sa enas tasya vindati
GE07mbh_05_u:039.026a: paścād api naraśreṣṭha tava tāpo bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:039.026c: tān vā hatān sutān vāpi śrutvā tad anucintaya
GE07mbh_05_u:039.027c: ādāv eva na tat kuryād adhruve jīvite sati
GE07mbh_05_u:039.028a: na kaś cin nāpanayate pumān anyatra bhārgavāt
GE07mbh_05_u:039.029a: duryodhanena yady etat pāpaṃ teṣu purā kṛtam
GE07mbh_05_u:039.030a: tāṃs tvaṃ pade pratiṣṭhāpya loke vigatakalmaṣaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:039.031d-001_0001: asamyag upayuktaṃ hi jñānaṃ sukuśalair api
GE07mbh_05_u:039.031d-001_0010: dvārāṇy etāni yo jñātvā saṃvṛṇoti sadā nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:039.031d-001_0012: na vai śrutam avijñāya vṛddhān anupasevya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:039.031d-001_0014: naṣṭaṃ samudre patitaṃ naṣṭaṃ vākyam aśṛṇvati
GE07mbh_05_u:039.031d-001_0015: anātmani śrutaṃ naṣṭaṃ naṣṭaṃ śrutam anagnikam
GE07mbh_05_u:039.031d-001_0016: matyā parīkṣya medhāvī buddhyā saṃpādya cāsakṛt
GE07mbh_05_u:039.031d-001_0017: śrutvā dṛṣṭvātha vijñāya prājño mantraṃ samācaret
GE07mbh_05_u:039.032a: avṛttiṃ vinayo hanti hanty anarthaṃ parākramaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:039.032c: hanti nityaṃ kṣamā krodham ācāro hanty alakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:039.033d-0235_03: duṣkulīnaḥ kulīno vā maryādāṃ yo na laṅghayet
GE07mbh_05_u:039.033d-0235_04: dharmāpekṣī mṛdur hrīmān sa kulīnaśatād varaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:039.034a: yayoś cittena vā cittaṃ naibhṛtaṃ naibhṛtena vā
GE07mbh_05_u:039.034c: sameti prajñayā prajñā tayor maitrī na jīryate
GE07mbh_05_u:039.035a: durbuddhim akṛtaprajñaṃ channaṃ kūpaṃ tṛṇair iva
GE07mbh_05_u:039.037c: jitendriyaṃ sthitaṃ sthityāṃ mitram atyāgi ceṣyate
GE07mbh_05_u:039.038c: atyarthaṃ punar utsargaḥ sādayed daivatāny api
GE07mbh_05_u:039.042a: karmaṇā manasā vācā yad abhīkṣṇaṃ niṣevate
GE07mbh_05_u:039.042c: tad evāpaharaty enaṃ tasmāt kalyāṇam ācaret
GE07mbh_05_u:039.044a: anirvedaḥ śriyo mūlaṃ duḥkhanāśe sukhasya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:039.044c: mahān bhavaty anirviṇṇaḥ sukhaṃ cātyantam aśnute
GE07mbh_05_u:039.045a: nātaḥ śrīmattaraṃ kiṃ cid anyat pathyatamaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:039.045c: prabhaviṣṇor yathā tāta kṣamā sarvatra sarvadā
GE07mbh_05_u:039.046c: arthānarthau samau yasya tasya nityaṃ kṣamā hitā
GE07mbh_05_u:039.047a: yat sukhaṃ sevamāno 'pi dharmārthābhyāṃ na hīyate
GE07mbh_05_u:039.047c: kāmaṃ tad upaseveta na mūḍhavratam ācaret
GE07mbh_05_u:039.048c: na śrīr vasaty adānteṣu ye cotsāhavivarjitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:039.050d-0237_01: na cātiguṇavatsv eṣā nātyantaṃ nirguṇeṣu ca
GE07mbh_05_u:039.050d-0237_03: unmattā gaur ivāndhā śrīḥ kva cid evāvatiṣṭhate
GE07mbh_05_u:039.052c: na sa tasya phalaṃ pretya bhuṅkte 'rthasya durāgamāt
GE07mbh_05_u:039.053c: udyateṣu ca śastreṣu nāsti śeṣavatāṃ bhayam
GE07mbh_05_u:039.054a: utthānaṃ saṃyamo dākṣyam apramādo dhṛtiḥ smṛtiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:039.054c: samīkṣya ca samārambho viddhi mūlaṃ bhavasya tat
GE07mbh_05_u:039.055a: tapo balaṃ tāpasānāṃ brahma brahmavidāṃ balam
GE07mbh_05_u:039.055c: hiṃsā balam asādhūnāṃ kṣamā guṇavatāṃ balam
GE07mbh_05_u:039.056a: aṣṭau tāny avrataghnāni āpo mūlaṃ phalaṃ payaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:039.056c: havir brāhmaṇakāmyā ca guror vacanam auṣadham
GE07mbh_05_u:039.057c: saṃgraheṇaiṣa dharmaḥ syāt kāmād anyaḥ pravartate
GE07mbh_05_u:039.058a: akrodhena jayet krodham asādhuṃ sādhunā jayet
GE07mbh_05_u:039.058c: jayet kadaryaṃ dānena jayet satyena cānṛtam
GE07mbh_05_u:039.059c: caure kṛtaghne viśvāso na kāryo na ca nāstike
GE07mbh_05_u:039.061c: arer vā praṇipātena mā sma teṣu manaḥ kṛthāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:039.062a: avidyaḥ puruṣaḥ śocyaḥ śocyaṃ mithunam aprajam
GE07mbh_05_u:039.062c: nirāhārāḥ prajāḥ śocyāḥ śocyaṃ rāṣṭram arājakam
GE07mbh_05_u:039.063a: adhvā jarā dehavatāṃ parvatānāṃ jalaṃ jarā
GE07mbh_05_u:039.063c: asaṃbhogo jarā strīṇāṃ vākśalyaṃ manaso jarā
GE07mbh_05_u:039.065a: suvarṇasya malaṃ rūpyaṃ rūpyasyāpi malaṃ trapu
GE07mbh_05_u:039.065c: jñeyaṃ trapumalaṃ sīsaṃ sīsasyāpi malaṃ malam
GE07mbh_05_u:039.066a: na svapnena jayen nidrāṃ na kāmena striyaṃ jayet
GE07mbh_05_u:039.066c: nendhanena jayed agniṃ na pānena surāṃ jayet
GE07mbh_05_u:039.067a: yasya dānajitaṃ mitram amitrā yudhi nirjitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:039.068c: dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ vimuñcecchāṃ na kathaṃ cin na jīvyate
GE07mbh_05_u:039.069a: yat pṛthivyāṃ vrīhiyavaṃ hiraṇyaṃ paśavaḥ striyaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:039.069c: nālam ekasya tat sarvam iti paśyan na muhyati
GE07mbh_05_u:039.070a: rājan bhūyo bravīmi tvāṃ putreṣu samam ācara
GE07mbh_05_u:039.070c: samatā yadi te rājan sveṣu pāṇḍusuteṣu ca
GE07mbh_05_u:040.001a: yo 'bhyarthitaḥ sadbhir asajjamānaḥ; karoty arthaṃ ahāpayitvā
GE07mbh_05_u:040.001c: kṣipraṃ yaśas taṃ samupaiti santam alaṃ; prasannā hi sukhāya santaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:040.002a: mahāntam apy artham adharmayuktaṃ; yaḥ saṃtyajaty anupākruṣṭa eva
GE07mbh_05_u:040.002c: sukhaṃ sa duḥkhāny avamucya śete; jīrṇāṃ tvacaṃ sarpa ivāvamucya
GE07mbh_05_u:040.003a: anṛtaṃ ca samutkarṣe rājagāmi ca paiśunam
GE07mbh_05_u:040.004c: aśuśrūṣā tvarā ślāghā vidyāyāḥ śatravas trayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:040.004d-0240_01: ālasyaṃ madamohau ca cāpalaṃ goṣṭhir eva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:040.004d-0240_03: ete vai sapta doṣās tu sadā vidyārthināṃ matāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:040.005a: sukhārthinaḥ kuto vidyā nāsti vidyārthinaḥ sukham
GE07mbh_05_u:040.005c: sukhārthī vā tyajed vidyāṃ vidyārthī vā sukhaṃ tyajet
GE07mbh_05_u:040.007a: āśā dhṛtiṃ hanti samṛddhim antakaḥ; krodhaḥ śriyaṃ hanti yaśaḥ kadaryatā
GE07mbh_05_u:040.007c: apālanaṃ hanti paśūṃś ca rājann; ekaḥ kruddho brāhmaṇo hanti rāṣṭram
GE07mbh_05_u:040.008a: ajaś ca kāṃsyaṃ ca rathaś ca nityaṃ; madhv ākarṣaḥ śakuniḥ śrotriyaś ca
GE07mbh_05_u:040.008c: vṛddho jñātir avasanno vayasya; etāni te santu gṛhe sadaiva
GE07mbh_05_u:040.009c: viṣam audumbaraṃ śaṅkhaḥ svarṇaṃ nābhiś ca rocanā
GE07mbh_05_u:040.011a: idaṃ ca tvāṃ sarvaparaṃ bravīmi; puṇyaṃ padaṃ tāta mahāviśiṣṭam
GE07mbh_05_u:040.011c: na jātu kāmān na bhayān na lobhād; dharmaṃ tyajej jīvitasyāpi hetoḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:040.012a: nityo dharmaḥ sukhaduḥkhe tv anitye; nityo jīvo dhātur asya tv anityaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:040.012c: tyaktvānityaṃ pratitiṣṭhasva nitye; saṃtuṣya tvaṃ toṣaparo hi lābhaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:040.013a: mahābalān paśya mahānubhāvān; praśāsya bhūmiṃ dhanadhānyapūrṇām
GE07mbh_05_u:040.013c: rājyāni hitvā vipulāṃś ca bhogān; gatān narendrān vaśam antakasya
GE07mbh_05_u:040.014a: mṛtaṃ putraṃ duḥkhapuṣṭaṃ manuṣyā; utkṣipya rājan svagṛhān nirharanti
GE07mbh_05_u:040.014c: taṃ muktakeśāḥ karuṇaṃ rudantaś; citāmadhye kāṣṭham iva kṣipanti
GE07mbh_05_u:040.015a: anyo dhanaṃ pretagatasya bhuṅkte; vayāṃsi cāgniś ca śarīradhātūn
GE07mbh_05_u:040.015c: dvābhyām ayaṃ saha gacchaty amutra; puṇyena pāpena ca veṣṭyamānaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:040.016b-0241_01: apuṣpān aphalān vṛkṣān yathā tāta patatriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:040.016c: agnau prāstaṃ tu puruṣaṃ karmānveti svayaṃkṛtam
GE07mbh_05_u:040.016d-0242_01: tasmāt tu puruṣo yatnād dharmaṃ saṃcinuyāc chanaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:040.017a: asmāl lokād ūrdhvam amuṣya cādho; mahat tamas tiṣṭhati hy andhakāram
GE07mbh_05_u:040.017c: tad vai mahāmohanam indriyāṇāṃ; budhyasva mā tvāṃ pralabheta rājan
GE07mbh_05_u:040.018a: idaṃ vacaḥ śakṣyasi ced yathāvan; niśamya sarvaṃ pratipattum evam
GE07mbh_05_u:040.018c: yaśaḥ paraṃ prāpsyasi jīvaloke; bhayaṃ na cāmutra na ceha te 'sti
GE07mbh_05_u:040.019a: ātmā nadī bhārata puṇyatīrthā; satyodakā dhṛtikūlā damormiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:040.019c: tasyāṃ snātaḥ pūyate puṇyakarmā; puṇyo hy ātmā nityam ambho 'mbha eva
GE07mbh_05_u:040.021a: prajñāvṛddhaṃ dharmavṛddhaṃ svabandhuṃ; vidyāvṛddhaṃ vayasā cāpi vṛddham
GE07mbh_05_u:040.021c: kāryākārye pūjayitvā prasādya; yaḥ saṃpṛcchen na sa muhyet kadā cit
GE07mbh_05_u:040.022a: dhṛtyā śiśnodaraṃ rakṣet pāṇipādaṃ ca cakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_05_u:040.022c: cakṣuḥśrotre ca manasā mano vācaṃ ca karmaṇā
GE07mbh_05_u:040.023c: ṛtaṃ bruvan gurave karma kurvan; na brāhmaṇaś cyavate brahmalokāt
GE07mbh_05_u:040.024a: adhītya vedān parisaṃstīrya cāgnīn; iṣṭvā yajñaiḥ pālayitvā prajāś ca
GE07mbh_05_u:040.024c: gobrāhmaṇārthe śastrapūtāntarātmā; hataḥ saṃgrāme kṣatriyaḥ svargam eti
GE07mbh_05_u:040.025a: vaiśyo 'dhītya brāhmaṇān kṣatriyāṃś ca; dhanaiḥ kāle saṃvibhajyāśritāṃś ca
GE07mbh_05_u:040.025c: tretāpūtaṃ dhūmam āghrāya puṇyaṃ; pretya svarge devasukhāni bhuṅkte
GE07mbh_05_u:040.026a: brahmakṣatraṃ vaiśyavarṇaṃ ca śūdraḥ; krameṇaitān nyāyataḥ pūjayānaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:040.026c: tuṣṭeṣv eteṣv avyatho dagdhapāpas; tyaktvā dehaṃ svargasukhāni bhuṅkte
GE07mbh_05_u:040.027a: cāturvarṇyasyaiṣa dharmas tavokto; hetuṃ cātra bruvato me nibodha
GE07mbh_05_u:040.027c: kṣātrād dharmād dhīyate pāṇḍuputras; taṃ tvaṃ rājan rājadharme niyuṅkṣva
GE07mbh_05_u:040.028a: evam etad yathā māṃ tvam anuśāsasi nityadā
GE07mbh_05_u:040.028c: mamāpi ca matiḥ saumya bhavaty evaṃ yathāttha mām
GE07mbh_05_u:040.029a: sā tu buddhiḥ kṛtāpy evaṃ pāṇḍavān prati me sadā
GE07mbh_05_u:040.030a: na diṣṭam abhyatikrāntuṃ śakyaṃ martyena kena cit
GE07mbh_05_u:040.030c: diṣṭam eva kṛtaṃ manye pauruṣaṃ tu nirarthakam
GE07mbh_05_u:041.001a: anuktaṃ yadi te kiṃ cid vācā vidura vidyate
GE07mbh_05_u:041.001c: tan me śuśrūṣave brūhi vicitrāṇi hi bhāṣase
GE07mbh_05_u:041.002a: dhṛtarāṣṭra kumāro vai yaḥ purāṇaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:041.003a: sa te guhyān prakāśāṃś ca sarvān hṛdayasaṃśrayān
GE07mbh_05_u:041.004a: kiṃ tvaṃ na veda tad bhūyo yan me brūyāt sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:041.004c: tvam eva vidura brūhi prajñāśeṣo 'sti cet tava
GE07mbh_05_u:041.005a: śūdrayonāv ahaṃ jāto nāto 'nyad vaktum utsahe
GE07mbh_05_u:041.005c: kumārasya tu yā buddhir veda tāṃ śāśvatīm aham
GE07mbh_05_u:041.006a: brāhmīṃ hi yonim āpannaḥ suguhyam api yo vadet
GE07mbh_05_u:041.006c: na tena garhyo devānāṃ tasmād etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_05_u:041.007a: bravīhi vidura tvaṃ me purāṇaṃ taṃ sanātanam
GE07mbh_05_u:041.007c: katham etena dehena syād ihaiva samāgamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:041.008a: cintayām āsa viduras tam ṛṣiṃ saṃśitavratam
GE07mbh_05_u:041.008c: sa ca tac cintitaṃ jñātvā darśayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:041.010a: bhagavan saṃśayaḥ kaś cid dhṛtarāṣṭrasya mānase
GE07mbh_05_u:041.010c: yo na śakyo mayā vaktuṃ tam asmai vaktum arhasi
GE07mbh_05_u:041.011e: aratiś caiva tandrī ca kāmakrodhau kṣayodayau
GE07mbh_05_u:042.001a: tato rājā dhṛtarāṣṭro manīṣī; saṃpūjya vākyaṃ vidureritaṃ tat
GE07mbh_05_u:042.001c: sanatsujātaṃ rahite mahātmā; papraccha buddhiṃ paramāṃ bubhūṣan
GE07mbh_05_u:042.002a: sanatsujāta yadīdaṃ śṛṇomi; mṛtyur hi nāstīti
GE07mbh_05_u:042.002c: devāsurā hy ācaran brahmacaryam; amṛtyave tat kataran nu satyam
GE07mbh_05_u:042.003a: amṛtyuḥ karmaṇā ke cin mṛtyur nāstīti cāpare
GE07mbh_05_u:042.003c: śṛṇu me bruvato rājan yathaitan mā viśaṅkithāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:042.004a: ubhe satye kṣatriyādyapravṛtte; moho mṛtyuḥ saṃmato yaḥ kavīnām
GE07mbh_05_u:042.004c: pramādaṃ vai mṛtyum ahaṃ bravīmi; sadāpramādam amṛtatvaṃ bravīmi
GE07mbh_05_u:042.005a: pramādād vai asurāḥ parābhavann; apramādād brahmabhūtā bhavanti
GE07mbh_05_u:042.005c: na vai mṛtyur vyāghra ivātti jantūn; na hy asya rūpam upalabhyate ha
GE07mbh_05_u:042.006a: yamaṃ tv eke mṛtyum ato 'nyam āhur; ātmāvasannam amṛtaṃ brahmacaryam
GE07mbh_05_u:042.006c: pitṛloke rājyam anuśāsti devaḥ; śivaḥ śivānām aśivo 'śivānām
GE07mbh_05_u:042.007a: āsyād eṣa niḥsarate narāṇāṃ; krodhaḥ pramādo moharūpaś ca mṛtyuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:042.007b-0243_02: na cātmano yogam upaiti kaś cit
GE07mbh_05_u:042.007c: te mohitās tadvaśe vartamānā; itaḥ pretās tatra punaḥ patanti
GE07mbh_05_u:042.008a: tatas taṃ devā anu viplavante; ato mṛtyur maraṇākhyām upaiti
GE07mbh_05_u:042.008c: karmodaye karmaphalānurāgās; tatrānu yānti na taranti mṛtyum
GE07mbh_05_u:042.009c: sa vai mṛtyur mṛtyur ivātti bhūtvā; evaṃ vidvān yo vinihanti kāmān
GE07mbh_05_u:042.010c: kāmān vyudasya dhunute yat kiṃ cit puruṣo rajaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:042.011c: gṛhyanta iva dhāvanti gacchantaḥ śvabhram unmukhāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:042.012a: abhidhyā vai prathamaṃ hanti cainaṃ; kāmakrodhau gṛhya cainaṃ tu paścāt
GE07mbh_05_u:042.012c: ete bālān mṛtyave prāpayanti; dhīrās tu dhairyeṇa taranti mṛtyum
GE07mbh_05_u:042.012d-0245_02: kiṃ vai mṛtyus tārṇa ivāsya vyāghraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:042.013a: amanyamānaḥ kṣatriya kiṃ cid anyan; nādhīyate tārṇa ivāsya vyāghraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:042.013c: krodhāl lobhān mohamayāntarātmā; sa vai mṛtyus tvac charīre ya eṣaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:042.014a: evaṃ mṛtyuṃ jāyamānaṃ viditvā; jñāne tiṣṭhan na bibhetīha mṛtyoḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:042.014c: vinaśyate viṣaye tasya mṛtyur; mṛtyor yathā viṣayaṃ prāpya martyaḥ dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
GE07mbh_05_u:042.014d-0246_03: teṣāṃ parārthaṃ kathayantīha vedā sanatsujāta uvāca
GE07mbh_05_u:042.014d-0246_04: etad vidvān naiti kathaṃ nu karma
GE07mbh_05_u:042.014d-0246_07: sa neha āyāti paraṃ parātmā dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
GE07mbh_05_u:042.014d-0246_11: kiṃ vāsya kāryam atha vā sukhaṃ ca sanatsujāta uvāca
GE07mbh_05_u:042.014d-0246_12: tan me vidvan brūhi sarvaṃ yathāvat
GE07mbh_05_u:042.014d-0246_17: ya etad vā bhagavān sa nityo
GE07mbh_05_u:042.014d-0246_19: tathā ca tacchaktir iti sma manyate
GE07mbh_05_u:042.015a: ye 'smin dharmān nācarantīha ke cit; tathā dharmān ke cid ihācaranti
GE07mbh_05_u:042.015c: dharmaḥ pāpena pratihanyate sma; utāho dharmaḥ pratihanti pāpam
GE07mbh_05_u:042.016a: ubhayam eva tatropabhujyate phalaṃ; dharmasyaivetarasya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:042.016b-0247_01: tasmin sthito vāpy ubhayaṃ hi nityaṃ
GE07mbh_05_u:042.016c: dharmeṇādharmaṃ praṇudatīha vidvān; dharmo balīyān iti tasya viddhi
GE07mbh_05_u:042.017a: yān imān āhuḥ svasya dharmasya lokān; dvijātīnāṃ puṇyakṛtāṃ sanātanān
GE07mbh_05_u:042.017c: teṣāṃ parikramān kathayantas tato 'nyān; naitad vidvan naiva kṛtaṃ ca karma
GE07mbh_05_u:042.018a: yeṣāṃ bale na vispardhā bale balavatām iva
GE07mbh_05_u:042.018c: te brāhmaṇā itaḥ pretya svargaloke prakāśate
GE07mbh_05_u:042.018d-0248_01: yeṣāṃ dharme na ca spardhā teṣāṃ tajjñānasādhanam
GE07mbh_05_u:042.018d-0248_02: te brāhmaṇā ito muktāḥ svargaṃ yānti triviṣṭapam
GE07mbh_05_u:042.018d-0248_03: tasya samyak samācāram āhur vedavido janāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:042.018d-0248_04: nainaṃ manyeta bhūyiṣṭhaṃ bāhyam ābhyantaraṃ janam
GE07mbh_05_u:042.019c: annaṃ pānaṃ ca brāhmaṇas taj jīvan nānusaṃjvaret
GE07mbh_05_u:042.020c: atiriktam ivākurvan sa śreyān netaro janaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:042.021b-0249_01: eko vai hy antarātmānaṃ brāhmaṇo hantum arhati
GE07mbh_05_u:042.021c: brahmasvaṃ nopabhuñjed vā tadannaṃ saṃmataṃ satām
GE07mbh_05_u:042.022a: yathā svaṃ vāntam aśnāti śvā vai nityam abhūtaye
GE07mbh_05_u:042.023a: nityam ajñātacaryā me iti manyeta brāhmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:042.023c: jñātīnāṃ tu vasan madhye naiva vidyeta kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:042.024a: ko hy evam antarātmānaṃ brāhmaṇo hantum arhati
GE07mbh_05_u:042.024c: tasmād dhi kiṃ cit kṣatriya brahmāvasati paśyati
GE07mbh_05_u:042.024d-0252_02: kiṃ tena na kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ coreṇātmāpahāriṇā
GE07mbh_05_u:042.025c: śiṣṭo na śiṣṭavat sa syād brāhmaṇo brahmavit kaviḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:042.026a: anāḍhyā mānuṣe vitte āḍhyā vedeṣu ye dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:042.026c: te durdharṣā duṣprakampyā vidyāt tān brahmaṇas tanum
GE07mbh_05_u:042.027a: sarvān sviṣṭakṛto devān vidyād ya iha kaś cana
GE07mbh_05_u:042.027c: na samāno brāhmaṇasya yasmin prayatate svayam
GE07mbh_05_u:042.028a: yam aprayatamānaṃ tu mānayanti sa mānitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:042.029e: na mānyaṃ mānayiṣyanti iti manyed amānitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:042.030a: na vai mānaṃ ca maunaṃ ca sahitau carataḥ sadā
GE07mbh_05_u:042.030c: ayaṃ hi loko mānasya asau mānasya tad viduḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:042.031a: śrīḥ sukhasyeha saṃvāsaḥ sā cāpi paripanthinī
GE07mbh_05_u:042.031c: brāhmī sudurlabhā śrīr hi prajñāhīnena kṣatriya
GE07mbh_05_u:042.032a: dvārāṇi tasyā hi vadanti santo; bahuprakārāṇi durāvarāṇi
GE07mbh_05_u:042.032c: satyārjave hrīr damaśaucavidyāḥ; ṣaṇmānamohapratibādhanāni dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
GE07mbh_05_u:043.000-0254_03: maunena vidvān uta yāti maunaṃ sanatsujāta uvāca
GE07mbh_05_u:043.001a: ṛco yajūṃṣy adhīte yaḥ sāmavedaṃ ca yo dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:043.001c: pāpāni kurvan pāpena lipyate na sa lipyate
GE07mbh_05_u:043.002a: nainaṃ sāmāny ṛco vāpi na yajūṃṣi vicakṣaṇa
GE07mbh_05_u:043.002c: trāyante karmaṇaḥ pāpān na te mithyā bravīmy aham
GE07mbh_05_u:043.003a: na chandāṃsi vṛjināt tārayanti; māyāvinaṃ māyayā vartamānam
GE07mbh_05_u:043.003c: nīḍaṃ śakuntā iva jātapakṣāś; chandāṃsy enaṃ prajahaty antakāle
GE07mbh_05_u:043.004a: na ced vedā vedavidaṃ śaktās trātuṃ vicakṣaṇa
GE07mbh_05_u:043.004c: atha kasmāt pralāpo 'yaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ sanātanaḥ sanatsujāta uvāca
GE07mbh_05_u:043.005-0257_01: brāhmaṇānāṃ tapaḥ svṛddham anyeṣāṃ tāvad eva tat
GE07mbh_05_u:043.005-0258_01: etat samṛddham atyṛddhaṃ tapo bhavati kevalam
GE07mbh_05_u:043.005a: asmiṃl loke tapas taptaṃ phalam anyatra dṛśyate
GE07mbh_05_u:043.005c: brāhmaṇānām ime lokā ṛddhe tapasi saṃyatāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:043.006a: kathaṃ samṛddham apy ṛddhaṃ tapo bhavati kevalam
GE07mbh_05_u:043.006c: sanatsujāta tad brūhi yathā vidyāma tad vayam sanatsujāta uvāca
GE07mbh_05_u:043.006d-0259_02: etat samṛddham apy ṛddhaṃ tapo bhavati nānyathā
GE07mbh_05_u:043.006d-0259_03: tapomūlam idaṃ sarvaṃ yan māṃ pṛcchasi kṣatriya dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
GE07mbh_05_u:043.006d-0259_04: tapasā vedavidvāṃsaḥ paraṃ tv amṛtam āpnuyuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:043.006d-0259_05: kalmaṣaṃ tapaso brūhi śrutaṃ niṣkalmaṣaṃ tapaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:043.006d-0260_01: śrīr evam ekā yo 'dhīte tac ca tāvac ca tatsamam
GE07mbh_05_u:043.007a: krodhādayo dvādaśa yasya doṣās; tathā nṛśaṃsādi ṣaḍ atra rājan
GE07mbh_05_u:043.007c: dharmādayo dvādaśa cātatānāḥ; śāstre guṇā ye viditā dvijānām
GE07mbh_05_u:043.008a: krodhaḥ kāmo lobhamohau vivitsā;kṛpāsūyā mānaśokau spṛhā ca
GE07mbh_05_u:043.008c: īrṣyā jugupsā ca manuṣyadoṣā; varjyāḥ sadā dvādaśaite nareṇa
GE07mbh_05_u:043.010a: vikatthanaḥ spṛhayālur manasvī; bibhrat kopaṃ capalo 'rakṣaṇaś ca
GE07mbh_05_u:043.010c: ete prāptāḥ ṣaṇ narān pāpadharmān; prakurvate nota santaḥ sudurge
GE07mbh_05_u:043.011c: vargapraśaṃsī vanitāsu dveṣṭā; ete 'pare sapta nṛśaṃsadharmāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:043.012a: dharmaś ca satyaṃ ca damas tapaś ca; amātsaryaṃ hrīs titikṣānasūyā
GE07mbh_05_u:043.012c: yajñaś ca dānaṃ ca dhṛtiḥ śrutaṃ ca; mahāvratā dvādaśa brāhmaṇasya
GE07mbh_05_u:043.013a: yas tv etebhyaḥ pravased dvādaśebhyaḥ; sarvām apīmāṃ pṛthivīṃ praśiṣyāt
GE07mbh_05_u:043.013c: tribhir dvābhyām ekato vā viśiṣṭo; nāsya svam astīti sa veditavyaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:043.014a: damas tyāgo 'pramādaś ca eteṣv amṛtam āhitam
GE07mbh_05_u:043.014c: tāni satyamukhāny āhur brāhmaṇā ye manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:043.014d-0261_01: doṣatyāgo 'pramādaḥ syāt sa cāpy aṣṭaguṇo mataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:043.015c: anṛtaṃ cābhyasūyā ca kāmārthau ca tathā spṛhā
GE07mbh_05_u:043.016a: krodhaḥ śokas tathā tṛṣṇā lobhaḥ paiśunyam eva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:043.016c: matsaraś ca vivitsā ca paritāpas tathā ratiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:043.017b-0262_03: asiddhiḥ pāpakṛtyaṃ ca hiṃsā ceti prakīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:043.017c: etair vimukto doṣair yaḥ sa damaḥ sadbhir ucyate
GE07mbh_05_u:043.017d-0264_02: śreyāṃs tu ṣaḍvidhas tyāgas tṛtīyas tatra duṣkaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:043.017d-0264_03: tena duḥkhaṃ taranty eva tasmiṃs tyakte jitaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_05_u:043.017d-0265_01: doṣā damasya ye proktās tān doṣān parivarjayet
GE07mbh_05_u:043.018a: śreyāṃs tu ṣaḍvidhas tyāgaḥ priyaṃ prāpya na hṛṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:043.018c: apriye tu samutpanne vyathāṃ jātu na cārcchati
GE07mbh_05_u:043.019a: iṣṭān dārāṃś ca putrāṃś ca na cānyaṃ yad vaco bhavet
GE07mbh_05_u:043.019c: arhate yācamānāya pradeyaṃ tad vaco bhavet
GE07mbh_05_u:043.019d-0266_02: kāmatyāgaś ca rājendra sa tṛtīya iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:043.019d-0266_03: apramādī bhaved etaiḥ sa cāpy aṣṭaguṇo mahān
GE07mbh_05_u:043.019d-0266_04: satyaṃ dhyānaṃ samādhānaṃ codyaṃ vairāgyam eva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:043.019d-0266_05: asteyo brahmacaryaṃ ca tathāsaṃgraha eva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:043.019d-0266_06: evaṃ doṣā madasyoktās tān doṣān parivarjayet
GE07mbh_05_u:043.019d-0266_07: doṣatyāgo 'pramādaḥ syāt sa cāpy aṣṭaguṇo mataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:043.019d-0266_08: tāṃs tu satyamukhān āhuḥ satye hy amṛtam āhitam
GE07mbh_05_u:043.019d-0266_09: satyātmā bhava rājendra satye lokāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:043.019d-0266_11: etad dhātṛkṛtaṃ vṛttaṃ satyam eva satāṃ vratam
GE07mbh_05_u:043.019e: apy avācyaṃ vadaty eva sa tṛtīyo guṇaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:043.020a: tyaktair dravyair yo bhavati nopayuṅkte ca kāmataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:043.020b-0267_01: na ca dravyais tad bhavati nopayuktaiś ca kāmataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:043.020c: na ca karmasu tad dhīnaḥ śiṣyabuddhir naro yathā
GE07mbh_05_u:043.020e: sarvair eva guṇair yukto dravyavān api yo bhavet
GE07mbh_05_u:043.021c: indriyebhyaś ca pañcabhyo manasaś caiva bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:043.021e: atītānāgatebhyaś ca mukto hy etaiḥ sukhī bhavet
GE07mbh_05_u:043.022a: doṣair etair vimuktaṃ tu guṇair etaiḥ samanvitam
GE07mbh_05_u:043.022c: etat samṛddham apy ṛddhaṃ tapo bhavati kevalam
GE07mbh_05_u:043.022e: yan māṃ pṛcchasi rājendra kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
GE07mbh_05_u:043.024a: dvivedāś caikavedāś ca anṛcaś ca tathāpare
GE07mbh_05_u:043.024c: teṣāṃ tu katamaḥ sa syād yam ahaṃ veda brāhmaṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:043.025c: satyasyaikasya rājendra satye kaś cid avasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:043.025e: evaṃ vedam anutsādya prajñāṃ mahati kurvate
GE07mbh_05_u:043.026a: dānam adhyayanaṃ yajño lobhād etat pravartate
GE07mbh_05_u:043.028c: nāmaitad dhātunirvṛttaṃ satyam eva satāṃ param
GE07mbh_05_u:043.028e: jñānaṃ vai nāma pratyakṣaṃ parokṣaṃ jāyate tapaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:043.029a: vidyād bahu paṭhantaṃ tu bahupāṭhīti brāhmaṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:043.029c: tasmāt kṣatriya mā maṃsthā jalpitenaiva brāhmaṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:043.029e: ya eva satyān nāpaiti sa jñeyo brāhmaṇas tvayā
GE07mbh_05_u:043.029f-0270_04: gatā hi vedasya na vedyam āryāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:043.029f-0271_01: na vedānāṃ veditā kaś cid asti
GE07mbh_05_u:043.029f-0271_02: vedyena vedaṃ na vidur na vedyam
GE07mbh_05_u:043.029f-0271_03: yo veda vedaṃ sa ca veda vedyaṃ
GE07mbh_05_u:043.029f-0271_04: yo veda vedyaṃ na sa veda satyam
GE07mbh_05_u:043.029f-0271_05: yo veda vedān sa ca veda vedyaṃ
GE07mbh_05_u:043.029f-0271_06: na taṃ vidur vedavido na vedāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:043.030a: chandāṃsi nāma kṣatriya tāny atharvā; jagau purastād ṛṣisarga eṣaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:043.030c: chandovidas te ya u tān adhītya; na vedyavedasya vidur na vedyam
GE07mbh_05_u:043.031a: na vedānāṃ veditā kaś cid asti; kaś cid vedān budhyate vāpi rājan
GE07mbh_05_u:043.031c: yo veda vedān na sa veda vedyaṃ; satye sthito yas tu sa veda vedyam
GE07mbh_05_u:043.032b-0272_01: evaṃ yo hi vijānāti sa jānāti paraṃ hi tat
GE07mbh_05_u:043.032b-0273_01: paraṃ hi tat paraṃ brahma jānāty eva ca brāhmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:043.032b-0275_01: nāsya paryeṣaṇaṃ gacchet pratyarthiṣu kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:043.032b-0275_02: avicinvann imaṃ vede tataḥ paśyati taṃ prabhum
GE07mbh_05_u:043.033a: tasya paryeṣaṇaṃ gacchet prācīnaṃ nota dakṣiṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:043.033c: nārvācīnaṃ kutas tiryaṅ nādiśaṃ tu kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:043.034a: tūṣṇīṃbhūta upāsīta na ceṣṭen manasā api
GE07mbh_05_u:043.035a: maunād dhi sa munir bhavati nāraṇyavasanān muniḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:043.035c: akṣaraṃ tat tu yo veda sa muniḥ śreṣṭha ucyate
GE07mbh_05_u:043.036b-0276_01: tan mūlato vyākaraṇaṃ vyākarotīti tat tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:043.037a: satye vai brāhmaṇas tiṣṭhan brahma paśyati kṣatriya
GE07mbh_05_u:043.037b-0277_01: jñānādiṣu sthito 'py evaṃ kṣatriya brahma paśyati
GE07mbh_05_u:043.037c: vedānāṃ cānupūrvyeṇa etad vidvan bravīmi te
GE07mbh_05_u:044.001a: sanatsujāta yad imāṃ parārthāṃ; brāhmīṃ vācaṃ viśvarūpām
GE07mbh_05_u:044.001c: parāṃ hi kāmeṣu sudurlabhāṃ kathāṃ; tad brūhi me vākyam etat kumāra
GE07mbh_05_u:044.002a: naitad brahma tvaramāṇena labhyaṃ; yan māṃ pṛcchasy abhihṛṣyasy atīva
GE07mbh_05_u:044.002c: avyaktavidyām abhidhāsye purāṇīṃ; buddhyā ca teṣāṃ brahmacaryeṇa siddhām
GE07mbh_05_u:044.003a: avyaktavidyām iti yat sanātanīṃ; bravīṣi tvaṃ brahmacaryeṇa siddhām
GE07mbh_05_u:044.003b-0280_02: yā vai vidyā guruvṛddheṣu nityā dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
GE07mbh_05_u:044.003b-0281_01: brahmacaryeṇa yā vidyā śakyā veditum añjasā
GE07mbh_05_u:044.003b-0281_02: tat kathaṃ brahmacaryaṃ syād etad vidvan bravīhi me
GE07mbh_05_u:044.003c: anārabhyā vasatīhārya kāle; kathaṃ brāhmaṇyam amṛtatvaṃ labheta
GE07mbh_05_u:044.004a: ye 'smiṃl loke vijayantīha kāmān; brāhmīṃ sthitim anutitikṣamāṇāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:044.004c: ta ātmānaṃ nirharantīha dehān; muñjād iṣīkām iva sattvasaṃsthāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:044.004d-0282_01: yadi sarve pramucyante kāmā ye hṛdi saṃsthitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:044.004d-0282_02: atha mṛtyor mṛta iti tatra brahma samaśnute
GE07mbh_05_u:044.005a: śarīram etau kurutaḥ pitā mātā ca bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:044.005c: ācāryaśāstā yā jātiḥ sā satyā sājarāmarā
GE07mbh_05_u:044.005d-0283_01: ācāryatas tu yaj janma tat satyaṃ vai tathāmṛtam
GE07mbh_05_u:044.005d-0284_01: tasmāt tām eva yatnena buddhimān pratipadyate
GE07mbh_05_u:044.006a: ācāryayonim iha ye praviśya; bhūtvā garbhaṃ brahmacaryaṃ caranti
GE07mbh_05_u:044.006c: ihaiva te śāstrakārā bhavanti; prahāya dehaṃ paramaṃ yānti yogam
GE07mbh_05_u:044.007a: ya āvṛṇoty avitathena karṇā;vṛtaṃ kurvann amṛtaṃ saṃprayacchan
GE07mbh_05_u:044.007c: taṃ manyeta pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca; tasmai na druhyet kṛtam asya jānan
GE07mbh_05_u:044.008a: guruṃ śiṣyo nityam abhimanyamānaḥ; svādhyāyam icchec chucir apramattaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:044.008c: mānaṃ na kuryān na dadhīta roṣam; eṣa prathamo brahmacaryasya pādaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:044.009a: ācāryasya priyaṃ kuryāt prāṇair api dhanair api
GE07mbh_05_u:044.009c: karmaṇā manasā vācā dvitīyaḥ pāda ucyate
GE07mbh_05_u:044.010a: samā gurau yathā vṛttir gurupatnyāṃ tathā bhavet
GE07mbh_05_u:044.010d-0286_02: taṃ guruṃ prati hṛṣṭaḥ saṃstṛtīyaḥ pāda ucyate
GE07mbh_05_u:044.011a: nācāryāyehopakṛtvā pravādaṃ; prājñaḥ kurvīta naitad ahaṃ karomi
GE07mbh_05_u:044.011c: itīva manyeta na bhāṣayeta; sa vai caturtho brahmacaryasya pādaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:044.012a: evaṃ vasantaṃ yad upaplaved dhanam; ācāryāya tad anuprayacchet
GE07mbh_05_u:044.012c: satāṃ vṛttiṃ bahuguṇām evam eti; guroḥ putre bhavati ca vṛttir eṣā
GE07mbh_05_u:044.013a: evaṃ vasan sarvato vardhatīha; bahūn putrāṃl labhate ca pratiṣṭhām
GE07mbh_05_u:044.013c: varṣanti cāsmai pradiśo diśaś ca; vasanty asmin brahmacarye janāś ca
GE07mbh_05_u:044.015d-0291_02: evaṃ hy etat samājñāya tādṛg bhāvaṃ gatā ime
GE07mbh_05_u:044.016a: ya āśayet pāṭayec cāpi rājan; sarvaṃ śarīraṃ tapasā tapyamānaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:044.016c: etenāsau bālyam atyeti vidvān; mṛtyuṃ tathā rodhayaty antakāle
GE07mbh_05_u:044.017a: antavantaḥ kṣatriya te jayanti; lokāñ janāḥ karmaṇā nirmitena
GE07mbh_05_u:044.017c: brahmaiva vidvāṃs tena abhyeti sarvaṃ; nānyaḥ panthā ayanāya vidyate
GE07mbh_05_u:044.018a: ābhāti śuklam iva lohitam iva; atho kṛṣṇam athāñjanaṃ kādravaṃ vā
GE07mbh_05_u:044.018c: tad brāhmaṇaḥ paśyati yo 'tra vidvān; kathaṃrūpaṃ tad amṛtam akṣaraṃ padam
GE07mbh_05_u:044.019a: nābhāti śuklam iva lohitam iva; atho kṛṣṇam āyasam arkavarṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:044.019c: na pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭhati nāntarikṣe; naitat samudre salilaṃ bibharti
GE07mbh_05_u:044.020a: na tārakāsu na ca vidyud āśritaṃ; na cābhreṣu dṛśyate rūpam asya
GE07mbh_05_u:044.020c: na cāpi vāyau na ca devatāsu; na tac candre dṛśyate nota sūrye
GE07mbh_05_u:044.021a: naivarkṣu tan na yajuḥṣu nāpy atharvasu; na caiva dṛśyaty amaleṣu sāmasu
GE07mbh_05_u:044.021c: rathaṃtare bārhate cāpi rājan; mahāvrate naiva dṛśyed dhruvaṃ tat
GE07mbh_05_u:044.022a: apāraṇīyaṃ tamasaḥ parastāt; tad antako 'py eti vināśakāle
GE07mbh_05_u:044.022c: aṇīyarūpaṃ kṣuradhārayā tan; mahac ca rūpaṃ tv api parvatebhyaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:044.023a: sā pratiṣṭhā tad amṛtaṃ lokās tad brahma tad yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:044.023c: bhūtāni jajñire tasmāt pralayaṃ yānti tatra ca
GE07mbh_05_u:044.024a: anāmayaṃ tan mahad udyataṃ yaśo; vāco vikārān kavayo vadanti
GE07mbh_05_u:044.024c: tasmiñ jagat sarvam idaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ; ye tad vidur amṛtās te bhavanti sanatsujāta uvāca
GE07mbh_05_u:044.024d-002_0001: śokaḥ krodhaś ca lobhaś ca kāmo mānaḥ parāsutā
GE07mbh_05_u:044.024d-002_0002: īrṣyā moho vivitsā ca kṛpāsūyā jugupsutā
GE07mbh_05_u:044.024d-002_0005: yair āviṣṭo naraḥ pāpaṃ mūḍhasaṃjño vyavasyati
GE07mbh_05_u:044.024d-002_0014: dharmaś ca satyaṃ ca tapo damaś ca
GE07mbh_05_u:044.024d-002_0016: dānaṃ śrutaṃ caiva dhṛtiḥ kṣamā ca
GE07mbh_05_u:044.024d-002_0022: damas tyāgo 'thāpramāda ity eteṣv amṛtaṃ sthitam
GE07mbh_05_u:044.024d-002_0024: sad vāsad vā parīvādo brāhmaṇasya na śasyate
GE07mbh_05_u:044.024d-002_0025: narakapratiṣṭhās te vai syur ya evaṃ kurvate narāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:044.024d-002_0031: tasmāt prājño na mādyeta sadā hy etad vigarhitam
GE07mbh_05_u:044.024d-002_0035: dadāty ayācyam api deyaṃ khalu syāt
GE07mbh_05_u:044.024d-002_0036: iṣṭān putrān vibhavān svāṃś ca dārān
GE07mbh_05_u:044.024d-002_0040: dravyavān guṇavān evaṃ tyāgī bhavati sāttvikaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:044.024d-002_0042: etat samṛddham apy ūrdhvaṃ tapo bhavati kevalam
GE07mbh_05_u:044.024d-002_0047: brāhmaṇasya viśeṣeṇa kiṃ cānyad api me śruṇu
GE07mbh_05_u:044.024d-002_0051: ye tad vidur amṛtās te bhavanti
GE07mbh_05_u:044.024d-002_0053: satyaṃ vadej juhuyād vā yajed vā
GE07mbh_05_u:044.024d-002_0056: tūṣṇīm eka upāsīta ceṣṭeta manasāpi na
GE07mbh_05_u:044.024d-002_0059: vedeṣu cānupūrvyeṇa etad vidvan bravīmi te
GE07mbh_05_u:044.024d-0292_01: tad etad ahnā saṃsthitaṃ bhāti sarvaṃ
GE07mbh_05_u:044.024d-0293_02: ya etad vidur amṛtās te bhavanti
GE07mbh_05_u:045.001a: yat tac chukraṃ mahaj jyotir dīpyamānaṃ mahad yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:045.001c: tad vai devā upāsante yasmād arko virājate
GE07mbh_05_u:045.002a: śukrād brahma prabhavati brahma śukreṇa vardhate
GE07mbh_05_u:045.002c: tac chukraṃ jyotiṣāṃ madhye 'taptaṃ tapati tāpanam
GE07mbh_05_u:045.003a: āpo 'tha adbhyaḥ salilasya madhye; ubhau devau śiśriyāte 'ntarikṣe
GE07mbh_05_u:045.003c: sa sadhrīcīḥ sa viṣūcīr vasānā; ubhe bibharti pṛthivīṃ divaṃ ca
GE07mbh_05_u:045.003f-0294_01: apa eva sasarjādau tāsu vīryam athāsṛjat
GE07mbh_05_u:045.004a: ubhau ca devau pṛthivīṃ divaṃ ca; diśaś ca śukraṃ bhuvanaṃ bibharti
GE07mbh_05_u:045.004c: tasmād diśaḥ saritaś ca sravanti; tasmāt samudrā vihitā mahāntaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:045.005c: ketumantaṃ vahanty aśvās taṃ divyam ajaraṃ divi
GE07mbh_05_u:045.006a: na sādṛśye tiṣṭhati rūpam asya; na cakṣuṣā paśyati kaś cid enam
GE07mbh_05_u:045.006c: manīṣayātho manasā hṛdā ca; ya evaṃ vidur amṛtās te bhavanti
GE07mbh_05_u:045.006d-0295_01: yasya deve parā bhaktir yathā deve tathā gurau
GE07mbh_05_u:045.006d-0295_02: tasya te kathitā hy arthāḥ prakāśante mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:045.008a: tad ardhamāsaṃ pibati saṃcitya bhramaro madhu
GE07mbh_05_u:045.009c: te tatra pakṣiṇo bhūtvā prapatanti yathādiśam
GE07mbh_05_u:045.010a: pūrṇāt pūrṇāny uddharanti pūrṇāt pūrṇāni cakrire
GE07mbh_05_u:045.011a: tasmād vai vāyur āyātas tasmiṃś ca prayataḥ sadā
GE07mbh_05_u:045.011c: tasmād agniś ca somaś ca tasmiṃś ca prāṇa ātataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:045.011d-0298_01: yasmād vai vāyur āyāto yasmāc ca prāṇa āgataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:045.011d-0299_01: tat pratiṣṭhās tad amṛtaṃ lokās tad brahma tad yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:045.011d-0299_02: bhūtāni jajñire tasmāt pralayaṃ yānti tatra ca
GE07mbh_05_u:045.012a: sarvam eva tato vidyāt tat tad vaktuṃ na śaknumaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:045.013a: apānaṃ girati prāṇaḥ prāṇaṃ girati candramāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:045.013c: ādityo girate candram ādityaṃ girate paraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:045.014a: ekaṃ pādaṃ notkṣipati salilād dhaṃsa uccaran
GE07mbh_05_u:045.014c: taṃ cet satatam ṛtvijaṃ na mṛtyur nāmṛtaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_05_u:045.014f-0301_04: sa vai jano gardabha eva sākṣāt
GE07mbh_05_u:045.015a: evaṃ devo mahātmā sa pāvakaṃ puruṣo giran
GE07mbh_05_u:045.015c: yo vai taṃ puruṣaṃ veda tasyehātmā na riṣyate
GE07mbh_05_u:045.016a: yaḥ sahasraṃ sahasrāṇāṃ pakṣān saṃtatya saṃpatet
GE07mbh_05_u:045.016c: madhyame madhya āgacched api cet syān manojavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:045.017a: na darśane tiṣṭhati rūpam asya; paśyanti cainaṃ suviśuddhasattvāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:045.017c: hito manīṣī manasābhipaśyed; ye taṃ śrayeyur amṛtās te bhavanti
GE07mbh_05_u:045.018a: gūhanti sarpā iva gahvarāṇi; svaśikṣayā svena vṛttena martyāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:045.018c: teṣu pramuhyanti janā vimūḍhā; yathādhvānaṃ mohayante bhayāya
GE07mbh_05_u:045.019a: sadā sadāsatkṛtaḥ syān na mṛtyur amṛtaṃ kutaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:045.019c: satyānṛte satyasamānabandhane; sataś ca yonir asataś caika eva
GE07mbh_05_u:045.020a: na sādhunā nota asādhunā vā; samānam etad dṛśyate mānuṣeṣu
GE07mbh_05_u:045.020c: samānam etad amṛtasya vidyād; evaṃyukto madhu tad vai parīpset
GE07mbh_05_u:045.021a: nāsyātivādā hṛdayaṃ tāpayanti; nānadhītaṃ nāhutam agnihotram
GE07mbh_05_u:045.021c: mano brāhmīṃ laghutām ādadhīta; prajñānam asya nāma dhīrā labhante
GE07mbh_05_u:045.022c: anyatrānyatra yukteṣu kiṃ sa śocet tataḥ param
GE07mbh_05_u:045.024a: aṅguṣṭhamātraḥ puruṣo mahātmā; na dṛśyate 'sau hṛdaye niviṣṭaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:045.024c: ajaś caro divārātram atandritaś ca; sa taṃ matvā kavir āste prasannaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:045.025a: aham evāsmi vo mātā pitā putro 'smy ahaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:045.025c: ātmāham api sarvasya yac ca nāsti yad asti ca
GE07mbh_05_u:045.026a: pitāmaho 'smi sthaviraḥ pitā putraś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:045.026c: mamaiva yūyam ātmasthā na me yūyaṃ na vo 'py aham
GE07mbh_05_u:045.027a: ātmaiva sthānaṃ mama janma cātmā; vedaprokto 'ham ajarapratiṣṭhaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:045.028d-0302_01: viṣaṃ bhuṅkṣva sahāmātyair vināśaṃ prāpnuhi dhruvam
GE07mbh_05_u:045.028d-0302_02: rājan kena vinā nābhyāṃ sphītaṃ kṛṣṇājinaṃ varam
GE07mbh_05_u:046.001c: sārdhaṃ kathayato rājñaḥ sā vyatīyāya śarvarī
GE07mbh_05_u:046.002a: tasyāṃ rajanyāṃ vyuṣṭāyāṃ rājānaḥ sarva eva te
GE07mbh_05_u:046.005a: rucirair āsanaiḥ stīrṇāṃ kāñcanair dāravair api
GE07mbh_05_u:046.006a: bhīṣmo droṇaḥ kṛpaḥ śalyaḥ kṛtavarmā jayadrathaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:046.006c: aśvatthāmā vikarṇaś ca somadattaś ca bāhlikaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:046.007a: viduraś ca mahāprājño yuyutsuś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:046.007c: sarve ca sahitāḥ śūrāḥ pārthivā bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:046.007e: dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ puraskṛtya viviśus tāṃ sabhāṃ śubhām
GE07mbh_05_u:046.008d-0305_01: ete cānye ca bahavaḥ pārthivā bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:046.009c: viviśus tāṃ sabhāṃ rājan surāḥ śakrasado yathā
GE07mbh_05_u:046.010c: śuśubhe sā sabhā rājan siṃhair iva girer guhā
GE07mbh_05_u:046.013a: ayaṃ sa ratha āyāti yo 'yāsīt pāṇḍavān prati
GE07mbh_05_u:046.013c: dūto nas tūrṇam āyātaḥ saindhavaiḥ sādhuvāhibhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:046.014a: upayāya tu sa kṣipraṃ rathāt praskandya kuṇḍalī
GE07mbh_05_u:046.015a: prāpto 'smi pāṇḍavān gatvā tad vijānīta kauravāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:046.016a: abhivādayanti vṛddhāṃś ca vayasyāṃś ca vayasyavat
GE07mbh_05_u:046.017a: yathāhaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭreṇa śiṣṭaḥ pūrvam ito gataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:046.017c: abruvaṃ pāṇḍavān gatvā tan nibodhata pārthivāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:047.001a: pṛcchāmi tvāṃ saṃjaya rājamadhye; kim abravīd adīnasattvaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:047.001c: dhanaṃjayas tāta yudhāṃ praṇetā; durātmanāṃ jīvitacchin mahātmā
GE07mbh_05_u:047.002a: duryodhano vācam imāṃ śṛṇotu; yad abravīd arjuno yotsyamānaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:047.003a: anvatrasto bāhuvīryaṃ vidāna; upahvare vāsudevasya dhīraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:047.003c: avocan māṃ yotsyamānaḥ kirīṭī; madhye brūyā dhārtarāṣṭraṃ kurūṇām
GE07mbh_05_u:047.004a: ye vai rājānaḥ pāṇḍavāyodhanāya; samānītāḥ śṛṇvatāṃ cāpi teṣām
GE07mbh_05_u:047.004c: yathā samagraṃ vacanaṃ mayoktaṃ; sahāmātyaṃ śrāvayethā nṛpaṃ tam
GE07mbh_05_u:047.005a: yathā nūnaṃ devarājasya devāḥ; śuśrūṣante vajrahastasya sarve
GE07mbh_05_u:047.005c: tathāśṛṇvan pāṇḍavāḥ sṛñjayāś ca; kirīṭinā vācam uktāṃ samarthām
GE07mbh_05_u:047.006a: ity abravīd arjuno yotsyamāno; gāṇḍīvadhanvā lohitapadmanetraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:047.006c: na ced rājyaṃ muñcati dhārtarāṣṭro; yudhiṣṭhirasyājamīḍhasya rājñaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:047.006e: asti nūnaṃ karma kṛtaṃ purastād; anirviṣṭaṃ pāpakaṃ dhārtarāṣṭraiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:047.007a: yeṣāṃ yuddhaṃ bhīmasenārjunābhyāṃ; tathāśvibhyāṃ vāsudevena caiva
GE07mbh_05_u:047.007c: śaineyena dhruvam āttāyudhena; dhṛṣṭadyumnenātha śikhaṇḍinā ca
GE07mbh_05_u:047.007e: yudhiṣṭhireṇendrakalpena caiva; yo 'padhyānān nirdahed gāṃ divaṃ ca
GE07mbh_05_u:047.008a: taiś ced yuddhaṃ manyate dhārtarāṣṭro; nirvṛtto 'rthaḥ sakalaḥ pāṇḍavānām
GE07mbh_05_u:047.008b-0309_01: nūnaṃ hy etān nirdahed gāṇḍivaṃ ca
GE07mbh_05_u:047.008c: mā tat kārṣīḥ pāṇḍavārthāya hetor; upaihi yuddhaṃ yadi manyase tvam
GE07mbh_05_u:047.009a: yāṃ tāṃ vane duḥkhaśayyām uvāsa; pravrājitaḥ pāṇḍavo dharmacārī
GE07mbh_05_u:047.009c: āśiṣyate duḥkhatarām anarthām; antyāṃ śayyāṃ dhārtarāṣṭraḥ parāsuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:047.010a: hriyā jñānena tapasā damena; krodhenātho dharmaguptyā dhanena
GE07mbh_05_u:047.012a: yadā jyeṣṭhaḥ pāṇḍavaḥ saṃśitātmā; krodhaṃ yat taṃ varṣapūgān sughoram
GE07mbh_05_u:047.013a: kṛṣṇavartmeva jvalitaḥ samiddho; yathā dahet kakṣam agnir nidāghe
GE07mbh_05_u:047.013c: evaṃ dagdhā dhārtarāṣṭrasya senāṃ; yudhiṣṭhiraḥ krodhadīpto 'nuvīkṣya
GE07mbh_05_u:047.014a: yadā draṣṭā bhīmasenaṃ raṇasthaṃ; gadāhastaṃ krodhaviṣaṃ vamantam
GE07mbh_05_u:047.014c: durmarṣaṇaṃ pāṇḍavaṃ bhīmavegaṃ; tadā yuddhaṃ dhārtarāṣṭro 'nvatapsyat
GE07mbh_05_u:047.015a: mahāsiṃho gāva iva praviśya; gadāpāṇir dhārtarāṣṭrān upetya
GE07mbh_05_u:047.015c: yadā bhīmo bhīmarūpo nihantā; tadā yuddhaṃ dhārtarāṣṭro 'nvatapsyat
GE07mbh_05_u:047.016c: sakṛd rathena pratiyād rathaughān; padātisaṃghān gadayābhinighnan
GE07mbh_05_u:047.017a: sainyān anekāṃs tarasā vimṛdnan; yadā kṣeptā dhārtarāṣṭrasya sainyam
GE07mbh_05_u:047.017c: chindan vanaṃ paraśuneva śūras; tadā yuddhaṃ dhārtarāṣṭro 'nvatapsyat
GE07mbh_05_u:047.018a: tṛṇaprāyaṃ jvalaneneva dagdhaṃ; grāmaṃ yathā dhārtarāṣṭraḥ samīkṣya
GE07mbh_05_u:047.018c: pakvaṃ sasyaṃ vaidyuteneva dagdhaṃ; parāsiktaṃ vipulaṃ svaṃ balaugham
GE07mbh_05_u:047.019c: śastrārciṣā bhīmasenena dagdhaṃ; tadā yuddhaṃ dhārtarāṣṭro 'nvatapsyat
GE07mbh_05_u:047.020a: upāsaṅgād uddharan dakṣiṇena; paraḥśatān nakulaś citrayodhī
GE07mbh_05_u:047.020c: yadā rathāgryo rathinaḥ pracetā; tadā yuddhaṃ dhārtarāṣṭro 'nvatapsyat
GE07mbh_05_u:047.021a: sukhocito duḥkhaśayyāṃ vaneṣu; dīrghaṃ kālaṃ nakulo yām aśeta
GE07mbh_05_u:047.021c: āśīviṣaḥ kruddha iva śvasan bhṛśaṃ; tadā yuddhaṃ dhārtarāṣṭro 'nvatapsyat
GE07mbh_05_u:047.022c: rathaiḥ śubhraiḥ sainyam abhidravanto; dṛṣṭvā paścāt tapsyate dhārtarāṣṭraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:047.023a: śiśūn kṛtāstrān aśiśuprakāśān; yadā draṣṭā kauravaḥ pañca śūrān
GE07mbh_05_u:047.023c: tyaktvā prāṇān kekayān ādravantas; tadā yuddhaṃ dhārtarāṣṭro 'nvatapsyat
GE07mbh_05_u:047.024a: yadā gatodvāham akūjanākṣaṃ; suvarṇatāraṃ ratham ātatāyī
GE07mbh_05_u:047.024c: dāntair yuktaṃ sahadevo 'dhirūḍhaḥ; śirāṃsi rājñāṃ kṣepsyate mārgaṇaughaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:047.025a: mahābhaye saṃpravṛtte rathasthaṃ; vivartamānaṃ samare kṛtāstram
GE07mbh_05_u:047.025c: sarvāṃ diśaṃ saṃpatantaṃ samīkṣya; tadā yuddhaṃ dhārtarāṣṭro 'nvatapsyat
GE07mbh_05_u:047.026c: gāndhārim ārcchaṃs tumule kṣiprakārī; kṣeptā janān sahadevas tarasvī
GE07mbh_05_u:047.027a: yadā draṣṭā draupadeyān maheṣūñ; śūrān kṛtāstrān rathayuddhakovidān
GE07mbh_05_u:047.027c: āśīviṣān ghoraviṣān ivāyatas; tadā yuddhaṃ dhārtarāṣṭro 'nvatapsyat
GE07mbh_05_u:047.028a: yadābhimanyuḥ paravīraghātī; śaraiḥ parān megha ivābhivarṣan
GE07mbh_05_u:047.028c: vigāhitā kṛṣṇasamaḥ kṛtāstras; tadā yuddhaṃ dhārtarāṣṭro 'nvatapsyat
GE07mbh_05_u:047.029a: yadā draṣṭā bālam abālavīryaṃ; dviṣaccamūṃ mṛtyum ivāpatantam
GE07mbh_05_u:047.029c: saubhadram indrapratimaṃ kṛtāstraṃ; tadā yuddhaṃ dhārtarāṣṭro 'nvatapsyat
GE07mbh_05_u:047.030c: yadā kṣeptāro dhārtarāṣṭrān sasainyāṃs; tadā yuddhaṃ dhārtarāṣṭro 'nvatapsyat
GE07mbh_05_u:047.031a: vṛddhau virāṭadrupadau mahārathau; pṛthak camūbhyām abhivartamānau
GE07mbh_05_u:047.031c: yadā draṣṭārau dhārtarāṣṭrān sasainyāṃs; tadā yuddhaṃ dhārtarāṣṭro 'nvatapsyat
GE07mbh_05_u:047.032a: yadā kṛtāstro drupadaḥ pracinvañ; śirāṃsi yūnāṃ samare rathasthaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:047.032c: kruddhaḥ śaraiś chetsyati cāpamuktais; tadā yuddhaṃ dhārtarāṣṭro 'nvatapsyat
GE07mbh_05_u:047.033a: yadā virāṭaḥ paravīraghātī; marmāntare śatrucamūṃ praveṣṭā
GE07mbh_05_u:047.033c: matsyaiḥ sārdham anṛśaṃsarūpais; tadā yuddhaṃ dhārtarāṣṭro 'nvatapsyat
GE07mbh_05_u:047.034a: jyeṣṭhaṃ mātsyānām anṛśaṃsarūpaṃ; virāṭaputraṃ rathinaṃ purastāt
GE07mbh_05_u:047.034c: yadā draṣṭā daṃśitaṃ pāṇḍavārthe; tadā yuddhaṃ dhārtarāṣṭro 'nvatapsyat
GE07mbh_05_u:047.035a: raṇe hate kauravāṇāṃ pravīre; śikhaṇḍinā sattame śaṃtanūje
GE07mbh_05_u:047.035c: na jātu naḥ śatravo dhārayeyur; asaṃśayaṃ satyam etad bravīmi
GE07mbh_05_u:047.036a: yadā śikhaṇḍī rathinaḥ pracinvan; bhīṣmaṃ rathenābhiyātā varūthī
GE07mbh_05_u:047.036c: divyair hayair avamṛdnan rathaughāṃs; tadā yuddhaṃ dhārtarāṣṭro 'nvatapsyat
GE07mbh_05_u:047.037a: yadā draṣṭā sṛñjayānām anīke; dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ pramukhe rocamānam
GE07mbh_05_u:047.037c: astraṃ yasmai guhyam uvāca dhīmān; droṇas tadā tapsyati dhārtarāṣṭraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:047.038a: yadā sa senāpatir aprameyaḥ; parābhavann iṣubhir dhārtarāṣṭrān
GE07mbh_05_u:047.038c: droṇaṃ raṇe śatrusaho 'bhiyātā; tadā yuddhaṃ dhārtarāṣṭro 'nvatapsyat
GE07mbh_05_u:047.039a: hrīmān manīṣī balavān manasvī; sa lakṣmīvān somakānāṃ prabarhaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:047.039c: na jātu taṃ śatravo 'nye saheran; yeṣāṃ sa syād agraṇīr vṛṣṇisiṃhaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:047.040a: brūyāc ca mā pravṛṇīṣveti loke; yuddhe 'dvitīyaṃ sacivaṃ rathastham
GE07mbh_05_u:047.040c: śiner naptāraṃ pravṛṇīma sātyakiṃ; mahābalaṃ vītabhayaṃ kṛtāstram
GE07mbh_05_u:047.041a: yadā śinīnām adhipo mayoktaḥ; śaraiḥ parān megha iva pravarṣan
GE07mbh_05_u:047.041c: pracchādayiṣyañ śarajālena yodhāṃs; tadā yuddhaṃ dhārtarāṣṭro 'nvatapsyat
GE07mbh_05_u:047.042a: yadā dhṛtiṃ kurute yotsyamānaḥ; sa dīrghabāhur dṛḍhadhanvā mahātmā
GE07mbh_05_u:047.042c: siṃhasyeva gandham āghrāya gāvaḥ; saṃveṣṭante śatravo 'smād yathāgneḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:047.043a: sa dīrghabāhur dṛḍhadhanvā mahātmā; bhindyād girīn saṃharet sarvalokān
GE07mbh_05_u:047.043c: astre kṛtī nipuṇaḥ kṣiprahasto; divi sthitaḥ sūrya ivābhibhāti
GE07mbh_05_u:047.044a: citraḥ sūkṣmaḥ sukṛto yādavasya; astre yogo vṛṣṇisiṃhasya bhūyān
GE07mbh_05_u:047.044c: yathāvidhaṃ yogam āhuḥ praśastaṃ; sarvair guṇaiḥ sātyakis tair upetaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:047.045a: hiraṇmayaṃ śvetahayaiś caturbhir; yadā yuktaṃ syandanaṃ mādhavasya
GE07mbh_05_u:047.045c: draṣṭā yuddhe sātyaker vai suyodhanas; tadā tapsyaty akṛtātmā sa mandaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:047.046a: yadā rathaṃ hemamaṇiprakāśaṃ; śvetāśvayuktaṃ vānaraketum ugram
GE07mbh_05_u:047.046c: draṣṭā raṇe saṃyataṃ keśavena; tadā tapsyaty akṛtātmā sa mandaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:047.047a: yadā maurvyās talaniṣpeṣam ugraṃ; mahāśabdaṃ vajraniṣpeṣatulyam
GE07mbh_05_u:047.047c: vidhūyamānasya mahāraṇe mayā; gāṇḍīvasya śroṣyati mandabuddhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:047.048a: tadā mūḍho dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putras; taptā yuddhe durmatir duḥsahāyaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:047.048c: dṛṣṭvā sainyaṃ bāṇavarṣāndhakāraṃ; prabhajyantaṃ gokulavad raṇāgre
GE07mbh_05_u:047.049a: balāhakād uccarantīva vidyut; sahasraghnī dviṣatāṃ saṃgameṣu
GE07mbh_05_u:047.049c: asthicchido marmabhido vamec charāṃs; tadā yuddhaṃ dhārtarāṣṭro 'nvatapsyat
GE07mbh_05_u:047.050a: yadā draṣṭā jyāmukhād bāṇasaṃghān; gāṇḍīvamuktān patataḥ śitāgrān
GE07mbh_05_u:047.050c: nāgān hayān varmiṇaś cādadānāṃs; tadā yuddhaṃ dhārtarāṣṭro 'nvatapsyat
GE07mbh_05_u:047.051a: yadā mandaḥ parabāṇān vimuktān; mameṣubhir hriyamāṇān pratīpam
GE07mbh_05_u:047.051c: tiryag vidvāṃś chidyamānān kṣuraprais; tadā yuddhaṃ dhārtarāṣṭro 'nvatapsyat
GE07mbh_05_u:047.052a: yadā vipāṭhā madbhujavipramuktā; dvijāḥ phalānīva mahīruhāgrāt
GE07mbh_05_u:047.052c: pracchettāra uttamāṅgāni yūnāṃ; tadā yuddhaṃ dhārtarāṣṭro 'nvatapsyat
GE07mbh_05_u:047.053a: yadā draṣṭā patataḥ syandanebhyo; mahāgajebhyo 'śvagatāṃś ca yodhān
GE07mbh_05_u:047.053c: śarair hatān pātitāṃś caiva raṅge; tadā yuddhaṃ dhārtarāṣṭro 'nvatapsyat
GE07mbh_05_u:047.054a: padātisaṃghān rathasaṃghān samantād; vyāttānanaḥ kāla ivātateṣuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:047.054c: praṇotsyāmi jvalitair bāṇavarṣaiḥ; śatrūṃs tadā tapsyati mandabuddhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:047.055a: sarvā diśaḥ saṃpatatā rathena; rajodhvastaṃ gāṇḍivenāpakṛttam
GE07mbh_05_u:047.055c: yadā draṣṭā svabalaṃ saṃpramūḍhaṃ; tadā paścāt tapsyati mandabuddhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:047.056a: kāṃdigbhūtaṃ chinnagātraṃ visaṃjñaṃ; duryodhano drakṣyati sarvasainyam
GE07mbh_05_u:047.057c: prajāpateḥ karma yathārdhaniṣṭhitaṃ; tadā dṛṣṭvā tapsyate mandabuddhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:047.058a: yadā rathe gāṇḍivaṃ vāsudevaṃ; divyaṃ śaṅkhaṃ pāñcajanyaṃ hayāṃś ca
GE07mbh_05_u:047.058c: tūṇāv akṣayyau devadattaṃ ca māṃ ca; draṣṭā yuddhe dhārtarāṣṭraḥ sametān
GE07mbh_05_u:047.059a: udvartayan dasyusaṃghān sametān; pravartayan yugam anyad yugānte
GE07mbh_05_u:047.059c: yadā dhakṣyāmy agnivat kauraveyāṃs; tadā taptā dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ saputraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:047.060c: darpasyānte vihite vepamānaḥ; paścān mandas tapsyati dhārtarāṣṭraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:047.061a: pūrvāhṇe māṃ kṛtajapyaṃ kadā cid; vipraḥ provācodakānte manojñam
GE07mbh_05_u:047.061c: kartavyaṃ te duṣkaraṃ karma pārtha; yoddhavyaṃ te śatrubhiḥ savyasācin
GE07mbh_05_u:047.062a: indro vā te harivān vajrahastaḥ; purastād yātu samare 'rīn vinighnan
GE07mbh_05_u:047.062c: sugrīvayuktena rathena vā te; paścāt kṛṣṇo rakṣatu vāsudevaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:047.063a: vavre cāhaṃ vajrahastān mahendrād; asmin yuddhe vāsudevaṃ sahāyam
GE07mbh_05_u:047.063c: sa me labdho dasyuvadhāya kṛṣṇo; manye caitad vihitaṃ daivatair me
GE07mbh_05_u:047.064a: ayudhyamāno manasāpi yasya; jayaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ puruṣasyābhinandet
GE07mbh_05_u:047.064c: dhruvaṃ sarvān so 'bhyatīyād amitrān; sendrān devān mānuṣe nāsti cintā
GE07mbh_05_u:047.065a: sa bāhubhyāṃ sāgaram uttitīrṣen; mahodadhiṃ salilasyāprameyam
GE07mbh_05_u:047.065c: tejasvinaṃ kṛṣṇam atyantaśūraṃ; yuddhena yo vāsudevaṃ jigīṣet
GE07mbh_05_u:047.066a: giriṃ ya iccheta talena bhettuṃ; śiloccayaṃ śvetam atipramāṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:047.066c: tasyaiva pāṇiḥ sanakho viśīryen; na cāpi kiṃ cit sa gires tu kuryāt
GE07mbh_05_u:047.067a: agniṃ samiddhaṃ śamayed bhujābhyāṃ; candraṃ ca sūryaṃ ca nivārayeta
GE07mbh_05_u:047.067c: hared devānām amṛtaṃ prasahya; yuddhena yo vāsudevaṃ jigīṣet
GE07mbh_05_u:047.068a: yo rukmiṇīm ekarathena bhojyām; utsādya rājñāṃ viṣayaṃ prasahya
GE07mbh_05_u:047.068c: uvāha bhāryāṃ yaśasā jvalantīṃ; yasyāṃ jajñe raukmiṇeyo mahātmā
GE07mbh_05_u:047.069a: ayaṃ gāndhārāṃs tarasā saṃpramathya; jitvā putrān nagnajitaḥ samagrān
GE07mbh_05_u:047.069c: baddhaṃ mumoca vinadantaṃ prasahya; sudarśanīyaṃ devatānāṃ lalāmam
GE07mbh_05_u:047.070a: ayaṃ kavāṭe nijaghāna pāṇḍyaṃ; tathā kaliṅgān dantakūre mamarda
GE07mbh_05_u:047.070c: anena dagdhā varṣapūgān vināthā; vārāṇasī nagarī saṃbabhūva
GE07mbh_05_u:047.071a: yaṃ sma yuddhe manyate 'nyair ajeyam; ekalavyaṃ nāma niṣādarājam
GE07mbh_05_u:047.071c: vegeneva śailam abhihatya jambhaḥ; śete sa kṛṣṇena hataḥ parāsuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:047.072a: tathograsenasya sutaṃ praduṣṭaṃ; vṛṣṇyandhakānāṃ madhyagāṃ tapantam
GE07mbh_05_u:047.072c: apātayad baladevadvitīyo; hatvā dadau cograsenāya rājyam
GE07mbh_05_u:047.073a: ayaṃ saubhaṃ yodhayām āsa khasthaṃ; vibhīṣaṇaṃ māyayā śālvarājam
GE07mbh_05_u:047.073c: saubhadvāri pratyagṛhṇāc chataghnīṃ; dorbhyāṃ ka enaṃ viṣaheta martyaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:047.074a: prāgjyotiṣaṃ nāma babhūva durgaṃ; puraṃ ghoram asurāṇām asahyam
GE07mbh_05_u:047.074c: mahābalo narakas tatra bhaumo; jahārādityā maṇikuṇḍale śubhe
GE07mbh_05_u:047.075a: na taṃ devāḥ saha śakreṇa sehire; samāgatā āharaṇāya bhītāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:047.075c: dṛṣṭvā ca te vikramaṃ keśavasya; balaṃ tathaivāstram avāraṇīyam
GE07mbh_05_u:047.076a: jānanto 'sya prakṛtiṃ keśavasya; nyayojayan dasyuvadhāya kṛṣṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:047.076c: sa tat karma pratiśuśrāva duṣkaram; aiśvaryavān siddhiṣu vāsudevaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:047.077a: nirmocane ṣaṭ sahasrāṇi hatvā; saṃchidya pāśān sahasā kṣurāntān
GE07mbh_05_u:047.077c: muraṃ hatvā vinihatyaugharākṣasaṃ; nirmocanaṃ cāpi jagāma vīraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:047.078a: tatraiva tenāsya babhūva yuddhaṃ; mahābalenātibalasya viṣṇoḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:047.078c: śete sa kṛṣṇena hataḥ parāsur; vāteneva mathitaḥ karṇikāraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:047.079a: āhṛtya kṛṣṇo maṇikuṇḍale te; hatvā ca bhaumaṃ narakaṃ muraṃ ca
GE07mbh_05_u:047.079c: śriyā vṛto yaśasā caiva dhīmān; pratyājagāmāpratimaprabhāvaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:047.080a: tasmai varān adadaṃs tatra devā; dṛṣṭvā bhīmaṃ karma raṇe kṛtaṃ tat
GE07mbh_05_u:047.080c: śramaś ca te yudhyamānasya na syād; ākāśe vā apsu caiva kramaḥ syāt
GE07mbh_05_u:047.081a: śastrāṇi gātre ca na te kramerann; ity eva kṛṣṇaś ca tataḥ kṛtārthaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:047.082a: tam asahyaṃ viṣṇum anantavīryam; āśaṃsate dhārtarāṣṭro balena
GE07mbh_05_u:047.082c: yadā hy enaṃ tarkayate durātmā; tac cāpy ayaṃ sahate 'smān samīkṣya
GE07mbh_05_u:047.083a: paryāgataṃ mama kṛṣṇasya caiva; yo manyate kalahaṃ saṃprayujya
GE07mbh_05_u:047.083c: śakyaṃ hartuṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ mamatvaṃ; tad veditā saṃyugaṃ tatra gatvā
GE07mbh_05_u:047.084a: namaskṛtvā śāṃtanavāya rājñe; droṇāyātho sahaputrāya caiva
GE07mbh_05_u:047.084c: śāradvatāyāpratidvandvine ca; yotsyāmy ahaṃ rājyam abhīpsamānaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:047.085a: dharmeṇāstraṃ niyataṃ tasya manye; yo yotsyate pāṇḍavair dharmacārī
GE07mbh_05_u:047.085c: mithyāglahe nirjitā vai nṛśaṃsaiḥ; saṃvatsarān dvādaśa pāṇḍuputrāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:047.086a: avāpya kṛcchraṃ vihitaṃ hy araṇye; dīrghaṃ kālaṃ caikam ajñātacaryām
GE07mbh_05_u:047.086c: te hy akasmāj jīvitaṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ; na mṛṣyante dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ padasthāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:047.087a: te ced asmān yudhyamānāñ jayeyur; devair apīndrapramukhaiḥ sahāyaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:047.087c: dharmād adharmaś carito garīyān; iti dhruvaṃ nāsti kṛtaṃ na sādhu
GE07mbh_05_u:047.088a: na ced imaṃ puruṣaṃ karmabaddhaṃ; na ced asmān manyate 'sau viśiṣṭān
GE07mbh_05_u:047.089a: na ced idaṃ karma nareṣu baddhaṃ; na vidyate puruṣasya svakarma
GE07mbh_05_u:047.089c: idaṃ ca tac cāpi samīkṣya nūnaṃ; parājayo dhārtarāṣṭrasya sādhuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:047.090a: pratyakṣaṃ vaḥ kuravo yad bravīmi; yudhyamānā dhārtarāṣṭrā na santi
GE07mbh_05_u:047.090c: anyatra yuddhāt kuravaḥ parīpsan; na yudhyatāṃ śeṣa ihāsti kaś cit
GE07mbh_05_u:047.091a: hatvā tv ahaṃ dhārtarāṣṭrān sakarṇān; rājyaṃ kurūṇām avajetā samagram
GE07mbh_05_u:047.091c: yad vaḥ kāryaṃ tat kurudhvaṃ yathāsvam; iṣṭān dārān ātmajāṃś copabhuṅkta
GE07mbh_05_u:047.092a: apy evaṃ no brāhmaṇāḥ santi vṛddhā; bahuśrutāḥ śīlavantaḥ kulīnāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:047.092c: sāṃvatsarā jyotiṣi cāpi yuktā; nakṣatrayogeṣu ca niścayajñāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:047.093a: uccāvacaṃ daivayuktaṃ rahasyaṃ; divyāḥ praśnā mṛgacakrā muhūrtāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:047.093c: kṣayaṃ mahāntaṃ kurusṛñjayānāṃ; nivedayante pāṇḍavānāṃ jayaṃ ca
GE07mbh_05_u:047.094a: tathā hi no manyate 'jātaśatruḥ; saṃsiddhārtho dviṣatāṃ nigrahāya
GE07mbh_05_u:047.094c: janārdanaś cāpy aparokṣavidyo; na saṃśayaṃ paśyati vṛṣṇisiṃhaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:047.095a: ahaṃ ca jānāmi bhaviṣyarūpaṃ; paśyāmi buddhyā svayam apramattaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:047.095c: dṛṣṭiś ca me na vyathate purāṇī; yudhyamānā dhārtarāṣṭrā na santi
GE07mbh_05_u:047.096a: anālabdhaṃ jṛmbhati gāṇḍivaṃ dhanur; anālabdhā kampati me dhanurjyā
GE07mbh_05_u:047.096c: bāṇāś ca me tūṇamukhād visṛjya; muhur muhur gantum uśanti caiva
GE07mbh_05_u:047.097a: saikyaḥ kośān niḥsarati prasanno; hitveva jīrṇām uragas tvacaṃ svām
GE07mbh_05_u:047.097c: dhvaje vāco raudrarūpā vadanti; kadā ratho yokṣyate te kirīṭin
GE07mbh_05_u:047.098a: gomāyusaṃghāś ca vadanti rātrau; rakṣāṃsy atho niṣpatanty antarikṣāt
GE07mbh_05_u:047.098c: mṛgāḥ śṛgālāḥ śitikaṇṭhāś ca kākā; gṛdhrā baḍāś caiva tarakṣavaś ca
GE07mbh_05_u:047.099a: suparṇapātāś ca patanti paścād; dṛṣṭvā rathaṃ śvetahayaprayuktam
GE07mbh_05_u:047.099c: ahaṃ hy ekaḥ pārthivān sarvayodhāñ; śarān varṣan mṛtyulokaṃ nayeyam
GE07mbh_05_u:047.100a: samādadānaḥ pṛthag astramārgān; yathāgnir iddho gahanaṃ nidāghe
GE07mbh_05_u:047.100c: sthūṇākarṇaṃ pāśupataṃ ca ghoraṃ; tathā brahmāstraṃ yac ca śakro viveda
GE07mbh_05_u:047.101a: vadhe dhṛto vegavataḥ pramuñcan; nāhaṃ prajāḥ kiṃ cid ivāvaśiṣye
GE07mbh_05_u:047.101c: śāntiṃ lapsye paramo hy eṣa bhāvaḥ; sthiro mama brūhi gāvalgaṇe tān
GE07mbh_05_u:047.102a: nityaṃ punaḥ sacivair yair avocad; devān apīndrapramukhān
GE07mbh_05_u:047.102c: tair manyate kalahaṃ saṃprayujya; sa dhārtarāṣṭraḥ paśyata moham asya
GE07mbh_05_u:047.103a: vṛddho bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavaḥ kṛpaś ca; droṇaḥ saputro viduraś ca dhīmān
GE07mbh_05_u:047.103c: ete sarve yad vadante tad astu; āyuṣmantaḥ kuravaḥ santu sarve
GE07mbh_05_u:048.002c: marutaś ca sahendreṇa vasavaś ca sahāśvinau
GE07mbh_05_u:048.003a: ādityāś caiva sādhyāś ca ye ca saptarṣayo divi
GE07mbh_05_u:048.003c: viśvāvasuś ca gandharvaḥ śubhāś cāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:048.005a: teṣāṃ manaś ca tejaś cāpy ādadānau divaukasām
GE07mbh_05_u:048.006a: bṛhaspatiś ca papraccha brāhmaṇaṃ kāv imāv iti
GE07mbh_05_u:048.006c: bhavantaṃ nopatiṣṭhete tau naḥ śaṃsa pitāmaha brahmovāca
GE07mbh_05_u:048.007a: yāv etau pṛthivīṃ dyāṃ ca bhāsayantau tapasvinau
GE07mbh_05_u:048.009a: etau hi karmaṇā lokān nandayām āsatur dhruvau
GE07mbh_05_u:048.010a: jagāma śakras tac chrutvā yatra tau tepatus tapaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:048.011a: tadā devāsure ghore bhaye jāte divaukasām
GE07mbh_05_u:048.012c: athaitāv abravīc chakraḥ sāhyaṃ naḥ kriyatām iti
GE07mbh_05_u:048.013a: tatas tau śakram abrūtāṃ kariṣyāvo yad icchasi
GE07mbh_05_u:048.013c: tābhyāṃ ca sahitaḥ śakro vijigye daityadānavān
GE07mbh_05_u:048.014a: nara indrasya saṃgrāme hatvā śatrūn paraṃtapaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:048.014c: paulomān kālakhañjāṃś ca sahasrāṇi śatāni ca
GE07mbh_05_u:048.015a: eṣa bhrānte rathe tiṣṭhan bhallenāpaharac chiraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:048.018a: evam etau mahāvīryau tau paśyata samāgatau
GE07mbh_05_u:048.019c: ajeyau mānuṣe loke sendrair api surāsuraiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:048.020a: eṣa nārāyaṇaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ phalgunas tu naraḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:048.020c: nārāyaṇo naraś caiva sattvam ekaṃ dvidhākṛtam
GE07mbh_05_u:048.021a: etau hi karmaṇā lokān aśnuvāte 'kṣayān dhruvān
GE07mbh_05_u:048.021c: tatra tatraiva jāyete yuddhakāle punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:048.021d-0318_01: tasmād etau mahābhāgau prapadya śaraṇaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_05_u:048.022a: tasmāt karmaiva kartavyam iti hovāca nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:048.022c: etad dhi sarvam ācaṣṭa vṛṣṇicakrasya vedavit
GE07mbh_05_u:048.024c: duryodhana tadā tāta smartāsi vacanaṃ mama
GE07mbh_05_u:048.025a: no ced ayam abhāvaḥ syāt kurūṇāṃ pratyupasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:048.025c: arthāc ca tāta dharmāc ca tava buddhir upaplutā
GE07mbh_05_u:048.026a: na ced grahīṣyase vākyaṃ śrotāsi subahūn hatān
GE07mbh_05_u:048.026c: tavaiva hi mataṃ sarve kuravaḥ paryupāsate
GE07mbh_05_u:048.027a: trayāṇām eva ca mataṃ tattvam eko 'numanyase
GE07mbh_05_u:048.028c: tathā kṣudrasya pāpasya bhrātur duḥśāsanasya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:048.029a: naivam āyuṣmatā vācyaṃ yan mām āttha pitāmaha
GE07mbh_05_u:048.029c: kṣatradharme sthito hy asmi svadharmād anapeyivān
GE07mbh_05_u:048.030a: kiṃ cānyan mayi durvṛttaṃ yena māṃ parigarhase
GE07mbh_05_u:048.030c: na hi me vṛjinaṃ kiṃ cid dhārtarāṣṭrā viduḥ kva cit
GE07mbh_05_u:048.030d-0319_01: kāmāl lobhāc ca kāruṇyāt snehāc ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:048.030d-0320_01: nācaraṃ vṛjinaṃ kiṃ cid dhārtarāṣṭrasya nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:048.030d-0320_02: ahaṃ hi pāṇḍavān sarvān haniṣyāmi raṇe sthitān
GE07mbh_05_u:048.030d-0320_03: prāg viruddhaiḥ śamaṃ sadbhiḥ kathaṃ vā kriyate punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:048.031a: rājño hi dhṛtarāṣṭrasya sarvaṃ kāryaṃ priyaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_05_u:048.031c: tathā duryodhanasyāpi sa hi rājye samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:048.032a: karṇasya tu vacaḥ śrutvā bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:048.033a: yad ayaṃ katthate nityaṃ hantāhaṃ pāṇḍavān iti
GE07mbh_05_u:048.033d-0321_01: teṣām ekakalāṃ pūrṇāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ na cārhati
GE07mbh_05_u:048.034a: anayo yo 'yam āgantā putrāṇāṃ te durātmanām
GE07mbh_05_u:048.034c: tad asya karma jānīhi sūtaputrasya durmateḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:048.035a: enam āśritya putras te mandabuddhiḥ suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:048.036a: kiṃ cāpy anena tat karma kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ suduṣkaram
GE07mbh_05_u:048.036c: tair yathā pāṇḍavaiḥ sarvair ekaikena kṛtaṃ purā
GE07mbh_05_u:048.037c: dhanaṃjayena vikramya kim anena tadā kṛtam
GE07mbh_05_u:048.037d-0322_01: sarve hy astravidaḥ śūrāḥ sarve prāptā mahad yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:048.037d-0322_02: api sarvāmaraiśvaryaṃ tyajeyur na punar jayam
GE07mbh_05_u:048.038a: sahitān hi kurūn sarvān abhiyāto dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:048.038c: pramathya cācchinad gāvaḥ kim ayaṃ proṣitas tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:048.039a: gandharvair ghoṣayātrāyāṃ hriyate yat sutas tava
GE07mbh_05_u:048.039c: kva tadā sūtaputro 'bhūd ya idānīṃ vṛṣāyate
GE07mbh_05_u:048.040a: nanu tatrāpi pārthena bhīmena ca mahātmanā
GE07mbh_05_u:048.040c: yamābhyām eva cāgamya gandharvās te parājitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:048.042a: bhīṣmasya tu vacaḥ śrutvā bhāradvājo mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:048.043a: yad āha bharataśreṣṭho bhīṣmas tat kriyatāṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_05_u:048.043c: na kāmam arthalipsūnāṃ vacanaṃ kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_05_u:048.044a: purā yuddhāt sādhu manye pāṇḍavaiḥ saha saṃgamam
GE07mbh_05_u:048.044b-0323_01: ajeyāḥ pāṇḍavā rājan sendrair api surāsuraiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:048.045a: sarvaṃ tad abhijānāmi kariṣyati ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:048.045c: na hy asya triṣu lokeṣu sadṛśo 'sti dhanurdharaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:048.046a: anādṛtya tu tad vākyam arthavad droṇabhīṣmayoḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:048.046c: tataḥ sa saṃjayaṃ rājā paryapṛcchata pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_05_u:048.047c: bhīṣmadroṇau yadā rājā na samyag anubhāṣate
GE07mbh_05_u:049.002c: kasya svid bhrātṛputrāṇāṃ cintāsu mukham īkṣate
GE07mbh_05_u:049.003a: ke svid enaṃ vārayanti śāmya yudhyeti vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:049.004a: rājño mukham udīkṣante pāñcālāḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_05_u:049.004c: yudhiṣṭhirasya bhadraṃ te sa sarvān anuśāsti ca
GE07mbh_05_u:049.008a: brāhmaṇyo rājaputryaś ca viśāṃ duhitaraś ca yāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:049.010a: gāvalgaṇis tu tat pṛṣṭaḥ sabhāyāṃ kurusaṃsadi
GE07mbh_05_u:049.010c: niḥśvasya subhṛśaṃ dīrghaṃ muhuḥ saṃcintayann iva
GE07mbh_05_u:049.011e: vācaṃ na sṛjate kāṃ cid dhīnaprajño 'lpacetanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:049.012c: tair asya puruṣavyāghrair bhṛśam udvejitaṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:049.014e: śṛṇu yair hi mahārāja pāṇḍavā abhyayuñjata
GE07mbh_05_u:049.015a: yo naiva roṣān na bhayān na kāmān nārthakāraṇāt
GE07mbh_05_u:049.015c: na hetuvādād dharmātmā satyaṃ jahyāt kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:049.016a: yaḥ pramāṇaṃ mahārāja dharme dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:049.017a: yasya bāhubale tulyaḥ pṛthivyāṃ nāsti kaś cana
GE07mbh_05_u:049.017c: yo vai sarvān mahīpālān vaśe cakre dhanurdharaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:049.018c: ya eṣām abhavad dvīpaḥ kuntīputro vṛkodaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:049.020a: yaś ca tān saṃgatān sarvān pāṇḍavān vāraṇāvate
GE07mbh_05_u:049.020c: dahyato mocayām āsa tena vas te 'bhyayuñjata
GE07mbh_05_u:049.021a: kṛṣṇāyāś caratā prītiṃ yena krodhavaśā hatāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:049.022a: yasya nāgāyutaṃ vīryaṃ bhujayoḥ sāram arpitam
GE07mbh_05_u:049.023c: ajayad yaḥ purā vīro yudhyamānaṃ puraṃdaram
GE07mbh_05_u:049.024a: yaḥ sa sākṣān mahādevaṃ giriśaṃ śūlapāṇinam
GE07mbh_05_u:049.025a: yaś ca sarvān vaśe cakre lokapālān dhanurdharaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:049.026a: yaḥ pratīcīṃ diśaṃ cakre vaśe mlecchagaṇāyutām
GE07mbh_05_u:049.026c: sa tatra nakulo yoddhā citrayodhī vyavasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:049.028a: yaḥ kāśīn aṅgamagadhān kaliṅgāṃś ca yudhājayat
GE07mbh_05_u:049.029a: yasya vīryeṇa sadṛśāś catvāro bhuvi mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:049.029c: aśvatthāmā dhṛṣṭaketuḥ pradyumno rukmir eva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:049.031a: tapaś cacāra yā ghoraṃ kāśikanyā purā satī
GE07mbh_05_u:049.032a: pāñcālasya sutā jajñe daivāc ca sa punaḥ pumān
GE07mbh_05_u:049.032c: strīpuṃsoḥ puruṣavyāghra yaḥ sa veda guṇāguṇān
GE07mbh_05_u:049.034a: yāṃ yakṣaḥ puruṣaṃ cakre bhīṣmasya nidhane kila
GE07mbh_05_u:049.035c: sumṛṣṭakavacāḥ śūrās taiś ca vas te 'bhyayuñjata
GE07mbh_05_u:049.037a: ya āsīc charaṇaṃ kāle pāṇḍavānāṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_05_u:049.038a: yaḥ sa kāśipatī rājā vārāṇasyāṃ mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:049.038c: sa teṣām abhavad yoddhā tena vas te 'bhyayuñjata
GE07mbh_05_u:049.042a: yaḥ saṃśrayaḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ devānām iva vāsavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:049.044a: jārāsaṃdhiḥ sahadevo jayatsenaś ca tāv ubhau
GE07mbh_05_u:049.044c: drupadaś ca mahātejā balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:049.045a: ete cānye ca bahavaḥ prācyodīcyā mahīkṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:050.001a: sarva ete mahotsāhā ye tvayā parikīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:050.001c: ekatas tv eva te sarve sametā bhīma ekataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:050.002a: bhīmasenād dhi me bhūyo bhayaṃ saṃjāyate mahat
GE07mbh_05_u:050.002c: kruddhād amarṣaṇāt tāta vyāghrād iva mahāruroḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:050.003a: jāgarmi rātrayaḥ sarvā dīrgham uṣṇaṃ ca niḥśvasan
GE07mbh_05_u:050.003c: bhīto vṛkodarāt tāta siṃhāt paśur ivābalaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:050.004c: sainye 'smin pratipaśyāmi ya enaṃ viṣahed yudhi
GE07mbh_05_u:050.005a: amarṣaṇaś ca kaunteyo dṛḍhavairaś ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:050.009a: yathā rurūṇāṃ yūtheṣu siṃho jātabalaś caret
GE07mbh_05_u:050.010a: sarveṣāṃ mama putrāṇāṃ sa ekaḥ krūravikramaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:050.010c: bahvāśī vipratīpaś ca bālye 'pi rabhasaḥ sadā
GE07mbh_05_u:050.012a: tasya vīryeṇa saṃkliṣṭā nityam eva sutā mama
GE07mbh_05_u:050.012b-0329_01: sa vai bhīmo mahāvīryaḥ kruddhaḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:050.012c: sa eva hetur bhedasya bhīmo bhīmaparākramaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:050.014b-0330_01: maheśvarasamaṃ krodhe ko hanyād bhīmam āhave
GE07mbh_05_u:050.015a: atilābhaṃ tu manye 'haṃ yat tena ripughātinā
GE07mbh_05_u:050.015c: tadaiva na hatāḥ sarve mama putrā manasvinā
GE07mbh_05_u:050.016a: yena bhīmabalā yakṣā rākṣasāś ca samāhatāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:050.016c: kathaṃ tasya raṇe vegaṃ mānuṣaḥ prasahiṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:050.017a: na sa jātu vaśe tasthau mama bālo 'pi saṃjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:050.017c: kiṃ punar mama duṣputraiḥ kliṣṭaḥ saṃprati pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:050.018a: niṣṭhuraḥ sa ca naiṣṭhuryād bhajyed api na saṃnamet
GE07mbh_05_u:050.021a: iti bālye śrutaḥ pūrvaṃ mayā vyāsamukhāt purā
GE07mbh_05_u:050.022a: āyasena sa daṇḍena rathān nāgān hayān narān
GE07mbh_05_u:050.022c: haniṣyati raṇe kruddho bhīmaḥ praharatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:050.023c: mama tāta pratīpāni kurvan pūrvaṃ vimānitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:050.024a: niṣkīrṇām āyasīṃ sthūlāṃ suparvāṃ kāñcanīṃ gadām
GE07mbh_05_u:050.024c: śataghnīṃ śatanirhrādāṃ kathaṃ śakṣyanti me sutāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:050.026a: krośato me na śṛṇvanti bālāḥ paṇḍitamāninaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:050.028c: prahitāṃ duḥkhasaṃsparśāṃ kathaṃ śakṣyanti me sutāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:050.030a: uddiśya pātān patataḥ kurvato bhairavān ravān
GE07mbh_05_u:050.031c: agneḥ prajvalitasyeva api mucyeta me prajā
GE07mbh_05_u:050.032a: vīthīṃ kurvan mahābāhur drāvayan mama vāhinīm
GE07mbh_05_u:050.033a: prabhinna iva mātaṅgaḥ prabhañjan puṣpitān drumān
GE07mbh_05_u:050.033c: pravekṣyati raṇe senāṃ putrāṇāṃ me vṛkodaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:050.036c: mama putrāś ca bhṛtyāś ca rājānaś caiva saṃjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:050.039c: te na tasya vaśaṃ jagmuḥ kevalaṃ daivam eva vā
GE07mbh_05_u:050.041c: sa mokṣyati raṇe tejaḥ putreṣu mama saṃjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:050.044c: bāhubhyāṃ yudhyamānasya kas tiṣṭhed agrataḥ pumān
GE07mbh_05_u:050.045a: bhīṣmo droṇaś ca vipro 'yaṃ kṛpaḥ śāradvatas tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:050.045c: jānanty ete yathaivāhaṃ vīryajñas tasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:050.046a: āryavrataṃ tu jānantaḥ saṃgarān na bibhitsavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:050.047c: paśyann api jayaṃ teṣāṃ na niyacchāmi yat sutān
GE07mbh_05_u:050.048a: te purāṇaṃ maheṣvāsā mārgam aindraṃ samāsthitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:050.048c: tyakṣyanti tumule prāṇān rakṣantaḥ pārthivaṃ yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:050.049a: yathaiṣāṃ māmakās tāta tathaiṣāṃ pāṇḍavā api
GE07mbh_05_u:050.049c: pautrā bhīṣmasya śiṣyāś ca droṇasya ca kṛpasya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:050.050a: yat tv asmad āśrayaṃ kiṃ cid dattam iṣṭaṃ ca saṃjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:050.052a: sa vai śocāmi sarvān vai ye yuyutsanti pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_05_u:050.052c: vikruṣṭaṃ vidureṇādau tad etad bhayam āgatam
GE07mbh_05_u:050.053a: na tu manye vighātāya jñānaṃ duḥkhasya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:050.053c: bhavaty atibale hy etaj jñānam apy upaghātakam
GE07mbh_05_u:050.054a: ṛṣayo hy api nirmuktāḥ paśyanto lokasaṃgrahān
GE07mbh_05_u:050.054c: sukhe bhavanti sukhinas tathā duḥkhena duḥkhitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:050.055a: kiṃ punar yo 'ham āsaktas tatra tatra sahasradhā
GE07mbh_05_u:050.055c: putreṣu rājyadāreṣu pautreṣv api ca bandhuṣu
GE07mbh_05_u:050.056a: saṃśaye tu mahaty asmin kiṃ nu me kṣamam uttamam
GE07mbh_05_u:050.056c: vināśaṃ hy eva paśyāmi kurūṇām anucintayan
GE07mbh_05_u:050.058c: cakre pradhir ivāsakto nāsya śakyaṃ palāyitum
GE07mbh_05_u:050.059a: kiṃ nu kāryaṃ kathaṃ kuryāṃ kva nu gacchāmi saṃjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:050.059c: ete naśyanti kuravo mandāḥ kālavaśaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:050.060a: avaśo 'haṃ purā tāta putrāṇāṃ nihate śate
GE07mbh_05_u:050.060c: śroṣyāmi ninadaṃ strīṇāṃ kathaṃ māṃ maraṇaṃ spṛśet
GE07mbh_05_u:050.061a: yathā nidāghe jvalanaḥ samiddho; dahet kakṣaṃ vāyunā codyamānaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:050.061c: gadāhastaḥ pāṇḍavas tadvad eva; hantā madīyān sahito 'rjunena
GE07mbh_05_u:051.001a: yasya vai nānṛtā vācaḥ pravṛttā anuśuśrumaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:051.001c: trailokyam api tasya syād yoddhā yasya dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:051.002a: tasyaiva ca na paśyāmi yudhi gāṇḍīvadhanvanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:051.002c: aniśaṃ cintayāno 'pi yaḥ pratīyād rathena tam
GE07mbh_05_u:051.003c: pratyetā na samaḥ kaś cid yudhi gāṇḍīvadhanvanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:051.004c: māhātmyāt saṃśayo loke na tv asti vijayo mama
GE07mbh_05_u:051.005a: ghṛṇī karṇaḥ pramādī ca ācāryaḥ sthaviro guruḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:051.006a: sarve hy astravidaḥ śūrāḥ sarve prāptā mahad yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:051.006c: api sarvāmaraiśvaryaṃ tyajeyur na punar jayam
GE07mbh_05_u:051.006e: vadhe nūnaṃ bhavec chāntis tayor vā phalgunasya vā
GE07mbh_05_u:051.007a: na tu jetārjunasyāsti hantā cāsya na vidyate
GE07mbh_05_u:051.007c: manyus tasya kathaṃ śāmyen mandān prati ya utthitaḥ
