GE07mbh_05_u:051.008a: anye 'py astrāṇi jānanti jīyante ca jayanti ca
GE07mbh_05_u:051.008c: ekāntavijayas tv eva śrūyate phalgunasya ha
GE07mbh_05_u:051.009c: jigāya ca surān sarvān nāsya vedmi parājayam
GE07mbh_05_u:051.010c: dhruvas tasya jayas tāta yathendrasya jayas tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:051.011a: kṛṣṇāv ekarathe yattāv adhijyaṃ gāṇḍivaṃ dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:051.012a: naiva no 'sti dhanus tādṛṅ na yoddhā na ca sārathiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:051.012c: tac ca mandā na jānanti duryodhanavaśānugāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:051.013a: śeṣayed aśanir dīpto nipatan mūrdhni saṃjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:051.013c: na tu śeṣaṃ śarāḥ kuryur astās tāta kirīṭinā
GE07mbh_05_u:051.014a: api cāsyann ivābhāti nighnann iva ca phalgunaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:051.015a: api bāṇamayaṃ tejaḥ pradīptam iva sarvataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:051.016c: vitrastā bahulā senā bhāratī pratibhāti me
GE07mbh_05_u:051.017a: yathā kakṣaṃ dahaty agniḥ pravṛddhaḥ sarvataś caran
GE07mbh_05_u:051.018a: yadodvaman niśitān bāṇasaṃghān; sthātātatāyī samare kirīṭī
GE07mbh_05_u:051.018c: sṛṣṭo 'ntakaḥ sarvaharo vidhātrā; yathā bhavet tadvad avāraṇīyaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:051.019a: yadā hy abhīkṣṇaṃ subahūn prakārāñ; śrotāsmi tān āvasathe kurūṇām
GE07mbh_05_u:051.019c: teṣāṃ samantāc ca tathā raṇāgre; kṣayaḥ kilāyaṃ bharatān upaiti
GE07mbh_05_u:052.002a: tvam eva hi parākrāntān ācakṣīthāḥ parān mama
GE07mbh_05_u:052.003a: yaś ca sendrān imāṃl lokān icchan kuryād vaśe balī
GE07mbh_05_u:052.003c: sa śreṣṭho jagataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ jaye dhṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:052.004a: samastām arjunād vidyāṃ sātyakiḥ kṣipram āptavān
GE07mbh_05_u:052.004c: śaineyaḥ samare sthātā bījavat pravapañ śarān
GE07mbh_05_u:052.006a: yudhiṣṭhirasya ca krodhād arjunasya ca vikramāt
GE07mbh_05_u:052.006c: yamābhyāṃ bhīmasenāc ca bhayaṃ me tāta jāyate
GE07mbh_05_u:052.007c: mama senāṃ haniṣyanti tataḥ krośāmi saṃjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:052.010a: dhṛtyā ca puruṣavyāghro naibhṛtyena ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:052.012a: tapantam iva ko mandaḥ patiṣyati pataṃgavat
GE07mbh_05_u:052.014a: tair ayuddhaṃ sādhu manye kuravas tan nibodhata
GE07mbh_05_u:052.014c: yuddhe vināśaḥ kṛtsnasya kulasya bhavitā dhruvam
GE07mbh_05_u:052.015a: eṣā me paramā śāntir yayā śāmyati me manaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:052.015c: yadi tv ayuddham iṣṭaṃ vo vayaṃ śāntyai yatāmahe
GE07mbh_05_u:052.016a: na tu naḥ śikṣamāṇānām upekṣeta yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:052.016c: jugupsati hy adharmeṇa mām evoddiśya kāraṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:053.001a: evam etan mahārāja yathā vadasi bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:053.002a: idaṃ tu nābhijānāmi tava dhīrasya nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:053.003a: naiṣa kālo mahārāja tava śaśvat kṛtāgasaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:053.003c: tvayā hy evāditaḥ pārthā nikṛtā bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:053.003d-0333_01: svīkṛtās tair janapadāḥ kuravas te sajāṅgalāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:053.003d-0333_02: kathaṃ vīraur jitāṃ bhūmim akhilāṃ pratipadyathāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:053.004a: pitā śreṣṭhaḥ suhṛd yaś ca samyak praṇihitātmavān
GE07mbh_05_u:053.004c: āstheyaṃ hi hitaṃ tena na drogdhā gurur ucyate
GE07mbh_05_u:053.005a: idaṃ jitam idaṃ labdham iti śrutvā parājitān
GE07mbh_05_u:053.006a: paruṣāṇy ucyamānān sma purā pārthān upekṣase
GE07mbh_05_u:053.007a: pitryaṃ rājyaṃ mahārāja kuravas te sajāṅgalāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:053.007c: atha vīrair jitāṃ bhūmim akhilāṃ pratyapadyathāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:053.008c: mayedaṃ kṛtam ity eva manyase rājasattama
GE07mbh_05_u:053.009c: ānināya punaḥ pārthaḥ putrāṃs te rājasattama
GE07mbh_05_u:053.010a: kumāravac ca smayase dyūte vinikṛteṣu yat
GE07mbh_05_u:053.010c: pāṇḍaveṣu vanaṃ rājan pravrajatsu punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:053.011c: apy arṇavā viśuṣyeyuḥ kiṃ punar māṃsayonayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:053.012a: asyatāṃ phalgunaḥ śreṣṭho gāṇḍīvaṃ dhanuṣāṃ varam
GE07mbh_05_u:053.013a: vānaro rocamānaś ca ketuḥ ketumatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:053.013c: evam etāni saratho vahañ śvetahayo raṇe
GE07mbh_05_u:053.014c: yasya bhīmārjunau yodhau sa rājā rājasattama
GE07mbh_05_u:053.016a: na hi bhīmabhayād bhītā lapsyante vijayaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_05_u:053.017a: matsyās tvām adya nārcanti pāñcālāś ca sakekayāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:053.017c: śālveyāḥ śūrasenāś ca sarve tvām avajānate
GE07mbh_05_u:053.017e: pārthaṃ hy ete gatāḥ sarve vīryajñās tasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:053.017f-0335_01: bhaktyā hy asya virudhyante tava putraiḥ sadaiva te
GE07mbh_05_u:053.018a: anarhān eva tu vadhe dharmayuktān vikarmaṇā
GE07mbh_05_u:053.018b-0336_01: yo 'kleśayat pāṇḍuputrān yo vidveṣṭy adhunāpi vai
GE07mbh_05_u:053.018d-0337_01: aparokṣaṃ mahārāja sākṣāc cainaṃ bravīmy aham
GE07mbh_05_u:053.018e: tava putro mahārāja nātra śocitum arhasi
GE07mbh_05_u:053.019a: dyūtakāle mayā coktaṃ vidureṇa ca dhīmatā
GE07mbh_05_u:053.019c: yad idaṃ te vilapitaṃ pāṇḍavān prati bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:054.001a: na bhetavyaṃ mahārāja na śocyā bhavatā vayam
GE07mbh_05_u:054.001c: samarthāḥ sma parān rājan vijetuṃ samare vibho
GE07mbh_05_u:054.002a: vanaṃ pravrājitān pārthān yad āyān madhusūdanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:054.003a: kekayā dhṛṣṭaketuś ca dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca pārṣataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:054.004c: vyagarhayaṃś ca saṃgamya bhavantaṃ kurubhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_05_u:054.006a: pratyādānaṃ ca rājyasya kāryam ūcur narādhipāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:054.007a: śrutvā caitan mayoktās tu bhīṣmadroṇakṛpās tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:054.008a: na te sthāsyanti samaye pāṇḍavā iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:054.008c: samucchedaṃ hi naḥ kṛtsnaṃ vāsudevaś cikīrṣati
GE07mbh_05_u:054.009a: ṛte ca viduraṃ sarve yūyaṃ vadhyā mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:054.009c: dhṛtarāṣṭraś ca dharmajño na vadhyaḥ kurusattamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:054.010a: samucchedaṃ ca kṛtsnaṃ naḥ kṛtvā tāta janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:054.011a: tatra kiṃ prāptakālaṃ naḥ praṇipātaḥ palāyanam
GE07mbh_05_u:054.012a: pratiyuddhe tu niyataḥ syād asmākaṃ parājayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:054.013a: viraktarāṣṭrāś ca vayaṃ mitrāṇi kupitāni naḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:054.013c: dhikkṛtāḥ pārthivaiḥ sarvaiḥ svajanena ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:054.014a: praṇipāte tu doṣo 'sti bandhūnāṃ śāśvatīḥ samāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:054.014c: pitaraṃ tv eva śocāmi prajñānetraṃ janeśvaram
GE07mbh_05_u:054.014e: matkṛte duḥkham āpannaṃ kleśaṃ prāptam anantakam
GE07mbh_05_u:054.015a: kṛtaṃ hi tava putraiś ca pareṣām avarodhanam
GE07mbh_05_u:054.017a: tato droṇo 'bravīd bhīṣmaḥ kṛpo drauṇiś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:054.017c: matvā māṃ mahatīṃ cintām āsthitaṃ vyathitendriyam
GE07mbh_05_u:054.018a: abhidrugdhāḥ pare cen no na bhetavyaṃ paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_05_u:054.018c: asamarthāḥ pare jetum asmān yudhi janeśvara
GE07mbh_05_u:054.019c: āgacchantu vineṣyāmo darpam eṣāṃ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:054.021c: tatas te śaraṇaṃ jagmur devavratam imaṃ bhayāt
GE07mbh_05_u:054.022a: sa bhīṣmaḥ susamartho 'yam asmābhiḥ sahito raṇe
GE07mbh_05_u:054.022c: parān vijetuṃ tasmāt te vyetu bhīr bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:054.022e: ity eṣāṃ niścayo hy āsīt tatkālam amitaujasām
GE07mbh_05_u:054.023c: asmān punar amī nādya samarthā jetum āhave
GE07mbh_05_u:054.023e: chinnapakṣāḥ pare hy adya vīryahīnāś ca pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:054.025a: apy agniṃ praviśeyus te samudraṃ vā paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_05_u:054.025c: madarthe pārthivāḥ sarve tad viddhi kurusattama
GE07mbh_05_u:054.026a: unmattam iva cāpi tvāṃ prahasantīha duḥkhitam
GE07mbh_05_u:054.027a: eṣāṃ hy ekaikaśo rājñāṃ samarthaḥ pāṇḍavān prati
GE07mbh_05_u:054.027c: ātmānaṃ manyate sarvo vyetu te bhayam āgatam
GE07mbh_05_u:054.028a: sarvāṃ samagrāṃ senāṃ me vāsavo 'pi na śaknuyāt
GE07mbh_05_u:054.029a: yudhiṣṭhiraḥ puraṃ hitvā pañca grāmān sa yācati
GE07mbh_05_u:054.029c: bhīto hi māmakāt sainyāt prabhāvāc caiva me prabho
GE07mbh_05_u:054.030a: samarthaṃ manyase yac ca kuntīputraṃ vṛkodaram
GE07mbh_05_u:054.030c: tan mithyā na hi me kṛtsnaṃ prabhāvaṃ vettha bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:054.031a: matsamo hi gadāyuddhe pṛthivyāṃ nāsti kaś cana
GE07mbh_05_u:054.031c: nāsīt kaś cid atikrānto bhavitā na ca kaś cana
GE07mbh_05_u:054.032c: tasmān na bhīmān nānyebhyo bhayaṃ me vidyate kva cit
GE07mbh_05_u:054.033c: saṃkarṣaṇasya bhadraṃ te yat tadainam upāvasam
GE07mbh_05_u:054.034c: gadāprahāraṃ bhīmo me na jātu viṣahed yudhi
GE07mbh_05_u:054.035a: ekaṃ prahāraṃ yaṃ dadyāṃ bhīmāya ruṣito nṛpa
GE07mbh_05_u:054.035c: sa evainaṃ nayed ghoraṃ kṣipraṃ vaivasvatakṣayam
GE07mbh_05_u:054.036a: iccheyaṃ ca gadāhastaṃ rājan draṣṭuṃ vṛkodaram
GE07mbh_05_u:054.036c: suciraṃ prārthito hy eṣa mama nityaṃ manorathaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:054.037a: gadayā nihato hy ājau mama pārtho vṛkodaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:054.039a: sa cāpy etad vijānāti vāsudevārjunau tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:054.040a: tat te vṛkodaramayaṃ bhayaṃ vyetu mahāhave
GE07mbh_05_u:054.040c: vyapaneṣyāmy ahaṃ hy enaṃ mā rājan vimanā bhava
GE07mbh_05_u:054.041a: tasmin mayā hate kṣipram arjunaṃ bahavo rathāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:054.042a: bhīṣmo droṇaḥ kṛpo drauṇiḥ karṇo bhūriśravās tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:054.043a: ekaika eṣāṃ śaktas tu hantuṃ bhārata pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_05_u:054.044a: samagrā pārthivī senā pārtham ekaṃ dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_05_u:054.044c: kasmād aśaktā nirjetum iti hetur na vidyate
GE07mbh_05_u:054.046a: pitāmaho hi gāṅgeyaḥ śaṃtanor adhi bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:054.046d-0338_01: na hantā vidyate cāpi rājan bhīṣmasya kaś cana
GE07mbh_05_u:054.046e: pitrā hy uktaḥ prasannena nākāmas tvaṃ mariṣyasi
GE07mbh_05_u:054.047a: brahmarṣeś ca bharadvājād droṇyāṃ droṇo vyajāyata
GE07mbh_05_u:054.047c: droṇāj jajñe mahārāja drauṇiś ca paramāstravit
GE07mbh_05_u:054.048c: śarastambodbhavaḥ śrīmān avadhya iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:054.049a: ayonijaṃ trayaṃ hy etat pitā mātā ca mātulaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:054.049c: aśvatthāmno mahārāja sa ca śūraḥ sthito mama
GE07mbh_05_u:054.050d-0339_01: naiteṣām arjunaḥ śakta ekaikaṃ prati vīkṣitum
GE07mbh_05_u:054.051a: bhīṣmadroṇakṛpāṇāṃ ca tulyaḥ karṇo mato mama
GE07mbh_05_u:054.052a: kuṇḍale rucire cāstāṃ karṇasya sahaje śubhe
GE07mbh_05_u:054.052c: te śacyarthe mahendreṇa yācitaḥ sa paraṃtapaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:054.053c: vijayo me dhruvaṃ rājan phalaṃ pāṇāv ivāhitam
GE07mbh_05_u:054.053e: abhivyaktaḥ pareṣāṃ ca kṛtsno bhuvi parājayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:054.054a: ahnā hy ekena bhīṣmo 'yam ayutaṃ hanti bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:054.054c: tat samāś ca maheṣvāsā droṇadrauṇikṛpā api
GE07mbh_05_u:054.055c: arjunaṃ vayam asmān vā dhanaṃjaya iti sma ha
GE07mbh_05_u:054.056a: tāṃś cālam iti manyante savyasācivadhe vibho
GE07mbh_05_u:054.056c: pārthivāḥ sa bhavān rājann akasmād vyathate katham
GE07mbh_05_u:054.057a: bhīmasene ca nihate ko 'nyo yudhyeta bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:054.057c: pareṣāṃ tan mamācakṣva yadi vettha paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_05_u:054.057d-0340_01: pāñcāleṣu ca bhagneṣu ko 'nyaḥ sthātum ihārhati
GE07mbh_05_u:054.058a: pañca te bhrātaraḥ sarve dhṛṣṭadyumno 'tha sātyakiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:054.058c: pareṣāṃ sapta ye rājan yodhāḥ paramakaṃ balam
GE07mbh_05_u:054.060c: duḥśāsano durmukhaś ca duḥsahaś ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_05_u:054.061c: śalo bhūriśravāś cobhau vikarṇaś ca tavātmajaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:054.062a: akṣauhiṇyo hi me rājan daśaikā ca samāhṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:054.062c: nyūnāḥ pareṣāṃ saptaiva kasmān me syāt parājayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:054.063a: balaṃ triguṇato hīnaṃ yodhyaṃ prāha bṛhaspatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:054.063c: parebhyas triguṇā ceyaṃ mama rājann anīkinī
GE07mbh_05_u:054.064a: guṇahīnaṃ pareṣāṃ ca bahu paśyāmi bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:054.064c: guṇodayaṃ bahuguṇam ātmanaś ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_05_u:054.065a: etat sarvaṃ samājñāya balāgryaṃ mama bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:054.065c: nyūnatāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ ca na mohaṃ gantum arhasi
GE07mbh_05_u:054.066a: ity uktvā saṃjayaṃ bhūyaḥ paryapṛcchata bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:055.001a: akṣauhiṇīḥ sapta labdhvā rājabhiḥ saha saṃjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:055.001c: kiṃ svid icchati kaunteyo yuddhaprepsur yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:055.002c: bhīmasenārjunau cobhau yamāv api na bibhyataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:055.003a: rathaṃ tu divyaṃ kaunteyaḥ sarvā vibhrājayan diśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:055.004a: tam apaśyāma saṃnaddhaṃ meghaṃ vidyutprabhaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_05_u:055.005a: pūrvarūpam idaṃ paśya vayaṃ jeṣyāma saṃjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:055.005c: bībhatsur māṃ yathovāca tathāvaimy aham apy uta
GE07mbh_05_u:055.006c: arjunasya rathe brūhi katham aśvāḥ kathaṃ dhvajaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:055.007a: bhauvanaḥ saha śakreṇa bahucitraṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_05_u:055.007c: rūpāṇi kalpayām āsa tvaṣṭā dhātrā sahābhibho
GE07mbh_05_u:055.008a: dhvaje hi tasmin rūpāṇi cakrus te devamāyayā
GE07mbh_05_u:055.008c: mahādhanāni divyāni mahānti ca laghūni ca
GE07mbh_05_u:055.009a: sarvā diśo yojanamātram antaraṃ; sa tiryag ūrdhvaṃ ca rurodha vai dhvajaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:055.009c: na saṃsajjet tarubhiḥ saṃvṛto 'pi; tathā hi māyā vihitā bhauvanena
GE07mbh_05_u:055.010a: yathākāśe śakradhanuḥ prakāśate; na caikavarṇaṃ na ca vidma kiṃ nu tat
GE07mbh_05_u:055.010c: tathā dhvajo vihito bhauvanena; bahvākāraṃ dṛśyate rūpam asya
GE07mbh_05_u:055.011a: yathāgnidhūmo divam eti ruddhvā; varṇān bibhrat taijasaṃ tac charīram
GE07mbh_05_u:055.011c: tathā dhvajo vihito bhauvanena; na ced bhāro bhavitā nota rodhaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:055.012a: śvetās tasmin vātavegāḥ sadaśvā; divyā yuktāś citrarathena dattāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:055.012c: śataṃ yat tat pūryate nityakālaṃ; hataṃ hataṃ dattavaraṃ purastāt
GE07mbh_05_u:055.013a: tathā rājño dantavarṇā bṛhanto; rathe yuktā bhānti tadvīryatulyāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:055.013c: ṛśyaprakhyā bhīmasenasya vāhā; raṇe vāyos tulyavegā babhūvuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:055.014a: kalmāṣāṅgās tittiricitrapṛṣṭhā; bhrātrā dattāḥ prīyatā phalgunena
GE07mbh_05_u:055.014c: bhrātur vīrasya svais turaṃgair viśiṣṭā; mudā yuktāḥ sahadevaṃ vahanti
GE07mbh_05_u:055.015a: mādrīputraṃ nakulaṃ tv ājamīḍhaṃ; mahendradattā harayo vājimukhyāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:055.015c: samā vāyor balavantas tarasvino; vahanti vīraṃ vṛtraśatruṃ yathendram
GE07mbh_05_u:055.016a: tulyāś caibhir vayasā vikrameṇa; javena caivāpratirūpāḥ sadaśvāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:055.016c: saubhadrādīn draupadeyān kumārān; vahanty aśvā devadattā bṛhantaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:056.001c: ye yotsyante pāṇḍavārthe putrasya mama vāhinīm
GE07mbh_05_u:056.002c: cekitānaṃ ca tatraiva yuyudhānaṃ ca sātyakim
GE07mbh_05_u:056.008a: jārāsaṃdhir māgadhaś ca dhṛṣṭaketuś ca cedirāṭ
GE07mbh_05_u:056.010a: etān etāvatas tatra yān apaśyaṃ samāgatān
GE07mbh_05_u:056.011a: yo veda mānuṣaṃ vyūhaṃ daivaṃ gāndharvam āsuram
GE07mbh_05_u:056.012a: bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavo rājan bhāgaḥ kḷptaḥ śikhaṇḍinaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:056.012c: taṃ virāṭo 'nu saṃyātā saha matsyaiḥ prahāribhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:056.013c: tau tu tatrābruvan ke cid viṣamau no matāv iti
GE07mbh_05_u:056.014c: prācyāś ca dākṣiṇātyāś ca bhīmasenasya bhāgataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:056.015a: arjunasya tu bhāgena karṇo vaikartano mataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:056.015c: aśvatthāmā vikarṇaś ca saindhavaś ca jayadrathaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:056.016a: aśakyāś caiva ye ke cit pṛthivyāṃ śūramāninaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:056.016c: sarvāṃs tān arjunaḥ pārthaḥ kalpayām āsa bhāgataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:056.017c: kekayān eva bhāgena kṛtvā yotsyanti saṃyuge
GE07mbh_05_u:056.018a: teṣām eva kṛto bhāgo mālavāḥ śālvakekayāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:056.018c: trigartānāṃ ca dvau mukhyau yau tau saṃśaptakāv iti
GE07mbh_05_u:056.019c: saubhadreṇa kṛto bhāgo rājā caiva bṛhadbalaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:056.022a: sahadevas tu mādreyaḥ śūraḥ saṃkrandano yudhi
GE07mbh_05_u:056.022c: svam aṃśaṃ kalpayām āsa śyālaṃ te subalātmajam
GE07mbh_05_u:056.023a: ulūkaṃ cāpi kaitavyaṃ ye ca sārasvatā gaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:056.024a: ye cānye pārthivā rājan pratyudyāsyanti saṃyuge
GE07mbh_05_u:056.025c: yat te kāryaṃ saputrasya kriyatāṃ tad akālikam
GE07mbh_05_u:056.026a: na santi sarve putrā me mūḍhā durdyūtadevinaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:056.028c: tāṃ raṇe ke 'nuyāsyanti prabhagnāṃ pāṇḍavair yudhi
GE07mbh_05_u:056.029a: sarve hy atirathāḥ śūrāḥ kīrtimantaḥ pratāpinaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:056.030a: yeṣāṃ yudhiṣṭhiro netā goptā ca madhusūdanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:056.031a: nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca pārṣataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:056.032a: uttamaujāś ca pāñcālyo yudhāmanyuś ca durjayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:056.032c: śikhaṇḍī kṣatradevaś ca tathā vairāṭir uttaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:056.032d-0343_01: tataḥ śvetas tu vairāṭiḥ ketumān vāhinīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:056.033a: kāśayaś cedayaś caiva matsyāḥ sarve ca sṛñjayāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:056.033c: virāṭaputro babhrūś ca pāñcālāś ca prabhadrakāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:056.034a: yeṣām indro 'py akāmānāṃ na haret pṛthivīm imām
GE07mbh_05_u:056.034c: vīrāṇāṃ raṇadhīrāṇāṃ ye bhindyuḥ parvatān api
GE07mbh_05_u:056.035c: krośato mama duṣputro yoddhum icchati saṃjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:056.036c: atha kasmāt pāṇḍavānām ekato manyase jayam
GE07mbh_05_u:056.037a: pitāmahaṃ ca droṇaṃ ca kṛpaṃ karṇaṃ ca durjayam
GE07mbh_05_u:056.038c: aśaktaḥ samare jetuṃ kiṃ punas tāta pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:056.039a: sarvā ca pṛthivī sṛṣṭā madarthe tāta pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_05_u:056.040a: na māmakān pāṇḍavās te samarthāḥ prativīkṣitum
GE07mbh_05_u:056.040c: parākrānto hy ahaṃ pāṇḍūn saputrān yoddhum āhave
GE07mbh_05_u:056.041a: matpriyaṃ pārthivāḥ sarve ye cikīrṣanti bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:056.041c: te tān āvārayiṣyanti aiṇeyān iva tantunā
GE07mbh_05_u:056.043a: unmatta iva me putro vilapaty eṣa saṃjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:056.043c: na hi śakto yudhā jetuṃ dharmarājaṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_05_u:056.044a: jānāti hi sadā bhīṣmaḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ yaśasvinām
GE07mbh_05_u:056.045a: yato nārocayam ahaṃ vigrahaṃ tair mahātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:056.045c: kiṃ tu saṃjaya me brūhi punas teṣāṃ viceṣṭitam
GE07mbh_05_u:056.046a: kas tāṃs tarasvino bhūyaḥ saṃdīpayati pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_05_u:056.047c: yudhyadhvam iti mā bhaiṣṭa yuddhād bharatasattamāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:056.048a: ye ke cit pārthivās tatra dhārtarāṣṭreṇa saṃvṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:056.049a: tān sarvān āhave kruddhān sānubandhān samāgatān
GE07mbh_05_u:056.049c: aham ekaḥ samādāsye timir matsyān ivaudakān
GE07mbh_05_u:056.050a: bhīṣmaṃ droṇaṃ kṛpaṃ karṇaṃ drauṇiṃ śalyaṃ suyodhanam
GE07mbh_05_u:056.051a: tathā bruvāṇaṃ dharmātmā prāha rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:056.051c: tava dhairyaṃ ca vīryaṃ ca pāñcālāḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_05_u:056.051e: sarve samadhirūḍhāḥ sma saṃgrāmān naḥ samuddhara
GE07mbh_05_u:056.052e: bhavatā yad vidhātavyaṃ tan naḥ śreyaḥ paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_05_u:056.053c: pauruṣaṃ darśayañ śūro yas tiṣṭhed agrataḥ pumān
GE07mbh_05_u:056.053e: krīṇīyāt taṃ sahasreṇa nītiman nāma tat padam
GE07mbh_05_u:056.054a: sa tvaṃ śūraś ca vīraś ca vikrāntaś ca nararṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:056.056a: sarvāñ janapadān sūta yodhā duryodhanasya ye
GE07mbh_05_u:056.057c: duḥśāsanaṃ vikarṇaṃ ca tathā duryodhanaṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_05_u:056.058a: bhīṣmaṃ caiva brūhi gatvā tvam āśu; yudhiṣṭhiraṃ sādhunaivābhyupeta
GE07mbh_05_u:056.058c: mā vo vadhīd arjuno devaguptaḥ; kṣipraṃ yācadhvaṃ pāṇḍavaṃ lokavīram
GE07mbh_05_u:056.059a: naitādṛśo hi yodho 'sti pṛthivyām iha kaś cana
GE07mbh_05_u:056.060a: devair hi saṃbhṛto divyo ratho gāṇḍīvadhanvanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:056.060c: na sa jeyo manuṣyeṇa mā sma kṛdhvaṃ mano yudhi
GE07mbh_05_u:057.001c: tena saṃyugam eṣyanti mandā vilapato mama
GE07mbh_05_u:057.002c: na hi yuddhaṃ praśaṃsanti sarvāvastham ariṃdama
GE07mbh_05_u:057.003a: alam ardhaṃ pṛthivyās te sahāmātyasya jīvitum
GE07mbh_05_u:057.004a: etad dhi kuravaḥ sarve manyante dharmasaṃhitam
GE07mbh_05_u:057.004c: yat tvaṃ praśāntim icchethāḥ pāṇḍuputrair mahātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:057.005a: aṅgemāṃ samavekṣasva putra svām eva vāhinīm
GE07mbh_05_u:057.005c: jāta eva tava srāvas tvaṃ tu mohān na budhyase
GE07mbh_05_u:057.006a: na hy ahaṃ yuddham icchāmi naitad icchati bāhlikaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:057.006c: na ca bhīṣmo na ca droṇo nāśvatthāmā na saṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:057.007a: na somadatto na śalyo na kṛpo yuddham icchati
GE07mbh_05_u:057.008c: te yuddhaṃ nābhinandanti tat tubhyaṃ tāta rocatām
GE07mbh_05_u:057.009a: na tvaṃ karoṣi kāmena karṇaḥ kārayitā tava
GE07mbh_05_u:057.009c: duḥśāsanaś ca pāpātmā śakuniś cāpi saubalaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:057.010a: nāhaṃ bhavati na droṇe nāśvatthāmni na saṃjaye
GE07mbh_05_u:057.010c: na vikarṇe na kāmboje na kṛpe na ca bāhlike
GE07mbh_05_u:057.011c: anyeṣu vā tāvakeṣu bhāraṃ kṛtvā samāhvaye
GE07mbh_05_u:057.012a: ahaṃ ca tāta karṇaś ca raṇayajñaṃ vitatya vai
GE07mbh_05_u:057.013a: ratho vedī sruvaḥ khaḍgo gadā sruk kavacaṃ sadaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:057.013c: cāturhotraṃ ca dhuryā me śarā darbhā havir yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:057.014c: vijitya svayam eṣyāvo hatāmitrau śriyā vṛtau
GE07mbh_05_u:057.015a: ahaṃ ca tāta karṇaś ca bhrātā duḥśāsanaś ca me
GE07mbh_05_u:057.015c: ete vayaṃ haniṣyāmaḥ pāṇḍavān samare trayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:057.016a: ahaṃ hi pāṇḍavān hatvā praśāstā pṛthivīm imām
GE07mbh_05_u:057.016c: māṃ vā hatvā pāṇḍuputrā bhoktāraḥ pṛthivīm imām
GE07mbh_05_u:057.017a: tyaktaṃ me jīvitaṃ rājan dhanaṃ rājyaṃ ca pārthiva
GE07mbh_05_u:057.017c: na jātu pāṇḍavaiḥ sārdhaṃ vaseyam aham acyuta
GE07mbh_05_u:057.018a: yāvad dhi sūcyās tīkṣṇāyā vidhyed agreṇa māriṣa
GE07mbh_05_u:057.018c: tāvad apy aparityājyaṃ bhūmer naḥ pāṇḍavān prati
GE07mbh_05_u:057.019a: sarvān vas tāta śocāmi tyakto duryodhano mayā
GE07mbh_05_u:057.020a: rurūṇām iva yūtheṣu vyāghrāḥ praharatāṃ varāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:057.020c: varān varān haniṣyanti sametā yudhi pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:057.021a: pratīpam iva me bhāti yuyudhānena bhāratī
GE07mbh_05_u:057.022a: saṃpūrṇaṃ pūrayan bhūyo balaṃ pārthasya mādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:057.022c: śaineyaḥ samare sthātā bījavat pravapañ śarān
GE07mbh_05_u:057.025a: tān abhiprekṣya saṃgrāme viśīrṇān iva parvatān
GE07mbh_05_u:057.025c: bhīto bhīmasya saṃsparśāt smartāsi vacanasya me
GE07mbh_05_u:057.026c: gatim agner iva prekṣya smartāsi vacanasya me
GE07mbh_05_u:057.027a: mahad vo bhayam āgāmi na cec chāmyatha pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:057.028a: mahāvanam iva chinnaṃ yadā drakṣyasi pātitam
GE07mbh_05_u:057.028c: balaṃ kurūṇāṃ saṃgrāme tadā smartāsi me vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:057.029a: etāvad uktvā rājā tu sa sarvān pṛthivīpatīn
GE07mbh_05_u:058.001c: tan me brūhi mahāprājña śuśrūṣe vacanaṃ tava
GE07mbh_05_u:058.002a: śṛṇu rājan yathā dṛṣṭau mayā kṛṣṇadhanaṃjayau
GE07mbh_05_u:058.002c: ūcatuś cāpi yad vīrau tat te vakṣyāmi bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:058.004a: naivābhimanyur na yamau taṃ deśam abhiyānti vai
GE07mbh_05_u:058.004c: yatra kṛṣṇau ca kṛṣṇā ca satyabhāmā ca bhāminī
GE07mbh_05_u:058.006d-0347_01: satyāṅkam upadhānaṃ tu kṛtvā śete janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:058.007c: arjunasya ca kṛṣṇāyāṃ satyāyāṃ ca mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:058.008a: kāñcanaṃ pādapīṭhaṃ tu pārtho me prādiśat tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:058.008c: tad ahaṃ pāṇinā spṛṣṭvā tato bhūmāv upāviśam
GE07mbh_05_u:058.009d-0348_01: na nūnaṃ kalmaṣaṃ kiṃ cin mama karmasu vidyate
GE07mbh_05_u:058.009d-0348_02: strīratnābhyāṃ sametau yan mitho mām abhyabhāṣatām
GE07mbh_05_u:058.009d-0348_03: vismayo me mahān āsīd āstraṃ me bahu saṃgatam
GE07mbh_05_u:058.009d-0348_04: hṛṣṭāni caiva romāṇi dṛṣṭvā tau sahitāv ubhau
GE07mbh_05_u:058.010c: ekāsanagatau dṛṣṭvā bhayaṃ māṃ mahad āviśat
GE07mbh_05_u:058.012a: nideśasthāv imau yasya mānasas tasya setsyate
GE07mbh_05_u:058.013c: añjaliṃ mūrdhni saṃdhāya tau saṃdeśam acodayam
GE07mbh_05_u:058.016a: vācaṃ sa vadatāṃ śreṣṭho hlādinīṃ vacanakṣamām
GE07mbh_05_u:058.016d-0350_02: matimān matim āsthāya keśavaḥ saṃdadhe vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:058.018d-0351_01: āvayor vacanāt sūta jyeṣṭhān apy abhivādayan
GE07mbh_05_u:058.018d-0351_02: yavīyasaś ca kuśalaṃ paścāt pṛṣṭvaivam uttaram
GE07mbh_05_u:058.019a: yajadhvaṃ vipulair yajñair viprebhyo datta dakṣiṇāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:058.019c: putrair dāraiś ca modadhvaṃ mahad vo bhayam āgatam
GE07mbh_05_u:058.020a: arthāṃs tyajata pātrebhyaḥ sutān prāpnuta kāmajān
GE07mbh_05_u:058.020c: priyaṃ priyebhyaś carata rājā hi tvarate jaye
GE07mbh_05_u:058.021a: ṛṇam etat pravṛddhaṃ me hṛdayān nāpasarpati
GE07mbh_05_u:058.021c: yad govindeti cukrośa kṛṣṇā māṃ dūravāsinam
GE07mbh_05_u:058.022d-0352_01: kṛṣṇasya tad vacaḥ śrutvā bhayaṃ māṃ mahad āviśat
GE07mbh_05_u:058.022d-0352_02: tava putrasya lobhaṃ tu vartamānaṃ pramṛśyataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:058.023a: maddvitīyaṃ punaḥ pārthaṃ kaḥ prārthayitum icchati
GE07mbh_05_u:058.023c: yo na kālaparīto vāpy api sākṣāt puraṃdaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:058.024a: bāhubhyām udvahed bhūmiṃ dahet kruddha imāḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:058.024c: pātayet tridivād devān yo 'rjunaṃ samare jayet
GE07mbh_05_u:058.025c: na taṃ paśyāmy ahaṃ yuddhe pāṇḍavaṃ yo 'bhyayād raṇe
GE07mbh_05_u:058.026a: yat tad virāṭanagare śrūyate mahad adbhutam
GE07mbh_05_u:058.026c: ekasya ca bahūnāṃ ca paryāptaṃ tan nidarśanam
GE07mbh_05_u:058.027c: bhagnāḥ palāyanta diśaḥ paryāptaṃ tan nidarśanam
GE07mbh_05_u:058.028a: balaṃ vīryaṃ ca tejaś ca śīghratā laghuhastatā
GE07mbh_05_u:058.028c: aviṣādaś ca dhairyaṃ ca pārthān nānyatra vidyate
GE07mbh_05_u:058.029a: ity abravīd dhṛṣīkeśaḥ pārtham uddharṣayan girā
GE07mbh_05_u:058.030c: arjunas tan mahad vākyam abravīl lomaharṣaṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:059.001c: tataḥ saṃkhyātum ārebhe tad vaco guṇadoṣataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:059.003b-0353_01: yadā tu mene bhūyiṣṭhaṃ tad vaco guṇadoṣataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:059.003b-0353_02: punar eva kurūṇāṃ ca pāṇḍavānāṃ ca buddhimān
GE07mbh_05_u:059.003c: śaktiṃ saṃkhyātum ārebhe tadā vai manujādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:059.005a: duryodhaneyaṃ cintā me śaśvan nāpy upaśāmyati
GE07mbh_05_u:059.005b-0354_02: adharme cāyaśasye ca kārye mahati dāruṇe
GE07mbh_05_u:059.005b-0354_03: pāṇḍavair vigrahas tāta sarvathā taṃ na rocaye
GE07mbh_05_u:059.005c: satyaṃ hy etad ahaṃ manye pratyakṣaṃ nānumānataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:059.006c: priyāṇi caiṣāṃ kurvanti yathāśakti hitāni ca
GE07mbh_05_u:059.007c: icchanti bahulaṃ santaḥ pratikartuṃ mahat priyam
GE07mbh_05_u:059.008a: agniḥ sācivyakartā syāt khāṇḍave tat kṛtaṃ smaran
GE07mbh_05_u:059.011a: te devasahitāḥ pārthā na śakyāḥ prativīkṣitum
GE07mbh_05_u:059.012a: durāsadaṃ yasya divyaṃ gāṇḍīvaṃ dhanur uttamam
GE07mbh_05_u:059.013a: vānaraś ca dhvajo divyo niḥsaṅgo dhūmavad gatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:059.013c: rathaś ca caturantāyāṃ yasya nāsti samas tviṣā
GE07mbh_05_u:059.015a: yaṃ cātimānuṣaṃ vīrye kṛtsno loko vyavasyati
GE07mbh_05_u:059.015c: devānām api jetāraṃ yaṃ viduḥ pārthivā raṇe
GE07mbh_05_u:059.016a: śatāni pañca caiveṣūn udvapann iva dṛśyate
GE07mbh_05_u:059.017a: yam āha bhīṣmo droṇaś ca kṛpo drauṇis tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:059.017c: madrarājas tathā śalyo madhyasthā ye ca mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:059.019a: kṣipaty ekena vegena pañca bāṇaśatāni yaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:059.021a: ity evaṃ cintayan kṛtsnam ahorātrāṇi bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:059.022c: asya cet kalahasyāntaḥ śamād anyo na vidyate
GE07mbh_05_u:059.023a: śamo me rocate nityaṃ pārthais tāta na vigrahaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:059.023c: kurubhyo hi sadā manye pāṇḍavāñ śaktimattarān
GE07mbh_05_u:060.001c: ādhāya vipulaṃ krodhaṃ punar evedam abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:060.002a: aśakyā devasacivāḥ pārthāḥ syur iti yad bhavān
GE07mbh_05_u:060.003c: upekṣayā ca bhāvānāṃ devā devatvam āpnuvan
GE07mbh_05_u:060.004a: iti dvaipāyano vyāso nāradaś ca mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:060.004c: jāmadagnyaś ca rāmo naḥ kathām akathayat purā
GE07mbh_05_u:060.005a: naiva mānuṣavad devāḥ pravartante kadā cana
GE07mbh_05_u:060.005c: kāmāl lobhād anukrośād dveṣāc ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:060.006a: yadi hy agniś ca vāyuś ca dharma indro 'śvināv api
GE07mbh_05_u:060.006c: kāmayogāt pravarteran na pārthā duḥkham āpnuyuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:060.007a: tasmān na bhavatā cintā kāryaiṣā syāt kadā cana
GE07mbh_05_u:060.007c: daiveṣv apekṣakā hy ete śaśvad bhāveṣu bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:060.008a: atha cet kāmasaṃyogād dveṣāl lobhāc ca lakṣyate
GE07mbh_05_u:060.010a: yad vā paramakaṃ tejo yena yuktā divaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:060.010c: mamāpy anupamaṃ bhūyo devebhyo viddhi bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:060.013a: aśmavarṣaṃ ca vāyuṃ ca śamayāmīha nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:060.015a: akṣauhiṇībhir yān deśān yāmi kāryeṇa kena cit
GE07mbh_05_u:060.016a: bhayāni viṣaye rājan vyālādīni na santi me
GE07mbh_05_u:060.016c: mattaḥ suptāni bhūtāni na hiṃsanti bhayaṃkarāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:060.017c: dharmiṣṭhāś ca prajāḥ sarvā ītayaś ca na santi me
GE07mbh_05_u:060.018a: aśvināv atha vāyvagnī marudbhiḥ saha vṛtrahā
GE07mbh_05_u:060.019a: yadi hy ete samarthāḥ syur maddviṣas trātum ojasā
GE07mbh_05_u:060.019c: na sma trayodaśa samāḥ pārthā duḥkham avāpnuyuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:060.020a: naiva devā na gandharvā nāsurā na ca rākṣasāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:060.020c: śaktās trātuṃ mayā dviṣṭaṃ satyam etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_05_u:060.021a: yad abhidhyāmy ahaṃ śaśvac chubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham
GE07mbh_05_u:060.021c: naitad vipannapūrvaṃ me mitreṣv ariṣu cobhayoḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:060.022a: bhaviṣyatīdam iti vā yad bravīmi paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_05_u:060.022c: nānyathā bhūtapūrvaṃ tat satyavāg iti māṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:060.023a: lokasākṣikam etan me māhātmyaṃ dikṣu viśrutam
GE07mbh_05_u:060.023c: āśvāsanārthaṃ bhavataḥ proktaṃ na ślāghayā nṛpa
GE07mbh_05_u:060.024a: na hy ahaṃ ślāghano rājan bhūtapūrvaḥ kadā cana
GE07mbh_05_u:060.024c: asad ācaritaṃ hy etad yad ātmānaṃ praśaṃsati
GE07mbh_05_u:060.025a: pāṇḍavāṃś caiva matsyāṃś ca pāñcālān kekayaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_05_u:060.025c: sātyakiṃ vāsudevaṃ ca śrotāsi vijitān mayā
GE07mbh_05_u:060.026a: saritaḥ sāgaraṃ prāpya yathā naśyanti sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:060.026c: tathaiva te vinaṅkṣyanti mām āsādya sahānvayāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:060.027a: parā buddhiḥ paraṃ tejo vīryaṃ ca paramaṃ mayi
GE07mbh_05_u:060.027c: parā vidyā paro yogo mama tebhyo viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_05_u:060.028a: pitāmahaś ca droṇaś ca kṛpaḥ śalyaḥ śalas tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:060.028c: astreṣu yat prajānanti sarvaṃ tan mayi vidyate
GE07mbh_05_u:060.029a: ity uktvā saṃjayaṃ bhūyaḥ paryapṛcchata bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:061.001a: tathā tu pṛcchantam atīva pārthān; vaicitravīryaṃ tam acintayitvā
GE07mbh_05_u:061.001c: uvāca karṇo dhṛtarāṣṭraputraṃ; praharṣayan saṃsadi kauravāṇām
GE07mbh_05_u:061.002a: mithyā pratijñāya mayā yad astraṃ; rāmād dhṛtaṃ brahmapuraṃ purastāt
GE07mbh_05_u:061.003a: mahāparādhe hy api saṃnatena; maharṣiṇāhaṃ guruṇā ca śaptaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:061.003c: śaktaḥ pradagdhuṃ hy api tigmatejāḥ; sasāgarām apy avaniṃ maharṣiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:061.004a: prasāditaṃ hy asya mayā mano 'bhūc; chuśrūṣayā svena ca pauruṣeṇa
GE07mbh_05_u:061.004c: tatas tad astraṃ mama sāvaśeṣaṃ; tasmāt samartho 'smi mamaiṣa bhāraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:061.005c: nihatya pārthāṃś ca saputrapautrāṃl; lokān ahaṃ śastrajitān prapatsye
GE07mbh_05_u:061.006a: pitāmahas tiṣṭhatu te samīpe; droṇaś ca sarve ca narendramukhyāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:061.006c: yathāpradhānena balena yātvā; pārthān haniṣyāmi mamaiṣa bhāraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:061.007a: evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ tam uvāca bhīṣmaḥ; kiṃ katthase kālaparītabuddhe
GE07mbh_05_u:061.007c: na karṇa jānāsi yathā pradhāne; hate hatāḥ syur dhṛtarāṣṭraputrāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:061.008a: yat khāṇḍavaṃ dāhayatā kṛtaṃ hi; kṛṣṇadvitīyena dhanaṃjayena
GE07mbh_05_u:061.008c: śrutvaiva tat karma niyantum ātmā; śakyas tvayā vai saha bāndhavena
GE07mbh_05_u:061.009a: yāṃ cāpi śaktiṃ tridaśādhipas te; dadau mahātmā bhagavān mahendraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:061.009c: bhasmīkṛtāṃ tāṃ patitāṃ viśīrṇāṃ; cakrāhatāṃ drakṣyasi keśavena
GE07mbh_05_u:061.010a: yas te śaraḥ sarpamukho vibhāti; sadāgryamālyair mahitaḥ prayatnāt
GE07mbh_05_u:061.010c: sa pāṇḍuputrābhihataḥ śaraughaiḥ; saha tvayā yāsyati karṇa nāśam
GE07mbh_05_u:061.011a: bāṇasya bhaumasya ca karṇa hantā; kirīṭinaṃ rakṣati vāsudevaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:061.011c: yas tvādṛśānāṃ ca garīyasāṃ ca; hantā ripūṇāṃ tumule pragāḍhe
GE07mbh_05_u:061.012a: asaṃśayaṃ vṛṣṇipatir yathoktas; tathā ca bhūyaś ca tato mahātmā
GE07mbh_05_u:061.012c: ahaṃ yad uktaḥ paruṣaṃ tu kiṃ cit; pitāmahas tasya phalaṃ śṛṇotu
GE07mbh_05_u:061.013a: nyasyāmi śastrāṇi na jātu saṃkhye; pitāmaho drakṣyati māṃ sabhāyām
GE07mbh_05_u:061.013c: tvayi praśānte tu mama prabhāvaṃ; drakṣyanti sarve bhuvi bhūmipālāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:061.014a: ity evam uktvā sa mahādhanuṣmān; hitvā sabhāṃ svaṃ bhavanaṃ jagāma
GE07mbh_05_u:061.014c: bhīṣmas tu duryodhanam eva rājan; madhye kurūṇāṃ
GE07mbh_05_u:061.015a: satyapratijñaḥ kila sūtaputras; tathā sa bhāraṃ viṣaheta kasmāt
GE07mbh_05_u:061.015c: vyūhaṃ prativyūhya śirāṃsi bhittvā; lokakṣayaṃ paśyata bhīmasenāt
GE07mbh_05_u:061.016c: ahaṃ haniṣyāmi sadā pareṣāṃ; sahasraśaś cāyutaśaś ca yodhān
GE07mbh_05_u:061.017a: yadaiva rāme bhagavaty anindye; brahma bruvāṇaḥ kṛtavāṃs tad astram
GE07mbh_05_u:061.017c: tadaiva dharmaś ca tapaś ca naṣṭaṃ; vaikartanasyādhamapūruṣasya
GE07mbh_05_u:061.018a: athoktavākye nṛpatau tu bhīṣme; nikṣipya śastrāṇi gate ca karṇe
GE07mbh_05_u:062.001c: katham ekāntatas teṣāṃ pārthānāṃ manyase jayam
GE07mbh_05_u:062.001d-0355_01: vayaṃ ca te 'pi tulyā vai vīryeṇa ca parākramaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:062.001d-0355_02: samena vayasā caiva prātibhena śrutena ca
GE07mbh_05_u:062.003a: nāhaṃ bhavati na droṇe na kṛpe na ca bāhlike
GE07mbh_05_u:062.004a: ahaṃ vaikartanaḥ karṇo bhrātā duḥśāsanaś ca me
GE07mbh_05_u:062.004c: pāṇḍavān samare pañca haniṣyāmaḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:062.005c: brāhmaṇāṃs tarpayiṣyāmi gobhir aśvair dhanena ca
GE07mbh_05_u:062.005d-0356_01: sukhāny avāpya sahitāḥ kṛtvā karma suduṣkaram
GE07mbh_05_u:062.005d-0356_02: visrabdhāḥ svargam eṣyāmaḥ kāle prāpte gatajvarāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:062.005d-0356_06: tāta karṇena sahitaḥ putro duryodhano mama
GE07mbh_05_u:062.005d-003_0002: ataritrān iva jale bāhubhir māmakā raṇe
GE07mbh_05_u:062.005d-003_0003: paśyantas te parāṃs tatra rathanāgasamākulān vidura uvāca
GE07mbh_05_u:062.005d-003_0004: tadā darpaṃ vimokṣyanti pāṇḍavāḥ sa ca keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:062.005d-003_0007: tasya dānaṃ kṣamā siddhir yathāvad upapadyate
GE07mbh_05_u:062.005d-003_0008: damo dānaṃ tapo jñānam adhītaṃ cānuvartate
GE07mbh_05_u:062.005d-003_0009: damas tejo vardhayati pavitraṃ dama uttamam
GE07mbh_05_u:062.005d-003_0010: vipāpmā vṛddhatejās tu puruṣo vindate mahat
GE07mbh_05_u:062.005d-003_0011: kravyādbhya iva bhūtānām adāntebhyaḥ sadā bhayam
GE07mbh_05_u:062.005d-003_0012: teṣāṃ ca pratiṣedhārthaṃ kṣatraṃ sṛṣṭaṃ svayaṃbhuvā
GE07mbh_05_u:062.005d-003_0013: āśrameṣu caturṣv āhur damam evottamaṃ vratam
GE07mbh_05_u:062.005d-003_0014: tasya liṅgaṃ pravakṣyāmi yeṣāṃ samudayo damaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:062.005d-003_0015: kṣamā dhṛtir ahiṃsā ca samatā satyam ārjavam
GE07mbh_05_u:062.005d-003_0018: etāni yasya rājendra sa dāntaḥ puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:062.005d-003_0019: kāmo lobhaś ca darpaś ca manyur nidrā vikatthanam
GE07mbh_05_u:062.005d-003_0020: māna īrṣyā ca śokaś ca naitad dānto niṣevate
GE07mbh_05_u:062.005d-003_0021: ajihmam aśaṭhaṃ śuddham etad dāntasya lakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:062.005d-003_0025: prāpyeha loke saṃmānaṃ sugatiṃ pretya gacchati
GE07mbh_05_u:062.005d-003_0026: abhayaṃ yasya bhūtebhyaḥ sarveṣām abhayaṃ yataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:062.005d-003_0030: karmaṇācaritaṃ pūrvaṃ sadbhir ācaritaṃ ca yat
GE07mbh_05_u:062.005d-003_0035: evaṃ prajñānatṛptasya muner vartma na dṛśyate
GE07mbh_05_u:062.005d-003_0036: utsṛjya vā gṛhān yas tu mokṣam evābhimanyate
GE07mbh_05_u:062.005d-003_0037: lokās tejomayās tasya kalpante śāśvatā divi
GE07mbh_05_u:062.006c: kaś cic chākunikas tāta pūrveṣām iti śuśruma
GE07mbh_05_u:062.007a: tasmin dvau śakunau baddhau yugapat samapauruṣau
GE07mbh_05_u:062.007c: tāv upādāya taṃ pāśaṃ jagmatuḥ khacarāv ubhau
GE07mbh_05_u:062.008a: tau vihāyasam ākrāntau dṛṣṭvā śākunikas tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:062.008c: anvadhāvad anirviṇṇo yena yena sma gacchataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:062.009c: āśramastho muniḥ kaś cid dadarśātha kṛtāhnikaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:062.010c: ślokenānena kauravya papraccha sa munis tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:062.011a: vicitram idam āścaryaṃ mṛgahan pratibhāti me
GE07mbh_05_u:062.012a: pāśam ekam ubhāv etau sahitau harato mama
GE07mbh_05_u:062.012c: yatra vai vivadiṣyete tatra me vaśam eṣyataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:062.015a: evaṃ ye jñātayo 'rtheṣu mitho gacchanti vigraham
GE07mbh_05_u:062.016c: etāni jñātikāryāṇi na virodhaḥ kadā cana
GE07mbh_05_u:062.017a: yasmin kāle sumanasaḥ sarve vṛddhān upāsate
GE07mbh_05_u:062.018a: ye 'rthaṃ saṃtatam āsādya dīnā iva samāsate
GE07mbh_05_u:062.020a: idam anyat pravakṣyāmi yathā dṛṣṭaṃ girau mayā
GE07mbh_05_u:062.020c: śrutvā tad api kauravya yathā śreyas tathā kuru
GE07mbh_05_u:062.021a: vayaṃ kirātaiḥ sahitā gacchāmo girim uttaram
GE07mbh_05_u:062.023a: tatra paśyāmahe sarve madhu pītam amākṣikam
GE07mbh_05_u:062.024c: yat prāśya puruṣo martyo amaratvaṃ nigacchati
GE07mbh_05_u:062.025a: acakṣur labhate cakṣur vṛddho bhavati vai yuvā
GE07mbh_05_u:062.025c: iti te kathayanti sma brāhmaṇā jambhasādhakāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:062.026a: tataḥ kirātās tad dṛṣṭvā prārthayanto mahīpate
GE07mbh_05_u:062.026d-0357_01: āśābaddhāḥ patanti sma sarva eva gatāsavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:062.027a: tathaiva tava putro 'yaṃ pṛthivīm eka icchati
GE07mbh_05_u:062.028c: na ca paśyāmi tejo 'sya vikramaṃ vā tathāvidham
GE07mbh_05_u:062.029a: ekena ratham āsthāya pṛthivī yena nirjitā
GE07mbh_05_u:062.029b-0358_02: virāṭanagare bhagnāḥ kiṃ tatra tava dṛśyatām
GE07mbh_05_u:062.029c: pratīkṣamāṇo yo vīraḥ kṣamate vīkṣitaṃ tava
GE07mbh_05_u:062.030a: drupado matsyarājaś ca saṃkruddhaś ca dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:062.031c: yudhyator hi dvayor yuddhe naikāntena bhavej jayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:063.001a: duryodhana vijānīhi yat tvāṃ vakṣyāmi putraka
GE07mbh_05_u:063.003a: yudhiṣṭhiraṃ hi kaunteyaṃ paraṃ dharmam ihāsthitam
GE07mbh_05_u:063.003c: parāṃ gatim asaṃprekṣya na tvaṃ vettum ihārhasi
GE07mbh_05_u:063.004a: bhīmasenaṃ ca kaunteyaṃ yasya nāsti samo bale
GE07mbh_05_u:063.005c: yudhi gāṇḍīvadhanvānaṃ ko nu yudhyeta buddhimān
GE07mbh_05_u:063.006a: dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca pāñcālyaḥ kam ivādya na śātayet
GE07mbh_05_u:063.006c: śatrumadhye śarān muñcan devarāḍ aśanīm iva
GE07mbh_05_u:063.008a: yaḥ punaḥ pratimānena trīṃl lokān atiricyate
GE07mbh_05_u:063.008c: taṃ kṛṣṇaṃ puṇḍarīkākṣaṃ ko nu yudhyeta buddhimān
GE07mbh_05_u:063.009a: ekato hy asya dārāś ca jñātayaś ca sabāndhavāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:063.009c: ātmā ca pṛthivī ceyam ekataś ca dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:063.010c: aviṣahyaṃ pṛthivyāpi tad balaṃ yatra keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:063.011a: tiṣṭha tāta satāṃ vākye suhṛdām arthavādinām
GE07mbh_05_u:063.012a: māṃ ca bruvāṇaṃ śuśrūṣa kurūṇām arthavādinam
GE07mbh_05_u:063.012c: droṇaṃ kṛpaṃ vikarṇaṃ ca mahārājaṃ ca bāhlikam
GE07mbh_05_u:063.013a: ete hy api yathaivāhaṃ mantum arhasi tāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:063.013c: sarve dharmavido hy ete tulyasnehāś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:063.014a: yat tad virāṭanagare saha bhrātṛbhir agrataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:063.014c: utsṛjya gāḥ susaṃtrastaṃ balaṃ te samaśīryata
GE07mbh_05_u:063.015a: yac caiva tasmin nagare śrūyate mahad adbhutam
GE07mbh_05_u:063.015c: ekasya ca bahūnāṃ ca paryāptaṃ tan nidarśanam
GE07mbh_05_u:063.016a: arjunas tat tathākārṣīt kiṃ punaḥ sarva eva te
GE07mbh_05_u:064.002a: brūhi saṃjaya yac cheṣaṃ vāsudevād anantaram
GE07mbh_05_u:064.002c: yad arjuna uvāca tvāṃ paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
GE07mbh_05_u:064.004c: droṇaṃ kṛpaṃ ca karṇaṃ ca mahārājaṃ ca bāhlikam
GE07mbh_05_u:064.005a: drauṇiṃ ca somadattaṃ ca śakuniṃ cāpi saubalam
GE07mbh_05_u:064.006a: vikarṇaṃ citrasenaṃ ca jayatsenaṃ ca pārthivam
GE07mbh_05_u:064.007a: saindhavaṃ duḥsahaṃ caiva bhūriśravasam eva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:064.007c: bhagadattaṃ ca rājānaṃ jalasaṃdhaṃ ca pārthivam
GE07mbh_05_u:064.008a: ye cāpy anye pārthivās tatra yoddhuṃ; samāgatāḥ kauravāṇāṃ priyārtham
GE07mbh_05_u:064.008c: mumūrṣavaḥ pāṇḍavāgnau pradīpte; samānītā dhārtarāṣṭreṇa sūta
GE07mbh_05_u:064.009a: yathānyāyaṃ kauśalaṃ vandanaṃ ca; samāgatā madvacanena vācyāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:064.009c: idaṃ brūyāḥ saṃjaya rājamadhye; suyodhanaṃ pāpakṛtāṃ pradhānam
GE07mbh_05_u:064.010a: amarṣaṇaṃ durmatiṃ rājaputraṃ; pāpātmānaṃ dhārtarāṣṭraṃ sulubdham
GE07mbh_05_u:064.010c: sarvaṃ mamaitad vacanaṃ samagraṃ; sahāmātyaṃ saṃjaya śrāvayethāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:064.011a: evaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya dhanaṃjayo māṃ; tato 'rthavad dharmavac cāpi vākyam
GE07mbh_05_u:064.011c: provācedaṃ vāsudevaṃ samīkṣya; pārtho dhīmāṃl lohitāntāyatākṣaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:064.012a: yathā śrutaṃ te vadato mahātmano; madhupravīrasya vacaḥ samāhitam
GE07mbh_05_u:064.012c: tathaiva vācyaṃ bhavatā hi madvacaḥ; samāgateṣu kṣitipeṣu sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:064.013c: yathā na homaḥ kriyate mahāmṛdhe; tathā sametya prayatadhvam ādṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:064.014a: na cet prayacchadhvam amitraghātino; yudhiṣṭhirasyāṃśam abhīpsitaṃ svakam
GE07mbh_05_u:064.014c: nayāmi vaḥ svāśvapadātikuñjarān; diśaṃ pitṝṇām aśivāṃ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:064.015a: tato 'ham āmantrya caturbhujaṃ hariṃ; dhanaṃjayaṃ caiva namasya satvaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:064.015c: javena saṃprāpta ihāmaradyute; tavāntikaṃ prāpayituṃ vaco mahat
GE07mbh_05_u:065.003c: ātmanaś ca pareṣāṃ ca pāṇḍavānāṃ ca niścayam
GE07mbh_05_u:065.004a: gāvalgaṇe brūhi naḥ sāraphalgu; svasenāyāṃ yāvad ihāsti kiṃ cit
GE07mbh_05_u:065.004c: tvaṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ nipuṇaṃ vettha sarvaṃ; kim eṣāṃ jyāyaḥ kim u teṣāṃ kanīyaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:065.005a: tvam etayoḥ sāravit sarvadarśī; dharmārthayor nipuṇo niścayajñaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:065.005c: sa me pṛṣṭaḥ saṃjaya brūhi sarvaṃ; yudhyamānāḥ katare 'smin na santi
GE07mbh_05_u:065.006a: na tvāṃ brūyāṃ rahite jātu kiṃ cid; asūyā hi tvāṃ prasaheta rājan
GE07mbh_05_u:065.006c: ānayasva pitaraṃ saṃśitavrataṃ; gāṃdhārīṃ ca mahiṣīm ājamīḍha
GE07mbh_05_u:065.007a: tau te 'sūyāṃ vinayetāṃ narendra; dharmajñau tau nipuṇau niścayajñau
GE07mbh_05_u:065.007c: tayos tu tvāṃ saṃnidhau tad vadeyaṃ; kṛtsnaṃ mataṃ vāsudevārjunābhyām vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_05_u:065.008-0359_01: ity uktena ca gāndhārī vyāsaś cātrājagāma
GE07mbh_05_u:065.008a: tatas tan matam ājñāya saṃjayasyātmajasya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:065.009a: saṃpṛcchate dhṛtarāṣṭrāya saṃjaya; ācakṣva sarvaṃ yāvad eṣo 'nuyuṅkte
GE07mbh_05_u:065.009c: sarvaṃ yāvad vettha tasmin yathāvad; yāthātathyaṃ vāsudeve 'rjune ca
GE07mbh_05_u:066.002c: cakraṃ tad vāsudevasya māyayā vartate vibho
GE07mbh_05_u:066.003c: sārāsārabalaṃ jñātvā tat samāsena me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_05_u:066.004a: narakaṃ śambaraṃ caiva kaṃsaṃ caidyaṃ ca mādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:066.005a: pṛthivīṃ cāntarikṣaṃ ca dyāṃ caiva puruṣottamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:066.006a: bhūyo bhūyo hi yad rājan pṛcchase pāṇḍavān prati
GE07mbh_05_u:066.006c: sārāsārabalaṃ jñātuṃ tan me nigadataḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_05_u:066.007a: ekato vā jagat kṛtsnam ekato vā janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:066.008a: bhasma kuryāj jagad idaṃ manasaiva janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:066.008c: na tu kṛtsnaṃ jagac chaktaṃ bhasma kartuṃ janārdanam
GE07mbh_05_u:066.009a: yataḥ satyaṃ yato dharmo yato hrīr ārjavaṃ yataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:066.009c: tato bhavati govindo yataḥ kṛṣṇas tato jayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:066.010a: pṛthivīṃ cāntarikṣaṃ ca divaṃ ca puruṣottamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:066.010d-0361_01: bhasmīkuryāj jagat sarvaṃ nimeṣeṇeti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:066.010d-0362_01: yatra bhāve 'pi yad rājan pṛcchase pāṇḍavān prati
GE07mbh_05_u:066.011a: sa kṛtvā pāṇḍavān satraṃ lokaṃ saṃmohayann iva
GE07mbh_05_u:066.011c: adharmaniratān mūḍhān dagdhum icchati te sutān
GE07mbh_05_u:066.013a: kālasya ca hi mṛtyoś ca jaṅgamasthāvarasya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:066.013c: īśate bhagavān ekaḥ satyam etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_05_u:066.014a: īśann api mahāyogī sarvasya jagato hariḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:066.014c: karmāṇy ārabhate kartuṃ kīnāśa iva durbalaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:066.015c: ye tam eva prapadyante na te muhyanti mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:067.001c: katham enaṃ na vedāhaṃ tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:067.002a: vidyā rājan na te vidyā mama vidyā na hīyate
GE07mbh_05_u:067.004a: gāvalgaṇe 'tra kā bhaktir yā te nityā janārdane
GE07mbh_05_u:067.005a: māyāṃ na seve bhadraṃ te na vṛthādharmam ācare
GE07mbh_05_u:067.005c: śuddhabhāvaṃ gato bhaktyā śāstrād vedmi janārdanam
GE07mbh_05_u:067.006c: āpto naḥ saṃjayas tāta śaraṇaṃ gaccha keśavam
GE07mbh_05_u:067.007c: pravadann arjune sakhyaṃ nāhaṃ gacche 'dya keśavam
GE07mbh_05_u:067.008a: avāg gāndhāri putrās te gacchaty eṣa sudurmatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:067.008c: īrṣyur durātmā mānī ca śreyasāṃ vacanātigaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:067.009c: aiśvaryajīvite hitvā pitaraṃ māṃ ca bāliśa
GE07mbh_05_u:067.010a: vardhayan durhṛdāṃ prītiṃ māṃ ca śokena vardhayan
GE07mbh_05_u:067.011a: dayito 'si rājan kṛṣṇasya dhṛtarāṣṭra nibodha me
GE07mbh_05_u:067.011c: yasya te saṃjayo dūto yas tvāṃ śreyasi yokṣyate
GE07mbh_05_u:067.012a: jānāty eṣa hṛṣīkeśaṃ purāṇaṃ yac ca vai navam
GE07mbh_05_u:067.013c: sitā bahuvidhaiḥ pāśair ye na tuṣṭāḥ svakair dhanaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:067.014a: yamasya vaśam āyānti kāmamūḍhāḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:067.015a: eṣa ekāyanaḥ panthā yena yānti manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:067.015c: taṃ dṛṣṭvā mṛtyum atyeti mahāṃs tatra na sajjate
GE07mbh_05_u:067.016a: aṅga saṃjaya me śaṃsa panthānam akutobhayam
GE07mbh_05_u:067.016c: yena gatvā hṛṣīkeśaṃ prāpnuyāṃ śāntim uttamām
GE07mbh_05_u:067.019a: indriyāṇāṃ yame yatto bhava rājann atandritaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:067.019c: buddhiś ca mā te cyavatu niyacchaitāṃ yatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:067.020a: etaj jñānaṃ vidur viprā dhruvam indriyadhāraṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:067.020c: etaj jñānaṃ ca panthāś ca yena yānti manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:067.021a: aprāpyaḥ keśavo rājann indriyair ajitair nṛbhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:068.002a: śrutaṃ me tasya devasya nāmanirvacanaṃ śubham
GE07mbh_05_u:068.003c: vāsudevas tato vedyo vṛṣatvād vṛṣṇir ucyate
GE07mbh_05_u:068.004a: maunād dhyānāc ca yogāc ca viddhi bhārata mādhavam
GE07mbh_05_u:068.005a: kṛṣir bhūvācakaḥ śabdo ṇaś ca nirvṛtivācakaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:068.005c: kṛṣṇas tadbhāvayogāc ca kṛṣṇo bhavati śāśvataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:068.006a: puṇḍarīkaṃ paraṃ dhāma nityam akṣayam akṣaram
GE07mbh_05_u:068.007a: yataḥ sattvaṃ na cyavate yac ca sattvān na hīyate
GE07mbh_05_u:068.008a: na jāyate janitryāṃ yad ajas tasmād anīkajit
GE07mbh_05_u:068.009c: bāhubhyāṃ rodasī bibhran mahābāhur iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:068.010a: adho na kṣīyate jātu yasmāt tasmād adhokṣajaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:068.010c: narāṇām ayanāc cāpi tena nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:068.011a: asataś ca sataś caiva sarvasya prabhavāpyayāt
GE07mbh_05_u:068.011c: sarvasya ca sadā jñānāt sarvam enaṃ pracakṣate
GE07mbh_05_u:068.012a: satye pratiṣṭhitaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ satyam atra pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_05_u:068.012c: satyāt satyaṃ ca govindas tasmāt satyo 'pi nāmataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:068.013a: viṣṇur vikramaṇād eva jayanāj jiṣṇur ucyate
GE07mbh_05_u:068.013c: śāśvatatvād anantaś ca govindo vedanād gavām
GE07mbh_05_u:068.014a: atattvaṃ kurute tattvaṃ tena mohayate prajāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:069.001a: cakṣuṣmatāṃ vai spṛhayāmi saṃjaya; drakṣyanti ye vāsudevaṃ samīpe
GE07mbh_05_u:069.001c: vibhrājamānaṃ vapuṣā pareṇa; prakāśayantaṃ pradiśo diśaś ca saṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:069.002a: īrayantaṃ bhāratīṃ bhāratānām; abhyarcanīyāṃ śaṃkarīṃ sṛñjayānām
GE07mbh_05_u:069.003a: samudyantaṃ sātvatam ekavīraṃ; praṇetāram ṛṣabhaṃ yādavānām
GE07mbh_05_u:069.003c: nihantāraṃ kṣobhaṇaṃ śātravāṇāṃ; muṣṇantaṃ ca dviṣatāṃ vai yaśāṃsi
GE07mbh_05_u:069.004a: draṣṭāro hi kuravas taṃ sametā; mahātmānaṃ śatruhaṇaṃ vareṇyam
GE07mbh_05_u:069.004c: bruvantaṃ vācam anṛśaṃsarūpāṃ; vṛṣṇiśreṣṭhaṃ mohayantaṃ madīyān
GE07mbh_05_u:069.005a: ṛṣiṃ sanātanatamaṃ vipaścitaṃ; vācaḥ samudraṃ kalaśaṃ yatīnām
GE07mbh_05_u:069.005c: ariṣṭanemiṃ garuḍaṃ suparṇaṃ; patiṃ prajānāṃ bhuvanasya dhāma
GE07mbh_05_u:069.006c: śukrasya dhātāram ajaṃ janitraṃ; paraṃ parebhyaḥ śaraṇaṃ prapadye
GE07mbh_05_u:069.007c: narādhipānāṃ viduṣāṃ pradhānam; indrānujaṃ taṃ śaraṇaṃ prapadye vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_05_u:070.001-0366_01: prayāte saṃjaye sādhau pāṇḍavān prati vai tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:070.001-0366_02: kiṃ cakruḥ pāṇḍavās tatra mama pūrvapitāmahāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:070.001-0366_03: etat sarvaṃ dvijaśreṣṭha śrotum icchāmi śaṃsa me
GE07mbh_05_u:070.001b-0367_01: arjunaṃ bhīmasenaṃ ca mādrīputrau ca bhrātarau
GE07mbh_05_u:070.001b-0367_05: yathā bhīṣmeṇa droṇena bāhlīkena ca dhīmatā
GE07mbh_05_u:070.001b-0367_06: anyaiś ca kurubhiḥ sārdhaṃ na yudhyemahi saṃyuge
GE07mbh_05_u:070.001b-0367_07: eṣa naḥ prathamaḥ kalpa etan naḥ śreya uttamam
GE07mbh_05_u:070.001b-0367_10: tathā ca duḥsahāḥ sarve sadasyaiś ca nararṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:070.002a: ayaṃ sa kālaḥ saṃprāpto mitrāṇāṃ me janārdana
GE07mbh_05_u:070.002c: na ca tvad anyaṃ paśyāmi yo na āpatsu tārayet
GE07mbh_05_u:070.003a: tvāṃ hi mādhava saṃśritya nirbhayā mohadarpitam
GE07mbh_05_u:070.004a: yathā hi sarvāsv āpatsu pāsi vṛṣṇīn ariṃdama
GE07mbh_05_u:070.004c: tathā te pāṇḍavā rakṣyāḥ pāhy asmān mahato bhayāt
GE07mbh_05_u:070.005a: ayam asmi mahābāho brūhi yat te vivakṣitam
GE07mbh_05_u:070.005c: kariṣyāmi hi tat sarvaṃ yat tvaṃ vakṣyasi bhārata yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_05_u:070.006-0370_01: mṛdupūrvaṃ sāmamiśraṃ sāntvam ugraṃ ca mādhava
GE07mbh_05_u:070.006-0370_02: na tu tan nyāyam āsthāya garhitāś ca tato vayam
GE07mbh_05_u:070.006c: etad dhi sakalaṃ kṛṣṇa saṃjayo māṃ yad abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:070.007c: yathoktaṃ dūta ācaṣṭe vadhyaḥ syād anyathā bruvan
GE07mbh_05_u:070.008c: lubdhaḥ pāpena manasā carann asamam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:070.009a: yat tad dvādaśa varṣāṇi vane nirvyuṣitā vayam
GE07mbh_05_u:070.010a: sthātā naḥ samaye tasmin dhṛtarāṣṭra iti prabho
GE07mbh_05_u:070.010c: nāhāsma samayaṃ kṛṣṇa tad dhi no brāhmaṇā viduḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:070.012c: mithyā carati lubdhaḥ saṃś caran priyam ivātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:070.013a: ito duḥkhataraṃ kiṃ nu yatrāhaṃ mātaraṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:070.013c: saṃvidhātuṃ na śaknomi mitrāṇāṃ vā janārdana
GE07mbh_05_u:070.014c: bhavatā caiva nāthena pañca grāmā vṛtā mayā
GE07mbh_05_u:070.015c: avasānaṃ ca govinda kiṃ cid evātra pañcamam
GE07mbh_05_u:070.016a: pañca nas tāta dīyantāṃ grāmā vā nagarāṇi vā
GE07mbh_05_u:070.016c: vasema sahitā yeṣu mā ca no bharatā naśan
GE07mbh_05_u:070.017a: na ca tān api duṣṭātmā dhārtarāṣṭro 'numanyate
GE07mbh_05_u:070.017c: svāmyam ātmani matvāsāv ato duḥkhataraṃ nu kim
GE07mbh_05_u:070.018c: lobhaḥ prajñānam āhanti prajñā hanti hatā hriyam
GE07mbh_05_u:070.019a: hrīr hatā bādhate dharmaṃ dharmo hanti hataḥ śriyam
GE07mbh_05_u:070.019c: śrīr hatā puruṣaṃ hanti puruṣasyāsvatā vadhaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:070.020c: apuṣpād aphalād vṛkṣād yathā tāta patatriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:070.021a: etac ca maraṇaṃ tāta yad asmāt patitād iva
GE07mbh_05_u:070.022a: nātaḥ pāpīyasīṃ kāṃ cid avasthāṃ śambaro 'bravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:070.022c: yatra naivādya na prātar bhojanaṃ pratidṛśyate
GE07mbh_05_u:070.023a: dhanam āhuḥ paraṃ dharmaṃ dhane sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_05_u:070.023c: jīvanti dhanino loke mṛtā ye tv adhanā narāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:070.024a: ye dhanād apakarṣanti naraṃ svabalam āśritāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:070.024c: te dharmam arthaṃ kāmaṃ ca pramathnanti naraṃ ca tam
GE07mbh_05_u:070.025a: etām avasthāṃ prāpyaike maraṇaṃ vavrire janāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:070.026a: unmādam eke puṣyanti yānty anye dviṣatāṃ vaśam
GE07mbh_05_u:070.027c: śriyo vināśas tad dhy asya nimittaṃ dharmakāmayoḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:070.028a: yad asya dharmyaṃ maraṇaṃ śāśvataṃ lokavartma tat
GE07mbh_05_u:070.028c: samantāt sarvabhūtānāṃ na tad atyeti kaś cana
GE07mbh_05_u:070.029a: na tathā bādhyate kṛṣṇa prakṛtyā nirdhano janaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:070.029c: yathā bhadrāṃ śriyaṃ prāpya tayā hīnaḥ sukhaidhitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:070.030c: sendrān garhayate devān nātmānaṃ ca kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:070.032a: taṃ tadā manyur evaiti sa bhūyaḥ saṃpramuhyati
GE07mbh_05_u:070.032c: sa mohavaśam āpannaḥ krūraṃ karma niṣevate
GE07mbh_05_u:070.034a: na cet prabudhyate kṛṣṇa narakāyaiva gacchati
GE07mbh_05_u:070.034c: tasya prabodhaḥ prajñaiva prajñācakṣur na riṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:070.035c: śāstranityaḥ punar dharmaṃ tasya hrīr aṅgam uttamam
GE07mbh_05_u:070.036a: hrīmān hi pāpaṃ pradveṣṭi tasya śrīr abhivardhate
GE07mbh_05_u:070.036c: śrīmān sa yāvad bhavati tāvad bhavati pūruṣaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:070.037c: nādharme kurute buddhiṃ na ca pāpeṣu vartate
GE07mbh_05_u:070.038a: ahrīko vā vimūḍho vā naiva strī na punaḥ pumān
GE07mbh_05_u:070.038c: nāsyādhikāro dharme 'sti yathā śūdras tathaiva saḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:070.039a: hrīmān avati devāṃś ca pitṝn ātmānam eva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:070.040a: tad idaṃ mayi te dṛṣṭaṃ pratyakṣaṃ madhusūdana
GE07mbh_05_u:070.040c: yathā rājyāt paribhraṣṭo vasāmi vasatīr imāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:070.041a: te vayaṃ na śriyaṃ hātum alaṃ nyāyena kena cit
GE07mbh_05_u:070.041c: atra no yatamānānāṃ vadhaś ced api sādhu tat
GE07mbh_05_u:070.042a: tatra naḥ prathamaḥ kalpo yad vayaṃ te ca mādhava
GE07mbh_05_u:070.042c: praśāntāḥ samabhūtāś ca śriyaṃ tān aśnuvīmahi
GE07mbh_05_u:070.043c: yad vayaṃ kauravān hatvā tāni rāṣṭrāṇy aśīmahi
GE07mbh_05_u:070.044a: ye punaḥ syur asaṃbaddhā anāryāḥ kṛṣṇa śatravaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:070.044c: teṣām apy avadhaḥ kāryaḥ kiṃ punar ye syur īdṛśāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:070.045a: jñātayaś ca hi bhūyiṣṭhāḥ sahāyā guravaś ca naḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:070.045c: teṣāṃ vadho 'tipāpīyān kiṃ nu yuddhe 'sti śobhanam
GE07mbh_05_u:070.046c: sa naḥ svadharmo 'dharmo vā vṛttir anyā vigarhitā
GE07mbh_05_u:070.047c: vayaṃ vadhena jīvāmaḥ kapālaṃ brāhmaṇair vṛtam
GE07mbh_05_u:070.048a: kṣatriyaḥ kṣatriyaṃ hanti matsyo matsyena jīvati
GE07mbh_05_u:070.048c: śvā śvānaṃ hanti dāśārha paśya dharmo yathāgataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:070.049a: yuddhe kṛṣṇa kalir nityaṃ prāṇāḥ sīdanti saṃyuge
GE07mbh_05_u:070.050c: nāpy akāle sukhaṃ prāpyaṃ duḥkhaṃ vāpi yadūttama
GE07mbh_05_u:070.051a: eko hy api bahūn hanti ghnanty ekaṃ bahavo 'py uta
GE07mbh_05_u:070.052a: jayaś caivobhayor dṛṣṭa ubhayoś ca parājayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:070.053a: sarvathā vṛjinaṃ yuddhaṃ ko ghnan na pratihanyate
GE07mbh_05_u:070.054a: parājayaś ca maraṇān manye naiva viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_05_u:070.054c: yasya syād vijayaḥ kṛṣṇa tasyāpy apacayo dhruvam
GE07mbh_05_u:070.055a: antato dayitaṃ ghnanti ke cid apy apare janāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:070.056a: ye hy eva vīrā hrīmanta āryāḥ karuṇavedinaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:070.056c: ta eva yuddhe hanyante yavīyān mucyate janaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:070.057a: hatvāpy anuśayo nityaṃ parān api janārdana
GE07mbh_05_u:070.057c: anubandhaś ca pāpo 'tra śeṣaś cāpy avaśiṣyate
GE07mbh_05_u:070.058a: śeṣo hi balam āsādya na śeṣam avaśeṣayet
GE07mbh_05_u:070.059a: jayo vairaṃ prasṛjati duḥkham āste parājitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:070.060a: jātavairaś ca puruṣo duḥkhaṃ svapiti nityadā
GE07mbh_05_u:070.061a: utsādayati yaḥ sarvaṃ yaśasā sa viyujyate
GE07mbh_05_u:070.062a: na hi vairāṇi śāmyanti dīrghakālakṛtāny api
GE07mbh_05_u:070.062c: ākhyātāraś ca vidyante pumāṃś cotpadyate kule
GE07mbh_05_u:070.063a: na cāpi vairaṃ vaireṇa keśava vyupaśāmyati
GE07mbh_05_u:070.064a: ato 'nyathā nāsti śāntir nityam antaram antataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:070.065c: tasya tyāgena vā śāntir nivṛttyā manaso 'pi vā
GE07mbh_05_u:070.066c: phalanirvṛttir iddhā syāt tan nṛśaṃsataraṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_05_u:070.067a: yā tu tyāgena śāntiḥ syāt tad ṛte vadha eva saḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:070.067c: saṃśayāc ca samucchedād dviṣatām ātmanas tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:070.068a: na ca tyaktuṃ tad icchāmo na cecchāmaḥ kulakṣayam
GE07mbh_05_u:070.068c: atra yā praṇipātena śāntiḥ saiva garīyasī
GE07mbh_05_u:070.070c: tac chunām iva gopāde paṇḍitair upalakṣitam
GE07mbh_05_u:070.072a: tatra yo balavān kṛṣṇa jitvā so 'tti tad āmiṣam
GE07mbh_05_u:070.072c: evam eva manuṣyeṣu viśeṣo nāsti kaś cana
GE07mbh_05_u:070.073a: sarvathā tv etad ucitaṃ durbaleṣu balīyasām
GE07mbh_05_u:070.073c: anādaro virodhaś ca praṇipātī hi durbalaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:070.074a: pitā rājā ca vṛddhaś ca sarvathā mānam arhati
GE07mbh_05_u:070.074c: tasmān mānyaś ca pūjyaś ca dhṛtarāṣṭro janārdana
GE07mbh_05_u:070.076a: tatra kiṃ manyase kṛṣṇa prāptakālam anantaram
GE07mbh_05_u:070.076c: katham arthāc ca dharmāc ca na hīyemahi mādhava
GE07mbh_05_u:070.077a: īdṛśe hy arthakṛcchre 'smin kam anyaṃ madhusūdana
GE07mbh_05_u:070.078a: priyaś ca priyakāmaś ca gatijñaḥ sarvakarmaṇām
GE07mbh_05_u:070.078c: ko hi kṛṣṇāsti nas tvādṛk sarvaniścayavit suhṛt
GE07mbh_05_u:070.079c: ubhayor eva vām arthe yāsyāmi kurusaṃsadam
GE07mbh_05_u:070.080a: śamaṃ tatra labheyaṃ ced yuṣmadartham ahāpayan
GE07mbh_05_u:070.080c: puṇyaṃ me sumahad rājaṃś caritaṃ syān mahāphalam
GE07mbh_05_u:070.081c: pāṇḍavān dhārtarāṣṭrāṃś ca sarvāṃ ca pṛthivīm imām
GE07mbh_05_u:070.082a: na mamaitan mataṃ kṛṣṇa yat tvaṃ yāyāḥ kurūn prati
GE07mbh_05_u:070.082c: suyodhanaḥ sūktam api na kariṣyati te vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:070.082d-0372_01: suyodhanaś ca duṣṭātmā karṇaś ca sahasaubalaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:070.083c: teṣāṃ madhyāvataraṇaṃ tava kṛṣṇa na rocaye
GE07mbh_05_u:070.084a: na hi naḥ prīṇayed dravyaṃ na devatvaṃ kutaḥ sukham
GE07mbh_05_u:070.084c: na ca sarvāmaraiśvaryaṃ tava rodhena mādhava
GE07mbh_05_u:070.086a: na cāpi mama paryāptāḥ sahitāḥ sarvapārthivāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:070.087a: atha cet te pravarteran mayi kiṃ cid asāṃpratam
GE07mbh_05_u:070.087c: nirdaheyaṃ kurūn sarvān iti me dhīyate matiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:070.088a: na jātu gamanaṃ tatra bhavet pārtha nirarthakam
GE07mbh_05_u:070.088c: arthaprāptiḥ kadā cit syād antato vāpy avācyatā
GE07mbh_05_u:070.089a: yat tubhyaṃ rocate kṛṣṇa svasti prāpnuhi kauravān
GE07mbh_05_u:070.090a: viṣvaksena kurūn gatvā bhāratāñ śamayeḥ prabho
GE07mbh_05_u:070.090c: yathā sarve sumanasaḥ saha syāmaḥ sucetasaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:070.091a: bhrātā cāsi sakhā cāsi bībhatsor mama ca priyaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:070.092a: asmān vettha parān vettha vetthārthaṃ vettha bhāṣitam
GE07mbh_05_u:070.092c: yad yad asmaddhitaṃ kṛṣṇa tat tad vācyaḥ suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:070.093a: yad yad dharmeṇa saṃyuktam upapadyed dhitaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:070.093c: tat tat keśava bhāṣethāḥ sāntvaṃ vā yadi vetarat
GE07mbh_05_u:071.001a: saṃjayasya śrutaṃ vākyaṃ bhavataś ca śrutaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_05_u:071.001c: sarvaṃ jānāmy abhiprāyaṃ teṣāṃ ca bhavataś ca yaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:071.002a: tava dharmāśritā buddhis teṣāṃ vairāśritā matiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:071.002c: yad ayuddhena labhyeta tat te bahumataṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_05_u:071.003a: na ca tan naiṣṭhikaṃ karma kṣatriyasya viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_05_u:071.003c: āhur āśramiṇaḥ sarve yad bhaikṣaṃ kṣatriyaś caret
GE07mbh_05_u:071.004a: jayo vadho vā saṃgrāme dhātrā diṣṭaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:071.005a: na hi kārpaṇyam āsthāya śakyā vṛttir yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_05_u:071.007a: na paryāyo 'sti yat sāmyaṃ tvayi kuryur viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_05_u:071.008c: tāvad ete hariṣyanti tava rājyam ariṃdama
GE07mbh_05_u:071.009a: nānukrośān na kārpaṇyān na ca dharmārthakāraṇāt
GE07mbh_05_u:071.009c: alaṃ kartuṃ dhārtarāṣṭrās tava kāmam ariṃdama
GE07mbh_05_u:071.010a: etad eva nimittaṃ te pāṇḍavās tu yathā tvayi
GE07mbh_05_u:071.011b-0373_01: brāhmaṇānāṃ ca sādhūnāṃ rājñaś ca nagarasya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:071.012c: yat tvām upadhinā rājan dyūtenāvañcayat tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:071.012e: na cāpatrapate pāpo nṛśaṃsas tena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_05_u:071.013c: vadhyās te sarvalokasya kiṃ punas tava bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:071.014c: ślāghamānaḥ prahṛṣṭaḥ san bhāṣate bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_05_u:071.015a: etāvat pāṇḍavānāṃ hi nāsti kiṃ cid iha svakam
GE07mbh_05_u:071.015c: nāmadheyaṃ ca gotraṃ ca tad apy eṣāṃ na śiṣyate
GE07mbh_05_u:071.016d-0374_06: dharmapāśanibaddhāś ca na kiṃ cit pratipedire
GE07mbh_05_u:071.017a: etāś cānyāś ca paruṣā vācaḥ sa samudīrayan
GE07mbh_05_u:071.017c: ślāghate jñātimadhye sma tvayi pravrajite vanam
GE07mbh_05_u:071.018a: ye tatrāsan samānītās te dṛṣṭvā tvām anāgasam
GE07mbh_05_u:071.018c: aśrukaṇṭhā rudantaś ca sabhāyām āsate tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:071.019a: na cainam abhyanandaṃs te rājāno brāhmaṇaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_05_u:071.019c: sarve duryodhanaṃ tatra nindanti sma sabhāsadaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:071.020a: kulīnasya ca yā nindā vadhaś cāmitrakarśana
GE07mbh_05_u:071.020c: mahāguṇo vadho rājan na tu nindā kujīvikā
GE07mbh_05_u:071.022a: īṣatkāryo vadhas tasya yasya cāritram īdṛśam
GE07mbh_05_u:071.023c: jahy enaṃ tvam amitraghna mā rājan vicikitsithāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:071.024a: sarvathā tvatkṣamaṃ caitad rocate ca mamānagha
GE07mbh_05_u:071.024c: yat tvaṃ pitari bhīṣme ca praṇipātaṃ samācareḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:071.025a: ahaṃ tu sarvalokasya gatvā chetsyāmi saṃśayam
GE07mbh_05_u:071.025c: yeṣām asti dvidhābhāvo rājan duryodhanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_05_u:071.026a: madhye rājñām ahaṃ tatra prātipauruṣikān guṇān
GE07mbh_05_u:071.026c: tava saṃkīrtayiṣyāmi ye ca tasya vyatikramāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:071.027a: bruvatas tatra me vākyaṃ dharmārthasahitaṃ hitam
GE07mbh_05_u:071.030a: śamaṃ ced yācamānas tvaṃ na dharmaṃ tatra lapsyase
GE07mbh_05_u:071.031c: hate duryodhane rājan yad anyat kriyatām iti
GE07mbh_05_u:071.032a: yātvā cāhaṃ kurūn sarvān yuṣmadartham ahāpayan
GE07mbh_05_u:071.032c: yatiṣye praśamaṃ kartuṃ lakṣayiṣye ca ceṣṭitam
GE07mbh_05_u:071.034a: sarvathā yuddham evāham āśaṃsāmi paraiḥ saha
GE07mbh_05_u:071.034c: nimittāni hi sarvāṇi tathā prādurbhavanti me
GE07mbh_05_u:071.035a: mṛgāḥ śakuntāś ca vadanti ghoraṃ; hastyaśvamukhyeṣu niśāmukheṣu
GE07mbh_05_u:071.035c: ghorāṇi rūpāṇi tathaiva cāgnir; varṇān bahūn puṣyati ghorarūpān
GE07mbh_05_u:071.035e: manuṣyalokakṣapaṇo 'tha ghoro; no ced anuprāpta ihāntakaḥ syāt
GE07mbh_05_u:071.036a: śastrāṇi patraṃ kavacān rathāṃś ca; nāgān dhvajāṃś ca pratipādayitvā
GE07mbh_05_u:071.036c: yodhāś ca sarve kṛtaniśramās te; bhavantu hastyaśvaratheṣu yattāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:071.036e: sāṃgrāmikaṃ te yad upārjanīyaṃ; sarvaṃ samagraṃ kuru tan narendra
GE07mbh_05_u:071.037a: duryodhano na hy alam adya dātuṃ; jīvaṃs tavaitan nṛpate kathaṃ cit
GE07mbh_05_u:071.037c: yat te purastād abhavat samṛddhaṃ; dyūte hṛtaṃ pāṇḍavamukhya rājyam
GE07mbh_05_u:072.001a: yathā yathaiva śāntiḥ syāt kurūṇāṃ madhusūdana
GE07mbh_05_u:072.001c: tathā tathaiva bhāṣethā mā sma yuddhena bhīṣayeḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:072.003a: prakṛtyā pāpasattvaś ca tulyacetāś ca dasyubhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:072.005a: mriyetāpi na bhajyeta naiva jahyāt svakaṃ matam
GE07mbh_05_u:072.006c: pratihanty eva suhṛdāṃ vācaś caiva manāṃsi ca
GE07mbh_05_u:072.007a: sa manyuvaśam āpannaḥ svabhāvaṃ duṣṭam āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:072.007c: svabhāvāt pāpam anveti tṛṇais tunna ivoragaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:072.008a: duryodhano hi yat senaḥ sarvathā viditas tava
GE07mbh_05_u:072.009a: purā prasannāḥ kuravaḥ sahaputrās tathā vayam
GE07mbh_05_u:072.011c: ye samuccicchidur jñātīn suhṛdaś ca sabāndhavān
GE07mbh_05_u:072.017a: śamaś ca nandivegānām ity ete kulapāṃsanāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:072.018a: apy ayaṃ naḥ kurūṇāṃ syād yugānte kālasaṃbhṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:072.019a: tasmān mṛdu śanair enaṃ brūyā dharmārthasaṃhitam
GE07mbh_05_u:072.020a: api duryodhanaṃ kṛṣṇa sarve vayam adhaścarāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:072.020c: nīcair bhūtvānuyāsyāmo mā sma no bharatā naśan
GE07mbh_05_u:072.021a: apy udāsīnavṛttiḥ syād yathā naḥ kurubhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_05_u:072.021c: vāsudeva tathā kāryaṃ na kurūn anayaḥ spṛśet
GE07mbh_05_u:072.022a: vācyaḥ pitāmaho vṛddho ye ca kṛṣṇa sabhāsadaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:072.023a: aham etad bravīmy evaṃ rājā caiva praśaṃsati
GE07mbh_05_u:072.023c: arjuno naiva yuddhārthī bhūyasī hi dayārjune
GE07mbh_05_u:073.001a: etac chrutvā mahābāhuḥ keśavaḥ prahasann iva
GE07mbh_05_u:073.002a: girer iva laghutvaṃ tac chītatvam iva pāvake
GE07mbh_05_u:073.004a: tvam anyadā bhīmasena yuddham eva praśaṃsasi
GE07mbh_05_u:073.005a: na ca svapiṣi jāgarṣi nyubjaḥ śeṣe paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_05_u:073.005c: ghorām aśāntāṃ ruśatīṃ sadā vācaṃ prabhāṣase
GE07mbh_05_u:073.007a: ekānte niṣṭanañ śeṣe bhārārta iva durbalaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:073.007c: api tvāṃ ke cid unmattaṃ manyante 'tadvido janāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:073.008a: ārujya vṛkṣān nirmūlān gajaḥ paribhujann iva
GE07mbh_05_u:073.008c: nighnan padbhiḥ kṣitiṃ bhīma niṣṭanan paridhāvasi
GE07mbh_05_u:073.009c: nānyaṃ niśi divā vāpi kadā cid abhinandasi
GE07mbh_05_u:073.010a: akasmāt smayamānaś ca rahasy āsse rudann iva
GE07mbh_05_u:073.010c: jānvor mūrdhānam ādhāya ciram āsse pramīlitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:073.011a: bhrukuṭiṃ ca punaḥ kurvann oṣṭhau ca vilihann iva
GE07mbh_05_u:073.011c: abhīkṣṇaṃ dṛśyase bhīma sarvaṃ tan manyukāritam
GE07mbh_05_u:073.012a: yathā purastāt savitā dṛśyate śukram uccaran
GE07mbh_05_u:073.012c: yathā ca paścān nirmukto dhruvaṃ paryeti raśmivān
GE07mbh_05_u:073.013a: tathā satyaṃ bravīmy etan nāsti tasya vyatikramaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:073.014a: iti sma madhye bhrātṝṇāṃ satyenālabhase gadām
GE07mbh_05_u:073.014c: tasya te praśame buddhir dhīyate 'dya paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_05_u:073.015c: paśyasīvāpratīpāni kiṃ tvāṃ bhīr bhīma vindati
GE07mbh_05_u:073.016c: svapnānte jāgarānte ca tasmāt praśamam icchasi
GE07mbh_05_u:073.017a: aho nāśaṃsase kiṃ cit puṃstvaṃ klība ivātmani
GE07mbh_05_u:073.018a: udvepate te hṛdayaṃ manas te praviṣīdati
GE07mbh_05_u:073.019a: anityaṃ kila martyasya cittaṃ pārtha calācalam
GE07mbh_05_u:073.020a: tavaiṣā vikṛtā buddhir gavāṃ vāg iva mānuṣī
GE07mbh_05_u:073.021a: idaṃ me mahad āścaryaṃ parvatasyeva sarpaṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:073.022a: sa dṛṣṭvā svāni karmāṇi kule janma ca bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:073.022c: uttiṣṭhasva viṣādaṃ mā kṛthā vīra sthiro bhava
GE07mbh_05_u:073.023a: na caitad anurūpaṃ te yat te glānir ariṃdama
GE07mbh_05_u:073.023c: yad ojasā na labhate kṣatriyo na tad aśnute
GE07mbh_05_u:074.003a: vettha dāśārha sattvaṃ me dīrghakālaṃ sahoṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:074.003c: uta vā māṃ na jānāsi plavan hrada ivālpavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:074.003e: tasmād apratirūpābhir vāgbhir māṃ tvaṃ samarchasi
GE07mbh_05_u:074.004a: kathaṃ hi bhīmasenaṃ māṃ jānan kaś cana mādhava
GE07mbh_05_u:074.004c: brūyād apratirūpāṇi yathā māṃ vaktum arhasi
GE07mbh_05_u:074.005c: ātmanaḥ pauruṣaṃ caiva balaṃ ca na samaṃ paraiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:074.007a: paśyeme rodasī kṛṣṇa yayor āsann imāḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:074.007c: acale cāpy anante ca pratiṣṭhe sarvamātarau
GE07mbh_05_u:074.008a: yadīme sahasā kruddhe sameyātāṃ śile iva
GE07mbh_05_u:074.009c: ya etat prāpya mucyeta na taṃ paśyāmi pūruṣam
GE07mbh_05_u:074.010a: himavāṃś ca samudraś ca vajrī ca balabhit svayam
GE07mbh_05_u:074.010c: mayābhipannaṃ trāyeran balam āsthāya na trayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:074.012a: na hi tvaṃ nābhijānāsi mama vikramam acyuta
GE07mbh_05_u:074.012c: yathā mayā vinirjitya rājāno vaśagāḥ kṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:074.013a: atha cen māṃ na jānāsi sūryasyevodyataḥ prabhām
GE07mbh_05_u:074.013c: vigāḍhe yudhi saṃbādhe vetsyase māṃ janārdana
GE07mbh_05_u:074.014a: kiṃ mātyavākṣīḥ paruṣair vraṇaṃ sūcyā ivānagha
GE07mbh_05_u:074.014c: yathāmati bravīmy etad viddhi mām adhikaṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:074.015c: mayā praṇunnān mātaṅgān rathinaḥ sādinas tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:074.016c: draṣṭā māṃ tvaṃ ca lokaś ca vikarṣantaṃ varān varān
GE07mbh_05_u:074.017a: na me sīdanti majjāno na mamodvepate manaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:074.017c: sarvalokād abhikruddhān na bhayaṃ vidyate mama
GE07mbh_05_u:074.018a: kiṃ tu sauhṛdam evaitat kṛpayā madhusūdana
GE07mbh_05_u:074.018c: sarvāṃs titikṣe saṃkleśān mā sma no bharatā naśan
GE07mbh_05_u:075.001c: na cākṣepān na pāṇḍityān na krodhān na vivakṣayā
GE07mbh_05_u:075.002a: vedāhaṃ tava māhātmyam uta te veda yad balam
GE07mbh_05_u:075.002c: uta te veda karmāṇi na tvāṃ paribhavāmy aham
GE07mbh_05_u:075.003c: sahasraguṇam apy etat tvayi saṃbhāvayāmy aham
GE07mbh_05_u:075.004c: bandhubhiś ca suhṛdbhiś ca bhīma tvam asi tādṛśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:075.006a: sa eva hetur bhūtvā hi puruṣasyārthasiddhiṣu
GE07mbh_05_u:075.006c: vināśe 'pi sa evāsya saṃdigdhaṃ karma pauruṣam
GE07mbh_05_u:075.009a: daivam apy akṛtaṃ karma pauruṣeṇa vihanyate
GE07mbh_05_u:075.009c: śītam uṣṇaṃ tathā varṣaṃ kṣutpipāse ca bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:075.010c: tasmād anavarodhaś ca vidyate tatra lakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:075.012a: ya evaṃ kṛtabuddhiḥ san karmasv eva pravartate
GE07mbh_05_u:075.012c: nāsiddhau vyathate tasya na siddhau harṣam aśnute
GE07mbh_05_u:075.014c: viṣādam arched glāniṃ vā etadarthaṃ bravīmi te
GE07mbh_05_u:075.016a: śamaṃ cet te kariṣyanti tato 'nantaṃ yaśo mama
GE07mbh_05_u:075.016c: bhavatāṃ ca kṛtaḥ kāmas teṣāṃ ca śreya uttamam
GE07mbh_05_u:075.017a: te ced abhinivekṣyanti nābhyupaiṣyanti me vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:075.017c: kuravo yuddham evātra raudraṃ karma bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:075.018a: asmin yuddhe bhīmasena tvayi bhāraḥ samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:075.018c: dhūr arjunena dhāryā syād voḍhavya itaro janaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:075.019a: ahaṃ hi yantā bībhatsor bhavitā saṃyuge sati
GE07mbh_05_u:075.019c: dhanaṃjayasyaiṣa kāmo na hi yuddhaṃ na kāmaye
GE07mbh_05_u:075.020c: tudann aklībayā vācā tejas te samadīpayam
GE07mbh_05_u:076.001c: tava vākyaṃ tu me śrutvā pratibhāti paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_05_u:076.002a: naiva praśamam atra tvaṃ manyase sukaraṃ prabho
GE07mbh_05_u:076.002c: lobhād vā dhṛtarāṣṭrasya dainyād vā samupasthitāt
GE07mbh_05_u:076.004a: tad idaṃ bhāṣitaṃ vākyaṃ tathā ca na tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:076.004c: na caitad evaṃ draṣṭavyam asādhyam iti kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:076.005a: kiṃ caitan manyase kṛcchram asmākaṃ pāpam āditaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:076.005c: kurvanti teṣāṃ karmāṇi yeṣāṃ nāsti phalodayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:076.006a: saṃpādyamānaṃ samyak ca syāt karma saphalaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_05_u:076.006c: sa tathā kṛṣṇa vartasva yathā śarma bhavet paraiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:076.007a: pāṇḍavānāṃ kurūṇāṃ ca bhavān paramakaḥ suhṛt
GE07mbh_05_u:076.007c: surāṇām asurāṇāṃ ca yathā vīra prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:076.008c: asmaddhitam anuṣṭhātuṃ na manye tava duṣkaram
GE07mbh_05_u:076.009a: evaṃ cet kāryatām eti kāryaṃ tava janārdana
GE07mbh_05_u:076.009c: gamanād evam eva tvaṃ kariṣyasi na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:076.010a: cikīrṣitam athānyat te tasmin vīra durātmani
GE07mbh_05_u:076.010c: bhaviṣyati tathā sarvaṃ yathā tava cikīrṣitam
GE07mbh_05_u:076.011a: śarma taiḥ saha vā no 'stu tava vā yac cikīrṣitam
GE07mbh_05_u:076.011c: vicāryamāṇo yaḥ kāmas tava kṛṣṇa sa no guruḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:076.012a: na sa nārhati duṣṭātmā vadhaṃ sasutabāndhavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:076.012c: yena dharmasute dṛṣṭvā na sā śrīr upamarṣitā
GE07mbh_05_u:076.014a: kathaṃ hi puruṣo jātaḥ kṣatriyeṣu dhanurdharaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:076.015a: adharmeṇa jitān dṛṣṭvā vane pravrajitāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:076.016a: na caitad adbhutaṃ kṛṣṇa mitrārthe yac cikīrṣasi
GE07mbh_05_u:076.016c: kriyā kathaṃ nu mukhyā syān mṛdunā vetareṇa vā
GE07mbh_05_u:076.017a: atha vā manyase jyāyān vadhas teṣām anantaram
GE07mbh_05_u:076.017c: tad eva kriyatām āśu na vicāryam atas tvayā
GE07mbh_05_u:076.018a: jānāsi hi yathā tena draupadī pāpabuddhinā
GE07mbh_05_u:076.018c: parikliṣṭā sabhāmadhye tac ca tasyāpi marṣitam
GE07mbh_05_u:076.019a: sa nāma samyag varteta pāṇḍaveṣv iti mādhava
GE07mbh_05_u:076.019c: na me saṃjāyate buddhir bījam uptam ivoṣare
GE07mbh_05_u:076.020a: tasmād yan manyase yuktaṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ ca yad dhitam
GE07mbh_05_u:076.020c: tad āśu kuru vārṣṇeya yan naḥ kāryam anantaram
GE07mbh_05_u:077.001a: evam etan mahābāho yathā vadasi pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_05_u:077.001c: sarvaṃ tv idaṃ samāyattaṃ bībhatso karmaṇor dvayoḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:077.002c: ṛte varṣaṃ na kaunteya jātu nirvartayet phalam
GE07mbh_05_u:077.003a: tatra vai pauruṣaṃ brūyur āsekaṃ yatnakāritam
GE07mbh_05_u:077.003c: tatra cāpi dhruvaṃ paśyec choṣaṇaṃ daivakāritam
GE07mbh_05_u:077.004a: tad idaṃ niścitaṃ buddhyā pūrvair api mahātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:077.004c: daive ca mānuṣe caiva saṃyuktaṃ lokakāraṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:077.005a: ahaṃ hi tat kariṣyāmi paraṃ puruṣakārataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:077.005c: daivaṃ tu na mayā śakyaṃ karma kartuṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:077.006a: sa hi dharmaṃ ca satyaṃ ca tyaktvā carati durmatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:077.006c: na hi saṃtapyate tena tathārūpeṇa karmaṇā
GE07mbh_05_u:077.007a: tāṃ cāpi buddhiṃ pāpiṣṭhāṃ vardhayanty asya mantriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:077.007c: śakuniḥ sūtaputraś ca bhrātā duḥśāsanas tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:077.008a: sa hi tyāgena rājyasya na śamaṃ samupeṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:077.009a: na cāpi praṇipātena tyaktum icchati dharmarāṭ
GE07mbh_05_u:077.009c: yācyamānas tu rājyaṃ sa na pradāsyati durmatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:077.010a: na tu manye sa tad vācyo yad yudhiṣṭhiraśāsanam
GE07mbh_05_u:077.011a: tathā pāpas tu tat sarvaṃ na kariṣyati kauravaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:077.012a: mama cāpi sa vadhyo vai jagataś cāpi bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:077.012c: yena kaumārake yūyaṃ sarve viprakṛtās tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:077.013a: vipraluptaṃ ca vo rājyaṃ nṛśaṃsena durātmanā
GE07mbh_05_u:077.013c: na copaśāmyate pāpaḥ śriyaṃ dṛṣṭvā yudhiṣṭhire
GE07mbh_05_u:077.014a: asakṛc cāpy ahaṃ tena tvatkṛte pārtha bheditaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:077.014c: na mayā tad gṛhītaṃ ca pāpaṃ tasya cikīrṣitam
GE07mbh_05_u:077.015a: jānāsi hi mahābāho tvam apy asya paraṃ matam
GE07mbh_05_u:077.015c: priyaṃ cikīrṣamāṇaṃ ca dharmarājasya mām api
GE07mbh_05_u:077.016a: sa jānaṃs tasya cātmānaṃ mama caiva paraṃ matam
GE07mbh_05_u:077.017a: yac cāpi paramaṃ divyaṃ tac cāpy avagataṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_05_u:077.017c: vidhānavihitaṃ pārtha kathaṃ śarma bhavet paraiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:077.018a: yat tu vācā mayā śakyaṃ karmaṇā cāpi pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_05_u:077.018c: kariṣye tad ahaṃ pārtha na tv āśaṃse śamaṃ paraiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:077.019a: kathaṃ goharaṇe brūyād icchañ śarma tathāvidham
GE07mbh_05_u:077.020a: tadaiva te parābhūtā yadā saṃkalpitās tvayā
GE07mbh_05_u:077.020c: lavaśaḥ kṣaṇaśaś cāpi na ca tuṣṭaḥ suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:077.021a: sarvathā tu mayā kāryaṃ dharmarājasya śāsanam
GE07mbh_05_u:077.021c: vibhāvyaṃ tasya bhūyaś ca karma pāpaṃ durātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:078.002a: matam ājñāya rājñaś ca bhīmasenena mādhava
GE07mbh_05_u:078.003a: tathaiva phalgunenāpi yad uktaṃ tat tvayā śrutam
GE07mbh_05_u:078.003c: ātmanaś ca mataṃ vīra kathitaṃ bhavatāsakṛt
GE07mbh_05_u:078.004a: sarvam etad atikramya śrutvā paramataṃ bhavān
GE07mbh_05_u:078.004c: yat prāptakālaṃ manyethās tat kuryāḥ puruṣottama
GE07mbh_05_u:078.005a: tasmiṃs tasmin nimitte hi mataṃ bhavati keśava
GE07mbh_05_u:078.006a: anyathā cintito hy arthaḥ punar bhavati so 'nyathā
GE07mbh_05_u:078.007a: anyathā buddhayo hy āsann asmāsu vanavāsiṣu
GE07mbh_05_u:078.007c: adṛśyeṣv anyathā kṛṣṇa dṛśyeṣu punar anyathā
GE07mbh_05_u:078.008a: asmākam api vārṣṇeya vane vicaratāṃ tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:078.008c: na tathā praṇayo rājye yathā saṃprati vartate
GE07mbh_05_u:078.010c: āttaśastrān raṇe dṛṣṭvā na vyathed iha kaḥ pumān
GE07mbh_05_u:078.011a: sa bhavān kurumadhye taṃ sāntvapūrvaṃ bhayānvitam
GE07mbh_05_u:078.011c: brūyād vākyaṃ yathā mando na vyatheta suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:078.012c: sahadevaṃ ca māṃ caiva tvāṃ ca rāmaṃ ca keśava
GE07mbh_05_u:078.013a: sātyakiṃ ca mahāvīryaṃ virāṭaṃ ca sahātmajam
GE07mbh_05_u:078.013c: drupadaṃ ca sahāmātyaṃ dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca pārṣatam
GE07mbh_05_u:078.014a: kāśirājaṃ ca vikrāntaṃ dhṛṣṭaketuṃ ca cedipam
GE07mbh_05_u:078.015a: sa bhavān gamanād eva sādhayiṣyaty asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_05_u:078.016a: viduraś caiva bhīṣmaś ca droṇaś ca sahabāhlikaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:078.018a: śrotā cārthasya viduras tvaṃ ca vaktā janārdana
GE07mbh_05_u:078.018c: kam ivārthaṃ vivartantaṃ sthāpayetāṃ na vartmani
GE07mbh_05_u:079.001a: yad etat kathitaṃ rājñā dharma eṣa sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:079.001c: yathā tu yuddham eva syāt tathā kāryam ariṃdama
GE07mbh_05_u:079.002a: yadi praśamam iccheyuḥ kuravaḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_05_u:079.002c: tathāpi yuddhaṃ dāśārha yojayethāḥ sahaiva taiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:079.003a: kathaṃ nu dṛṣṭvā pāñcālīṃ tathā kliṣṭāṃ sabhāgatām
GE07mbh_05_u:079.004a: yadi bhīmārjunau kṛṣṇa dharmarājaś ca dhārmikaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:079.004c: dharmam utsṛjya tenāhaṃ yoddhum icchāmi saṃyuge
GE07mbh_05_u:079.004d-0378_02: kṛcchre vane vā vastavyaṃ pure vā nāgasāhvaye
GE07mbh_05_u:079.005c: duryodhanavadhe śāntis tasya kopasya me bhavet
GE07mbh_05_u:079.006a: jānāsi hi yathā dṛṣṭvā cīrājinadharān vane
GE07mbh_05_u:079.006c: tavāpi manyur udbhūto duḥkhitān prekṣya pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_05_u:079.007a: tasmān mādrīsutaḥ śūro yad āha puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:079.008a: evaṃ vadati vākyaṃ tu yuyudhāne mahāmatau
GE07mbh_05_u:079.009a: sarve hi sarvato vīrās tad vacaḥ pratyapūjayan
GE07mbh_05_u:079.009c: sādhu sādhv iti śaineyaṃ harṣayanto yuyutsavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:080.001a: rājñas tu vacanaṃ śrutvā dharmārthasahitaṃ hitam
GE07mbh_05_u:080.002c: saṃpūjya sahadevaṃ ca sātyakiṃ ca mahāratham
GE07mbh_05_u:080.004c: yathā nikṛtim āsthāya bhraṃśitāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ sukhāt
GE07mbh_05_u:080.005c: yathā ca saṃjayo rājñā mantraṃ rahasi śrāvitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:080.006a: yudhiṣṭhireṇa dāśārha tac cāpi viditaṃ tava
GE07mbh_05_u:080.006c: yathoktaḥ saṃjayaś caiva tac ca sarvaṃ śrutaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_05_u:080.007a: pañca nas tāta dīyantāṃ grāmā iti mahādyute
GE07mbh_05_u:080.008a: avasānaṃ mahābāho kiṃ cid eva tu pañcamam
GE07mbh_05_u:080.008c: iti duryodhano vācyaḥ suhṛdaś cāsya keśava
GE07mbh_05_u:080.009a: tac cāpi nākarod vākyaṃ śrutvā kṛṣṇa suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:080.010c: saṃdhim icchen na kartavyas tatra gatvā kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:080.011a: śakṣyanti hi mahābāho pāṇḍavāḥ sṛñjayaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_05_u:080.012a: na hi sāmnā na dānena śakyo 'rthas teṣu kaś cana
GE07mbh_05_u:080.012c: tasmāt teṣu na kartavyā kṛpā te madhusūdana
GE07mbh_05_u:080.013a: sāmnā dānena vā kṛṣṇa ye na śāmyanti śatravaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:080.013c: moktavyas teṣu daṇḍaḥ syāj jīvitaṃ parirakṣatā
GE07mbh_05_u:080.014a: tasmāt teṣu mahādaṇḍaḥ kṣeptavyaḥ kṣipram acyuta
GE07mbh_05_u:080.014c: tvayā caiva mahābāho pāṇḍavaiḥ saha sṛñjayaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:080.015a: etat samarthaṃ pārthānāṃ tava caiva yaśaskaram
GE07mbh_05_u:080.015c: kriyamāṇaṃ bhavet kṛṣṇa kṣatrasya ca sukhāvaham
GE07mbh_05_u:080.016a: kṣatriyeṇa hi hantavyaḥ kṣatriyo lobham āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:080.018c: sa vadhyasyāvadhe dṛṣṭa iti dharmavido viduḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:080.019a: yathā tvāṃ na spṛśed eṣa doṣaḥ kṛṣṇa tathā kuru
GE07mbh_05_u:080.019c: pāṇḍavaiḥ saha dāśārha sṛñjayaiś ca sasainikaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:080.020a: punar uktaṃ ca vakṣyāmi viśrambheṇa janārdana
GE07mbh_05_u:080.020c: kā nu sīmantinī mādṛk pṛthivyām asti keśava
GE07mbh_05_u:080.021c: dhṛṣṭadyumnasya bhaginī tava kṛṣṇa priyā sakhī
GE07mbh_05_u:080.023a: sutā me pañcabhir vīraiḥ pañca jātā mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:080.023c: abhimanyur yathā kṛṣṇa tathā te tava dharmataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:080.024a: sāhaṃ keśagrahaṃ prāptā parikliṣṭā sabhāṃ gatā
GE07mbh_05_u:080.026c: trāhi mām iti govinda manasā kāṅkṣito 'si me
GE07mbh_05_u:080.027a: yatra māṃ bhagavān rājā śvaśuro vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:080.027c: varaṃ vṛṇīṣva pāñcāli varārhāsi matāsi me
GE07mbh_05_u:080.028a: adāsāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ santu sarathāḥ sāyudhā iti
GE07mbh_05_u:080.030a: nanv ahaṃ kṛṣṇa bhīṣmasya dhṛtarāṣṭrasya cobhayoḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:080.031a: dhig balaṃ bhīmasenasya dhik pārthasya dhanuṣmatām
GE07mbh_05_u:080.031c: yatra duryodhanaḥ kṛṣṇa muhūrtam api jīvati
GE07mbh_05_u:080.032a: yadi te 'ham anugrāhyā yadi te 'sti kṛpā mayi
GE07mbh_05_u:080.032c: dhārtarāṣṭreṣu vai kopaḥ sarvaḥ kṛṣṇa vidhīyatām
GE07mbh_05_u:080.037c: pitā me yotsyate vṛddhaḥ saha putrair mahārathaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:080.038a: pañca caiva mahāvīryāḥ putrā me madhusūdana
GE07mbh_05_u:080.039c: yady ahaṃ taṃ na paśyāmi kā śāntir hṛdayasya me
GE07mbh_05_u:080.040a: trayodaśa hi varṣāṇi pratīkṣantyā gatāni me
GE07mbh_05_u:080.040c: nidhāya hṛdaye manyuṃ pradīptam iva pāvakam
GE07mbh_05_u:080.046a: ahaṃ ca tat kariṣyāmi bhīmārjunayamaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_05_u:080.047a: dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ kālapakvā na cec chṛṇvanti me vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:080.048a: caled dhi himavāñ śailo medinī śatadhā bhavet
GE07mbh_05_u:080.048c: dyauḥ patec ca sanakṣatrā na me moghaṃ vaco bhavet
GE07mbh_05_u:080.048d-0379_01: dyauḥ patet pṛthivī śīryed dhimavāñ chithilībhavet
GE07mbh_05_u:080.048d-0380_01: śuṣyet toyanidhiḥ kṛṣṇe na me moghaṃ vaco bhavet
GE07mbh_05_u:080.049a: satyaṃ te pratijānāmi kṛṣṇe bāṣpo nigṛhyatām
GE07mbh_05_u:080.049c: hatāmitrāñ śriyā yuktān acirād drakṣyase patīn
GE07mbh_05_u:081.001a: kurūṇām adya sarveṣāṃ bhavān suhṛd anuttamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:081.001c: saṃbandhī dayito nityam ubhayoḥ pakṣayor api
GE07mbh_05_u:081.002c: samarthaḥ praśamaṃ caiṣāṃ kartuṃ tvam asi keśava
GE07mbh_05_u:081.003c: śāntyarthaṃ bhārataṃ brūyā yat tad vācyam amitrahan
GE07mbh_05_u:081.004a: tvayā dharmārthayuktaṃ ced uktaṃ śivam anāmayam
GE07mbh_05_u:081.004c: hitaṃ nādāsyate bālo diṣṭasya vaśam eṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:081.005a: dharmyam asmaddhitaṃ caiva kurūṇāṃ yad anāmayam
GE07mbh_05_u:081.006a: tato vyapete tamasi sūrye vimala udgate
GE07mbh_05_u:081.008a: maṅgalyāḥ puṇyanirghoṣā vācaḥ śṛṇvaṃś ca sūnṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:081.009a: kṛtvā paurvāhṇikaṃ kṛtyaṃ snātaḥ śucir alaṃkṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:081.010a: ṛṣabhaṃ pṛṣṭha ālabhya brāhmaṇān abhivādya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:081.010c: agniṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā paśyan kalyāṇam agrataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:081.012a: ratha āropyatāṃ śaṅkhaś cakraṃ ca gadayā saha
GE07mbh_05_u:081.012c: upāsaṅgāś ca śaktyaś ca sarvapraharaṇāni ca
GE07mbh_05_u:081.013a: duryodhano hi duṣṭātmā karṇaś ca sahasaubalaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:081.013c: na ca śatrur avajñeyaḥ prākṛto 'pi balīyasā
GE07mbh_05_u:081.014a: tatas tan matam ājñāya keśavasya puraḥsarāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:081.015a: taṃ dīptam iva kālāgnim ākāśagam ivādhvagam
GE07mbh_05_u:081.016a: ardhacandraiś ca candraiś ca matsyaiḥ samṛgapakṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:081.016c: puṣpaiś ca vividhaiś citraṃ maṇiratnaiś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:081.021c: āruroha rathaṃ śaurir vimānam iva puṇyakṛt
GE07mbh_05_u:081.023c: śivaś cānuvavau vāyuḥ praśāntam abhavad rajaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:081.025c: sārasāḥ śatapatrāś ca haṃsāś ca madhusūdanam
GE07mbh_05_u:081.027a: vasiṣṭho vāmadevaś ca bhūridyumno gayaḥ krathaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:081.029c: pūjitaḥ prayayau kṛṣṇaḥ kurūṇāṃ sadanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_05_u:081.029d-0383_01: devatābhyo namaskṛtya brāhmaṇān svasti vācya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:081.031a: cekitānaś ca vikrānto dhṛṣṭaketuś ca cedipaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:081.031c: drupadaḥ kāśirājaś ca śikhaṇḍī ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:081.032a: dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ saputraś ca virāṭaḥ kekayaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_05_u:081.033c: rājñāṃ sakāśe dyutimān uvācedaṃ vacas tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:081.034a: yo naiva kāmān na bhayān na lobhān nārthakāraṇāt
GE07mbh_05_u:081.037a: yā sā bālyāt prabhṛty asmān paryavardhayatābalā
GE07mbh_05_u:081.040a: asmatkṛte ca satataṃ yayā duḥkhāni mādhava
GE07mbh_05_u:081.040c: anubhūtāny aduḥkhārhā tāṃ sma pṛccher anāmayam
GE07mbh_05_u:081.042c: nikārān atadarhā ca paśyantī duḥkham aśnute
GE07mbh_05_u:081.043a: api jātu sa kālaḥ syāt kṛṣṇa duḥkhaviparyayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:081.043c: yad ahaṃ mātaraṃ kliṣṭāṃ sukhe dadhyām ariṃdama
GE07mbh_05_u:081.045a: na nūnaṃ mriyate duḥkhaiḥ sā cej jīvati keśava
GE07mbh_05_u:081.045c: tathā putrādhibhir gāḍham ārtā hy ānartasatkṛtā
GE07mbh_05_u:081.046a: abhivādyā tu sā kṛṣṇa tvayā madvacanād vibho
GE07mbh_05_u:081.046c: dhṛtarāṣṭraś ca kauravyo rājānaś ca vayo 'dhikāḥ
