GE07mbh_05_u:081.047a: bhīṣmaṃ droṇaṃ kṛpaṃ caiva mahārājaṃ ca bāhlikam
GE07mbh_05_u:081.047c: drauṇiṃ ca somadattaṃ ca sarvāṃś ca bharatān pṛthak
GE07mbh_05_u:081.049a: ity uktvā keśavaṃ tatra rājamadhye yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:081.050a: vrajann eva tu bībhatsuḥ sakhāyaṃ puruṣarṣabham
GE07mbh_05_u:081.051a: yad asmākaṃ vibho vṛttaṃ purā vai mantraniścaye
GE07mbh_05_u:081.052a: tac ced dadyād asaṅgena satkṛtyānavamanya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:081.052c: priyaṃ me syān mahābāho mucyeran mahato bhayāt
GE07mbh_05_u:081.054c: muhur muhuḥ krodhavaśāt prāvepata ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:081.055a: vepamānaś ca kaunteyaḥ prākrośan mahato ravān
GE07mbh_05_u:081.056a: tasya taṃ ninadaṃ śrutvā saṃprāvepanta dhanvinaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:081.057a: ity uktvā keśavaṃ tatra tathā coktvā viniścayam
GE07mbh_05_u:081.060c: brāhmyā śriyā dīpyamānān sthitān ubhayataḥ pathi
GE07mbh_05_u:081.061c: yathāvat tān ṛṣīn sarvān abhyabhāṣata pūjayan
GE07mbh_05_u:081.062a: kaccil lokeṣu kuśalaṃ kaccid dharmaḥ svanuṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:081.062c: brāhmaṇānāṃ trayo varṇāḥ kaccit tiṣṭhanti śāsane
GE07mbh_05_u:081.063a: tebhyaḥ prayujya tāṃ pūjāṃ provāca madhusūdanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:081.063c: bhagavantaḥ kva saṃsiddhāḥ kā vīthī bhavatām iha

GE07mbh_05_u:081.071a: tava vākyāni divyāni tatra teṣāṃ ca mādhava
GE07mbh_05_u:081.071c: śrotum icchāma govinda satyāni ca śubhāni ca
GE07mbh_05_u:081.072c: yāhy avighnena vai vīra drakṣyāmas tvāṃ sabhāgatam
GE07mbh_05_u:082.002a: padātīnāṃ sahasraṃ ca sādināṃ ca paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_05_u:082.002c: bhojyaṃ ca vipulaṃ rājan preṣyāś ca śataśo 'pare
GE07mbh_05_u:082.003c: kāni vā vrajatas tasya nimittāni mahaujasaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:082.004a: tasya prayāṇe yāny āsann adbhutāni mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:082.004c: tāni me śṛṇu divyāni daivāny autpātikāni ca
GE07mbh_05_u:082.005c: anvag eva ca parjanyaḥ prāvarṣad vighane bhṛśam
GE07mbh_05_u:082.006c: viparītā diśaḥ sarvā na prājñāyata kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:082.007c: udapānāś ca kumbhāś ca prāsiñcañ śataśo jalam
GE07mbh_05_u:082.008a: tamaḥsaṃvṛtam apy āsīt sarvaṃ jagad idaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:082.008c: na diśo nādiśo rājan prajñāyante sma reṇunā
GE07mbh_05_u:082.009a: prādurāsīn mahāñ śabdaḥ khe śarīraṃ na dṛśyate

GE07mbh_05_u:082.012a: vavarṣa puṣpavarṣaṃ ca kamalāni ca bhūriśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:082.013a: sa gacchan brāhmaṇai rājaṃs tatra tatra mahābhujaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:082.014a: taṃ kiranti mahātmānaṃ vanyaiḥ puṣpaiḥ sugandhibhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:082.016c: purāṇi ca vyatikrāman rāṣṭrāṇi vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_05_u:082.019a: te tu sarve sunāmānam agnim iddham iva prabhum
GE07mbh_05_u:082.019c: arcayām āsur arcyaṃ taṃ deśātithim upasthitam
GE07mbh_05_u:082.021a: avatīrya rathāt tūrṇaṃ kṛtvā śaucaṃ yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_05_u:082.022a: dāruko 'pi hayān muktvā paricarya ca śāstrataḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:082.023a: abhyatītya tu tat sarvam uvāca madhusūdanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:082.024a: tasya tan matam ājñāya cakrur āvasathaṃ narāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:082.025a: tasmin grāme pradhānās tu ya āsan brāhmaṇā nṛpa

GE07mbh_05_u:082.028a: tān prabhuḥ kṛtam ity uktvā satkṛtya ca yathārhataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:082.028c: abhyetya teṣāṃ veśmāni punar āyāt sahaiva taiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:082.029a: sumṛṣṭaṃ bhojayitvā ca brāhmaṇāṃs tatra keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:082.029c: bhuktvā ca saha taiḥ sarvair avasat tāṃ kṣapāṃ sukham
GE07mbh_05_u:083.002a: droṇaṃ ca saṃjayaṃ caiva viduraṃ ca mahāmatim
GE07mbh_05_u:083.003c: striyo bālāś ca vṛddhāś ca kathayanti gṛhe gṛhe
GE07mbh_05_u:083.004c: pṛthagvādāś ca vartante catvareṣu sabhāsu ca

GE07mbh_05_u:083.006a: tasmin hi yātrā lokasya bhūtānām īśvaro hi saḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:083.006c: tasmin dhṛtiś ca vīryaṃ ca prajñā caujaś ca mādhave
GE07mbh_05_u:083.007a: sa mānyatāṃ naraśreṣṭhaḥ sa hi dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:083.007c: pūjito hi sukhāya syād asukhaḥ syād apūjitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:083.008a: sa cet tuṣyati dāśārha upacārair ariṃdamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:083.010a: yathā prītir mahābāho tvayi jāyeta tasya vai
GE07mbh_05_u:083.010c: tathā kuruṣva gāndhāre kathaṃ vā bhīṣma manyase
GE07mbh_05_u:083.011c: ūcuḥ paramam ity evaṃ pūjayanto 'sya tad vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:083.012a: teṣām anumataṃ jñātvā rājā duryodhanas tadā

GE07mbh_05_u:083.015c: mālyāni ca sugandhīni tāni rājā dadau tataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:083.016a: viśeṣataś ca vāsārthaṃ sabhāṃ grāme vṛkasthale
GE07mbh_05_u:083.017a: etad vidhāya vai sarvaṃ devārham atimānuṣam
GE07mbh_05_u:083.018a: tāḥ sabhāḥ keśavaḥ sarvā ratnāni vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_05_u:084.001c: vṛkasthale nivasati sa ca prātar iheṣyati

GE07mbh_05_u:084.005c: pratyakṣaṃ tava dharmajña tan me kathayataḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_05_u:084.006c: caturyuktān rathāṃs tasmai raukmān dāsyāmi ṣoḍaśa
GE07mbh_05_u:084.008c: śatam asmai pradāsyāmi dāsānām api tāvataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:084.009c: tad apy asmai pradāsyāmi sahasrāṇi daśāṣṭa ca
GE07mbh_05_u:084.010c: tāny apy asmai pradāsyāmi yāvad arhati keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:084.011a: divā rātrau ca bhāty eṣa sutejā vimalo maṇiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:084.011c: tam apy asmai pradāsyāmi tam apy arhati keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:084.012c: yānam aśvatarīyuktaṃ dāsye tasmai tad apy aham
GE07mbh_05_u:084.013a: yāvanti vāhanāny asya yāvantaḥ puruṣāś ca te
GE07mbh_05_u:084.013c: tato 'ṣṭaguṇam apy asmai bhojyaṃ dāsyāmy ahaṃ sadā
GE07mbh_05_u:084.014a: mama putrāś ca pautrāś ca sarve duryodhanād ṛte
GE07mbh_05_u:084.015a: svalaṃkṛtāś ca kalyāṇyaḥ pādair eva sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:084.016a: nagarād api yāḥ kāś cid gamiṣyanti janārdanam
GE07mbh_05_u:084.016c: draṣṭuṃ kanyāś ca kalyāṇyas tāś ca yāsyanty anāvṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:084.019c: tad asya kriyatāṃ kṣipraṃ susaṃmṛṣṭam alaṃkṛtam
GE07mbh_05_u:084.020c: śivaṃ ca ramaṇīyaṃ ca sarvartu sumahādhanam
GE07mbh_05_u:084.021a: sarvam asmin gṛhe ratnaṃ mama duryodhanasya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:084.021c: yad yad arhet sa vārṣṇeyas tat tad deyam asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_05_u:085.001c: saṃbhāvitaś ca lokasya saṃmataś cāsi bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:085.002a: yat tvam evaṃgate brūyāḥ paścime vayasi sthitaḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:085.003a: lekhāśmanīva bhāḥ sūrye mahormir iva sāgare

GE07mbh_05_u:085.004a: sadaiva bhāvito loko guṇaughais tava pārthiva
GE07mbh_05_u:085.005a: ārjavaṃ pratipadyasva mā bālyād bahudhā naśīḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:085.005c: rājyaṃ putrāṃś ca pautrāṃś ca suhṛdaś cāpi supriyān
GE07mbh_05_u:085.006a: yat tvaṃ ditsasi kṛṣṇāya rājann atithaye bahu
GE07mbh_05_u:085.006c: etad anyac ca dāśārhaḥ pṛthivīm api cārhati
GE07mbh_05_u:085.007a: na tu tvaṃ dharmam uddiśya tasya vā priyakāraṇāt
GE07mbh_05_u:085.008c: jānāmi te mataṃ rājan gūḍhaṃ bāhyena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_05_u:085.009a: pañca pañcaiva lipsanti grāmakān pāṇḍavā nṛpa
GE07mbh_05_u:085.009c: na ca ditsasi tebhyas tāṃs tac chamaṃ kaḥ kariṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:085.010a: arthena tu mahābāhuṃ vārṣṇeyaṃ tvaṃ jihīrṣasi
GE07mbh_05_u:085.011a: na ca vittena śakyo 'sau nodyamena na garhayā
GE07mbh_05_u:085.011c: anyo dhanaṃjayāt kartum etat tattvaṃ bravīmi te
GE07mbh_05_u:085.012c: atyājyam asya jānāmi prāṇais tulyaṃ dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_05_u:085.013a: anyat kumbhād apāṃ pūrṇād anyat pādāvasecanāt
GE07mbh_05_u:085.014a: yat tv asya priyam ātithyaṃ mānārhasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:085.014c: tad asmai kriyatāṃ rājan mānārho hi janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:085.015c: yenaiva rājann arthena tad evāsmā upākuru
GE07mbh_05_u:085.016a: śamam icchati dāśārhas tava duryodhanasya ca

GE07mbh_05_u:093.002a: jīmūta iva gharmānte sarvāṃ saṃśrāvayan sabhām

GE07mbh_05_u:093.013d-0426_01: hitaṃ hi dhārtarāṣṭrāṇāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ tathā hitam

GE07mbh_05_u:093.031c: kṣīṇān ubhayataḥ śūrān rathebhyo rathibhir hatān
GE07mbh_05_u:093.033a: trāhi rājann imaṃ lokaṃ na naśyeyur imāḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:093.033c: tvayi prakṛtim āpanne śeṣaṃ syāt kurunandana
GE07mbh_05_u:093.034c: anyonyasacivā rājaṃs tān pāhi mahato bhayāt
GE07mbh_05_u:093.035c: saha bhuktvā ca pītvā ca pratiyāntu yathāgṛham
GE07mbh_05_u:093.036c: amarṣāṃś ca nirākṛtya vairāṇi ca paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_05_u:093.037a: hārdaṃ yat pāṇḍaveṣv āsīt prāpte 'sminn āyuṣaḥ kṣaye
GE07mbh_05_u:093.037c: tad eva te bhavatv adya śaśvac ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:093.038a: bālā vihīnāḥ pitrā te tvayaiva parivardhitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:093.038c: tān pālaya yathānyāyaṃ putrāṃś ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:093.039a: bhavataiva hi rakṣyās te vyasaneṣu viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:093.039c: mā te dharmas tathaivārtho naśyeta bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:093.040a: āhus tvāṃ pāṇḍavā rājann abhivādya prasādya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:093.042a: sthātā naḥ samaye tasmin piteti kṛtaniścayāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:093.042c: nāhāsma samayaṃ tāta tac ca no brāhmaṇā viduḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:093.043a: tasmin naḥ samaye tiṣṭha sthitānāṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:093.044a: tvaṃ dharmam arthaṃ yuñjānaḥ samyaṅ nas trātum arhasi
GE07mbh_05_u:093.044c: gurutvaṃ bhavati prekṣya bahūn kleśāṃs titikṣmahe
GE07mbh_05_u:093.045c: guror garīyasī vṛttir yā ca śiṣyasya bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:093.045d-0428_01: vartāmahe tvayi ca tāṃ tvaṃ ca vartasva nas tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:093.046a: pitrā sthāpayitavyā hi vayam utpatham āsthitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:093.046c: saṃsthāpaya pathiṣv asmāṃs tiṣṭha rājan svavartmani
GE07mbh_05_u:093.047a: āhuś cemāṃ pariṣadaṃ putrās te bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:093.048a: yatra dharmo hy adharmeṇa satyaṃ yatrānṛtena ca
GE07mbh_05_u:093.049a: viddho dharmo hy adharmeṇa sabhāṃ yatra prapadyate
GE07mbh_05_u:093.049c: na cāsya śalyaṃ kṛntanti viddhās tatra sabhāsadaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:093.049e: dharma etān ārujati yathā nady anukūlajān
GE07mbh_05_u:093.050a: ye dharmam anupaśyantas tūṣṇīṃ dhyāyanta āsate
GE07mbh_05_u:093.050c: te satyam āhur dharmaṃ ca nyāyyaṃ ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:093.051a: śakyaṃ kim anyad vaktuṃ te dānād anyaj janeśvara
GE07mbh_05_u:093.051c: bruvantu vā mahīpālāḥ sabhāyāṃ ye samāsate
GE07mbh_05_u:093.051e: dharmārthau saṃpradhāryaiva yadi satyaṃ bravīmy aham
GE07mbh_05_u:093.053c: tataḥ saputraḥ siddhārtho bhuṅkṣva bhogān paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_05_u:093.054a: ajātaśatruṃ jānīṣe sthitaṃ dharme satāṃ sadā
GE07mbh_05_u:093.054c: saputre tvayi vṛttiṃ ca vartate yāṃ narādhipa
GE07mbh_05_u:093.055a: dāhitaś ca nirastaś ca tvām evopāśritaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:093.056a: sa tatra nivasan sarvān vaśam ānīya pārthivān
GE07mbh_05_u:093.056c: tvanmukhān akarod rājan na ca tvām atyavartata
GE07mbh_05_u:093.058a: sa tām avasthāṃ saṃprāpya kṛṣṇāṃ prekṣya sabhāgatām
GE07mbh_05_u:093.059a: ahaṃ tu tava teṣāṃ ca śreya icchāmi bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:093.059c: dharmād arthāt sukhāc caiva mā rājan nīnaśaḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:093.060a: anartham arthaṃ manvānā arthaṃ vānartham ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:093.061a: sthitāḥ śuśrūṣituṃ pārthāḥ sthitā yoddhum ariṃdamāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:093.061c: yat te pathyatamaṃ rājaṃs tasmiṃs tiṣṭha paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_05_u:093.062a: tad vākyaṃ pārthivāḥ sarve hṛdayaiḥ samapūjayan
GE07mbh_05_u:093.062c: na tatra kaś cid vaktuṃ hi vācaṃ prākrāmad agrataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:094.002a: kaḥ svid uttaram etasmād vaktum utsahate pumān
GE07mbh_05_u:094.002c: iti sarve manobhis te cintayanti sma pārthivāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:094.003a: tathā teṣu ca sarveṣu tūṣṇīṃbhūteṣu rājasu
GE07mbh_05_u:094.004a: imām ekopamāṃ rājañ śṛṇu satyām aśaṅkitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:094.004c: tāṃ śrutvā śreya ādatsva yadi sādhv iti manyase
GE07mbh_05_u:094.005c: akhilāṃ bubhuje sarvāṃ pṛthivīm iti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_05_u:094.006a: sa sma nityaṃ niśāpāye prātar utthāya vīryavān
GE07mbh_05_u:094.006c: brāhmaṇān kṣatriyāṃś caiva pṛcchann āste mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:094.007a: asti kaś cid viśiṣṭo vā madvidho vā bhaved yudhi
GE07mbh_05_u:094.007c: śūdro vaiśyaḥ kṣatriyo vā brāhmaṇo vāpi śastrabhṛt
GE07mbh_05_u:094.008a: iti bruvann anvacarat sa rājā pṛthivīm imām
GE07mbh_05_u:094.008c: darpeṇa mahatā mattaḥ kaṃ cid anyam acintayan
GE07mbh_05_u:094.009a: taṃ sma vaidyā akṛpaṇā brāhmaṇāḥ sarvato 'bhayāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:094.010a: pratiṣidhyamāno 'py asakṛt pṛcchaty eva sa vai dvijān
GE07mbh_05_u:094.010c: abhimānī śriyā mattas tam ūcur brāhmaṇās tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:094.012c: tayos tvaṃ na samo rājan bhavitāsi kadā cana
GE07mbh_05_u:094.013a: evam uktaḥ sa rājā tu punaḥ papraccha tān dvijān
GE07mbh_05_u:094.013c: kva tau vīrau kvajanmānau kiṃkarmāṇau ca kau ca tau
GE07mbh_05_u:094.014a: naro nārāyaṇaś caiva tāpasāv iti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_05_u:094.014c: āyātau mānuṣe loke tābhyāṃ yudhyasva pārthiva
GE07mbh_05_u:094.016a: sa rājā mahatīṃ senāṃ yojayitvā ṣaḍaṅginīm
GE07mbh_05_u:094.017a: sa gatvā viṣamaṃ ghoraṃ parvataṃ gandhamādanam
GE07mbh_05_u:094.019c: nyamantrayetāṃ rājānaṃ kiṃ kāryaṃ kriyatām iti
GE07mbh_05_u:094.019d-0430_01: tatas tām ānupūrvīṃ sa punar evānvakīrtayat
GE07mbh_05_u:094.020a: bāhubhyāṃ me jitā bhūmir nihatāḥ sarvaśatravaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:094.020e: ātithyaṃ dīyatām etat kāṅkṣitaṃ me ciraṃ prati
GE07mbh_05_u:094.021c: na hy asminn āśrame yuddhaṃ kutaḥ śastraṃ kuto 'nṛjuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:094.021e: anyatra yuddham ākāṅkṣva bahavaḥ kṣatriyāḥ kṣitau
GE07mbh_05_u:094.022c: punaḥ punaḥ kṣamyamāṇaḥ sāntvyamānaś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:094.022e: dambhodbhavo yuddham icchann āhvayaty eva tāpasau
GE07mbh_05_u:094.023a: tato naras tv iṣīkāṇāṃ muṣṭim ādāya kaurava
GE07mbh_05_u:094.024c: ahaṃ hi te vineṣyāmi yuddhaśraddhām itaḥ param
GE07mbh_05_u:094.024d-0431_01: saṃnahyasva ca varmāṇi yāni cānyāni santi te
GE07mbh_05_u:094.025a: yady etad astram asmāsu yuktaṃ tāpasa manyase
GE07mbh_05_u:094.025c: etenāpi tvayā yotsye yuddhārthī hy aham āgataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:094.027a: tasya tān asyato ghorān iṣūn paratanucchidaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:094.029a: teṣām akṣīṇi karṇāṃś ca nastakāṃś caiva māyayā
GE07mbh_05_u:094.030a: sa dṛṣṭvā śvetam ākāśam iṣīkābhiḥ samācitam
GE07mbh_05_u:094.030c: pādayor nyapatad rājā svasti me 'stv iti cābravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:094.031a: tam abravīn naro rājañ śaraṇyaḥ śaraṇaiṣiṇām
GE07mbh_05_u:094.031c: brahmaṇyo bhava dharmātmā mā ca smaivaṃ punaḥ kṛthāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:094.032a: mā ca darpasamāviṣṭaḥ kṣepsīḥ kāṃś cit kadā cana
GE07mbh_05_u:094.032c: alpīyāṃsaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ vā tat te rājan paraṃ hitam
GE07mbh_05_u:094.033c: dāntaḥ kṣānto mṛduḥ kṣemaḥ prajāḥ pālaya pārthiva
GE07mbh_05_u:094.033d-0433_01: mā sma bhūyaḥ kṣipeḥ kaṃ cid aviditvā balābalam
GE07mbh_05_u:094.034a: anujñātaḥ svasti gaccha maivaṃ bhūyaḥ samācareḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:094.034c: kuśalaṃ brāhmaṇān pṛccher āvayor vacanād bhṛśam
GE07mbh_05_u:094.035a: tato rājā tayoḥ pādāv abhivādya mahātmanoḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:094.036a: sumahac cāpi tat karma yan nareṇa kṛtaṃ purā
GE07mbh_05_u:094.037a: tasmād yāvad dhanuḥśreṣṭhe gāṇḍīve 'straṃ na yujyate
GE07mbh_05_u:094.037c: tāvat tvaṃ mānam utsṛjya gaccha rājan dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_05_u:094.039a: etair viddhāḥ sarva eva maraṇaṃ yānti mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:094.040a: svapante ca plavante ca chardayanti ca mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:094.040c: mūtrayante ca satataṃ rudanti ca hasanti ca
GE07mbh_05_u:094.041c: tvam eva bhūyo jānāsi kuntīputraṃ dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_05_u:094.042d-0435_02: yasya nārāyaṇo bandhur arjuno duḥsaho yudhi
GE07mbh_05_u:094.042d-0435_03: kas tam utsahate jetuṃ triṣu lokeṣu bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:094.042d-0435_04: vīraṃ kapidhvajaṃ jiṣṇuṃ yasya nāsti samo yudhi
GE07mbh_05_u:094.043a: yady etad evaṃ jānāsi na ca mām atiśaṅkase
GE07mbh_05_u:094.043c: āryāṃ matiṃ samāsthāya śāmya bhārata pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:094.044a: atha cen manyase śreyo na me bhedo bhaved iti
GE07mbh_05_u:094.044c: praśāmya bharataśreṣṭha mā ca yuddhe manaḥ kṛthāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:094.045a: bhavatāṃ ca kuruśreṣṭha kulaṃ bahumataṃ bhuvi
GE07mbh_05_u:094.045c: tat tathaivāstu bhadraṃ te svārtham evānucintaya
GE07mbh_05_u:095.003a: ādityānāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ viṣṇur ekaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:095.003c: ajayyaś cāvyayaś caiva śāśvataḥ prabhur īśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:095.004a: nimittamaraṇās tv anye candrasūryau mahī jalam
GE07mbh_05_u:095.004c: vāyur agnis tathākāśaṃ grahās tārāgaṇās tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:095.005a: te ca kṣayānte jagato hitvā lokatrayaṃ sadā
GE07mbh_05_u:095.005c: kṣayaṃ gacchanti vai sarve sṛjyante ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:095.006c: tiryagyonyaś ca ye cānye jīvalokacarāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:095.007a: bhūyiṣṭhena tu rājānaḥ śriyaṃ bhuktvāyuṣaḥ kṣaye
GE07mbh_05_u:095.008a: sa bhavān dharmaputreṇa śamaṃ kartum ihārhati
GE07mbh_05_u:095.009a: balavān aham ity eva na mantavyaṃ suyodhana
GE07mbh_05_u:095.010a: na balaṃ balināṃ madhye balaṃ bhavati kaurava
GE07mbh_05_u:095.010c: balavanto hi te sarve pāṇḍavā devavikramāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:095.013c: śriyā ca vapuṣā caiva striyo 'nyāḥ sātiricyate
GE07mbh_05_u:095.016a: mātuḥ kulaṃ pitṛkulaṃ yatra caiva pradīyate
GE07mbh_05_u:095.017c: avagāhyaiva vicitau na ca me rocate varaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:095.018a: na devān naiva ditijān na gandharvān na mānuṣān
GE07mbh_05_u:095.019a: bhāryayā tu sa saṃmantrya saha rātrau sudharmayā
GE07mbh_05_u:095.020a: na me devamanuṣyeṣu guṇakeśyāḥ samo varaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:095.020c: rūpato dṛśyate kaś cin nāgeṣu bhavitā dhruvam
GE07mbh_05_u:095.021a: ity āmantrya sudharmāṃ sa kṛtvā cābhipradakṣiṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:096.001a: mātalis tu vrajan mārge nāradena maharṣiṇā
GE07mbh_05_u:096.002a: nārado 'thābravīd enaṃ kva bhavān gantum udyataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:096.002c: svena vā sūta kāryeṇa śāsanād vā śatakratoḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:096.003c: yathāvat sarvam ācaṣṭa svakāryaṃ varuṇaṃ prati
GE07mbh_05_u:096.004a: tam uvācātha sa munir gacchāvaḥ sahitāv iti
GE07mbh_05_u:096.005a: ahaṃ te sarvam ākhyāsye darśayan vasudhātalam
GE07mbh_05_u:096.005c: dṛṣṭvā tatra varaṃ kaṃ cid rocayiṣyāva mātale
GE07mbh_05_u:096.007a: tatra devarṣisadṛśīṃ pūjāṃ prāpa sa nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:096.008a: tāv ubhau prītamanasau kāryavattāṃ nivedya ha
GE07mbh_05_u:096.009c: jānaṃś cakāra vyākhyānaṃ yantuḥ sarvam aśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:096.011c: eṣa taṃ śīlavṛttena śaucena ca viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_05_u:096.012c: rūpavān darśanīyaś ca somaputryā vṛtaḥ patiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:096.013a: jyotsnākālīti yām āhur dvitīyāṃ rūpataḥ śriyam
GE07mbh_05_u:096.013c: ādityasyaiva goḥ putro jyeṣṭhaḥ putraḥ kṛtaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:096.014a: bhavanaṃ paśya vāruṇyā yad etat sarvakāñcanam
GE07mbh_05_u:096.014b-0436_01: eṣā vai vāruṇī kanyā surā lokeṣu viśrutā
GE07mbh_05_u:096.014c: yāṃ prāpya suratāṃ prāptāḥ surāḥ surapateḥ sakhe
GE07mbh_05_u:096.017a: atra rākṣasajātyaś ca bhūtajātyaś ca mātale
GE07mbh_05_u:096.019c: rakṣyate daivatair nityaṃ yatas tad gāṇḍivaṃ dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:096.020a: eṣa kṛtye samutpanne tat tad dhārayate balam
GE07mbh_05_u:096.021a: aśāsyān api śāsty eṣa rakṣobandhuṣu rājasu
GE07mbh_05_u:096.022a: etac chatraṃ narendrāṇāṃ mahac chakreṇa bhāṣitam
GE07mbh_05_u:096.023c: sarvataḥ salilaṃ śītaṃ jīmūta iva varṣati
GE07mbh_05_u:096.024c: tamasā mūrchitaṃ yāti yena nārchati darśanam
GE07mbh_05_u:096.025c: tava kāryoparodhas tu tasmād gacchāva māciram
GE07mbh_05_u:097.001a: etat tu nāgalokasya nābhisthāne sthitaṃ puram
GE07mbh_05_u:097.002a: idam adbhiḥ samaṃ prāptā ye ke cid dhruvajaṅgamāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:097.004c: ataḥ somasya hāniś ca vṛddhiś caiva pradṛśyate
GE07mbh_05_u:097.005a: atra divyaṃ hayaśiraḥ kāle parvaṇi parvaṇi
GE07mbh_05_u:097.006a: yasmād atra samagrās tāḥ patanti jalamūrtayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:097.006c: tasmāt pātālam ity etat khyāyate puram uttamam
GE07mbh_05_u:097.007c: megheṣv āmuñcate śītaṃ yan mahendraḥ pravarṣati
GE07mbh_05_u:097.009c: mṛtā divasataḥ sūta punar jīvanti te niśi
GE07mbh_05_u:097.010a: udaye nityaśaś cātra candramā raśmibhir vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:097.016a: paśya yady atra te kaś cid rocate guṇato varaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:097.016c: varayiṣyāva taṃ gatvā yatnam āsthāya mātale
GE07mbh_05_u:097.017a: aṇḍam etaj jale nyastaṃ dīpyamānam iva śriyā
GE07mbh_05_u:097.017c: ā prajānāṃ nisargād vai nodbhidyati na sarpati
GE07mbh_05_u:097.018a: nāsya jātiṃ nisargaṃ vā kathyamānaṃ śṛṇomi vai
GE07mbh_05_u:097.018c: pitaraṃ mātaraṃ vāpi nāsya jānāti kaś cana
GE07mbh_05_u:097.019a: ataḥ kila mahān agnir antakāle samutthitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:097.020a: mātalis tv abravīc chrutvā nāradasyātha bhāṣitam
GE07mbh_05_u:097.020c: na me 'tra rocate kaś cid anyato vraja māciram
GE07mbh_05_u:098.001a: hiraṇyapuram ity etat khyātaṃ puravaraṃ mahat
GE07mbh_05_u:098.003c: dānavā nivasanti sma śūrā dattavarāḥ purā
GE07mbh_05_u:098.004a: naite śakreṇa nānyena varuṇena yamena vā
GE07mbh_05_u:098.004c: śakyante vaśam ānetuṃ tathaiva dhanadena ca
GE07mbh_05_u:098.005c: nairṛtā yātudhānāś ca brahmavedodbhavāś ca ye
GE07mbh_05_u:098.007c: jānāsi ca yathā śakro naitāñ śaknoti bādhitum
GE07mbh_05_u:098.008a: bahuśo mātale tvaṃ ca tava putraś ca gomukhaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:098.009a: paśya veśmāni raukmāṇi mātale rājatāni ca
GE07mbh_05_u:098.011c: śailānīva ca dṛśyante tārakāṇīva cāpy uta
GE07mbh_05_u:098.013a: naitāni śakyaṃ nirdeṣṭuṃ rūpato dravyatas tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:098.014a: ākrīḍān paśya daityānāṃ tathaiva śayanāny uta
GE07mbh_05_u:098.016a: mātale kaś cid atrāpi rucitas te varo bhavet
GE07mbh_05_u:098.016c: atha vānyāṃ diśaṃ bhūmer gacchāva yadi manyase
GE07mbh_05_u:098.017a: mātalis tv abravīd enaṃ bhāṣamāṇaṃ tathāvidham
GE07mbh_05_u:098.017c: devarṣe naiva me kāryaṃ vipriyaṃ tridivaukasām
GE07mbh_05_u:098.019a: anyatra sādhu gacchāvo draṣṭuṃ nārhāmi dānavān

GE07mbh_05_u:101.014a: karavīraḥ pīṭharakaḥ saṃvṛtto vṛtta eva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:101.015c: kauravyo dhṛtarāṣṭraś ca kumāraḥ kuśakas tathā

GE07mbh_05_u:103.001a: garuḍas tat tu śuśrāva yathāvṛttaṃ mahābalaḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:103.007d-0442_02: tyaktvā rūpaṃ vivarṇas tu sarparūpadharo 'bhavat indra uvāca
GE07mbh_05_u:103.007d-0442_04: na mayā kṛtaṃ vainateya na māṃ kroddhuṃ tvam arhasi

GE07mbh_05_u:103.012c: prasabhaḥ kālakākṣaś ca mayāpi ditijā hatāḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:103.015a: avajñāya tu yat te 'haṃ bhojanād vyaparopitaḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:103.030a: tataś cakre sa bhagavān prasādaṃ vai garutmataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:103.030c: maivaṃ bhūya iti snehāt tadā cainam uvāca ha
GE07mbh_05_u:103.030d-0449_02: tataḥ prabhṛti rājendra saha sarpeṇa vartate
GE07mbh_05_u:103.031a: tathā tvam api gāndhāre yāvat pāṇḍusutān raṇe

GE07mbh_05_u:103.034a: tad alaṃ te virodhena śamaṃ gaccha nṛpātmaja

GE07mbh_05_u:104.017a: pratigṛhya tato dharmas tathaivoṣṇaṃ tathā navam
GE07mbh_05_u:104.017c: bhuktvā prīto 'smi viprarṣe tam uktvā sa munir gataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:104.019c: śuśrūṣayā ca bhaktyā ca prītimān ity uvāca tam

GE07mbh_05_u:105.012a: so 'haṃ pāpaḥ kṛtaghnaś ca kṛpaṇaś cānṛto 'pi ca
GE07mbh_05_u:105.012c: guror yaḥ kṛtakāryaḥ saṃs tat karomi na bhāṣitam
GE07mbh_05_u:105.012e: so 'haṃ prāṇān vimokṣyāmi kṛtvā yatnam anuttamam
GE07mbh_05_u:105.013a: arthanā na mayā kā cit kṛtapūrvā divaukasām
GE07mbh_05_u:105.013c: mānayanti ca māṃ sarve tridaśā yajñasaṃstare
GE07mbh_05_u:105.014c: viṣṇuṃ gacchāmy ahaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ gatiṃ gatimatāṃ varam
GE07mbh_05_u:105.015a: bhogā yasmāt pratiṣṭhante vyāpya sarvān surāsurān
GE07mbh_05_u:105.016a: evam ukte sakhā tasya garuḍo vinatātmajaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:105.016c: darśayām āsa taṃ prāha saṃhṛṣṭaḥ priyakāmyayā
GE07mbh_05_u:105.017a: suhṛd bhavān mama mataḥ suhṛdāṃ ca mataḥ suhṛt
GE07mbh_05_u:105.018a: vibhavaś cāsti me vipra vāsavāvarajo dvija
GE07mbh_05_u:105.018c: pūrvam uktas tvadarthaṃ ca kṛtaḥ kāmaś ca tena me
GE07mbh_05_u:105.019a: sa bhavān etu gacchāva nayiṣye tvāṃ yathāsukham
GE07mbh_05_u:105.019c: deśaṃ pāraṃ pṛthivyā vā gaccha gālava māciram
GE07mbh_05_u:106.001c: brūhi kām anusaṃyāmi draṣṭuṃ prathamato diśam
GE07mbh_05_u:106.002a: pūrvāṃ vā dakṣiṇāṃ vāham atha vā paścimāṃ diśam
GE07mbh_05_u:106.002c: uttarāṃ vā dvijaśreṣṭha kuto gacchāmi gālava
GE07mbh_05_u:106.003c: savitā yatra saṃdhyāyāṃ sādhyānāṃ vartate tapaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:106.004a: yasyāṃ pūrvaṃ matir jātā yayā vyāptam idaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_05_u:106.004c: cakṣuṣī yatra dharmasya yatra caiṣa pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:106.006a: yatra pūrvaṃ prasūtā vai dākṣāyaṇyaḥ prajāḥ striyaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:106.007c: surarājyena viprarṣe devaiś cātra tapaś citam
GE07mbh_05_u:106.008a: etasmāt kāraṇād brahman pūrvety eṣā dig ucyate
GE07mbh_05_u:106.008c: yasmāt pūrvatare kāle pūrvam eṣāvṛtā suraiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:106.009a: ata eva ca pūrveṣāṃ pūrvām āśām avekṣatām
GE07mbh_05_u:106.010a: atra vedāñ jagau pūrvaṃ bhagavāṃl lokabhāvanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:106.011c: atra labdhavaraiḥ somaḥ suraiḥ kratuṣu pīyate
GE07mbh_05_u:106.012a: atra tṛptā hutavahāḥ svāṃ yonim upabhuñjate
GE07mbh_05_u:106.012c: atra pātālam āśritya varuṇaḥ śriyam āpa ca
GE07mbh_05_u:106.013c: sūtiś caiva pratiṣṭhā ca nidhanaṃ ca prakāśate
GE07mbh_05_u:106.014c: pibanti munayo yatra havirdhāne sma somapāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:106.015a: prokṣitā yatra bahavo varāhādyā mṛgā vane
GE07mbh_05_u:106.016a: atrāhitāḥ kṛtaghnāś ca mānuṣāś cāsurāś ca ye
GE07mbh_05_u:106.016c: udayaṃs tān hi sarvān vai krodhād dhanti vibhāvasuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:106.017a: etad dvāraṃ trilokasya svargasya ca sukhasya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:106.018a: priyaṃ kāryaṃ hi me tasya yasyāsmi vacane sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:106.018c: brūhi gālava yāsyāmi śṛṇu cāpy aparāṃ diśam
GE07mbh_05_u:107.001a: iyaṃ vivasvatā pūrvaṃ śrautena vidhinā kila
GE07mbh_05_u:107.001c: gurave dakṣiṇā dattā dakṣiṇety ucyate 'tha dik
GE07mbh_05_u:107.003a: atra viśve sadā devāḥ pitṛbhiḥ sārdham āsate
GE07mbh_05_u:107.004a: etad dvitīyaṃ dharmasya dvāram ācakṣate dvija
GE07mbh_05_u:107.006a: atra dharmaś ca satyaṃ ca karma cātra niśāmyate
GE07mbh_05_u:107.007a: eṣā dik sā dvijaśreṣṭha yāṃ sarvaḥ pratipadyate
GE07mbh_05_u:107.007c: vṛtā tv anavabodhena sukhaṃ tena na gamyate
GE07mbh_05_u:107.009c: gandharvā gānti gāthā vai cittabuddhiharā dvija
GE07mbh_05_u:107.010a: atra sāmāni gāthābhiḥ śrutvā gītāni raivataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:107.011c: maryādā sthāpitā brahman yāṃ sūryo nātivartate
GE07mbh_05_u:107.013c: atra sarvāsavaḥ prāptāḥ punar gacchanti pañcadhā
GE07mbh_05_u:107.014c: atra vaitaraṇī nāma nadī vitaraṇair vṛtā
GE07mbh_05_u:107.015c: kāṣṭhāṃ cāsādya dhāniṣṭhāṃ himam utsṛjate punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:107.017a: atra śakradhanur nāma sūryāj jāto mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:107.017c: vidur yaṃ kapilaṃ devaṃ yenāttāḥ sagarātmajāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:107.018a: atra siddhāḥ śivā nāma brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:107.021a: eṣa tasyāpi te mārgaḥ paritāpasya gālava
GE07mbh_05_u:107.021c: brūhi me yadi gantavyaṃ pratīcīṃ śṛṇu vā mama
GE07mbh_05_u:108.001a: iyaṃ dig dayitā rājño varuṇasya tu gopateḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:108.001c: sadā salilarājasya pratiṣṭhā cādir eva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:108.002a: atra paścād ahaḥ sūryo visarjayati bhāḥ svayam
GE07mbh_05_u:108.003a: yādasām atra rājyena salilasya ca guptaye
GE07mbh_05_u:108.004a: atra pītvā samastān vai varuṇasya rasāṃs tu ṣaṭ
GE07mbh_05_u:108.005a: atra paścāt kṛtā daityā vāyunā saṃyatās tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:108.006c: asto nāma yataḥ saṃdhyā paścimā pratisarpati
GE07mbh_05_u:108.007a: ato rātriś ca nidrā ca nirgatā divasakṣaye
GE07mbh_05_u:108.008c: vigarbhām akaroc chakro yatra jāto marudgaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:108.009a: atra mūlaṃ himavato mandaraṃ yāti śāśvatam
GE07mbh_05_u:108.010c: udadhes tīram āsādya surabhiḥ kṣarate payaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:108.013c: ākāśe tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti tasthau sūryasya śāsanāt
GE07mbh_05_u:108.014a: atra vāyus tathā vahnir āpaḥ khaṃ caiva gālava
GE07mbh_05_u:108.014c: āhnikaṃ caiva naiśaṃ ca duḥkhasparśaṃ vimuñcati
GE07mbh_05_u:108.014e: ataḥ prabhṛti sūryasya tiryag āvartate gatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:108.019a: eṣa te paścimo mārgo digdvāreṇa prakīrtitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:108.019c: brūhi gālava gacchāvo buddhiḥ kā dvijasattama
GE07mbh_05_u:108.019d-0451_01: diktrayaṃ te śrutaṃ brahmañ śṛṇu cāpy uttarāṃ diśam
GE07mbh_05_u:109.002c: mārgaḥ paścimapūrvābhyāṃ digbhyāṃ vai madhyamaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:109.004a: atra nārāyaṇaḥ kṛṣṇo jiṣṇuś caiva narottamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:109.004c: badaryām āśramapade tathā brahmā ca śāśvataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:109.005a: atra vai himavatpṛṣṭhe nityam āste maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:109.005b-0452_02: na sa dṛśyo munigaṇais tathā devaiḥ savāsavaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:109.006a: atra gaṅgāṃ mahādevaḥ patantīṃ gaganāc cyutām
GE07mbh_05_u:109.007c: atra kāmaś ca roṣaś ca śailaś comā ca saṃbabhuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:109.009c: atra mandākinī caiva mandaraś ca dvijarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:109.012a: atra te ṛṣayaḥ sapta devī cārundhatī tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:109.012c: atra tiṣṭhati vai svātir atrāsyā udayaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:109.013a: atra yajñaṃ samāruhya dhruvaṃ sthātā pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:109.015a: na teṣāṃ jñāyate sūtir nākṛtir na tapaś citam
GE07mbh_05_u:109.016a: yathā yathā praviśati tasmāt parataraṃ naraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:109.017a: na tat kena cid anyena gatapūrvaṃ dvijarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:109.017c: ṛte nārāyaṇaṃ devaṃ naraṃ vā jiṣṇum avyayam
GE07mbh_05_u:109.018a: atra kailāsam ity uktaṃ sthānam ailavilasya tat
GE07mbh_05_u:109.019a: atra viṣṇupadaṃ nāma kramatā viṣṇunā kṛtam
GE07mbh_05_u:109.022a: brāhmaṇeṣu ca yat kṛtsnaṃ svantaṃ kṛtvā dhanaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_05_u:109.022c: vavre vanaṃ maharṣiḥ sa jaimūtaṃ tad vanaṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:109.023a: atra nityaṃ diśāpālāḥ sāyaṃ prātar dvijarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:109.023c: kasya kāryaṃ kim iti vai parikrośanti gālava
GE07mbh_05_u:109.024a: evam eṣā dvijaśreṣṭha guṇair anyair dig uttarā
GE07mbh_05_u:109.025a: etā vistaraśas tāta tava saṃkīrtitā diśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:109.026c: pṛthivīṃ cākhilāṃ brahmaṃs tasmād āroha māṃ dvija
GE07mbh_05_u:110.001c: naya māṃ tārkṣya pūrveṇa yatra dharmasya cakṣuṣī
GE07mbh_05_u:110.002a: pūrvam etāṃ diśaṃ gaccha yā pūrvaṃ parikīrtitā
GE07mbh_05_u:110.002c: daivatānāṃ hi sāṃnidhyam atra kīrtitavān asi
GE07mbh_05_u:110.003a: atra satyaṃ ca dharmaś ca tvayā samyak prakīrtitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:110.003c: iccheyaṃ tu samāgantuṃ samastair daivatair aham
GE07mbh_05_u:110.003e: bhūyaś ca tān surān draṣṭum iccheyam aruṇānuja
GE07mbh_05_u:110.004a: tam āha vinatāsūnur ārohasveti vai dvijam
GE07mbh_05_u:110.004c: ārurohātha sa munir garuḍaṃ gālavas tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:110.006c: prasthitānām iva samaṃ paśyāmīha gatiṃ khaga
GE07mbh_05_u:110.009c: nāgāṃś ca naravaktrāṃś ca paśyāmy unmathitān iva
GE07mbh_05_u:110.010a: mahārṇavasya ca ravaiḥ śrotre me badhirīkṛte
GE07mbh_05_u:110.010c: na śṛṇomi na paśyāmi nātmano vedmi kāraṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:110.011a: śanaiḥ sādhu bhavān yātu brahmahatyām anusmaran
GE07mbh_05_u:110.011c: na dṛśyate ravis tāta na diśo na ca khaṃ khaga
GE07mbh_05_u:110.012a: tama eva tu paśyāmi śarīraṃ te na lakṣaye
GE07mbh_05_u:110.012c: maṇīva jātyau paśyāmi cakṣuṣī te 'ham aṇḍaja
GE07mbh_05_u:110.013a: śarīre tu na paśyāmi tava caivātmanaś ca ha
GE07mbh_05_u:110.013c: pade pade tu paśyāmi salilād agnim utthitam
GE07mbh_05_u:110.014a: sa me nirvāpya sahasā cakṣuṣī śāmyate punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:110.014c: tan nivarta mahān kālo gacchato vinatātmaja
GE07mbh_05_u:110.015a: na me prayojanaṃ kiṃ cid gamane pannagāśana
GE07mbh_05_u:110.015c: saṃnivarta mahāvega na vegaṃ viṣahāmi te
GE07mbh_05_u:110.016a: gurave saṃśrutānīha śatāny aṣṭau hi vājinām
GE07mbh_05_u:110.018a: naiva me 'sti dhanaṃ kiṃ cin na dhanenānvitaḥ suhṛt
GE07mbh_05_u:110.018c: na cārthenāpi mahatā śakyam etad vyapohitum
GE07mbh_05_u:110.019a: evaṃ bahu ca dīnaṃ ca bruvāṇaṃ gālavaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:110.020c: na cāpi kṛtrimaḥ kālaḥ kālo hi parameśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:110.021a: kim ahaṃ pūrvam eveha bhavatā nābhicoditaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:110.022a: tad eṣa ṛṣabho nāma parvataḥ sāgarorasi
GE07mbh_05_u:110.022c: atra viśramya bhuktvā ca nivartiṣyāva gālava
GE07mbh_05_u:111.002a: abhivādya suparṇas tu gālavaś cābhipūjya tām
GE07mbh_05_u:111.003c: bhuktvā tṛptāv ubhau bhūmau suptau tāv annamohitau
GE07mbh_05_u:111.004b-0453_02: grahītuṃ hi manaś cakre rūpāt sākṣād iva śriyam
GE07mbh_05_u:111.005c: gālavas taṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā viṣaṇṇaḥ paryapṛcchata
GE07mbh_05_u:111.006a: kim idaṃ bhavatā prāptam ihāgamanajaṃ phalam
GE07mbh_05_u:111.006c: vāso 'yam iha kālaṃ tu kiyantaṃ nau bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:111.007a: kiṃ nu te manasā dhyātam aśubhaṃ dharmadūṣaṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:111.007c: na hy ayaṃ bhavataḥ svalpo vyabhicāro bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:111.008a: suparṇo 'thābravīd vipraṃ pradhyātaṃ vai mayā dvija
GE07mbh_05_u:111.008c: imāṃ siddhām ito netuṃ tatra yatra prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:111.009a: yatra devo mahādevo yatra viṣṇuḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:111.009c: yatra dharmaś ca yajñaś ca tatreyaṃ nivased iti
GE07mbh_05_u:111.010c: mayaitan nāma pradhyātaṃ manasā śocatā kila
GE07mbh_05_u:111.011a: tad evaṃ bahumānāt te mayehānīpsitaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_05_u:111.011c: sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ vā tvaṃ māhātmyāt kṣantum arhasi
GE07mbh_05_u:111.012c: na bhetavyaṃ suparṇo 'si suparṇa tyaja saṃbhramam
GE07mbh_05_u:111.013a: ninditāsmi tvayā vatsa na ca nindāṃ kṣamāmy aham
GE07mbh_05_u:111.013c: lokebhyaḥ sa paribhraśyed yo māṃ nindeta pāpakṛt
GE07mbh_05_u:111.015a: ācārāl labhate dharmam ācārāl labhate dhanam
GE07mbh_05_u:111.015c: ācārāc chriyam āpnoti ācāro hanty alakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:111.016c: na ca te garhaṇīyāpi garhitavyāḥ striyaḥ kva cit
GE07mbh_05_u:111.016d-0454_01: yadi tvam ātmano hy arthair māṃ caivādātum icchasi
GE07mbh_05_u:111.016d-0454_02: tadaiva naṣṭadehas tu yad vai tvaṃ pannagāśana
GE07mbh_05_u:111.016d-0454_04: tvaṃ tu sāṅgas tu saṃjātaḥ punar eva bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_05_u:111.019a: viśvāmitro 'tha taṃ dṛṣṭvā gālavaṃ cādhvani sthitam
GE07mbh_05_u:111.020a: yas tvayā svayam evārthaḥ pratijñāto mama dvija
GE07mbh_05_u:111.020c: tasya kālo 'pavargasya yathā vā manyate bhavān
GE07mbh_05_u:111.021a: pratīkṣiṣyāmy ahaṃ kālam etāvantaṃ tathā param
GE07mbh_05_u:111.021c: yathā saṃsidhyate vipra sa mārgas tu niśamyatām
GE07mbh_05_u:111.022c: pratyakṣaṃ khalv idānīṃ me viśvāmitro yad uktavān
GE07mbh_05_u:111.023c: nādattvā gurave śakyaṃ kṛtsnam arthaṃ tvayāsitum
GE07mbh_05_u:112.001a: athāha gālavaṃ dīnaṃ suparṇaḥ patatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:112.001c: nirmitaṃ vahninā bhūmau vāyunā vaidhitaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:112.001e: yasmād dhiraṇmayaṃ sarvaṃ hiraṇyaṃ tena cocyate
GE07mbh_05_u:112.002a: dhatte dhārayate cedam etasmāt kāraṇād dhanam
GE07mbh_05_u:112.002c: tad etat triṣu lokeṣu dhanaṃ tiṣṭhati śāśvatam
GE07mbh_05_u:112.003a: nityaṃ proṣṭhapadābhyāṃ ca śukre dhanapatau tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:112.004c: evaṃ na śakyate labdhum alabdhavyaṃ dvijarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:112.005a: ṛte ca dhanam aśvānāṃ nāvāptir vidyate tava
GE07mbh_05_u:112.005c: arthaṃ yācātra rājānaṃ kaṃ cid rājarṣivaṃśajam
GE07mbh_05_u:112.005e: apīḍya rājā paurān hi yo nau kuryāt kṛtārthinau
GE07mbh_05_u:112.006a: asti somānvavāye me jātaḥ kaś cin nṛpaḥ sakhā
GE07mbh_05_u:112.006c: abhigacchāvahe taṃ vai tasyāsti vibhavo bhuvi
GE07mbh_05_u:112.007c: sa dāsyati mayā cokto bhavatā cārthitaḥ svayam
GE07mbh_05_u:112.008a: vibhavaś cāsya sumahān āsīd dhanapater iva
GE07mbh_05_u:112.008c: evaṃ sa tu dhanaṃ vidvān dānenaiva vyaśodhayat
GE07mbh_05_u:112.009a: tathā tau kathayantau ca cintayantau ca yat kṣamam
GE07mbh_05_u:112.010a: pratigṛhya ca satkāram arghādiṃ bhojanaṃ varam
GE07mbh_05_u:112.011a: ayaṃ me nāhuṣa sakhā gālavas tapaso nidhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:112.012c: tam āha bhagavān kāṃ te dadāni gurudakṣiṇām
GE07mbh_05_u:112.013a: asakṛt tena coktena kiṃ cid āgatamanyunā
GE07mbh_05_u:112.013c: ayam uktaḥ prayaccheti jānatā vibhavaṃ laghu
GE07mbh_05_u:112.014c: aṣṭau śatāni me dehi hayānāṃ candravarcasām
GE07mbh_05_u:112.015a: gurvartho dīyatām eṣa yadi gālava manyase
GE07mbh_05_u:112.015c: ity evam āha sakrodho viśvāmitras tapodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:112.016c: aśaktaḥ pratikartuṃ tad bhavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:112.019a: yāvanti romāṇi haye bhavanti hi nareśvara
GE07mbh_05_u:112.020a: pātraṃ pratigrahasyāyaṃ dātuṃ pātraṃ tathā bhavān
GE07mbh_05_u:112.020c: śaṅkhe kṣīram ivāsaktaṃ bhavatv etat tathopamam
GE07mbh_05_u:113.001a: evam uktaḥ suparṇena tathyaṃ vacanam uttamam
GE07mbh_05_u:113.001c: vimṛśyāvahito rājā niścitya ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:113.003a: dṛṣṭvā priyasakhaṃ tārkṣyaṃ gālavaṃ ca dvijarṣabham
GE07mbh_05_u:113.003c: nidarśanaṃ ca tapaso bhikṣāṃ ślāghyāṃ ca kīrtitām
GE07mbh_05_u:113.004c: matsakāśam anuprāptāv etau buddhim avekṣya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:113.005a: adya me saphalaṃ janma tāritaṃ cādya me kulam
GE07mbh_05_u:113.005c: adyāyaṃ tārito deśo mama tārkṣya tvayānagha
GE07mbh_05_u:113.006a: vaktum icchāmi tu sakhe yathā jānāsi māṃ purā
GE07mbh_05_u:113.006c: na tathā vittavān asmi kṣīṇaṃ vittaṃ hi me sakhe
GE07mbh_05_u:113.007a: na ca śakto 'smi te kartuṃ mogham āgamanaṃ khaga
GE07mbh_05_u:113.007c: na cāśām asya viprarṣer vitathāṃ kartum utsahe
GE07mbh_05_u:113.008a: tat tu dāsyāmi yat kāryam idaṃ saṃpādayiṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:113.008c: abhigamya hatāśo hi nivṛtto dahate kulam
GE07mbh_05_u:113.009a: nātaḥ paraṃ vainateya kiṃ cit pāpiṣṭham ucyate
GE07mbh_05_u:113.009c: yathāśānāśanaṃ loke dehi nāstīti vā vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:113.010a: hatāśo hy akṛtārthaḥ san hataḥ saṃbhāvito naraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:113.010c: hinasti tasya putrāṃś ca pautrāṃś cākurvato 'rthinām
GE07mbh_05_u:113.011a: tasmāc caturṇāṃ vaṃśānāṃ sthāpayitrī sutā mama
GE07mbh_05_u:113.012c: kāṅkṣitā rūpato bālā sutā me pratigṛhyatām
GE07mbh_05_u:113.013a: asyāḥ śulkaṃ pradāsyanti nṛpā rājyam api dhruvam
GE07mbh_05_u:113.013c: kiṃ punaḥ śyāmakarṇānāṃ hayānāṃ dve catuḥśate
GE07mbh_05_u:113.014a: sa bhavān pratigṛhṇātu mamemāṃ mādhavīṃ sutām
GE07mbh_05_u:113.014c: ahaṃ dauhitravān syāṃ vai vara eṣa mama prabho
GE07mbh_05_u:113.014d-0456_01: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā brāhmaṇaḥ saṃśitavrataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:113.015a: pratigṛhya ca tāṃ kanyāṃ gālavaḥ saha pakṣiṇā
GE07mbh_05_u:113.015c: punar drakṣyāva ity uktvā pratasthe saha kanyayā
GE07mbh_05_u:113.016a: upalabdham idaṃ dvāram aśvānām iti cāṇḍajaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:113.016c: uktvā gālavam āpṛcchya jagāma bhavanaṃ svakam
GE07mbh_05_u:113.017a: gate patagarāje tu gālavaḥ saha kanyayā
GE07mbh_05_u:113.017c: cintayānaḥ kṣamaṃ dāne rājñāṃ vai śulkato 'gamat
GE07mbh_05_u:113.020a: tam upāgamya vipraḥ sa haryaśvaṃ gālavo 'bravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:113.021c: śulkaṃ te kīrtayiṣyāmi tac chrutvā saṃpradhāryatām
GE07mbh_05_u:114.001a: haryaśvas tv abravīd rājā vicintya bahudhā tataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:114.001c: dīrgham uṣṇaṃ ca niḥśvasya prajāhetor nṛpottamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:114.002c: gambhīrā triṣu gambhīreṣv iyaṃ raktā ca pañcasu
GE07mbh_05_u:114.002d-0457_01: śroṇyau lalāṭakakṣau ca ghrāṇaṃ ceti ṣaḍunnatam
GE07mbh_05_u:114.002d-0457_03: svaraḥ sattvaṃ ca nābhiś ca trigambhīraṃ pracakṣate
GE07mbh_05_u:114.002d-006_0008: tvak caiva vai kararuhāś ca naduḥkhitānām
GE07mbh_05_u:114.004c: brūhi śulkaṃ dvijaśreṣṭha samīkṣya vibhavaṃ mama
GE07mbh_05_u:114.006a: tatas tava bhavitrīyaṃ putrāṇāṃ jananī śubhā
GE07mbh_05_u:114.007a: etac chrutvā vaco rājā haryaśvaḥ kāmamohitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:114.008a: dve me śate saṃnihite hayānāṃ yad vidhās tava
GE07mbh_05_u:114.008c: eṣṭavyāḥ śataśas tv anye caranti mama vājinaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:114.009a: so 'ham ekam apatyaṃ vai janayiṣyāmi gālava
GE07mbh_05_u:114.009c: asyām etaṃ bhavān kāmaṃ saṃpādayatu me varam
GE07mbh_05_u:114.010a: etac chrutvā tu sā kanyā gālavaṃ vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:114.010c: mama datto varaḥ kaś cit kena cid brahmavādinā
GE07mbh_05_u:114.011c: sa tvaṃ dadasva māṃ rājñe pratigṛhya hayottamān
GE07mbh_05_u:114.012a: nṛpebhyo hi caturbhyas te pūrṇāny aṣṭau śatāni vai
GE07mbh_05_u:114.012c: bhaviṣyanti tathā putrā mama catvāra eva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:114.013c: eṣā tāvan mama prajñā yathā vā manyase dvija
GE07mbh_05_u:114.014a: evam uktas tu sa muniḥ kanyayā gālavas tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:114.016a: pratigṛhya sa tāṃ kanyāṃ gālavaṃ pratinandya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:114.016c: samaye deśakāle ca labdhavān sutam īpsitam
GE07mbh_05_u:114.018a: atha kāle punar dhīmān gālavaḥ pratyupasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:114.019c: kālo gantuṃ naraśreṣṭha bhikṣārtham aparaṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_05_u:114.020a: haryaśvaḥ satyavacane sthitaḥ sthitvā ca pauruṣe
GE07mbh_05_u:114.020c: durlabhatvād dhayānāṃ ca pradadau mādhavīṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:114.021a: mādhavī ca punar dīptāṃ parityajya nṛpaśriyam
GE07mbh_05_u:114.022a: tvayy eva tāvat tiṣṭhantu hayā ity uktavān dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:115.002a: tatra gacchāvahe bhadre śanair āgaccha mā śucaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:115.002c: dhārmikaḥ saṃyame yuktaḥ satyaś caiva janeśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:115.003a: tam upāgamya sa munir nyāyatas tena satkṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:115.004a: śrutam etan mayā pūrvaṃ kim uktvā vistaraṃ dvija
GE07mbh_05_u:115.005a: etac ca me bahumataṃ yad utsṛjya narādhipān
GE07mbh_05_u:115.005c: mām evam upayāto 'si bhāvi caitad asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_05_u:115.006a: sa eva vibhavo 'smākam aśvānām api gālava
GE07mbh_05_u:115.006c: aham apy ekam evāsyāṃ janayiṣyāmi pārthivam
GE07mbh_05_u:115.007a: tathety uktvā dvijaśreṣṭhaḥ prādāt kanyāṃ mahīpateḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:115.007c: vidhipūrvaṃ ca tāṃ rājā kanyāṃ pratigṛhītavān
GE07mbh_05_u:115.008a: reme sa tasyāṃ rājarṣiḥ prabhāvatyāṃ yathā raviḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:115.008c: svāhāyāṃ ca yathā vahnir yathā śacyāṃ sa vāsavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:115.009a: yathā candraś ca rohiṇyāṃ yathā dhūmorṇayā yamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:115.009c: varuṇaś ca yathā gauryāṃ yathā carddhyāṃ dhaneśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:115.010a: yathā nārāyaṇo lakṣmyāṃ jāhnavyāṃ ca yathodadhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:115.010c: yathā rudraś ca rudrāṇyāṃ yathā vedyāṃ pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:115.011c: cyavanaś ca sukanyāyāṃ pulastyaḥ saṃdhyayā yathā
GE07mbh_05_u:115.012a: agastyaś cāpi vaidarbhyāṃ sāvitryāṃ satyavān yathā
GE07mbh_05_u:115.012c: yathā bhṛguḥ pulomāyām adityāṃ kaśyapo yathā
GE07mbh_05_u:115.013c: bṛhaspatiś ca tārāyāṃ śukraś ca śataparvayā
GE07mbh_05_u:115.014a: yathā bhūmyāṃ bhūmipatir urvaśyāṃ ca purūravāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:115.014c: ṛcīkaḥ satyavatyāṃ ca sarasvatyāṃ yathā manuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:115.014d-0460_01: śakuntalāyāṃ duḥṣanto dhṛtyāṃ dharmaś ca śāśvataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:115.014d-0460_02: damayantyāṃ nalaś caiva satyavatyāṃ ca nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:115.014d-0460_06: vaidehyāṃ ca yathā rāmo rukmiṇyāṃ ca janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:115.014d-0461_01: pulastyaś ca bharadvājyāṃ vṛttyāṃ dharmaś ca śāśvataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:115.015c: mādhavī janayām āsa putram ekaṃ pratardanam
GE07mbh_05_u:115.017a: niryātayatu me kanyāṃ bhavāṃs tiṣṭhantu vājinaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:115.018c: kanyāṃ niryātayām āsa sthitaḥ satye mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:116.001a: tathaiva sā śriyaṃ tyaktvā kanyā bhūtvā yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_05_u:116.003a: tam uvācātha gatvā sa nṛpatiṃ satyavikramam
GE07mbh_05_u:116.003c: iyaṃ kanyā sutau dvau te janayiṣyati pārthivau
GE07mbh_05_u:116.004a: asyāṃ bhavān avāptārtho bhavitā pretya ceha ca
GE07mbh_05_u:116.006a: gurvartho 'yaṃ samārambho na hayaiḥ kṛtyam asti me
GE07mbh_05_u:116.006c: yadi śakyaṃ mahārāja kriyatāṃ mā vicāryatām
GE07mbh_05_u:116.007c: pitṝn putraplavena tvam ātmānaṃ caiva tāraya
GE07mbh_05_u:116.008a: na putraphalabhoktā hi rājarṣe pātyate divaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:116.008c: na yāti narakaṃ ghoraṃ yatra gacchanty anātmajāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:116.009a: etac cānyac ca vividhaṃ śrutvā gālavabhāṣitam
GE07mbh_05_u:116.010a: śrutavān asmi te vākyaṃ yathā vadasi gālava
GE07mbh_05_u:116.010c: vidhis tu balavān brahman pravaṇaṃ hi mano mama
GE07mbh_05_u:116.011a: śate dve tu mamāśvānām īdṛśānāṃ dvijottama
GE07mbh_05_u:116.012c: putraṃ dvija gataṃ mārgaṃ gamiṣyāmi parair aham
GE07mbh_05_u:116.014a: kāmato hi dhanaṃ rājā pārakyaṃ yaḥ prayacchati
GE07mbh_05_u:116.014c: na sa dharmeṇa dharmātman yujyate yaśasā na ca
GE07mbh_05_u:116.015a: so 'haṃ pratigrahīṣyāmi dadātv etāṃ bhavān mama
GE07mbh_05_u:116.017c: reme sa tāṃ samāsādya kṛtapuṇya iva śriyam
GE07mbh_05_u:116.018a: kandareṣu ca śailānāṃ nadīnāṃ nirjhareṣu ca
GE07mbh_05_u:116.021a: upasthāya sa taṃ vipro gālavaḥ pratigṛhya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:116.021c: kanyāṃ prayātas tāṃ rājan dṛṣṭavān vinatātmajam
GE07mbh_05_u:117.001c: diṣṭyā kṛtārthaṃ paśyāmi bhavantam iha vai dvija
GE07mbh_05_u:117.002a: gālavas tu vacaḥ śrutvā vainateyena bhāṣitam
GE07mbh_05_u:117.002c: caturbhāgāvaśiṣṭaṃ tad ācakhyau kāryam asya hi
GE07mbh_05_u:117.003a: suparṇas tv abravīd enaṃ gālavaṃ patatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:117.003c: prayatnas te na kartavyo naiṣa saṃpatsyate tava
GE07mbh_05_u:117.004a: purā hi kanyakubje vai gādheḥ satyavatīṃ sutām
GE07mbh_05_u:117.005c: bhagavan dīyatāṃ mahyaṃ sahasram iti gālava
GE07mbh_05_u:117.006a: ṛcīkas tu tathety uktvā varuṇasyālayaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:117.006c: aśvatīrthe hayāṃl labdhvā dattavān pārthivāya vai
GE07mbh_05_u:117.007a: iṣṭvā te puṇḍarīkeṇa dattā rājñā dvijātiṣu
GE07mbh_05_u:117.007c: tebhyo dve dve śate krītvā prāptās te pārthivais tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:117.008e: evaṃ na śakyam aprāpyaṃ prāptuṃ gālava karhi cit
GE07mbh_05_u:117.009a: imām aśvaśatābhyāṃ vai dvābhyāṃ tasmai nivedaya
GE07mbh_05_u:117.010a: gālavas taṃ tathety uktvā suparṇasahitas tataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:117.010c: ādāyāśvāṃś ca kanyāṃ ca viśvāmitram upāgamat
GE07mbh_05_u:117.011a: aśvānāṃ kāṅkṣitārthānāṃ ṣaḍ imāni śatāni vai
GE07mbh_05_u:117.012a: asyāṃ rājarṣibhiḥ putrā jātā vai dhārmikās trayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:117.012c: caturthaṃ janayatv ekaṃ bhavān api narottama
GE07mbh_05_u:117.013a: pūrṇāny evaṃ śatāny aṣṭau turagāṇāṃ bhavantu te
GE07mbh_05_u:117.013c: bhavato hy anṛṇo bhūtvā tapaḥ kuryāṃ yathāsukham
GE07mbh_05_u:117.014a: viśvāmitras tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā gālavaṃ saha pakṣiṇā
GE07mbh_05_u:117.014c: kanyāṃ ca tāṃ varārohām idam ity abravīd vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:117.015a: kim iyaṃ pūrvam eveha na dattā mama gālava
GE07mbh_05_u:117.016c: aśvāś cāśramam āsādya tiṣṭhantu mama sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:117.018a: jātamātraṃ sutaṃ taṃ ca viśvāmitro mahādyutiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:117.018c: saṃyojyārthais tathā dharmair aśvais taiḥ samayojayat
GE07mbh_05_u:117.019c: niryātya kanyāṃ śiṣyāya kauśiko 'pi vanaṃ yayau
GE07mbh_05_u:117.021a: jāto dānapatiḥ putras tvayā śūras tathāparaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:117.022a: tad āgaccha varārohe tāritas te pitā sutaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:117.022c: catvāraś caiva rājānas tathāhaṃ ca sumadhyame
GE07mbh_05_u:117.023c: pitur niryātya tāṃ kanyāṃ prayayau vanam eva ha
GE07mbh_05_u:118.001a: sa tu rājā punas tasyāḥ kartukāmaḥ svayaṃvaram
GE07mbh_05_u:118.002c: pūrur yaduś ca bhaginīm āśrame paryadhāvatām
GE07mbh_05_u:118.004c: ṛṣibhir brahmakalpaiś ca samantād āvṛtaṃ vanam
GE07mbh_05_u:118.005c: varān utkramya sarvāṃs tān vanaṃ vṛtavatī varam
GE07mbh_05_u:118.006a: avatīrya rathāt kanyā namaskṛtvā ca bandhuṣu
GE07mbh_05_u:118.006c: upagamya vanaṃ puṇyaṃ tapas tepe yayātijā
GE07mbh_05_u:118.007a: upavāsaiś ca vividhair dīkṣābhir niyamais tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:118.009a: sravantīnāṃ ca puṇyānāṃ surasāni śucīni ca
GE07mbh_05_u:118.012a: yayātir api pūrveṣāṃ rājñāṃ vṛttam anuṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:118.013a: pūrur yaduś ca dvau vaṃśau vardhamānau narottamau
GE07mbh_05_u:118.013c: tābhyāṃ pratiṣṭhito loke paraloke ca nāhuṣaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:118.016a: avamene narān sarvān devān ṛṣigaṇāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:118.017a: tatas taṃ bubudhe devaḥ śakro balaniṣūdanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:118.017c: te ca rājarṣayaḥ sarve dhig dhig ity evam abruvan
GE07mbh_05_u:118.018c: ko nv ayaṃ kasya vā rājñaḥ kathaṃ vā svargam āgataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:118.019a: karmaṇā kena siddho 'yaṃ kva vānena tapaś citam
GE07mbh_05_u:118.019c: kathaṃ vā jñāyate svarge kena vā jñāyate 'py uta
GE07mbh_05_u:118.020c: dṛṣṭvā papracchur anyonyaṃ yayātiṃ nṛpatiṃ prati
GE07mbh_05_u:118.021c: pṛṣṭā āsanapālāś ca na jānīmety athābruvan
GE07mbh_05_u:118.022a: sarve te hy āvṛtajñānā nābhyajānanta taṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_05_u:118.022c: sa muhūrtād atha nṛpo hataujā abhavat tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:119.001a: atha pracalitaḥ sthānād āsanāc ca paricyutaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:119.003a: adṛśyamānas tān paśyann apaśyaṃś ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:119.004a: kiṃ mayā manasā dhyātam aśubhaṃ dharmadūṣaṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:119.004c: yenāhaṃ calitaḥ sthānād iti rājā vyacintayat
GE07mbh_05_u:119.005a: te tu tatraiva rājānaḥ siddhāś cāpsarasas tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:119.007a: atīva madamattas tvaṃ na kaṃ cin nāvamanyase
GE07mbh_05_u:119.007c: mānena bhraṣṭaḥ svargas te nārhas tvaṃ pārthivātmaja
GE07mbh_05_u:119.007e: na ca prajñāyase gaccha patasveti tam abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:119.008a: pateyaṃ satsv iti vacas trir uktvā nahuṣātmajaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:119.008c: patiṣyaṃś cintayām āsa gatiṃ gatimatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:119.009a: etasminn eva kāle tu naimiṣe pārthivarṣabhān
GE07mbh_05_u:119.009c: caturo 'paśyata nṛpas teṣāṃ madhye papāta saḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:119.011c: yayātir upajighran vai nipapāta mahīṃ prati
GE07mbh_05_u:119.012a: bhūmau svarge ca saṃbaddhāṃ nadīṃ dhūmamayīṃ nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:119.012c: sa gaṅgām iva gacchantīm ālambya jagatīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:119.015a: tam āhuḥ pārthivāḥ sarve pratimānam iva śriyaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:119.015c: ko bhavān kasya vā bandhur deśasya nagarasya vā
GE07mbh_05_u:119.016a: yakṣo vāpy atha vā devo gandharvo rākṣaso 'pi vā
GE07mbh_05_u:119.016c: na hi mānuṣarūpo 'si ko vārthaḥ kāṅkṣitas tvayā
GE07mbh_05_u:119.017a: yayātir asmi rājarṣiḥ kṣīṇapuṇyaś cyuto divaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:119.017c: pateyaṃ satsv iti dhyāyan bhavatsu patitas tataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:119.018a: satyam etad bhavatu te kāṅkṣitaṃ puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:119.018c: sarveṣāṃ naḥ kratuphalaṃ dharmaś ca pratigṛhyatām
GE07mbh_05_u:119.019a: nāhaṃ pratigrahadhano brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo hy aham
GE07mbh_05_u:119.019c: na ca me pravaṇā buddhiḥ parapuṇyavināśane
GE07mbh_05_u:119.021a: kim āgamanakṛtyaṃ te kiṃ kurvaḥ śāsanaṃ tava
GE07mbh_05_u:119.021c: ājñāpyā hi vayaṃ sarve tava putrās tapodhane
GE07mbh_05_u:119.022a: teṣāṃ tad bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā mādhavī parayā mudā
GE07mbh_05_u:119.022c: pitaraṃ samupāgacchad yayātiṃ sā vavanda ca
GE07mbh_05_u:119.023a: dṛṣṭvā mūrdhnā natān putrāṃs tāpasī vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:119.023c: dauhitrās tava rājendra mama putrā na te parāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:119.023e: ime tvāṃ tārayiṣyanti diṣṭam etat purātanam

GE07mbh_05_u:120.001c: yayātir divyasaṃsthāno babhūva vigatajvaraḥ nārada uvāca

GE07mbh_05_u:120.004c: tad apy atha ca dāsyāmi tena saṃyujyatāṃ bhavān
GE07mbh_05_u:120.005a: yat phalaṃ dānaśīlasya kṣamāśīlasya yat phalam

GE07mbh_05_u:120.010a: yathā prāṇāṃś ca rājyaṃ ca rājan karma sukhāni ca

GE07mbh_05_u:120.012a: aṣṭakas tv atha rājarṣiḥ kauśiko mādhavīsutaḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:120.014c: kratuṣv anupayuktāni tena satyena khaṃ vraja
GE07mbh_05_u:120.014d-0466_01: yadi satyaṃ bravīmy etat tena satyena vai vraja
GE07mbh_05_u:120.015a: yathā yathā hi jalpanti dauhitrās taṃ narādhipam
GE07mbh_05_u:120.015c: tathā tathā vasumatīṃ tyaktvā rājā divaṃ yayau

GE07mbh_05_u:120.016c: yayātiṃ svargato bhraṣṭaṃ tārayām āsur añjasā

GE07mbh_05_u:122.018a: etac chreyo hi manyante pitā yac chāsti bhārata

GE07mbh_05_u:122.047a: idaṃ saṃnihitaṃ tāta samagraṃ pārthivaṃ balam

GE07mbh_05_u:122.050a: dṛśyatāṃ vā pumān kaś cit samagre pārthive bale

GE07mbh_05_u:122.051c: yasmiñ jite jitaṃ te syāt pumān ekaḥ sa dṛśyatām
GE07mbh_05_u:122.052c: ajayat khāṇḍavaprasthe kas taṃ yudhyeta mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:122.053c: ekasya ca bahūnāṃ ca paryāptaṃ tan nidarśanam

GE07mbh_05_u:122.054a: tam ajeyam anādhṛṣyaṃ vijetuṃ jiṣṇum acyutam
GE07mbh_05_u:122.055a: maddvitīyaṃ punaḥ pārthaṃ kaḥ prārthayitum arhati
GE07mbh_05_u:122.055c: yuddhe pratīpam āyāntam api sākṣāt puraṃdaraḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:122.056c: pātayet tridivād devān yo 'rjunaṃ samare jayet
GE07mbh_05_u:122.057a: paśya putrāṃs tathā bhrātṝñ jñātīn saṃbandhinas tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:122.058a: astu śeṣaṃ kauravāṇāṃ mā parābhūd idaṃ kulam
GE07mbh_05_u:122.060a: mā tāta śriyam āyāntīm avamaṃsthāḥ samudyatām
GE07mbh_05_u:122.060c: ardhaṃ pradāya pārthebhyo mahatīṃ śriyam āpsyasi
GE07mbh_05_u:122.061a: pāṇḍavaiḥ saṃśamaṃ kṛtvā kṛtvā ca suhṛdāṃ vacaḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:123.014c: vāsudevārjunau yatra viddhy ajeyaṃ balaṃ hi tat

GE07mbh_05_u:123.016c: kṛṣṇo hi devakīputro devair api durutsahaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:123.017c: etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yathecchasi tathā kuru

GE07mbh_05_u:123.027a: śamaṃ ced yācamānaṃ tvaṃ pratyākhyāsyasi keśavam

GE07mbh_05_u:124.002c: yāvad dhaumyo na senāgnau juhotīha dviṣadbalam
GE07mbh_05_u:124.003a: yāvan na prekṣate kruddhaḥ senāṃ tava yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:124.004a: yāvan na dṛṣyate pārthaḥ sveṣv anīkeṣv avasthitaḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:124.007a: nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca pārṣataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:124.007c: virāṭaś ca śikhaṇḍī ca śaiśupāliś ca daṃśitāḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:124.008c: kṛtāstrāḥ kṣipram asyantas tāvac chāmyatu vaiśasam

GE07mbh_05_u:124.017a: dṛṣṭvā tvāṃ pāṇḍavair vīrair bhrātṛbhiḥ saha saṃgatam

GE07mbh_05_u:125.002c: mām eva hi viśeṣeṇa vibhāṣya parigarhase
GE07mbh_05_u:125.003c: bhavān garhayate nityaṃ kiṃ samīkṣya balābalam
GE07mbh_05_u:125.004a: bhavān kṣattā ca rājā ca ācāryo vā pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:125.004c: mām eva parigarhante nānyaṃ kaṃ cana pārthivam
GE07mbh_05_u:125.005a: na cāhaṃ lakṣaye kaṃ cid vyabhicāram ihātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:125.005c: atha sarve bhavanto māṃ vidviṣanti sarājakāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:125.006a: na cāhaṃ kaṃ cid atyartham aparādham ariṃdama
GE07mbh_05_u:125.007c: jitāḥ śakuninā rājyaṃ tatra kiṃ mama duṣkṛtam
GE07mbh_05_u:125.008a: yat punar draviṇaṃ kiṃ cit tatrājīyanta pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:125.009a: aparādho na cāsmākaṃ yat te hy akṣaparājitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:125.009c: ajeyā jayatāṃ śreṣṭha pārthāḥ pravrājitā vanam
GE07mbh_05_u:125.011a: kim asmābhiḥ kṛtaṃ teṣāṃ kasmin vā punar āgasi
GE07mbh_05_u:125.012a: na cāpi vayam ugreṇa karmaṇā vacanena vā
GE07mbh_05_u:125.013a: na ca taṃ kṛṣṇa paśyāmi kṣatradharmam anuṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_05_u:125.013c: utsaheta yudhā jetuṃ yo naḥ śatrunibarhaṇa
GE07mbh_05_u:125.014c: devair api yudhā jetuṃ śakyāḥ kim uta pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:125.015c: śastreṇa nidhanaṃ kāle prāpsyāmaḥ svargam eva tat
GE07mbh_05_u:125.016a: mukhyaś caivaiṣa no dharmaḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ janārdana
GE07mbh_05_u:125.017a: te vayaṃ vīraśayanaṃ prāpsyāmo yadi saṃyuge
GE07mbh_05_u:125.017c: apraṇamyaiva śatrūṇāṃ na nas tapsyati mādhava
GE07mbh_05_u:125.018a: kaś ca jātu kule jātaḥ kṣatradharmeṇa vartayan
GE07mbh_05_u:125.018c: bhayād vṛttiṃ samīkṣyaivaṃ praṇamed iha kasya cit
GE07mbh_05_u:125.019a: udyacched eva na named udyamo hy eva pauruṣam
GE07mbh_05_u:125.019c: apy aparvaṇi bhajyeta na named iha kasya cit
GE07mbh_05_u:125.020c: dharmāya caiva praṇamed brāhmaṇebhyaś ca madvidhaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:125.021a: acintayan kaṃ cid anyaṃ yāvajjīvaṃ tathācaret
GE07mbh_05_u:125.021c: eṣa dharmaḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ matam etac ca me sadā
GE07mbh_05_u:125.022a: rājyāṃśaś cābhyanujñāto yo me pitrā purābhavat
GE07mbh_05_u:125.022c: na sa labhyaḥ punar jātu mayi jīvati keśava
GE07mbh_05_u:125.023a: yāvac ca rājā dhriyate dhṛtarāṣṭro janārdana
GE07mbh_05_u:125.023c: nyastaśastrā vayaṃ te vāpy upajīvāma mādhava
GE07mbh_05_u:125.024a: yady adeyaṃ purā dattaṃ rājyaṃ paravato mama
GE07mbh_05_u:125.024c: ajñānād vā bhayād vāpi mayi bāle janārdana
GE07mbh_05_u:125.025a: na tad adya punar labhyaṃ pāṇḍavair vṛṣṇinandana
GE07mbh_05_u:125.026a: yāvad dhi sūcyās tīkṣṇāyā vidhyed agreṇa mādhava
GE07mbh_05_u:125.026c: tāvad apy aparityājyaṃ bhūmer naḥ pāṇḍavān prati
GE07mbh_05_u:126.002c: sthiro bhava sahāmātyo vimardo bhavitā mahān
GE07mbh_05_u:126.003a: yac caivaṃ manyase mūḍha na me kaś cid vyatikramaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:126.003c: pāṇḍaveṣv iti tat sarvaṃ nibodhata narādhipāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:126.004c: tvayā durmantritaṃ dyūtaṃ saubalena ca bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:126.005a: kathaṃ ca jñātayas tāta śreyāṃsaḥ sādhusaṃmatāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:126.006c: asatāṃ tatra jāyante bhedāś ca vyasanāni ca
GE07mbh_05_u:126.007a: tad idaṃ vyasanaṃ ghoraṃ tvayā dyūtamukhaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_05_u:126.008a: kaś cānyo jñātibhāryāṃ vai viprakartuṃ tathārhati
GE07mbh_05_u:126.008c: ānīya ca sabhāṃ vaktuṃ yathoktā draupadī tvayā
GE07mbh_05_u:126.011c: sveṣu bandhuṣu kaḥ sādhuś cared evam asāṃpratam
GE07mbh_05_u:126.012c: karṇaduḥśāsanābhyāṃ ca tvayā ca bahuśaḥ kṛtam
GE07mbh_05_u:126.013a: saha mātrā pradagdhuṃ tān bālakān vāraṇāvate
GE07mbh_05_u:126.013c: āsthitaḥ paramaṃ yatnaṃ na samṛddhaṃ ca tat tava
GE07mbh_05_u:126.014a: ūṣuś ca suciraṃ kālaṃ pracchannāḥ pāṇḍavās tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:126.015a: viṣeṇa sarpabandhaiś ca yatitāḥ pāṇḍavās tvayā
GE07mbh_05_u:126.015c: sarvopāyair vināśāya na samṛddhaṃ ca tat tava
GE07mbh_05_u:126.015d-0478_01: evaṃvṛttaḥ kathaṃ rājye sthātum arhasi pāpakṛt
GE07mbh_05_u:126.015d-0478_02: sa rājyāc ca sukhāc caiva hāsyase kulapāṃsana
GE07mbh_05_u:126.016d-0479_01: yac caibhyo yācamānebhyaḥ pitryam aṃśaṃ na ditsasi
GE07mbh_05_u:126.016d-0479_02: tac ca pāpa pradātāsi bhraṣṭaiśvaryo nipātitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:126.018c: śāmyeti muhur ukto 'si na ca śāmyasi pārthiva
GE07mbh_05_u:126.019a: śame hi sumahān arthas tava pārthasya cobhayoḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:126.019c: na ca rocayase rājan kim anyad buddhilāghavāt
GE07mbh_05_u:126.020a: na śarma prāpsyase rājann utkramya suhṛdāṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:126.020c: adharmyam ayaśasyaṃ ca kriyate pārthiva tvayā
GE07mbh_05_u:126.022a: na cet saṃdhāsyase rājan svena kāmena pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:126.022c: baddhvā kila tvāṃ dāsyanti kuntīputrāya kauravāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:126.023a: vaikartanaṃ tvāṃ ca māṃ ca trīn etān manujarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:126.023c: pāṇḍavebhyaḥ pradāsyanti bhīṣmo droṇaḥ pitā ca te
GE07mbh_05_u:126.024a: bhrātur etad vacaḥ śrutvā dhārtarāṣṭraḥ suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:126.025a: viduraṃ dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ ca mahārājaṃ ca bāhlikam
GE07mbh_05_u:126.025c: kṛpaṃ ca somadattaṃ ca bhīṣmaṃ droṇaṃ janārdanam
GE07mbh_05_u:126.028a: sabhāyām utthitaṃ kruddhaṃ prasthitaṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_05_u:126.029c: hasanti vyasane tasya durhṛdo nacirād iva
GE07mbh_05_u:126.031c: sarve hy anusṛtā mohāt pārthivāḥ saha mantribhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:126.033c: prasahya mandam aiśvarye na niyacchata yan nṛpam
GE07mbh_05_u:126.034a: tatra kāryam ahaṃ manye prāptakālam ariṃdamāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:126.034c: kriyamāṇe bhavec chreyas tat sarvaṃ śṛṇutānaghāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:126.035a: pratyakṣam etad bhavatāṃ yad vakṣyāmi hitaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:126.036c: jīvataḥ pitur aiśvaryaṃ hṛtvā manyuvaśaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:126.038a: āhukaḥ punar asmābhir jñātibhiś cāpi satkṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:126.040a: api cāpy avadad rājan parameṣṭhī prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:126.043d-0480_01: vartamānaṃ jagat sarvaṃ muhūrtān na bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:126.045a: evam uktas tato dharmo niyogāt parameṣṭhinaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:126.046a: tān baddhvā dharmapāśaiś ca svaiś ca pāśair jaleśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:126.046c: varuṇaḥ sāgare yatto nityaṃ rakṣati dānavān
GE07mbh_05_u:126.047a: tathā duryodhanaṃ karṇaṃ śakuniṃ cāpi saubalam
GE07mbh_05_u:126.048a: tyajet kulārthe puruṣaṃ grāmasyārthe kulaṃ tyajet
GE07mbh_05_u:126.049a: rājan duryodhanaṃ baddhvā tataḥ saṃśāmya pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:127.003c: api kṛṣṇāya suhṛdas tiṣṭhema vacane vayam
GE07mbh_05_u:127.005a: api no vyasanaṃ ghoraṃ duryodhanakṛtaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_05_u:127.006a: rājñas tu vacanaṃ śrutvā viduro dīrghadarśinīm
GE07mbh_05_u:127.007a: eṣa gāndhāri putras te durātmā śāsanātigaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:127.009a: sā bhartur vacanaṃ śrutvā rājaputrī yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_05_u:127.009c: anvicchantī mahac chreyo gāndhārī vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:127.010c: na hi rājyam aśiṣṭena śakyaṃ dharmārthalopinā
GE07mbh_05_u:127.011a: tvaṃ hy evātra bhṛśaṃ garhyo dhṛtarāṣṭra sutapriyaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:127.011c: yo jānan pāpatām asya tatprajñām anuvartase
GE07mbh_05_u:127.012a: sa eṣa kāmamanyubhyāṃ pralabdho moham āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:127.014a: kathaṃ hi svajane bhedam upekṣeta mahāmatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:127.014c: bhinnaṃ hi svajanena tvāṃ prasahiṣyanti śatravaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:127.015a: yā hi śakyā mahārāja sāmnā dānena vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:127.015c: nistartum āpadaḥ sveṣu daṇḍaṃ kas tatra pātayet
GE07mbh_05_u:127.016c: mātuś ca vacanāt kṣattā sabhāṃ prāveśayat punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:127.017a: sa mātur vacanākāṅkṣī praviveśa sabhāṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:127.018a: taṃ praviṣṭam abhiprekṣya putram utpatham āsthitam
GE07mbh_05_u:127.019d-0482_01: duryodhana yad āha tvāṃ pitā bharatasattama
GE07mbh_05_u:127.019d-0482_02: bhīṣmo droṇaḥ kṛpaḥ kṣattā suhṛdāṃ kuru tad vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:127.020a: bhīṣmasya tu pituś caiva mama cāpacitiḥ kṛtā
GE07mbh_05_u:127.020c: bhaved droṇamukhānāṃ ca suhṛdāṃ śāmyatā tvayā
GE07mbh_05_u:127.021a: na hi rājyaṃ mahāprājña svena kāmena śakyate
GE07mbh_05_u:127.021c: avāptuṃ rakṣituṃ vāpi bhoktuṃ vā bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:127.022a: na hy avaśyendriyo rājyam aśnīyād dīrgham antaram
GE07mbh_05_u:127.022c: vijitātmā tu medhāvī sa rājyam abhipālayet
GE07mbh_05_u:127.023c: tau tu śatrū vinirjitya rājā vijayate mahīm
GE07mbh_05_u:127.024c: rājyaṃ nāmepsitaṃ sthānaṃ na śakyam abhirakṣitum
GE07mbh_05_u:127.028a: ātmānam eva prathamaṃ deśarūpeṇa yo jayet
GE07mbh_05_u:127.028c: tato 'mātyān amitrāṃś ca na moghaṃ vijigīṣate
GE07mbh_05_u:127.031a: yābhyāṃ hi devāḥ svaryātuḥ svargasyāpidadhur mukham
GE07mbh_05_u:127.032a: kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca lobhaṃ ca dambhaṃ darpaṃ ca bhūmipaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:127.032c: samyag vijetuṃ yo veda sa mahīm abhijāyate
GE07mbh_05_u:127.033a: satataṃ nigrahe yukta indriyāṇāṃ bhaven nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:127.033c: īpsann arthaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca dviṣatāṃ ca parābhavam
GE07mbh_05_u:127.034a: kāmābhibhūtaḥ krodhād vā yo mithyā pratipadyate
GE07mbh_05_u:127.034c: sveṣu cānyeṣu vā tasya na sahāyā bhavanty uta
GE07mbh_05_u:127.035c: pāṇḍavaiḥ pṛthivīṃ tāta bhokṣyase sahitaḥ sukhī
GE07mbh_05_u:127.036a: yathā bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavo droṇaś cāpi mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:127.036c: āhatus tāta tat satyam ajeyau kṛṣṇapāṇḍavau
GE07mbh_05_u:127.037c: prasanno hi sukhāya syād ubhayor eva keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:127.038a: suhṛdām arthakāmānāṃ yo na tiṣṭhati śāsane
GE07mbh_05_u:127.039a: na yuddhe tāta kalyāṇaṃ na dharmārthau kutaḥ sukham
GE07mbh_05_u:127.039c: na cāpi vijayo nityaṃ mā yuddhe ceta ādhithāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:127.040a: bhīṣmeṇa hi mahāprājña pitrā te bāhlikena ca
GE07mbh_05_u:127.043a: alam ardhaṃ pṛthivyās te sahāmātyasya jīvanam
GE07mbh_05_u:127.043c: suhṛdāṃ vacane tiṣṭhan yaśaḥ prāpsyasi bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:127.044c: pāṇḍavair vigrahas tāta bhraṃśayen mahataḥ sukhāt
GE07mbh_05_u:127.045a: nigṛhya suhṛdāṃ manyuṃ śādhi rājyaṃ yathocitam
GE07mbh_05_u:127.046a: alam ahnā nikāro 'yaṃ trayodaśa samāḥ kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:127.047a: na caiṣa śaktaḥ pārthānāṃ yas tvadartham abhīpsati
GE07mbh_05_u:127.047c: sūtaputro dṛḍhakrodho bhrātā duḥśāsanaś ca te
GE07mbh_05_u:127.048a: bhīṣme droṇe kṛpe karṇe bhīmasene dhanaṃjaye
GE07mbh_05_u:127.048c: dhṛṣṭadyumne ca saṃkruddhe na syuḥ sarvāḥ prajā dhruvam
GE07mbh_05_u:127.049a: amarṣavaśam āpanno mā kurūṃs tāta jīghanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:127.049c: sarvā hi pṛthivī spṛṣṭā tvat pāṇḍavakṛte vadham
GE07mbh_05_u:127.050a: yac ca tvaṃ manyase mūḍha bhīṣmadroṇakṛpādayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:127.051a: samaṃ hi rājyaṃ prītiś ca sthānaṃ ca vijitātmanām
GE07mbh_05_u:127.051c: pāṇḍaveṣv atha yuṣmāsu dharmas tv abhyadhikas tataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:127.052c: na hi śakṣyanti rājānaṃ yudhiṣṭhiram udīkṣitum
GE07mbh_05_u:127.053a: na lobhād arthasaṃpattir narāṇām iha dṛśyate
GE07mbh_05_u:127.053c: tad alaṃ tāta lobhena praśāmya bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:128.001a: tat tu vākyam anādṛtya so 'rthavan mātṛbhāṣitam
GE07mbh_05_u:128.002a: tataḥ sabhāyā nirgamya mantrayām āsa kauravaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:128.002d-0483_02: no cet saṃdhāsyase rājan svena kāmena pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:128.002d-0483_04: vaikartanaṃ tvāṃ ca māṃ ca trīn etān bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:128.002d-0483_05: pāṇḍavebhyaḥ pradāsyanti bhīṣmadroṇau pitā ca te
GE07mbh_05_u:128.005a: vayam eva hṛṣīkeśaṃ nigṛhṇīma balād iva
GE07mbh_05_u:128.007a: ayaṃ hy eṣāṃ mahābāhuḥ sarveṣāṃ śarma varma ca
GE07mbh_05_u:128.012a: sa praviśya sabhāṃ vīraḥ siṃho giriguhām iva
GE07mbh_05_u:128.013c: teṣām etam abhiprāyam ācacakṣe smayann iva
GE07mbh_05_u:128.014a: dharmād apetam arthāc ca karma sādhuvigarhitam
GE07mbh_05_u:128.014c: mandāḥ kartum ihecchanti na cāvāpyaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:128.016c: paṭenāgniṃ prajvalitaṃ yathā bālā yathā jaḍāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:128.017a: sātyakes tad vacaḥ śrutvā viduro dīrghadarśivān
GE07mbh_05_u:128.017d-007_0002: sānubandhas tu kṛṣṇena kāśīnām ṛṣabho hataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:128.017d-007_0008: hṛtās te vāsudevena hy upasaṃkramya kauravān
GE07mbh_05_u:128.017d-007_0009: dvāram āsādya saubhasya vidhūya gadayā girim
GE07mbh_05_u:128.017d-007_0013: ete hi yadi govindam icchanti saha rājabhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:128.017d-007_0015: yathā vāyos tṛṇāgrāṇi vaśaṃ yānti balīyasaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:128.017d-007_0016: tathā cakrabhṛtaḥ sarve vaśam eṣyanti kauravāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:128.018a: rājan parītakālās te putrāḥ sarve paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_05_u:128.018c: ayaśasyam aśakyaṃ ca karma kartuṃ samudyatāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:128.019a: imaṃ hi puṇḍarīkākṣam abhibhūya prasahya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:128.020c: āsādya na bhaviṣyanti pataṃgā iva pāvakam
GE07mbh_05_u:128.020d-0484_01: ete na śaktāḥ sarve hi sāhasāt kartum udyatāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:128.021a: ayam icchan hi tān sarvān yatamānāñ janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:128.021c: siṃho mṛgān iva kruddho gamayed yamasādanam
GE07mbh_05_u:128.022a: na tv ayaṃ ninditaṃ karma kuryāt kṛṣṇaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:128.022c: na ca dharmād apakrāmed acyutaḥ puruṣottamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:128.023a: vidureṇaivam ukte tu keśavo vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:128.024a: rājann ete yadi kruddhā māṃ nigṛhṇīyur ojasā
GE07mbh_05_u:128.024c: ete vā mām ahaṃ vainān anujānīhi pārthiva
GE07mbh_05_u:128.025a: etān hi sarvān saṃrabdhān niyantum aham utsahe
GE07mbh_05_u:128.025c: na tv ahaṃ ninditaṃ karma kuryāṃ pāpaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:128.026a: pāṇḍavārthe hi lubhyantaḥ svārthād dhāsyanti te sutāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:128.026c: ete ced evam icchanti kṛtakāryo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:128.027a: adyaiva hy aham etāṃś ca ye caitān anu bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:128.027b-0486_02: eṣa me niścayo rājan yady eṣo 'sya viniścayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:128.027b-0486_04: anāyāsena pārthānāṃ vartatāṃ ca śivaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_05_u:128.027c: nigṛhya rājan pārthebhyo dadyāṃ kiṃ duṣkṛtaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_05_u:128.028a: idaṃ tu na pravarteyaṃ ninditaṃ karma bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:128.029a: eṣa duryodhano rājan yathecchati tathāstu tat
GE07mbh_05_u:128.029c: ahaṃ tu sarvān samayān anujānāmi bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:128.030c: kṣipram ānaya taṃ pāpaṃ rājyalubdhaṃ suyodhanam
GE07mbh_05_u:128.032a: tato duryodhanaṃ kṣattā punaḥ prāveśayat sabhām

GE07mbh_05_u:132.010a: yasya hy arthābhinirvṛttau bhavanty āpyāyitāḥ pare
GE07mbh_05_u:132.011a: samṛddhir asamṛddhir vā pūrveṣāṃ mama saṃjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:132.011c: evaṃ vidvān yuddhamanā bhava mā pratyupāhara
GE07mbh_05_u:132.012a: nātaḥ pāpīyasīṃ kāṃ cid avasthāṃ śambaro 'bravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:132.012c: yatra naivādya na prātar bhojanaṃ pratidṛśyate
GE07mbh_05_u:132.013c: dāridryam iti yat proktaṃ paryāyamaraṇaṃ hi tat
GE07mbh_05_u:132.014a: ahaṃ mahākule jātā hradād dhradam ivāgatā
GE07mbh_05_u:132.015c: purā dṛṣṭvā suhṛdvargo mām apaśyat sudurgatām
GE07mbh_05_u:132.016a: yadā māṃ caiva bhāryāṃ ca draṣṭāsi bhṛśadurbale
GE07mbh_05_u:132.016c: na tadā jīvitenārtho bhavitā tava saṃjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:132.017c: avṛttyāsmān prajahato dṛṣṭvā kiṃ jīvitena te
GE07mbh_05_u:132.018a: yadi kṛtyaṃ na paśyāmi tavādyeha yathā purā
GE07mbh_05_u:132.018c: ślāghanīyaṃ yaśasyaṃ ca kā śāntir hṛdayasya me
GE07mbh_05_u:132.019a: neti ced brāhmaṇān brūyāṃ dīryate hṛdayaṃ mama
GE07mbh_05_u:132.019c: na hy ahaṃ na ca me bhartā neti brāhmaṇam uktavān
GE07mbh_05_u:132.020a: vayam āśrayaṇīyāḥ sma nāśritāraḥ parasya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:132.021a: apāre bhava naḥ pāram aplave bhava naḥ plavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:132.021c: kuruṣva sthānam asthāne mṛtān saṃjīvayasva naḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:132.022a: sarve te śatravaḥ sahyā na cej jīvitum icchasi
GE07mbh_05_u:132.022c: atha ced īdṛśīṃ vṛttiṃ klībām abhyupapadyase
GE07mbh_05_u:132.024c: māhendraṃ ca grahaṃ lebhe lokānāṃ ceśvaro 'bhavat
GE07mbh_05_u:132.025a: nāma viśrāvya vā saṃkhye śatrūn āhūya daṃśitān
GE07mbh_05_u:132.025c: senāgraṃ vāpi vidrāvya hatvā vā puruṣaṃ varam
GE07mbh_05_u:132.026a: yadaiva labhate vīraḥ suyuddhena mahad yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:132.027a: tyaktvātmānaṃ raṇe dakṣaṃ śūraṃ kāpuruṣā janāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:132.028a: rājyaṃ vāpy ugravibhraṃśaṃ saṃśayo jīvitasya vā
GE07mbh_05_u:132.028c: pralabdhasya hi śatror vai śeṣaṃ kurvanti sādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:132.029d-0504_01: bhuṅkṣva yuddhena me śatrūñ jitvā tu raṇamūrdhani
GE07mbh_05_u:132.030a: jahi śatrūn raṇe rājan svadharmam anupālaya
GE07mbh_05_u:132.030c: mā tvā paśyet sukṛpaṇaṃ śatruḥ śrīmān kadā cana
GE07mbh_05_u:132.031a: asmadīyaiś ca śocadbhir nadadbhiś ca parair vṛtam
GE07mbh_05_u:132.031c: api tvāṃ nānupaśyeyaṃ dīnā dīnam avasthitam
GE07mbh_05_u:132.032c: mā ca saindhavakanyānām avasan no vaśaṃ gamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:132.033e: voḍhavye dhury anaḍuvan manye maraṇam eva tat
GE07mbh_05_u:132.034c: pṛṣṭhato 'nuvrajantaṃ vā kā śāntir hṛdayasya me
GE07mbh_05_u:132.035a: nāsmiñ jātu kule jāto gacched yo 'nyasya pṛṣṭhataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:132.035c: na tvaṃ parasyānudhuraṃ tāta jīvitum arhasi
GE07mbh_05_u:132.036a: ahaṃ hi kṣatrahṛdayaṃ veda yat pariśāśvatam
GE07mbh_05_u:132.036c: pūrvaiḥ pūrvataraiḥ proktaṃ paraiḥ paratarair api
GE07mbh_05_u:132.037a: yo vai kaś cid ihājātaḥ kṣatriyaḥ kṣatradharmavit
GE07mbh_05_u:132.037c: bhayād vṛttisamīkṣo vā na named iha kasya cit
GE07mbh_05_u:132.038a: udyacched eva na named udyamo hy eva pauruṣam
GE07mbh_05_u:132.038c: apy aparvaṇi bhajyeta na named iha kasya cit
GE07mbh_05_u:132.039a: mātaṅgo matta iva ca parīyāt sumahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:132.039c: brāhmaṇebhyo namen nityaṃ dharmāyaiva ca saṃjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:133.001a: kṛṣṇāyasasyeva ca te saṃhatya hṛdayaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_05_u:133.001c: mama mātas tv akaruṇe vairaprajñe hy amarṣaṇe
GE07mbh_05_u:133.002a: aho kṣatrasamācāro yatra mām aparaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_05_u:133.002c: īdṛśaṃ vacanaṃ brūyād bhavatī putram ekajam
GE07mbh_05_u:133.003a: kiṃ nu te mām apaśyantyāḥ pṛthivyā api sarvayā
GE07mbh_05_u:133.003c: kim ābharaṇakṛtyaṃ te kiṃ bhogair jīvitena vā
GE07mbh_05_u:133.003d-0509_01: mohāt saṃgarhase mātaḥ priyaṃ putraṃ viśeṣataḥ mātovāca
GE07mbh_05_u:133.005c: asmiṃś ced āgate kāle kāryaṃ na pratipadyase
GE07mbh_05_u:133.006a: taṃ tvām ayaśasā spṛṣṭaṃ na brūyāṃ yadi saṃjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:133.006b-0510_01: aham eva bhaveyaṃ te ripur atyantaro mahān
GE07mbh_05_u:133.007c: avidyā vai mahaty asti yām imāṃ saṃśritāḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:133.008a: tava syād yadi sadvṛttaṃ tena me tvaṃ priyo bhaveḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:133.009a: yo hy evam avinītena ramate putranaptṛṇā
GE07mbh_05_u:133.010a: akurvanto hi karmāṇi kurvanto ninditāni ca
GE07mbh_05_u:133.011a: yuddhāya kṣatriyaḥ sṛṣṭaḥ saṃjayeha jayāya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:133.012a: na śakrabhavane puṇye divi tad vidyate sukham
GE07mbh_05_u:133.012c: yad amitrān vaśe kṛtvā kṣatriyaḥ sukham aśnute
GE07mbh_05_u:133.014a: ātmānaṃ vā parityajya śatrūn vā vinipātya vai
GE07mbh_05_u:133.014b-0512_01: yat sukhaṃ prāpyate tena na tad anyatra vidyate
GE07mbh_05_u:133.014b-0513_01: prāpyate neha śāntir hi nityam eva tu saṃjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:133.014c: ato 'nyena prakāreṇa śāntir asya kuto bhavet
GE07mbh_05_u:133.015a: iha prājño hi puruṣaḥ svalpam apriyam icchati
GE07mbh_05_u:133.015c: yasya svalpaṃ priyaṃ loke dhruvaṃ tasyālpam apriyam
GE07mbh_05_u:133.016a: priyābhāvāc ca puruṣo naiva prāpnoti śobhanam
GE07mbh_05_u:133.016c: dhruvaṃ cābhāvam abhyeti gatvā gaṅgeva sāgaram
GE07mbh_05_u:133.017a: neyaṃ matis tvayā vācyā mātaḥ putre viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:133.017c: kāruṇyam evātra paśya bhūtveha jaḍamūkavat mātovāca
GE07mbh_05_u:133.018a: ato me bhūyasī nandir yad evam anupaśyasi
GE07mbh_05_u:133.018c: codyaṃ māṃ codayasy etad bhṛśaṃ vai codayāmi te
GE07mbh_05_u:133.019a: atha tvāṃ pūjayiṣyāmi hatvā vai sarvasaindhavān
GE07mbh_05_u:133.019c: ahaṃ paśyāmi vijayaṃ kṛtsnaṃ bhāvinam eva te
GE07mbh_05_u:133.020e: rājyād bhāvo nivṛtto me tridivād iva duṣkṛteḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:133.021a: īdṛśaṃ bhavatī kaṃ cid upāyam anupaśyati
GE07mbh_05_u:133.021c: tan me pariṇataprajñe samyak prabrūhi pṛcchate
GE07mbh_05_u:133.021e: kariṣyāmi hi tat sarvaṃ yathāvad anuśāsanam mātovāca
GE07mbh_05_u:133.022c: abhūtvā hi bhavanty arthā bhūtvā naśyanti cāpare
GE07mbh_05_u:133.023c: sarveṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ tāta phale nityam anityatā
GE07mbh_05_u:133.024a: anityam iti jānanto na bhavanti bhavanti ca
GE07mbh_05_u:133.024c: atha ye naiva kurvanti naiva jātu bhavanti te
GE07mbh_05_u:133.025c: atha dvaiguṇyam īhāyāṃ phalaṃ bhavati vā na vā
GE07mbh_05_u:133.026a: yasya prāg eva viditā sarvārthānām anityatā
GE07mbh_05_u:133.027c: bhaviṣyatīty eva manaḥ kṛtvā satatam avyathaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:133.028a: prājñasya nṛpater āśu vṛddhir bhavati putraka
GE07mbh_05_u:133.028c: abhivartati lakṣmīs taṃ prācīm iva divākaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:133.029a: nidarśanāny upāyāṃś ca bahūny uddharṣaṇāni ca
GE07mbh_05_u:133.030c: spardhinaś caiva ye ke cit tān yukta upadhāraya
GE07mbh_05_u:133.031a: etena tvaṃ prakāreṇa mahato bhetsyase gaṇān
GE07mbh_05_u:133.032c: te tvāṃ priyaṃ kariṣyanti puro dhāsyanti ca dhruvam
GE07mbh_05_u:133.034a: taṃ viditvā parākrāntaṃ vaśe na kurute yadi
GE07mbh_05_u:133.034c: nirvādair nirvaded enam antatas tad bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:133.035c: dhanavantaṃ hi mitrāṇi bhajante cāśrayanti ca
GE07mbh_05_u:133.036a: skhalitārthaṃ punas tāta saṃtyajanty api bāndhavāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:133.036c: apy asminn āśrayante ca jugupsanti ca tādṛśam
GE07mbh_05_u:133.037a: śatruṃ kṛtvā yaḥ sahāyaṃ viśvāsam upagacchati
GE07mbh_05_u:133.037c: ataḥ saṃbhāvyam evaitad yad rājyaṃ prāpnuyād iti mātovāca
GE07mbh_05_u:134.001a: naiva rājñā daraḥ kāryo jātu kasyāṃ cid āpadi
GE07mbh_05_u:134.001c: atha ced api dīrṇaḥ syān naiva varteta dīrṇavat
GE07mbh_05_u:134.002a: dīrṇaṃ hi dṛṣṭvā rājānaṃ sarvam evānudīryate
GE07mbh_05_u:134.002c: rāṣṭraṃ balam amātyāś ca pṛthak kurvanti te matim
GE07mbh_05_u:134.003a: śatrūn eke prapadyante prajahaty apare punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:134.003c: anv eke prajihīrṣanti ye purastād vimānitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:134.005a: api te pūjitāḥ pūrvam api te suhṛdo matāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:134.005c: ye rāṣṭram abhimanyante rājño vyasanam īyuṣaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:134.005e: mā dīdaras tvaṃ suhṛdo mā tvāṃ dīrṇaṃ prahāsiṣuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:134.006a: prabhāvaṃ pauruṣaṃ buddhiṃ jijñāsantyā mayā tava
GE07mbh_05_u:134.007a: yady etat saṃvijānāsi yadi samyag bravīmy aham
GE07mbh_05_u:134.008a: asti naḥ kośanicayo mahān aviditas tava
GE07mbh_05_u:134.008c: tam ahaṃ veda nānyas tam upasaṃpādayāmi te
GE07mbh_05_u:134.009a: santi naikaśatā bhūyaḥ suhṛdas tava saṃjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:134.010a: tādṛśā hi sahāyā vai puruṣasya bubhūṣataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:134.010c: īṣad ujjihataḥ kiṃ cit sacivāḥ śatrukarśanāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:134.011a: kasya tv īdṛśakaṃ vākyaṃ śrutvāpi svalpacetasaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:134.012a: udake dhūr iyaṃ dhāryā sartavyaṃ pravaṇe mayā
GE07mbh_05_u:134.012c: yasya me bhavatī netrī bhaviṣyad bhūtadarśinī
GE07mbh_05_u:134.013a: ahaṃ hi vacanaṃ tvattaḥ śuśrūṣur aparāparam
GE07mbh_05_u:134.013c: kiṃ cit kiṃ cit prativadaṃs tūṣṇīm āsaṃ muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:134.014c: udyacchāmy eṣa śatrūṇāṃ niyamāya jayāya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:134.015a: sadaśva iva sa kṣiptaḥ praṇunno vākyasāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:134.015c: tac cakāra tathā sarvaṃ yathāvad anuśāsanam
GE07mbh_05_u:134.017c: mahīṃ vijayate kṣipraṃ śrutvā śatrūṃś ca mardati
GE07mbh_05_u:134.018a: idaṃ puṃsavanaṃ caiva vīrājananam eva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:134.018c: abhīkṣṇaṃ garbhiṇī śrutvā dhruvaṃ vīraṃ prajāyate
GE07mbh_05_u:134.021d-0514_01: iti śrutvā vaco mātuḥ saṃjayaḥ śatrubhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_05_u:134.021d-0514_02: kṛtavān saṃyugaṃ kṛṣṇa jayaṃ ca prāptavān dhruvam
GE07mbh_05_u:135.001a: arjunaṃ keśava brūyās tvayi jāte sma sūtake
GE07mbh_05_u:135.002c: sahasrākṣasamaḥ kunti bhaviṣyaty eṣa te sutaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:135.003a: eṣa jeṣyati saṃgrāme kurūn sarvān samāgatān
GE07mbh_05_u:135.004a: putras te pṛthivīṃ jetā yaśaś cāsya divaspṛśam
GE07mbh_05_u:135.005a: pitryam aṃśaṃ pranaṣṭaṃ ca punar apy uddhariṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:135.005c: bhrātṛbhiḥ sahitaḥ śrīmāṃs trīn medhān āhariṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:135.005d-0515_01: tathā cares tvaṃ śvetāśva yathā vāg abhyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_05_u:135.006e: tathā tad astu dāśārha yathā vāg abhyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_05_u:135.007a: dharmaś ced asti vārṣṇeya tathā satyaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:135.007c: tvaṃ cāpi tat tathā kṛṣṇa sarvaṃ saṃpādayiṣyasi
GE07mbh_05_u:135.008a: nāhaṃ tad abhyasūyāmi yathā vāg abhyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_05_u:135.008c: namo dharmāya mahate dharmo dhārayati prajāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:135.009c: yadarthaṃ kṣatriyā sūte tasya kālo 'yam āgataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:135.009e: na hi vairaṃ samāsādya sīdanti puruṣarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:135.010a: viditā te sadā buddhir bhīmasya na sa śāmyati
GE07mbh_05_u:135.010d-0516_01: tāvad eva mahābāhur niśāsu na sukhaṃ labhet
GE07mbh_05_u:135.011c: brūyā mādhava kalyāṇīṃ kṛṣṇāṃ kṛṣṇa yaśasvinīm
GE07mbh_05_u:135.012a: yuktam etan mahābhāge kule jāte yaśasvini
GE07mbh_05_u:135.012c: yan me putreṣu sarveṣu yathāvat tvam avartithāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:135.015c: pāñcālī paruṣāṇy uktā ko nu tat kṣantum arhati
GE07mbh_05_u:135.016a: na rājyaharaṇaṃ duḥkhaṃ dyūte cāpi parājayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:135.016c: pravrājanaṃ sutānāṃ vā na me tad duḥkhakāraṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:135.017a: yat tu sā bṛhatī śyāmā sabhāyāṃ rudatī tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:135.017c: aśrauṣīt paruṣā vācas tan me duḥkhataraṃ matam
GE07mbh_05_u:135.018c: nādhyagacchat tadā nāthaṃ kṛṣṇā nāthavatī satī
GE07mbh_05_u:135.019a: taṃ vai brūhi mahābāho sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varam
GE07mbh_05_u:135.020a: viditau hi tavātyantaṃ kruddhāv iva yamāntakau
GE07mbh_05_u:135.020c: bhīmārjunau nayetāṃ hi devān api parāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_05_u:135.021a: tayoś caitad avajñānaṃ yat sā kṛṣṇā sabhāgatā
GE07mbh_05_u:135.021c: duḥśāsanaś ca yad bhīmaṃ kaṭukāny abhyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_05_u:135.021e: paśyatāṃ kuruvīrāṇāṃ tac ca saṃsmārayeḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:135.022a: pāṇḍavān kuśalaṃ pṛccheḥ saputrān kṛṣṇayā saha
GE07mbh_05_u:135.022c: māṃ ca kuśalinīṃ brūyās teṣu bhūyo janārdana
GE07mbh_05_u:135.022e: ariṣṭaṃ gaccha panthānaṃ putrān me paripālaya
GE07mbh_05_u:135.024c: āropya ca rathe karṇaṃ prāyāt sātyakinā saha
GE07mbh_05_u:135.025a: tataḥ prayāte dāśārhe kuravaḥ saṃgatā mithaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:135.027c: mantrayām āsa ca tadā karṇena suciraṃ saha
GE07mbh_05_u:135.028c: tato javena mahatā tūrṇam aśvān acodayat
GE07mbh_05_u:135.030a: te vyatītya tam adhvānaṃ kṣipraṃ śyenā ivāśugāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:136.001a: kuntyās tu vacanaṃ śrutvā bhīṣmadroṇau mahārathau
GE07mbh_05_u:136.002a: śrutaṃ te puruṣavyāghra kuntyāḥ kṛṣṇasya saṃnidhau
GE07mbh_05_u:136.002c: vākyam arthavad avyagram uktaṃ dharmyam anuttamam
GE07mbh_05_u:136.003c: na hi te jātu śāmyerann ṛte rājyena kaurava
GE07mbh_05_u:136.004a: kleśitā hi tvayā pārthā dharmapāśasitās tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:136.004c: sabhāyāṃ draupadī caiva taiś ca tan marṣitaṃ tava
GE07mbh_05_u:136.005a: kṛtāstraṃ hy arjunaṃ prāpya bhīmaṃ ca kṛtaniśramam
GE07mbh_05_u:136.005c: gāṇḍīvaṃ ceṣudhī caiva rathaṃ ca dhvajam eva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:136.005e: sahāyaṃ vāsudevaṃ ca na kṣaṃsyati yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:136.006a: pratyakṣaṃ te mahābāho yathā pārthena dhīmatā
GE07mbh_05_u:136.006c: virāṭanagare pūrvaṃ sarve sma yudhi nirjitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:136.008a: karṇaprabhṛtayaś ceme tvaṃ cāpi kavacī rathī
GE07mbh_05_u:136.009c: rakṣemāṃ pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ mṛtyor daṃṣṭrāntaraṃ gatām
GE07mbh_05_u:136.010a: jyeṣṭho bhrātā dharmaśīlo vatsalaḥ ślakṣṇavāk śuciḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:136.011c: prasannabhrukuṭiḥ śrīmān kṛtā śāntiḥ kulasya naḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:136.016c: tau ca tvāṃ guruvat premṇā pūjayā pratyudīyatām
GE07mbh_05_u:136.017c: saṃgaccha bhrātṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ mānaṃ saṃtyajya pārthiva
GE07mbh_05_u:136.018a: praśādhi pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnāṃ tatas taṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
