GE07mbh_05_u:141.028a: śvetoṣṇīṣāś ca dṛśyante sarve te śuklavāsasaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:141.031c: tvayā dattām imāṃ vyaktaṃ bhokṣyate sa vasuṃdharām
GE07mbh_05_u:141.032c: gadāpāṇir naravyāghro vīkṣann iva mahīm imām
GE07mbh_05_u:141.033a: kṣapayiṣyati naḥ sarvān sa suvyaktaṃ mahāraṇe
GE07mbh_05_u:141.033c: viditaṃ me hṛṣīkeśa yato dharmas tato jayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:141.034a: pāṇḍuraṃ gajam ārūḍho gāṇḍīvī sa dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:141.034c: tvayā sārdhaṃ hṛṣīkeśa śriyā paramayā jvalan
GE07mbh_05_u:141.035a: yūyaṃ sarvān vadhiṣyadhvaṃ tatra me nāsti saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:141.036a: nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca sātyakiś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:141.038a: śvetoṣṇīṣāś ca dṛśyante traya eva janārdana
GE07mbh_05_u:141.039a: aśvatthāmā kṛpaś caiva kṛtavarmā ca sātvataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:141.039c: raktoṣṇīṣāś ca dṛśyante sarve mādhava pārthivāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:141.041a: agastyaśāstāṃ ca diśaṃ prayātāḥ sma janārdana
GE07mbh_05_u:141.042a: ahaṃ cānye ca rājāno yac ca tat kṣatramaṇḍalam
GE07mbh_05_u:141.042c: gāṇḍīvāgniṃ pravekṣyāma iti me nāsti saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:141.043c: tathā hi me vacaḥ karṇa nopaiti hṛdayaṃ tava
GE07mbh_05_u:141.045a: api tvā kṛṣṇa paśyāma jīvanto 'smān mahāraṇāt
GE07mbh_05_u:141.046a: atha vā saṃgamaḥ kṛṣṇa svarge no bhavitā dhruvam
GE07mbh_05_u:141.047a: ity uktvā mādhavaṃ karṇaḥ pariṣvajya ca pīḍitam
GE07mbh_05_u:141.049c: punar uccārayan vāṇīṃ yāhi yāhīti sārathim
GE07mbh_05_u:142.001c: abhigamya pṛthāṃ kṣattā śanaiḥ śocann ivābravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:142.002a: jānāsi me jīvaputre bhāvaṃ nityam anugrahe
GE07mbh_05_u:142.002c: krośato na ca gṛhṇīte vacanaṃ me suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:142.005a: rājā tu dhṛtarāṣṭro 'yaṃ vayovṛddho na śāmyati
GE07mbh_05_u:142.007a: adharmeṇa hi dharmiṣṭhaṃ hṛtaṃ vai rājyam īdṛśam
GE07mbh_05_u:142.007c: yeṣāṃ teṣām ayaṃ dharmaḥ sānubandho bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:142.008a: hriyamāṇe balād dharme kurubhiḥ ko na saṃjvaret
GE07mbh_05_u:142.009c: cintayan na labhe nidrām ahaḥsu ca niśāsu ca
GE07mbh_05_u:142.010a: śrutvā tu kuntī tad vākyam arthakāmena bhāṣitam
GE07mbh_05_u:142.011a: dhig astv arthaṃ yatkṛte 'yaṃ mahāñ jñātivadhe kṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:142.011c: vartsyate suhṛdāṃ hy eṣāṃ yuddhe 'smin vai parābhavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:142.012c: bhāratair yadi yotsyanti kiṃ nu duḥkham ataḥ param
GE07mbh_05_u:142.013a: paśye doṣaṃ dhruvaṃ yuddhe tathā yuddhe parābhavam
GE07mbh_05_u:142.013c: adhanasya mṛtaṃ śreyo na hi jñātikṣaye jayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:142.013d-0531_01: iti me cintayantyā vai hṛdi duḥkhaṃ pravartate
GE07mbh_05_u:142.014a: pitāmahaḥ śāṃtanava ācāryaś ca yudhāṃ patiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:142.014c: karṇaś ca dhārtarāṣṭrārthaṃ vardhayanti bhayaṃ mama
GE07mbh_05_u:142.015a: nācāryaḥ kāmavāñ śiṣyair droṇo yudhyeta jātu cit
GE07mbh_05_u:142.015c: pāṇḍaveṣu kathaṃ hārdaṃ kuryān na ca pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:142.016a: ayaṃ tv eko vṛthādṛṣṭir dhārtarāṣṭrasya durmateḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:142.016c: mohānuvartī satataṃ pāpo dveṣṭi ca pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_05_u:142.017a: mahaty anarthe nirbandhī balavāṃś ca viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:142.017c: karṇaḥ sadā pāṇḍavānāṃ tan me dahati sāṃpratam
GE07mbh_05_u:142.018a: āśaṃse tv adya karṇasya mano 'haṃ pāṇḍavān prati
GE07mbh_05_u:142.019a: toṣito bhagavān yatra durvāsā me varaṃ dadau
GE07mbh_05_u:142.021a: balābalaṃ ca mantrāṇāṃ brāhmaṇasya ca vāgbalam
GE07mbh_05_u:142.021c: strībhāvād bālabhāvāc ca cintayantī punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:142.023a: kathaṃ nu sukṛtaṃ me syān nāparādhavatī katham
GE07mbh_05_u:142.023c: bhaveyam iti saṃcintya brāhmaṇaṃ taṃ namasya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:142.024a: kautūhalāt tu taṃ labdhvā bāliśyād ācaraṃ tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:142.024c: kanyā satī devam arkam āsādayam ahaṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:142.025c: kasmān na kuryād vacanaṃ pathyaṃ bhrātṛhitaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:142.026a: iti kuntī viniścitya kāryaṃ niścitam uttamam
GE07mbh_05_u:142.030a: ā pṛṣṭhatāpāj japtvā sa parivṛtya yatavrataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:142.030f-0533_01: utsmayan praṇataḥ prāha kuntīṃ vaikartano vṛṣaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:143.001c: prāptā kimarthaṃ bhavatī brūhi kiṃ karavāṇi te
GE07mbh_05_u:143.002a: kaunteyas tvaṃ na rādheyo na tavādhirathaḥ pitā
GE07mbh_05_u:143.002c: nāsi sūtakule jātaḥ karṇa tad viddhi me vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:143.003a: kānīnas tvaṃ mayā jātaḥ pūrvajaḥ kukṣiṇā dhṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:143.003c: kuntibhojasya bhavane pārthas tvam asi putraka
GE07mbh_05_u:143.004c: ajījanat tvāṃ mayy eṣa karṇa śastrabhṛtāṃ varam
GE07mbh_05_u:143.005c: jātas tvam asi durdharṣa mayā putra pitur gṛhe
GE07mbh_05_u:143.006a: sa tvaṃ bhrātṝn asaṃbuddhvā mohād yad upasevase
GE07mbh_05_u:143.006c: dhārtarāṣṭrān na tad yuktaṃ tvayi putra viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:143.007c: yat tuṣyanty asya pitaro mātā cāpy ekadarśinī
GE07mbh_05_u:143.010c: asādhyaṃ kiṃ nu loke syād yuvayoḥ sahitātmanoḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:143.011a: karṇa śobhiṣyase nūnaṃ pañcabhir bhrātṛbhir vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:143.012a: upapanno guṇaiḥ śreṣṭho jyeṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭheṣu bandhuṣu
GE07mbh_05_u:143.012c: sūtaputreti mā śabdaḥ pārthas tvam asi vīryavān
GE07mbh_05_u:144.001a: tataḥ sūryān niścaritāṃ karṇaḥ śuśrāva bhāratīm
GE07mbh_05_u:144.002a: satyam āha pṛthā vākyaṃ karṇa mātṛvacaḥ kuru
GE07mbh_05_u:144.002c: śreyas te syān naravyāghra sarvam ācaratas tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:144.003a: evam uktasya mātrā ca svayaṃ pitrā ca bhānunā
GE07mbh_05_u:144.003c: cacāla naiva karṇasya matiḥ satyadhṛtes tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:144.004a: na te na śraddadhe vākyaṃ kṣatriye bhāṣitaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_05_u:144.005a: akaron mayi yat pāpaṃ bhavatī sumahātyayam
GE07mbh_05_u:144.006a: ahaṃ ca kṣatriyo jāto na prāptaḥ kṣatrasatkriyām
GE07mbh_05_u:144.006c: tvatkṛte kiṃ nu pāpīyaḥ śatruḥ kuryān mamāhitam
GE07mbh_05_u:144.007a: kriyākāle tv anukrośam akṛtvā tvam imaṃ mama
GE07mbh_05_u:144.008a: na vai mama hitaṃ pūrvaṃ mātṛvac ceṣṭitaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_05_u:144.009a: kṛṣṇena sahitāt ko vai na vyatheta dhanaṃjayāt
GE07mbh_05_u:144.009c: ko 'dya bhītaṃ na māṃ vidyāt pārthānāṃ samitiṃ gatam
GE07mbh_05_u:144.010c: pāṇḍavān yadi gacchāmi kiṃ māṃ kṣatraṃ vadiṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:144.011a: sarvakāmaiḥ saṃvibhaktaḥ pūjitaś ca sadā bhṛśam
GE07mbh_05_u:144.011c: ahaṃ vai dhārtarāṣṭrāṇāṃ kuryāṃ tad aphalaṃ katham
GE07mbh_05_u:144.012a: upanahya parair vairaṃ ye māṃ nityam upāsate
GE07mbh_05_u:144.012c: namaskurvanti ca sadā vasavo vāsavaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_05_u:144.013a: mama prāṇena ye śatrūñ śaktāḥ pratisamāsitum
GE07mbh_05_u:144.013c: manyante 'dya kathaṃ teṣām ahaṃ bhindyāṃ manoratham
GE07mbh_05_u:144.014c: apāre pārakāmā ye tyajeyaṃ tān ahaṃ katham
GE07mbh_05_u:144.016a: kṛtārthāḥ subhṛtā ye hi kṛtyakāla upasthite
GE07mbh_05_u:144.017c: naivāyaṃ na paro loko vidyate pāpakarmaṇām
GE07mbh_05_u:144.018a: dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putrāṇām arthe yotsyāmi te sutaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:144.018c: balaṃ ca śaktiṃ cāsthāya na vai tvayy anṛtaṃ vade
GE07mbh_05_u:144.019c: ato 'rthakaram apy etan na karomy adya te vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:144.020a: na tu te 'yaṃ samārambho mayi mogho bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:144.020c: vadhyān viṣahyān saṃgrāme na haniṣyāmi te sutān
GE07mbh_05_u:144.020e: yudhiṣṭhiraṃ ca bhīmaṃ ca yamau caivārjunād ṛte
GE07mbh_05_u:144.021a: arjunena samaṃ yuddhaṃ mama yaudhiṣṭhire bale
GE07mbh_05_u:144.021c: arjunaṃ hi nihatyājau saṃprāptaṃ syāt phalaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_05_u:144.022a: na te jātu naśiṣyanti putrāḥ pañca yaśasvini
GE07mbh_05_u:144.022c: nirarjunāḥ sakarṇā vā sārjunā vā hate mayi
GE07mbh_05_u:144.023a: iti karṇavacaḥ śrutvā kuntī duḥkhāt pravepatī
GE07mbh_05_u:144.023c: uvāca putram āśliṣya karṇaṃ dhairyād akampitam
GE07mbh_05_u:144.024a: evaṃ vai bhāvyam etena kṣayaṃ yāsyanti kauravāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:144.024c: yathā tvaṃ bhāṣase karṇa daivaṃ tu balavattaram
GE07mbh_05_u:144.026a: anāmayaṃ svasti ceti pṛthātho karṇam abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:144.026c: tāṃ karṇo 'bhyavadat prītas tatas tau jagmatuḥ pṛthak
GE07mbh_05_u:145.002a: saṃbhāṣya suciraṃ kālaṃ mantrayitvā punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:145.002c: svam evāvasathaṃ śaurir viśrāmārthaṃ jagāma ha
GE07mbh_05_u:145.003c: pāṇḍavā bhrātaraḥ pañca bhānāv astaṃgate sati
GE07mbh_05_u:145.004a: saṃdhyām upāsya dhyāyantas tam eva gatamānasāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:145.004c: ānāyya kṛṣṇaṃ dāśārhaṃ punar mantram amantrayan
GE07mbh_05_u:145.005c: kim uktaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣa tan naḥ śaṃsitum arhasi
GE07mbh_05_u:145.006c: tathyaṃ pathyaṃ hitaṃ cokto na ca gṛhṇāti durmatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:145.007e: ācāryo vā mahābāho bhāradvājaḥ kim abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:145.007f-0534_01: pitā vā dhṛtarāṣṭras taṃ gāndhārī vā kim abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:145.008a: pitā yavīyān asmākaṃ kṣattā dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:145.009a: kiṃ ca sarve nṛpatayaḥ sabhāyāṃ ye samāsate
GE07mbh_05_u:145.009c: uktavanto yathātattvaṃ tad brūhi tvaṃ janārdana
GE07mbh_05_u:145.010a: uktavān hi bhavān sarvaṃ vacanaṃ kurumukhyayoḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:145.011a: apriyaṃ hṛdaye mahyaṃ tan na tiṣṭhati keśava
GE07mbh_05_u:145.011c: teṣāṃ vākyāni govinda śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_05_u:145.012a: yathā ca nābhipadyeta kālas tāta tathā kuru
GE07mbh_05_u:145.012c: bhavān hi no gatiḥ kṛṣṇa bhavān nātho bhavān guruḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:145.013a: śṛṇu rājan yathā vākyam ukto rājā suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:145.013c: madhye kurūṇāṃ rājendra sabhāyāṃ tan nibodha me
GE07mbh_05_u:145.014a: mayā vai śrāvite vākye jahāsa dhṛtarāṣṭrajaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:145.014c: atha bhīṣmaḥ susaṃkruddha idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:145.015a: duryodhana nibodhedaṃ kulārthe yad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_05_u:145.015c: tac chrutvā rājaśārdūla svakulasya hitaṃ kuru
GE07mbh_05_u:145.016a: mama tāta pitā rājañ śaṃtanur lokaviśrutaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:145.016c: tasyāham eka evāsaṃ putraḥ putravatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:145.017a: tasya buddhiḥ samutpannā dvitīyaḥ syāt kathaṃ sutaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:145.018a: na cocchedaṃ kulaṃ yāyād vistīryeta kathaṃ yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:145.018c: tasyāham īpsitaṃ buddhvā kālīṃ mātaram āvaham
GE07mbh_05_u:145.019a: pratijñāṃ duṣkarāṃ kṛtvā pitur arthe kulasya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:145.019c: arājā cordhvaretāś ca yathā suviditaṃ tava
GE07mbh_05_u:145.021c: vicitravīryaṃ rājānaṃ bhṛtyo bhūtvā hy adhaścaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:145.022c: jitvā pārthivasaṃghātam api te bahuśaḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_05_u:145.023c: sa hi rāmabhayād ebhir nāgarair vipravāsitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:145.024a: yadā tv arājake rāṣṭre na vavarṣa sureśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:145.025a: upakṣīṇāḥ prajāḥ sarvā rājā bhava bhavāya naḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:145.025c: ītayo nuda bhadraṃ te śaṃtanoḥ kulavardhana
GE07mbh_05_u:145.026a: pīḍyante te prajāḥ sarvā vyādhibhir bhṛśadāruṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:145.027a: vyādhīn praṇudya vīra tvaṃ prajā dharmeṇa pālaya
GE07mbh_05_u:145.027c: tvayi jīvati mā rāṣṭraṃ vināśam upagacchatu
GE07mbh_05_u:145.028a: prajānāṃ krośatīnāṃ vai naivākṣubhyata me manaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:145.029a: tataḥ paurā mahārāja mātā kālī ca me śubhā
GE07mbh_05_u:145.029e: mām ūcur bhṛśasaṃtaptā bhava rājeti saṃtatam
GE07mbh_05_u:145.030c: sa tvam asmaddhitārthaṃ vai rājā bhava mahāmate
GE07mbh_05_u:145.031a: ity uktaḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā duḥkhito bhṛśam āturaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:145.031e: ūrdhvaretā hy arājā ca kulasyārthe punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:145.032c: nāmba śaṃtanunā jātaḥ kauravaṃ vaṃśam udvahan
GE07mbh_05_u:145.032e: pratijñāṃ vitathāṃ kuryām iti rājan punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:145.033a: viśeṣatas tvadarthaṃ ca dhuri mā māṃ niyojaya
GE07mbh_05_u:145.033c: ahaṃ preṣyaś ca dāsaś ca tavāmba sutavatsale
GE07mbh_05_u:145.034a: evaṃ tām anunīyāhaṃ mātaraṃ janam eva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:145.035a: saha mātrā mahārāja prasādya tam ṛṣiṃ tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:145.035c: apatyārtham ayācaṃ vai prasādaṃ kṛtavāṃś ca saḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:145.035e: trīn sa putrān ajanayat tadā bharatasattama
GE07mbh_05_u:145.036a: andhaḥ karaṇahīneti na vai rājā pitā tava
GE07mbh_05_u:145.036c: rājā tu pāṇḍur abhavan mahātmā lokaviśrutaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:145.037a: sa rājā tasya te putrāḥ pitur dāyādyahāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:145.037c: mā tāta kalahaṃ kārṣī rājyasyārdhaṃ pradīyatām
GE07mbh_05_u:145.038a: mayi jīvati rājyaṃ kaḥ saṃpraśāset pumān iha
GE07mbh_05_u:145.038c: māvamaṃsthā vaco mahyaṃ śamam icchāmi vaḥ sadā
GE07mbh_05_u:145.039a: na viśeṣo 'sti me putra tvayi teṣu ca pārthiva
GE07mbh_05_u:145.039c: matam etat pitus tubhyaṃ gāndhāryā vidurasya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:145.040a: śrotavyaṃ yadi vṛddhānāṃ mātiśaṅkīr vaco mama
GE07mbh_05_u:145.040c: nāśayiṣyasi mā sarvam ātmānaṃ pṛthivīṃ tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:146.001c: madhye nṛpāṇāṃ bhadraṃ te vacanaṃ vacanakṣamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:146.006a: nīcaiḥ sthitvā tu vidura upāste sma vinītavat
GE07mbh_05_u:146.007a: tataḥ sarvāḥ prajās tāta dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ janeśvaram
GE07mbh_05_u:146.008a: visṛjya dhṛtarāṣṭrāya rājyaṃ sa vidurāya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:146.012a: kathaṃ tasya kule jātaḥ kulabhedaṃ vyavasyasi
GE07mbh_05_u:146.012c: saṃbhūya bhrātṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ bhuṅkṣva bhogāñ janādhipa
GE07mbh_05_u:146.013a: bravīmy ahaṃ na kārpaṇyān nārthahetoḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:146.013c: bhīṣmeṇa dattam aśnāmi na tvayā rājasattama
GE07mbh_05_u:146.014c: yato bhīṣmas tato droṇo yad bhīṣmas tv āha tat kuru
GE07mbh_05_u:146.015c: samam ācāryakaṃ tāta tava teṣāṃ ca me sadā
GE07mbh_05_u:146.016a: aśvatthāmā yathā mahyaṃ tathā śvetahayo mama
GE07mbh_05_u:146.016c: bahunā kiṃ pralāpena yato dharmas tato jayaḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:151.007a: uktavān asmi yad vākyaṃ dharmārthasahitaṃ hitam
GE07mbh_05_u:151.007c: na tu tan nikṛtiprajñe kauravye pratitiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_05_u:151.008a: na ca bhīṣmasya durmedhāḥ śṛṇoti vidurasya vā
GE07mbh_05_u:151.008c: mama vā bhāṣitaṃ kiṃ cit sarvam evātivartate
GE07mbh_05_u:151.009a: na sa kāmayate dharmaṃ na sa kāmayate yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:151.009c: jitaṃ sa manyate sarvaṃ durātmā karṇam āśritaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:151.010a: bandham ājñāpayām āsa mama cāpi suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:151.010c: na ca taṃ labdhavān kāmaṃ durātmā śāsanātigaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:151.011a: na ca bhīṣmo na ca droṇo yuktaṃ tatrāhatur vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:151.011c: sarve tam anuvartante ṛte viduram acyuta
GE07mbh_05_u:151.012c: tvayy ayuktāny abhāṣanta mūḍhā mūḍham amarṣaṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:151.013a: kiṃ ca tena mayoktena yāny abhāṣanta kauravāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:151.013c: saṃkṣepeṇa durātmāsau na yuktaṃ tvayi vartate
GE07mbh_05_u:151.014a: na pārthiveṣu sarveṣu ya ime tava sainikāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:151.014c: yat pāpaṃ yan na kalyāṇaṃ sarvaṃ tasmin pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_05_u:151.015a: na cāpi vayam atyarthaṃ parityāgena karhi cit
GE07mbh_05_u:151.015c: kauravaiḥ śamam icchāmas tatra yuddham anantaram
GE07mbh_05_u:151.016a: tac chrutvā pārthivāḥ sarve vāsudevasya bhāṣitam
GE07mbh_05_u:151.019c: niṣṭanan bhīmasenaṃ ca vijayaṃ cedam abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:151.020a: yadarthaṃ vanavāsaś ca prāptaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca yan mayā
GE07mbh_05_u:151.020c: so 'yam asmān upaity eva paro 'narthaḥ prayatnataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:151.021a: yasmin yatnaḥ kṛto 'smābhiḥ sa no hīnaḥ prayatnataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:151.021c: akṛte tu prayatne 'smān upāvṛttaḥ kalir mahān
GE07mbh_05_u:151.022a: kathaṃ hy avadhyaiḥ saṃgrāmaḥ kāryaḥ saha bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:151.022c: kathaṃ hatvā gurūn vṛddhān vijayo no bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:151.023c: yad uktaṃ vāsudevena śrāvayām āsa tad vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:151.024a: uktavān devakīputraḥ kuntyāś ca vidurasya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:151.025a: na ca tau vakṣyato 'dharmam iti me naiṣṭhikī matiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:151.025c: na cāpi yuktaṃ kaunteya nivartitum ayudhyataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:151.026c: smayamāno 'bravīt pārtham evam etad iti bruvan
GE07mbh_05_u:151.027c: pāṇḍaveyā mahārāja tāṃ rātriṃ sukham āvasan
GE07mbh_05_u:152.001a: vyuṣitāyāṃ rajanyāṃ tu rājā duryodhanas tataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:152.001c: vyabhajat tāny anīkāni daśa caikaṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:152.002a: narahastirathāśvānāṃ sāraṃ madhyaṃ ca phalgu ca
GE07mbh_05_u:152.011c: tau cāpi rathināṃ śreṣṭhau rathī ca hayavit tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:152.013a: yathā rathās tathā nāgā baddhakakṣyāḥ svalaṃkṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:152.015c: tad babhūva balaṃ rājan kauravyasya sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:152.019a: rathasyāsan daśa gajā gajasya daśa vājinaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:152.020a: rathasya nāgāḥ pañcāśan nāgasyāsañ śataṃ hayāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:152.021a: senā pañcaśataṃ nāgā rathās tāvanta eva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:152.021b-0547_01: pañcāśac ca śataṃ cāśvā narāḥ pañcaguṇās tataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:152.022a: vāhinī pṛtanā senā dhvajinī sādinī camūḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:152.023a: akṣauhiṇyo daśaikā ca saṃkhyātāḥ sapta caiva ha
GE07mbh_05_u:152.023c: akṣauhiṇyas tu saptaiva pāṇḍavānām abhūd balam
GE07mbh_05_u:152.023e: akṣauhiṇyo daśaikā ca kauravāṇām abhūd balam
GE07mbh_05_u:152.024c: senāmukhaṃ ca tisras tā gulma ity abhisaṃjñitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:152.025a: daśa gulmā gaṇas tv āsīd gaṇās tv ayutaśo 'bhavan
GE07mbh_05_u:152.026a: tatra duryodhano rājā śūrān buddhimato narān
GE07mbh_05_u:152.028a: kṛpaṃ droṇaṃ ca śalyaṃ ca saindhavaṃ ca mahāratham
GE07mbh_05_u:152.028c: sudakṣiṇaṃ ca kāmbojaṃ kṛtavarmāṇam eva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:152.029a: droṇaputraṃ ca karṇaṃ ca bhūriśravasam eva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:152.029c: śakuniṃ saubalaṃ caiva bāhlīkaṃ ca mahāratham
GE07mbh_05_u:152.030a: divase divase teṣāṃ prativelaṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:152.030c: cakre sa vividhāḥ saṃjñāḥ pratyakṣaṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:152.031a: tathā viniyatāḥ sarve ye ca teṣāṃ padānugāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:153.001c: saha sarvair mahīpālair idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:153.003a: na hi jātu dvayor buddhiḥ samā bhavati karhi cit
GE07mbh_05_u:153.003c: śauryaṃ ca nāma netṝṇāṃ spardhate ca parasparam
GE07mbh_05_u:153.005a: tān anvayus tadā vaiśyāḥ śūdrāś caiva pitāmaha
GE07mbh_05_u:153.005c: ekatas tu trayo varṇā ekataḥ kṣatriyarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:153.006a: te sma yuddheṣv abhajyanta trayo varṇāḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:153.006b-0549_01: tathāpi niyatāḥ sarve kṣatriyās tu jaghanyajāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:153.006c: kṣatriyās tu jayanty eva bahulaṃ caikato balam
GE07mbh_05_u:153.007a: tatas te kṣatriyān eva papracchur dvijasattamāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:153.009a: tatas te brāhmaṇāś cakrur ekaṃ senāpatiṃ dvijam
GE07mbh_05_u:153.009c: nayeṣu kuśalaṃ śūram ajayan kṣatriyāṃs tataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:153.010a: evaṃ ye kuśalaṃ śūraṃ hite sthitam akalmaṣam
GE07mbh_05_u:153.010c: senāpatiṃ prakurvanti te jayanti raṇe ripūn
GE07mbh_05_u:153.011a: bhavān uśanasā tulyo hitaiṣī ca sadā mama
GE07mbh_05_u:153.011c: asaṃhāryaḥ sthito dharme sa naḥ senāpatir bhava
GE07mbh_05_u:153.012c: kubera iva yakṣāṇāṃ marutām iva vāsavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:153.013a: parvatānāṃ yathā meruḥ suparṇaḥ patatām iva
GE07mbh_05_u:153.013c: kumāra iva bhūtānāṃ vasūnām iva havyavāṭ
GE07mbh_05_u:153.014a: bhavatā hi vayaṃ guptāḥ śakreṇeva divaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:153.015a: prayātu no bhavān agre devānām iva pāvakiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:153.015d-0550_01: ity uktvā pādayos tasya nipapāta narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:153.015d-0550_02: rakṣāsmān rājaśārdūla tvām ahaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:153.016a: evam etan mahābāho yathā vadasi bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:153.016c: yathaiva hi bhavanto me tathaiva mama pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:153.017a: api caiva maya śreyo vācyaṃ teṣāṃ narādhipa
GE07mbh_05_u:153.017c: yoddhavyaṃ tu tavārthāya yathā sa samayaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:153.018a: na tu paśyāmi yoddhāram ātmanaḥ sadṛśaṃ bhuvi
GE07mbh_05_u:153.019a: sa hi veda mahābāhur divyāny astrāṇi sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:153.019c: na tu māṃ vivṛto yuddhe jātu yudhyeta pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:153.020a: ahaṃ sa ca kṣaṇenaiva nirmanuṣyam idaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_05_u:153.021a: na tv evotsādanīyā me pāṇḍoḥ putrā narādhipa
GE07mbh_05_u:153.022c: na cet te māṃ haniṣyanti pūrvam eva samāgame
GE07mbh_05_u:153.023a: senāpatis tv ahaṃ rājan samayenāpareṇa te
GE07mbh_05_u:153.023c: bhaviṣyāmi yathākāmaṃ tan me śrotum ihārhasi
GE07mbh_05_u:153.024a: karṇo vā yudhyatāṃ pūrvam ahaṃ vā pṛthivīpate
GE07mbh_05_u:153.024c: spardhate hi sadātyarthaṃ sūtaputro mayā raṇe
GE07mbh_05_u:153.025a: nāhaṃ jīvati gāṅgeye yotsye rājan kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:153.025c: hate bhīṣme tu yotsyāmi saha gāṇḍīvadhanvanā
GE07mbh_05_u:153.027a: tato bherīś ca śaṅkhāṃś ca śataśaś caiva puṣkarān
GE07mbh_05_u:153.028a: siṃhanādāś ca vividhā vāhanānāṃ ca nisvanāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:153.029c: āsaṃś ca sarvayodhānāṃ pātayanto manāṃsy uta
GE07mbh_05_u:153.030a: vācaś cāpy aśarīriṇyo divaś colkāḥ prapedire
GE07mbh_05_u:153.030c: śivāś ca bhayavedinyo nedur dīptasvarā bhṛśam
GE07mbh_05_u:153.032c: vācayitvā dvijaśreṣṭhān niṣkair gobhiś ca bhūriśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:153.034c: śibiraṃ māpayām āsa same deśe narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:154.002c: samudram iva gāmbhīrye himavantam iva sthiram
GE07mbh_05_u:154.006c: sarvān bhrātṝn samānīya vāsudevaṃ ca sātvatam
GE07mbh_05_u:154.006e: uvāca vadatāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ sāntvapūrvam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:154.007c: pitāmahena vo yuddhaṃ pūrvam eva bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:154.007e: tasmāt saptasu senāsu praṇetṝn mama paśyata
GE07mbh_05_u:154.008a: yathārhati bhavān vaktum asmin kāla upasthite
GE07mbh_05_u:154.008c: tathedam arthavad vākyam uktaṃ te bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:154.009a: rocate me mahābāho kriyatāṃ yad anantaram
GE07mbh_05_u:154.009c: nāyakās tava senāyām abhiṣicyantu sapta vai
GE07mbh_05_u:154.010c: dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca pāñcālyaṃ dhṛṣṭaketuṃ ca pārthivam
GE07mbh_05_u:154.010e: śikhaṇḍinaṃ ca pāñcālyaṃ sahadevaṃ ca māgadham
GE07mbh_05_u:154.013a: sarveṣām eva teṣāṃ tu samastānāṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_05_u:154.014a: arjunasyāpi netā ca saṃyantā caiva vājinām
GE07mbh_05_u:154.019a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā dharmarājaś ca keśavaś ca mahādyutiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:154.020a: gāṇḍīvadhanvā ye cānye rājānas tatra ke cana
GE07mbh_05_u:154.020c: pūjayāṃ cakrur abhyetya te sma sarve halāyudham
GE07mbh_05_u:154.021a: tatas taṃ pāṇḍavo rājā kare pasparśa pāṇinā
GE07mbh_05_u:154.024c: diṣṭam etad dhruvaṃ manye na śakyam ativartitum
GE07mbh_05_u:154.025a: asmād yuddhāt samuttīrṇān api vaḥ sasuhṛjjanān
GE07mbh_05_u:154.025c: arogān akṣatair dehaiḥ paśyeyam iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:154.027a: ukto mayā vāsudevaḥ punaḥ punar upahvare
GE07mbh_05_u:154.028a: pāṇḍavā hi yathāsmākaṃ tathā duryodhano nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:154.028c: tasyāpi kriyatāṃ yuktyā saparyeti punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:154.029a: tac ca me nākarod vākyaṃ tvadarthe madhusūdanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:154.030a: dhruvo jayaḥ pāṇḍavānām iti me niścitā matiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:154.031a: na cāham utsahe kṛṣṇam ṛte lokam udīkṣitum
GE07mbh_05_u:154.032a: ubhau śiṣyau hi me vīrau gadāyuddhaviśāradau
GE07mbh_05_u:154.032c: tulyasneho 'smy ato bhīme tathā duryodhane nṛpe
GE07mbh_05_u:154.033c: na hi śakṣyāmi kauravyān naśyamānān upekṣitum
GE07mbh_05_u:154.034a: evam uktvā mahābāhur anujñātaś ca pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:155.001a: etasminn eva kāle tu bhīṣmakasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:155.004a: yo māhendraṃ dhanur lebhe tulyaṃ gāṇḍīvatejasā
GE07mbh_05_u:155.004c: śārṅgeṇa ca mahābāhuḥ saṃmitaṃ divyam akṣayam
GE07mbh_05_u:155.005c: vāruṇaṃ gāṇḍivaṃ tatra māhendraṃ vijayaṃ dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:155.006a: śārṅgaṃ tu vaiṣṇavaṃ prāhur divyaṃ tejomayaṃ dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:155.008a: saṃchidya mauravān pāśān nihatya muram ojasā
GE07mbh_05_u:155.009c: pratipede hṛṣīkeśaḥ śārṅgaṃ ca dhanur uttamam
GE07mbh_05_u:155.010a: rukmī tu vijayaṃ labdhvā dhanur meghasamasvanam
GE07mbh_05_u:155.014a: sa samāsādya vārṣṇeyaṃ yogānām īśvaraṃ prabhum
GE07mbh_05_u:155.014c: vyaṃsito vrīḍito rājann ājagāma sa kuṇḍinam
GE07mbh_05_u:155.015c: tatra bhojakaṭaṃ nāma cakre nagaram uttamam
GE07mbh_05_u:155.016c: puraṃ tad bhuvi vikhyātaṃ nāmnā bhojakaṭaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_05_u:155.018a: tataḥ sa kavacī khaḍgī śarī dhanvī talī rathī
GE07mbh_05_u:155.020c: pratipūjya ca tān sarvān viśrāntaḥ sahasainikaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:155.021a: sahāyo 'smi sthito yuddhe yadi bhīto 'si pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_05_u:155.021c: kariṣyāmi raṇe sāhyam asahyaṃ tava śatrubhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:155.022a: na hi me vikrame tulyaḥ pumān astīha kaś cana
GE07mbh_05_u:155.022b-0552_01: haniṣyāmi raṇe bhāgaṃ yan me dāsyasi pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_05_u:155.022b-0552_02: api droṇakṛpau vīrau bhīṣmakarṇāv atho punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:155.022b-0552_03: atha vā sarva evaite tiṣṭhantu vasudhādhipāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:155.022c: nihatya samare śatrūṃs tava dāsyāmi phalguna
GE07mbh_05_u:155.023a: ity ukto dharmarājasya keśavasya ca saṃnidhau
GE07mbh_05_u:155.025c: sahāyo ghoṣayātrāyāṃ kas tadāsīt sakhā mama
GE07mbh_05_u:155.027c: tatra me yudhyamānasya kaḥ sahāyas tadābhavat
GE07mbh_05_u:155.028c: yudhyato bahubhis tāta kaḥ sahāyo 'bhavan mama
GE07mbh_05_u:155.029a: upajīvya raṇe rudraṃ śakraṃ vaiśravaṇaṃ yamam
GE07mbh_05_u:155.029c: varuṇaṃ pāvakaṃ caiva kṛpaṃ droṇaṃ ca mādhavam
GE07mbh_05_u:155.030a: dhārayan gāṇḍivaṃ divyaṃ dhanus tejomayaṃ dṛḍham
GE07mbh_05_u:155.031a: kauravāṇāṃ kule jātaḥ pāṇḍoḥ putro viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:155.031d-0553_01: bhīto 'smīti kathaṃ brūyāṃ dadhāno gāṇḍivaṃ dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:155.033a: nāsmi bhīto mahābāho sahāyārthaś ca nāsti me
GE07mbh_05_u:155.033c: yathākāmaṃ yathāyogaṃ gaccha vānyatra tiṣṭha vā
GE07mbh_05_u:155.033d-0554_01: tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya vijayasya ca dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:155.035c: pratyākhyātaś ca tenāpi sa tadā śūramāninā
GE07mbh_05_u:155.036a: dvāv eva tu mahārāja tasmād yuddhād vyapeyatuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:155.036c: rauhiṇeyaś ca vārṣṇeyo rukmī ca vasudhādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:155.037a: gate rāme tīrthayātrāṃ bhīṣmakasya sute tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:155.037c: upāviśan pāṇḍaveyā mantrāya punar eva hi
GE07mbh_05_u:156.002a: tathā vyūḍheṣv anīkeṣu yat teṣu bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:156.004a: diṣṭam eva paraṃ manye pauruṣaṃ cāpy anarthakam
GE07mbh_05_u:156.005c: na śaknomi niyantuṃ vā kartuṃ vā hitam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:156.006a: bhavaty eva hi me sūta buddhir doṣānudarśinī
GE07mbh_05_u:156.007a: evaṃ gate vai yad bhāvi tad bhaviṣyati saṃjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:156.008c: na tu duryodhane doṣam imam āsaktum arhasi
GE07mbh_05_u:156.009a: ya ātmano duścaritād aśubhaṃ prāpnuyān naraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:156.009c: enasā na sa daivaṃ vā kālaṃ vā gantum arhati
GE07mbh_05_u:156.010a: mahārāja manuṣyeṣu nindyaṃ yaḥ sarvam ācaret
GE07mbh_05_u:156.012a: hayānāṃ ca gajānāṃ ca rājñāṃ cāmitatejasām
GE07mbh_05_u:156.012c: vaiśasaṃ samare vṛttaṃ yat tan me śṛṇu sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:156.013c: yathābhūtaṃ mahāyuddhe śrutvā mā vimanā bhava
GE07mbh_05_u:156.014a: na hy eva kartā puruṣaḥ karmaṇoḥ śubhapāpayoḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:156.015a: ke cid īśvaranirdiṣṭāḥ ke cid eva yadṛcchayā
GE07mbh_05_u:156.015c: pūrvakarmabhir apy anye traidham etad vikṛṣyate
GE07mbh_05_u:156.015d-0555_01: tasmād anartham āpannaḥ sthiro bhūtvā niśāmaya
GE07mbh_05_u:157.001b-0556_02: tatra duryodhano rājā niveśya balam ojasā
GE07mbh_05_u:157.001b-0556_03: saṃmānayitvā nṛpatīn nyasya gulmāṃs tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:157.001b-0556_04: ārakṣasya vidhiṃ kṛtvā yodhānāṃ tatra bhārata

GE07mbh_05_u:158.012d-0560_02: sūtaputraṃ sudurdharṣaṃ śalyaṃ ca balināṃ varam
GE07mbh_05_u:158.013a: droṇaṃ ca yudhyatāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ śacīpatisamaṃ yudhi
GE07mbh_05_u:158.013c: ajitvā saṃyuge pārtha rājyaṃ katham ihecchasi
GE07mbh_05_u:158.014a: brāhme dhanuṣi cācāryaṃ vedayor antaraṃ dvayoḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:158.015a: droṇaṃ mohād yudhā pārtha yaj jigīṣasi tan mṛṣā
GE07mbh_05_u:158.015c: na hi śuśruma vātena merum unmathitaṃ girim
GE07mbh_05_u:158.016a: anilo vā vahen meruṃ dyaur vāpi nipaten mahīm
GE07mbh_05_u:158.016c: yugaṃ vā parivarteta yady evaṃ syād yathāttha mām
GE07mbh_05_u:158.017a: ko hy ābhyāṃ jīvitākāṅkṣī prāpyāstram arimardanam
GE07mbh_05_u:158.017c: gajo vājī naro vāpi punaḥ svasti gṛhān vrajet
GE07mbh_05_u:158.018a: katham ābhyām abhidhyātaḥ saṃsṛṣṭo dāruṇena vā
GE07mbh_05_u:158.018c: raṇe jīvan vimucyeta padā bhūmim upaspṛśan
GE07mbh_05_u:158.019a: kiṃ darduraḥ kūpaśayo yathemāṃ; na budhyase rājacamūṃ sametām
GE07mbh_05_u:158.019c: durādharṣāṃ devacamūprakāśāṃ; guptāṃ narendrais tridaśair iva dyām
GE07mbh_05_u:158.020a: prācyaiḥ pratīcyair atha dākṣiṇātyair; udīcyakāmbojaśakaiḥ khaśaiś ca
GE07mbh_05_u:158.020c: śālvaiḥ samatsyaiḥ kurumadhyadeśair; mlecchaiḥ pulindair draviḍāndhrakāñcyaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:158.021a: nānājanaughaṃ yudhi saṃpravṛddhaṃ; gāṅgaṃ yathā vegam avāraṇīyam
GE07mbh_05_u:158.021c: māṃ ca sthitaṃ nāgabalasya madhye; yuyutsase manda kim alpabuddhe
GE07mbh_05_u:158.022a: ity evam uktvā rājānaṃ dharmaputraṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_05_u:158.023c: paryāyāt siddhir etasya naitat sidhyati katthanāt
GE07mbh_05_u:158.024a: yadīdaṃ katthanāt sidhyet karma loke dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_05_u:158.024c: sarve bhaveyuḥ siddhārthā bahu kattheta durgataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:158.025a: jānāmi te vāsudevaṃ sahāyaṃ; jānāmi te gāṇḍivaṃ tālamātram
GE07mbh_05_u:158.025c: jānāmy etat tvādṛśo nāsti yoddhā; rājyaṃ ca te jānamāno harāmi
GE07mbh_05_u:158.026a: na tu paryāyadharmeṇa siddhiṃ prāpnoti bhūyasīm
GE07mbh_05_u:158.026c: manasaiva hi bhūtāni dhātā prakurute vaśe
GE07mbh_05_u:158.027a: trayodaśa samā bhuktaṃ rājyaṃ vilapatas tava
GE07mbh_05_u:158.027c: bhūyaś caiva praśāsiṣye nihatya tvāṃ sabāndhavam
GE07mbh_05_u:158.028a: kva tadā gāṇḍivaṃ te 'bhūd yat tvaṃ dāsapaṇe jitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:158.028c: kva tadā bhīmasenasya balam āsīc ca phalguna
GE07mbh_05_u:158.029a: sagadād bhīmasenāc ca pārthāc caiva sagāṇḍivāt
GE07mbh_05_u:158.029c: na vai mokṣas tadā vo 'bhūd vinā kṛṣṇām aninditām
GE07mbh_05_u:158.030a: sā vo dāsyaṃ samāpannān mokṣayām āsa bhāminī
GE07mbh_05_u:158.031a: avocaṃ yat ṣaṇḍhatilān ahaṃ vas tathyam eva tat
GE07mbh_05_u:158.031c: dhṛtā hi veṇī pārthena virāṭanagare tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:158.032c: bhīmasenena kaunteya yac ca tan mama pauruṣam
GE07mbh_05_u:158.033a: evam eva sadā daṇḍaṃ kṣatriyāḥ kṣatriye dadhuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:158.033c: śreṇyāṃ kakṣyāṃ ca veṇyāṃ ca saṃyuge yaḥ palāyate
GE07mbh_05_u:158.034a: na bhayād vāsudevasya na cāpi tava phalguna
GE07mbh_05_u:158.035a: na māyā hīndrajālaṃ vā kuhakā vā vibhīṣaṇī
GE07mbh_05_u:158.036c: āsādya mām amogheṣuṃ draviṣyanti diśo daśa
GE07mbh_05_u:158.037a: saṃyugaṃ gaccha bhīṣmeṇa bhindhi tvaṃ śirasā girim
GE07mbh_05_u:158.040c: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ hatasarvabāndhavas; tadā manas te paritāpam eṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:158.041a: tadā manas te tridivād ivāśucer; nivartatāṃ pārtha mahīpraśāsanāt
GE07mbh_05_u:158.041c: rājyaṃ praśāstuṃ hi sudurlabhaṃ tvayā; bubhūṣatā svarga ivātapasvinā
GE07mbh_05_u:159.001a: ulūkas tv arjunaṃ bhūyo yathoktaṃ vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:159.002a: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā ruṣitāḥ pāṇḍavā bhṛśam
GE07mbh_05_u:159.003c: āśīviṣā iva kruddhā vīkṣāṃ cakruḥ parasparam
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006a: prayāhi śīghraṃ kaitavya brūyāś caiva suyodhanam
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006c: śrutaṃ vākyaṃ gṛhīto 'rtho mataṃ yat te tathāstu tat
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0003: sṛñjayānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ kṛṣṇasya ca yaśasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0005: bhūmipānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ madhye vākyaṃ jagāda ha
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0006: ulūko 'py arjunaṃ bhūyo yathoktaṃ vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0008: kṛṣṇādīṃś caiva tān sarvān yathoktaṃ vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0009: ulūkasya tu tad vākyaṃ pāpaṃ dāruṇam īritam
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0010: śrutvā vicukṣubhe pārtho lalāṭaṃ cāpy amārjayat
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0011: tad avasthaṃ tadā dṛṣṭvā pārthaṃ sā samitir nṛpa
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0014: śrutvā te puruṣavyāghrāḥ krodhāj jajvalur acyutāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0015: dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ śikhaṇḍī ca sātyakiś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0016: kekayā bhrātaraḥ pañca rākṣasaś ca ghaṭotkacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0018: bhīmasenaś ca vikrānto yamajau ca mahārathau
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0021: aṅgadaiḥ pārihāryaiś ca keyūraiś ca vibhūṣitān
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0024: udatiṣṭhat sa vegena krodhena prajvalann iva
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0025: udvṛtya sahasā netre dantān kaṭakaṭāyya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0026: hastaṃ hastena niṣpiṣya ulūkaṃ vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0028: śrutaṃ te vacanaṃ mūrkha yat tvāṃ duryodhano 'bravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0029: tan me kathayato manda śruṇu vākyaṃ durāsadam
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0030: sarvakṣatrasya madhye tvaṃ yad vakṣyasi suyodhanam
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0031: śṛṇvataḥ sūtaputrasya pituś ca tvaṃ durātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0032: asmābhiḥ prītikāmais tu bhrātur jyeṣṭhasya nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0033: marṣitaṃ te durācāra tat tvaṃ na bahu manyase
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0034: preṣitaś ca hṛṣīkeśaḥ śamākāṅkṣī kurūn prati
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0037: gacchasvāhavam asmābhis tac ca śvo bhavitā dhruvam
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0038: mayāpi ca pratijñāto vadhaḥ sabhrātṛkasya te
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0039: sa tathā bhavitā pāpa nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0041: parvatāś ca viśīryeyur mayoktaṃ na mṛṣā bhavet
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0042: sahāyas te yadi yamaḥ kubero rudra eva vā
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0046: api bhīṣmaṃ puraskṛtya taṃ neṣyāmi yamakṣayam
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0047: yac caitad uktaṃ vacanaṃ mayā kṣatrasya saṃsadi
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0052: śṛṇu pāpa vaco mahyaṃ yad vācyo hi pitā tvayā
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0053: nāsmākaṃ bhavitā bhedaḥ kadā cit kurubhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0054: dhṛtarāṣṭrasya saṃbandho yadi na syāt tvayā saha
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0060: aham ādau nihatya tvāṃ śakuneḥ saṃprapaśyataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0063: uvāca phālguno vākyaṃ bhīmasenaṃ smayann iva
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0064: bhīmasena na te santi yeṣāṃ vairaṃ tvayā saha
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0066: ulūkaś ca na te vācyaḥ paruṣaṃ puruṣottama
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0070: śrutaṃ vas tasya pāpasya dhārtarāṣṭrasya bhāṣitam
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0074: samagraṃ pārthivaṃ kṣatraṃ sarvaṃ na gaṇayāmy aham
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0075: bhavadbhiḥ samanujñāto vākyam asya yad uttaram
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0079: tatas te pārthivāḥ sarve praśaśaṃsur dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0081: anunīya ca tān sarvān yathāmānyaṃ yathāvayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0082: dharmarājas tadā vākyaṃ tat prāpyaṃ pratyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0083: ātmānam avamanvāno na hi syāt pārthivottamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0091: ulūka gaccha kaitavya brūhi tāta suyodhanam
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0093: pāṇḍaveṣu sadā pāpa nityaṃ jihmaṃ pravartase
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0094: svavīryād yaḥ parākramya pāpa āhvayate parān
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0095: abhītaḥ pūrayan vākyam eṣa vai kṣatriyaḥ pumān
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0096: sa pāpa kṣatriyo bhūtvā asmān āhūya saṃyuge
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0097: mānyāmānyān puraskṛtya yuddhaṃ mā gāḥ kulādhama
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0099: āhvayasva raṇe pārthān sarvathā kṣatriyo bhava
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0101: aśaktaḥ svayam ādātum etad eva napuṃsakam
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0102: yas tvaṃ pareṣāṃ vīryeṇa ātmānaṃ bahu manyase
GE07mbh_05_u:159.006d-012_0103: katham evam aśaktas tvam asmān samabhigarjasi
GE07mbh_05_u:159.007a: madvacaś cāpi bhūyas te vaktavyaḥ sa suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:159.007c: śva idānīṃ pradṛśyethāḥ puruṣo bhava durmate
GE07mbh_05_u:159.008a: manyase yac ca mūḍha tvaṃ na yotsyati janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:159.008c: sārathyena vṛtaḥ pārthair iti tvaṃ na bibheṣi ca
GE07mbh_05_u:159.009a: jaghanyakālam apy etad bhaved yat sarvapārthivān
GE07mbh_05_u:159.011a: yady utpatasi lokāṃs trīn yady āviśasi bhūtalam
GE07mbh_05_u:159.013a: na tvāṃ samīkṣate pārtho nāpi rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:160.003a: svavīryaṃ yaḥ samāśritya samāhvayati vai parān
GE07mbh_05_u:160.003c: abhītaḥ pūrayañ śaktiṃ sa vai puruṣa ucyate
GE07mbh_05_u:160.005a: sa tvaṃ pareṣāṃ vīryeṇa manyase vīryam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:160.005c: svayaṃ kāpuruṣo mūḍhaḥ parāṃś ca kṣeptum icchasi
GE07mbh_05_u:160.006a: yas tvaṃ vṛddhaṃ sarvarājñāṃ hitabuddhiṃ jitendriyam
GE07mbh_05_u:160.007c: na haniṣyanti gaṅgeyaṃ pāṇḍavā ghṛṇayeti ca
GE07mbh_05_u:160.009a: kaitavya gatvā bharatān sametya; suyodhanaṃ dhārtarāṣṭraṃ bravīhi
GE07mbh_05_u:160.009c: tathety āha arjunaḥ savyasācī; niśāvyapāye bhavitā vimardaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:160.010a: yad vo 'bravīd vākyam adīnasattvo; madhye kurūṇāṃ harṣayan satyasaṃdhaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:160.010c: ahaṃ hantā pāṇḍavānām anīkaṃ; śālveyakāṃś ceti mamaiṣa bhāraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:160.011a: hanyām ahaṃ droṇam ṛte hi lokaṃ; na te bhayaṃ vidyate pāṇḍavebhyaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:160.011c: tato hi te labdhatamaṃ ca rājyaṃ; kṣayaṃ gatāḥ pāṇḍavāś ceti bhāvaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:160.012a: sa darpapūrṇo na samīkṣase tvam; anartham ātmany api vartamānam
GE07mbh_05_u:160.012c: tasmād ahaṃ te prathamaṃ samūhe; hantā samakṣaṃ kuruvṛddham eva
GE07mbh_05_u:160.013a: sūryodaye yuktasenaḥ pratīkṣya; dhvajī rathī rakṣa ca satyasaṃdham
GE07mbh_05_u:160.013c: ahaṃ hi vaḥ paśyatāṃ dvīpam enaṃ; rathād bhīṣmaṃ pātayitāsmi bāṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:160.015a: yad uktaś ca sabhāmadhye puruṣo hrasvadarśanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:160.016c: satyāṃ pratijñāṃ nacirād rakṣyase tāṃ suyodhana
GE07mbh_05_u:160.019c: drakṣyasi tvaṃ phalaṃ tīvram acireṇa suyodhana
GE07mbh_05_u:160.020c: āśā te jīvite mūḍha rājye vā kena hetunā
GE07mbh_05_u:160.021a: śānte bhīṣme tathā droṇe sūtaputre ca pātite
GE07mbh_05_u:160.021c: nirāśo jīvite rājye putreṣu ca bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_05_u:160.022a: bhrātṝṇāṃ nidhanaṃ dṛṣṭvā putrāṇāṃ ca suyodhana
GE07mbh_05_u:160.023a: na dvitīyāṃ pratijñāṃ hi pratijñāsyati keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:160.023c: satyaṃ bravīmy ahaṃ hy etat sarvaṃ satyaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:160.023d-013_0002: ulūka madvaco brūhi gatvā tāta suyodhanam
GE07mbh_05_u:160.023d-013_0003: svena vṛttena me vṛttaṃ nādhigantuṃ tvam arhasi
GE07mbh_05_u:160.023d-013_0005: na cāhaṃ kāmaye pāpam api kīṭapipīlayoḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:160.023d-013_0006: kiṃ punar jñātiṣu vadhaṃ kāmayeyaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:160.023d-013_0007: etadarthaṃ mayā tāta pañca grāmā vṛtāḥ purā
GE07mbh_05_u:160.023d-013_0008: kathaṃ tava sudurbuddhe na prekṣe vyasanaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_05_u:160.023d-013_0009: sa tvaṃ kāmaparītātmā mūḍhabhāvāc ca katthase
GE07mbh_05_u:160.023d-013_0010: tathaiva vāsudevasya na gṛhṇāsi hitaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:160.023d-013_0011: kiṃ cedānīṃ bahūktena yudhyasva saha bāndhavaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:160.023d-013_0013: śrutaṃ vākyaṃ gṛhīto 'rtho mataṃ yat te tathāstu tat
GE07mbh_05_u:160.023d-013_0014: bhīmasenas tato vākyaṃ bhūya āha nṛpātmajam
GE07mbh_05_u:160.023d-013_0017: gṛdhrodare vā vastavyaṃ pure vā nāgasāhvaye
GE07mbh_05_u:160.023d-013_0018: pratijñātaṃ mayā yac ca sabhāmadhye narādhama
GE07mbh_05_u:160.023d-013_0019: kartāhaṃ tad vacaḥ satyaṃ satyenaiva śapāmi te
GE07mbh_05_u:160.023d-013_0020: duḥśāsanasya rudhiraṃ hatvā pāsyāmy ahaṃ mṛdhe
GE07mbh_05_u:160.023d-013_0021: sakthinī tava bhaṅktvaiva hatvā hi tava sodarān
GE07mbh_05_u:160.023d-013_0024: karmaṇā toṣayiṣyāmi bhūyaś caiva vacaḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_05_u:160.023d-013_0025: hatvā suyodhana tvāṃ vai sahitaṃ sarvasodaraiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:160.023d-013_0027: nakulas tu tato vākyam idam āha mahīpate
GE07mbh_05_u:160.023d-013_0029: śrutaṃ te gadato vākyaṃ sarvam eva yathātatham
GE07mbh_05_u:160.023d-013_0030: tathā kartāsmi kauravya yathā tvam anuśāsi mām
GE07mbh_05_u:160.023d-013_0032: suyodhana matir yā te vṛthaiṣā te bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:160.023d-013_0034: imaṃ ca kleśam asmākaṃ hṛṣṭo yat tvaṃ nikatthase
GE07mbh_05_u:160.023d-013_0036: dāsabhāvaṃ niyaccheva sādhor iti matiḥ sadā
GE07mbh_05_u:160.023d-013_0037: tau ca dāsāv adāsau vā pauruṣaṃ yasya yādṛśam
GE07mbh_05_u:160.023d-013_0038: śikhaṇḍī tu tato vākyam ulūkam idam abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:160.023d-013_0039: vaktavyo bhavatā rājā pāpeṣv abhirataḥ sadā
GE07mbh_05_u:160.023d-013_0040: paśya tvaṃ māṃ raṇe rājan kurvāṇaṃ karma dāruṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:160.023d-013_0041: yasya vīryaṃ samāsādya manyase vijayaṃ yudhi
GE07mbh_05_u:160.023d-013_0042: tam ahaṃ pātayiṣyāmi rathāt tava pitāmaham
GE07mbh_05_u:160.023d-013_0043: ahaṃ bhīṣmavadhāt sṛṣṭo nūnaṃ dhātrā mahātmanā
GE07mbh_05_u:160.023d-013_0046: suyodhano mama vaco vaktavyo nṛpateḥ sutaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:160.023d-013_0048: kartā cāhaṃ tathā karma yathā nānyaḥ kariṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:160.023d-013_0049: tam abravīd dharmarājaḥ kāruṇyārthaṃ vaco mahat
GE07mbh_05_u:160.023d-013_0050: nāhaṃ jñātivadhaṃ rājan kāmayeyaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:160.023d-013_0051: tavaiva doṣād durbuddhe sarvam etat tv anāvṛtam
GE07mbh_05_u:160.023d-013_0052: avaśyaṃ ca mayā kāryaṃ sarveṣāṃ caritaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_05_u:160.023d-013_0053: sa gaccha māciraṃ tāta ulūka yadi manyase
GE07mbh_05_u:160.023d-013_0054: iha vā tiṣṭha bhadraṃ te vayaṃ hi tava bāndhavāḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:166.031c: gāṇḍīvaṃ ca dhanur divyaṃ te cāśvā vātaraṃhasaḥ
