GE07mbh_05_u:168.007a: kṣatradharmā tu rājendra mato me 'rdharatho nṛpa
GE07mbh_05_u:168.009a: eṣa cedipatiḥ śūraḥ saha putreṇa bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:168.010e: jayantaś cāmitaujāś ca satyajic ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:168.011c: yotsyante samare tāta saṃrabdhā iva kuñjarāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:168.012a: ajo bhojaś ca vikrāntau pāṇḍaveṣu mahārathau
GE07mbh_05_u:168.014a: kāśikaḥ sukumāraś ca nīlo yaś cāparo nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:168.014c: sūryadattaś ca śaṅkhaś ca madirāśvaś ca nāmataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:168.016a: vārdhakṣemir mahārāja ratho mama mahān mataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:168.016c: citrāyudhaś ca nṛpatir mato me rathasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:168.016e: sa hi saṃgrāmaśobhī ca bhaktaś cāpi kirīṭinaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:168.017c: dvāv imau puruṣavyāghrau rathodārau matau mama
GE07mbh_05_u:168.018a: vyāghradattaś ca rājendra candrasenaś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:168.018c: matau mama rathodārau pāṇḍavānāṃ na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:168.019a: senābinduś ca rājendra krodhahantā ca nāmataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:168.019e: sa yotsyatīha vikramya samare tava sainikaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:168.020a: māṃ droṇaṃ ca kṛpaṃ caiva yathā saṃmanyate bhavān
GE07mbh_05_u:168.022a: ayaṃ ca yudhi vikrānto mantavyo 'ṣṭaguṇo rathaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:168.024a: anuraktaś ca śūraś ca ratho 'yam aparo mahān
GE07mbh_05_u:168.025e: ubhāv etāv atirathau matau mama paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_05_u:169.002c: mātulo bhīmasenasya sa ca me 'tiratho mataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:169.003a: eṣa vīro maheṣvāsaḥ kṛtī ca nipuṇaś ca ha
GE07mbh_05_u:169.003c: citrayodhī ca śaktaś ca mato me rathapuṃgavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:169.004a: sa yotsyati hi vikramya maghavān iva dānavaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:169.005c: sumahat karma pāṇḍūnāṃ sthitaḥ priyahite nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:169.007c: ye cāsya rākṣasāḥ śūrāḥ sacivā vaśavartinaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:169.009c: rathāś cātirathāś caiva ye cāpy ardharathā matāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:169.010a: neṣyanti samare senāṃ bhīmāṃ yaudhiṣṭhirīṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_05_u:169.011a: tair ahaṃ samare vīra tvām āyadbhir jayaiṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:169.011c: yotsyāmi jayam ākāṅkṣann atha vā nidhanaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_05_u:169.013a: ye caiva te rathodārāḥ pāṇḍuputrasya sainikāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:169.013c: sahasainyān ahaṃ tāṃś ca pratīyāṃ raṇamūrdhani
GE07mbh_05_u:169.014a: ete rathāś cātirathāś ca tubhyaṃ; yathāpradhānaṃ nṛpa kīrtitā mayā
GE07mbh_05_u:169.014c: tathā rājann ardharathāś ca ke cit; tathaiva teṣām api kauravendra
GE07mbh_05_u:169.015a: arjunaṃ vāsudevaṃ ca ye cānye tatra pārthivāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:169.016a: pāñcālyaṃ tu mahābāho nāhaṃ hanyāṃ śikhaṇḍinam
GE07mbh_05_u:169.017a: lokas tad veda yad ahaṃ pituḥ priyacikīrṣayā
GE07mbh_05_u:169.019c: naiva hanyāṃ striyaṃ jātu na strīpūrvaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:169.020a: sa hi strīpūrvako rājañ śikhaṇḍī yadi te śrutaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:169.020c: kanyā bhūtvā pumāñ jāto na yotsye tena bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:169.021a: sarvāṃs tv anyān haniṣyāmi pārthivān bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:169.021c: yān sameṣyāmi samare na tu kuntīsutān nṛpa
GE07mbh_05_u:170.001a: kimarthaṃ bharataśreṣṭha na hanyās tvaṃ śikhaṇḍinam
GE07mbh_05_u:170.002a: pūrvam uktvā mahābāho pāṇḍavān saha somakaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:170.002c: vadhiṣyāmīti gāṅgeya tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_05_u:170.003c: yadarthaṃ yudhi saṃprekṣya nāhaṃ hanyāṃ śikhaṇḍinam
GE07mbh_05_u:170.006a: tasmiṃś ca nidhanaṃ prāpte satyavatyā mate sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:170.008a: tasya dārakriyāṃ tāta cikīrṣur aham apy uta
GE07mbh_05_u:170.008c: anurūpād iva kulād iti cintya mano dadhe
GE07mbh_05_u:170.010c: ambā jyeṣṭhābhavat tāsām ambikā tv atha madhyamā
GE07mbh_05_u:170.011c: apaśyaṃ tā mahābāho tisraḥ kanyāḥ svalaṃkṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:170.012a: tato 'haṃ tān nṛpān sarvān āhūya samare sthitān
GE07mbh_05_u:170.012c: ratham āropayāṃ cakre kanyās tā bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:170.013a: vīryaśulkāś ca tā jñātvā samāropya rathaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:170.013c: avocaṃ pārthivān sarvān ahaṃ tatra samāgatān
GE07mbh_05_u:170.013e: bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavaḥ kanyā haratīti punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:170.014a: te yatadhvaṃ paraṃ śaktyā sarve mokṣāya pārthivāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:170.014c: prasahya hi nayāmy eṣa miṣatāṃ vo narādhipāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:170.015c: yogo yoga iti kruddhāḥ sārathīṃś cāpy acodayan
GE07mbh_05_u:170.016a: te rathair meghasaṃkāśair gajaiś ca gajayodhinaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:170.017a: tatas te māṃ mahīpālāḥ sarva eva viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_05_u:170.018c: sarvān nṛpāṃś cāpy ajayaṃ devarāḍ iva dānavān
GE07mbh_05_u:170.019c: ekaikena hi bāṇena bhūmau pātitavān aham
GE07mbh_05_u:170.020a: hayāṃś caiṣāṃ gajāṃś caiva sārathīṃś cāpy ahaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_05_u:170.021a: te nivṛttāś ca bhagnāś ca dṛṣṭvā tal lāghavaṃ mama
GE07mbh_05_u:170.021b-0570_01: praṇipetuś ca sarve vai praśaśaṃsuś ca pārthivāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:170.021b-0570_02: tata ādāya tāḥ kanyā nṛpatīṃś ca visṛjya tān
GE07mbh_05_u:170.022a: ato 'haṃ tāś ca kanyā vai bhrātur arthāya bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:170.022c: tac ca karma mahābāho satyavatyai nyavedayam
GE07mbh_05_u:171.002a: imāḥ kāśipateḥ kanyā mayā nirjitya pārthivān
GE07mbh_05_u:171.003c: āha satyavatī hṛṣṭā diṣṭyā putra jitaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_05_u:171.004c: uvāca vākyaṃ savrīḍā jyeṣṭhā kāśipateḥ sutā
GE07mbh_05_u:171.005c: śrutvā ca dharmyaṃ vacanaṃ mahyaṃ kartum ihārhasi
GE07mbh_05_u:171.006c: tena cāsmi vṛtā pūrvaṃ rahasy avidite pituḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:171.007a: kathaṃ mām anyakāmāṃ tvaṃ rājañ śāstram adhītya vai
GE07mbh_05_u:171.007c: vāsayethā gṛhe bhīṣma kauravaḥ san viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:171.008c: yat kṣamaṃ te mahābāho tad ihārabdhum arhasi
GE07mbh_05_u:171.009a: sa māṃ pratīkṣate vyaktaṃ śālvarājo viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_05_u:171.009b-0571_01: tasmān māṃ tvaṃ kuruśreṣṭha samanujñātum arhasi
GE07mbh_05_u:171.009c: kṛpāṃ kuru mahābāho mayi dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
GE07mbh_05_u:171.009e: tvaṃ hi satyavrato vīra pṛthivyām iti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_05_u:172.001c: mantriṇaś ca dvijāṃś caiva tathaiva ca purohitān
GE07mbh_05_u:172.002a: anujñātā yayau sā tu kanyā śālvapateḥ puram
GE07mbh_05_u:172.002c: vṛddhair dvijātibhir guptā dhātryā cānugatā tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:172.002e: atītya ca tam adhvānam āsasāda narādhipam
GE07mbh_05_u:172.003a: sā tam āsādya rājānaṃ śālvaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:172.003d-0572_01: abhinandasva māṃ rājan sadā priyahite ratām
GE07mbh_05_u:172.003d-0572_02: pratipālaya māṃ rājan dharmādīṃś cara dharmataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:172.003d-0572_03: tvaṃ hi me manasā dhyātas tvayā cāpy upamantritā
GE07mbh_05_u:172.004a: tām abravīc chālvapatiḥ smayann iva viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_05_u:172.005a: gaccha bhadre punas tatra sakāśaṃ bhāratasya vai
GE07mbh_05_u:172.005c: nāham icchāmi bhīṣmeṇa gṛhītāṃ tvāṃ prasahya vai
GE07mbh_05_u:172.006a: tvaṃ hi nirjitya bhīṣmeṇa nītā prītimatī tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:172.007e: yatheṣṭaṃ gamyatāṃ bhadre mā te kālo 'tyagād ayam
GE07mbh_05_u:172.008c: maivaṃ vada mahīpāla naitad evaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:172.010a: bhajasva māṃ śālvapate bhaktāṃ bālām anāgasam
GE07mbh_05_u:172.010c: bhaktānāṃ hi parityāgo na dharmeṣu praśasyate
GE07mbh_05_u:172.011c: anujñātā ca tenaiva tavaiva gṛham āgatā
GE07mbh_05_u:172.012a: na sa bhīṣmo mahābāhur mām icchati viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_05_u:172.013a: bhaginyau mama ye nīte ambikāmbālike nṛpa
GE07mbh_05_u:172.014a: yathā śālvapate nānyaṃ naraṃ dhyāmi kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:172.014c: tvām ṛte puruṣavyāghra tathā mūrdhānam ālabhe
GE07mbh_05_u:172.015a: na cānyapūrvā rājendra tvām ahaṃ samupasthitā
GE07mbh_05_u:172.016a: bhajasva māṃ viśālākṣa svayaṃ kanyām upasthitām
GE07mbh_05_u:172.017a: tām evaṃ bhāṣamāṇāṃ tu śālvaḥ kāśipateḥ sutām
GE07mbh_05_u:172.019a: tataḥ sā manyunāviṣṭā jyeṣṭhā kāśipateḥ sutā
GE07mbh_05_u:172.020a: tvayā tyaktā gamiṣyāmi yatra yatra viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_05_u:172.020c: tatra me santu gatayaḥ santaḥ satyaṃ yathābruvam
GE07mbh_05_u:172.021a: evaṃ saṃbhāṣamāṇāṃ tu nṛśaṃsaḥ śālvarāṭ tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:172.022a: gaccha gaccheti tāṃ śālvaḥ punaḥ punar abhāṣata
GE07mbh_05_u:172.022c: bibhemi bhīṣmāt suśroṇi tvaṃ ca bhīṣmaparigrahaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:172.023a: evam uktā tu sā tena śālvenādīrghadarśinā
GE07mbh_05_u:172.023c: niścakrāma purād dīnā rudatī kurarī yathā
GE07mbh_05_u:173.001a: sā niṣkramantī nagarāc cintayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:173.002a: na ca śakyaṃ punar gantuṃ mayā vāraṇasāhvayam
GE07mbh_05_u:173.003a: kiṃ nu garhāmy athātmānam atha bhīṣmaṃ durāsadam
GE07mbh_05_u:173.003c: āho svit pitaraṃ mūḍhaṃ yo me 'kārṣīt svayaṃvaram
GE07mbh_05_u:173.004a: mamāyaṃ svakṛto doṣo yāhaṃ bhīṣmarathāt tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:173.004c: pravṛtte vaiśase yuddhe śālvārthaṃ nāpataṃ purā
GE07mbh_05_u:173.005a: dhig bhīṣmaṃ dhik ca me mandaṃ pitaraṃ mūḍhacetasam
GE07mbh_05_u:173.006a: dhiṅ māṃ dhik śālvarājānaṃ dhig dhātāram athāpi ca
GE07mbh_05_u:173.007c: anayasyāsya tu mukhaṃ bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavo mama
GE07mbh_05_u:173.008a: sā bhīṣme pratikartavyam ahaṃ paśyāmi sāṃpratam
GE07mbh_05_u:173.008c: tapasā vā yudhā vāpi duḥkhahetuḥ sa me mataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:173.008e: ko nu bhīṣmaṃ yudhā jetum utsaheta mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:173.009a: evaṃ sā pariniścitya jagāma nagarād bahiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:173.009e: tatas tām avasad rātriṃ tāpasaiḥ parivāritā
GE07mbh_05_u:173.010a: ācakhyau ca yathā vṛttaṃ sarvam ātmani bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:173.010e: haraṇaṃ ca visargaṃ ca śālvena ca visarjanam
GE07mbh_05_u:173.011a: tatas tatra mahān āsīd brāhmaṇaḥ saṃśitavrataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:173.012a: ārtāṃ tām āha sa muniḥ śaikhāvatyo mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:173.013a: evaṃ gate kiṃ nu bhadre śakyaṃ kartuṃ tapasvibhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:173.014a: sā tv enam abravīd rājan kriyatāṃ madanugrahaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:173.015c: kṛtāni nūnaṃ pāpāni teṣām etat phalaṃ dhruvam
GE07mbh_05_u:173.016a: notsaheyaṃ punar gantuṃ svajanaṃ prati tāpasāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:173.017c: yuṣmābhir devasaṃkāśāḥ kṛpā bhavatu vo mayi
GE07mbh_05_u:173.018c: sāntvayām āsa kāryaṃ ca pratijajñe dvijaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_05_u:174.001a: tatas te tāpasāḥ sarve kāryavanto 'bhavaṃs tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:174.001c: tāṃ kanyāṃ cintayanto vai kiṃ kāryam iti dharmiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:174.002a: ke cid āhuḥ pitur veśma nīyatām iti tāpasāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:174.002c: ke cid asmadupālambhe matiṃ cakrur dvijottamāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:174.003a: ke cic chālvapatiṃ gatvā niyojyam iti menire
GE07mbh_05_u:174.003c: neti ke cid vyavasyanti pratyākhyātā hi tena sā
GE07mbh_05_u:174.004a: evaṃ gate kiṃ nu śakyaṃ bhadre kartuṃ manīṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:174.004c: punar ūcuś ca te sarve tāpasāḥ saṃśitavratāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:174.005a: alaṃ pravrajiteneha bhadre śṛṇu hitaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:174.005c: ito gacchasva bhadraṃ te pitur eva niveśanam
GE07mbh_05_u:174.006a: pratipatsyati rājā sa pitā te yad anantaram
GE07mbh_05_u:174.006e: na ca te 'nyā gatir nyāyyā bhaved bhadre yathā pitā
GE07mbh_05_u:174.007a: patir vāpi gatir nāryāḥ pitā vā varavarṇini
GE07mbh_05_u:174.007c: gatiḥ patiḥ samasthāyā viṣame tu pitā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:174.008c: rājaputryāḥ prakṛtyā ca kumāryās tava bhāmini
GE07mbh_05_u:174.009a: bhadre doṣā hi vidyante bahavo varavarṇini
GE07mbh_05_u:174.009c: āśrame vai vasantyās te na bhaveyuḥ pitur gṛhe
GE07mbh_05_u:174.010a: tatas tu te 'bruvan vākyaṃ brāhmaṇās tāṃ tapasvinīm
GE07mbh_05_u:174.010c: tvām ihaikākinīṃ dṛṣṭvā nirjane gahane vane
GE07mbh_05_u:174.010e: prārthayiṣyanti rājendrās tasmān maivaṃ manaḥ kṛthāḥ ambovāca
GE07mbh_05_u:174.011a: na śakyaṃ kāśinagarīṃ punar gantuṃ pitur gṛhān
GE07mbh_05_u:174.012a: uṣitā hy anyathā bālye pitur veśmani tāpasāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:174.012c: nāhaṃ gamiṣye bhadraṃ vas tatra yatra pitā mama
GE07mbh_05_u:174.013a: yathā pare 'pi me loke na syād evaṃ mahātyayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:174.013c: daurbhāgyaṃ brāhmaṇaśreṣṭhās tasmāt tapsyāmy ahaṃ tapaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:174.014a: ity evaṃ teṣu vipreṣu cintayatsu tathā tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:174.014c: rājarṣis tad vanaṃ prāptas tapasvī hotravāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:174.014d-0573_01: tāṃ tathā bhāminīṃ dṛṣṭvā śrutvā codvignamānasaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:174.015a: tatas te tāpasāḥ sarve pūjayanti sma taṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_05_u:174.016c: punar eva kathāṃ cakruḥ kanyāṃ prati vanaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:174.017a: ambāyās tāṃ kathāṃ śrutvā kāśirājñaś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:174.017b-0574_02: tāṃ tathāvādinīṃ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā ca sa mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:174.017c: sa vepamāna utthāya mātur asyāḥ pitā tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:174.017e: tāṃ kanyām aṅkam āropya paryāśvāsayata prabho
GE07mbh_05_u:174.018a: sa tām apṛcchat kārtsnyena vyasanotpattim āditaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:174.018c: sā ca tasmai yathāvṛttaṃ vistareṇa nyavedayat
GE07mbh_05_u:174.019c: kāryaṃ ca pratipede tan manasā sumahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:174.020a: abravīd vepamānaś ca kanyām ārtāṃ suduḥkhitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:174.020c: mā gāḥ pitṛgṛhaṃ bhadre mātus te janako hy aham
GE07mbh_05_u:174.021a: duḥkhaṃ chetsyāmi te 'haṃ vai mayi vartasva putrike
GE07mbh_05_u:174.021c: paryāptaṃ te manaḥ putri yad evaṃ pariśuṣyasi
GE07mbh_05_u:174.022c: rāmas tava mahad duḥkhaṃ śokaṃ cāpanayiṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:174.022e: haniṣyati raṇe bhīṣmaṃ na kariṣyati ced vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:174.023c: pratiṣṭhāpayitā sa tvāṃ same pathi mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:174.024a: tatas tu sasvaraṃ bāṣpam utsṛjantī punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:174.024c: abravīt pitaraṃ mātuḥ sā tadā hotravāhanam
GE07mbh_05_u:174.025c: api nāmādya paśyeyam āryaṃ taṃ lokaviśrutam
GE07mbh_05_u:174.026a: kathaṃ ca tīvraṃ duḥkhaṃ me haniṣyati sa bhārgavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:174.026c: etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotum atha yāsyāmi tatra vai
GE07mbh_05_u:175.001a: rāmaṃ drakṣyasi vatse tvaṃ jāmadagnyaṃ mahāvane
GE07mbh_05_u:175.002a: mahendre vai giriśreṣṭhe rāmaṃ nityam upāsate
GE07mbh_05_u:175.003a: tatra gacchasva bhadraṃ te brūyāś cainaṃ vaco mama
GE07mbh_05_u:175.004a: brūyāś cainaṃ punar bhadre yat te kāryaṃ manīṣitam
GE07mbh_05_u:175.004c: mayi saṃkīrtite rāmaḥ sarvaṃ tat te kariṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:175.005a: mama rāmaḥ sakhā vatse prītiyuktaḥ suhṛc ca me
GE07mbh_05_u:175.006a: evaṃ bruvati kanyāṃ tu pārthive hotravāhane
GE07mbh_05_u:175.007a: tatas te munayaḥ sarve samuttasthuḥ sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:175.007c: sa ca rājā vayovṛddhaḥ sṛñjayo hotravāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:175.008a: tataḥ pṛṣṭvā yathānyāyam anyonyaṃ te vanaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:175.009a: tatas te kathayām āsuḥ kathās tās tā manoramāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:175.009c: kāntā divyāś ca rājendra prītiharṣamudā yutāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:175.011c: akṛtavraṇa śakyo vai draṣṭuṃ vedavidāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:175.012a: bhavantam eva satataṃ rāmaḥ kīrtayati prabho
GE07mbh_05_u:175.012c: sṛñjayo me priyasakho rājarṣir iti pārthiva
GE07mbh_05_u:175.013a: iha rāmaḥ prabhāte śvo bhaviteti matir mama
GE07mbh_05_u:175.014a: iyaṃ ca kanyā rājarṣe kimarthaṃ vanam āgatā
GE07mbh_05_u:175.014c: kasya ceyaṃ tava ca kā bhavatīcchāmi veditum
GE07mbh_05_u:175.016a: iyam ambeti vikhyātā jyeṣṭhā kāśipateḥ sutā
GE07mbh_05_u:175.018a: tataḥ kila mahāvīryo bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavo nṛpān
GE07mbh_05_u:175.018c: avākṣipya mahātejās tisraḥ kanyā jahāra tāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:175.022c: na mām arhasi dharmajña paracittāṃ pradāpitum
GE07mbh_05_u:175.023a: tac chrutvā vacanaṃ bhīṣmaḥ saṃmantrya saha mantribhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:175.024a: anujñātā tu bhīṣmeṇa śālvaṃ saubhapatiṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:175.024c: kanyeyaṃ muditā vipra kāle vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:175.027c: asya duḥkhasya cotpattiṃ bhīṣmam eveha manyate
GE07mbh_05_u:175.027d-0575_01: evaṃ bruvati vai rājñi kanyā vacanam abravīt ambovāca
GE07mbh_05_u:175.029a: na hy utsahe svanagaraṃ pratiyātuṃ tapodhana
GE07mbh_05_u:175.030a: yat tu māṃ bhagavān rāmo vakṣyati dvijasattama
GE07mbh_05_u:175.030c: tan me kāryatamaṃ kāryam iti me bhagavan matiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:176.001c: pratikartavyam abale tat tvaṃ vatse bravīhi me
GE07mbh_05_u:176.002a: yadi saubhapatir bhadre niyoktavyo mate tava
GE07mbh_05_u:176.003c: raṇe vinirjitaṃ draṣṭuṃ kuryāt tad api bhārgavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:176.004a: sṛñjayasya vacaḥ śrutvā tava caiva śucismite
GE07mbh_05_u:176.004c: yad atrānantaraṃ kāryaṃ tad adyaiva vicintyatām ambovāca
GE07mbh_05_u:176.005c: na hi jānāti me bhīṣmo brahmañ śālvagataṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:176.006a: etad vicārya manasā bhavān eva viniścayam
GE07mbh_05_u:176.007a: bhīṣme vā kuruśārdūle śālvarāje 'tha vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:176.007c: ubhayor eva vā brahman yad yuktaṃ tat samācara
GE07mbh_05_u:176.008a: niveditaṃ mayā hy etad duḥkhamūlaṃ yathātatham
GE07mbh_05_u:176.008c: vidhānaṃ tatra bhagavan kartum arhasi yuktitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:176.009a: upapannam idaṃ bhadre yad evaṃ varavarṇini
GE07mbh_05_u:176.009c: dharmaṃ prati vaco brūyāḥ śṛṇu cedaṃ vaco mama
GE07mbh_05_u:176.010a: yadi tvām āpageyo vai na nayed gajasāhvayam
GE07mbh_05_u:176.010c: śālvas tvāṃ śirasā bhīru gṛhṇīyād rāmacoditaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:176.011a: tena tvaṃ nirjitā bhadre yasmān nītāsi bhāmini
GE07mbh_05_u:176.012a: bhīṣmaḥ puruṣamānī ca jitakāśī tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:176.012c: tasmāt pratikriyā yuktā bhīṣme kārayituṃ tvayā ambovāca
GE07mbh_05_u:176.013a: mamāpy eṣa mahān brahman hṛdi kāmo 'bhivartate
GE07mbh_05_u:176.013c: ghātayeyaṃ yadi raṇe bhīṣmam ity eva nityadā
GE07mbh_05_u:176.014a: bhīṣmaṃ vā śālvarājaṃ vā yaṃ vā doṣeṇa gacchasi
GE07mbh_05_u:176.015a: evaṃ kathayatām eva teṣāṃ sa divaso gataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:176.016a: tato rāmaḥ prādurāsīt prajvalann iva tejasā
GE07mbh_05_u:176.018a: tatas taṃ tāpasā dṛṣṭvā sa ca rājā mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:176.018c: tasthuḥ prāñjalayaḥ sarve sā ca kanyā tapasvinī
GE07mbh_05_u:176.019c: arcitaś ca yathāyogaṃ niṣasāda sahaiva taiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:176.020a: tataḥ pūrvavyatītāni kathayete sma tāv ubhau
GE07mbh_05_u:176.020c: sṛñjayaś ca sa rājarṣir jāmadagnyaś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:176.021c: uvāca madhuraṃ kāle rāmaṃ vacanam arthavat
GE07mbh_05_u:176.023a: paramaṃ kathyatāṃ ceti tāṃ rāmaḥ pratyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_05_u:176.023c: tataḥ sābhyagamad rāmaṃ jvalantam iva pāvakam
GE07mbh_05_u:176.024a: sā cābhivādya caraṇau rāmasya śirasā śubhā
GE07mbh_05_u:176.026c: brūhi yat te manoduḥkhaṃ kariṣye vacanaṃ tava ambovāca
GE07mbh_05_u:176.027c: śokapaṅkārṇavād ghorād uddharasva ca māṃ vibho
GE07mbh_05_u:176.028a: tasyāś ca dṛṣṭvā rūpaṃ ca vayaś cābhinavaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:176.029a: kim iyaṃ vakṣyatīty evaṃ vimṛśan bhṛgusattamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:176.030a: kathyatām iti sā bhūyo rāmeṇoktā śucismitā
GE07mbh_05_u:176.030c: sarvam eva yathātattvaṃ kathayām āsa bhārgave
GE07mbh_05_u:176.031a: tac chrutvā jāmadagnyas tu rājaputryā vacas tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:176.032c: kariṣyati vaco dharmyaṃ śrutvā me sa narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:176.033a: na cet kariṣyati vaco mayoktaṃ jāhnavīsutaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:176.033c: dhakṣyāmy enaṃ raṇe bhadre sāmātyaṃ śastratejasā
GE07mbh_05_u:176.034a: atha vā te matis tatra rājaputri nivartate
GE07mbh_05_u:176.034c: tāvac chālvapatiṃ vīraṃ yojayāmy atra karmaṇi ambovāca
GE07mbh_05_u:176.036c: na ca māṃ pratyagṛhṇāt sa cāritrapariśaṅkitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:176.037c: yad atraupayikaṃ kāryaṃ tac cintayitum arhasi
GE07mbh_05_u:176.038c: yenāhaṃ vaśam ānītā samutkṣipya balāt tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:176.039a: bhīṣmaṃ jahi mahābāho yatkṛte duḥkham īdṛśam
GE07mbh_05_u:176.040a: sa hi lubdhaś ca mānī ca jitakāśī ca bhārgava
GE07mbh_05_u:176.040c: tasmāt pratikriyā kartuṃ yuktā tasmai tvayānagha
GE07mbh_05_u:176.041a: eṣa me hriyamāṇāyā bhāratena tadā vibho
GE07mbh_05_u:176.042c: jahi bhīṣmaṃ mahābāho yathā vṛtraṃ puraṃdaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:177.001a: evam uktas tadā rāmo jahi bhīṣmam iti prabho
GE07mbh_05_u:177.001c: uvāca rudatīṃ kanyāṃ codayantīṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:177.002a: kāśye kāmaṃ na gṛhṇāmi śastraṃ vai varavarṇini
GE07mbh_05_u:177.002c: ṛte brahmavidāṃ hetoḥ kim anyat karavāṇi te
GE07mbh_05_u:177.003a: vācā bhīṣmaś ca śālvaś ca mama rājñi vaśānugau
GE07mbh_05_u:177.004a: na tu śastraṃ grahīṣyāmi kathaṃ cid api bhāmini
GE07mbh_05_u:177.004c: ṛte niyogād viprāṇām eṣa me samayaḥ kṛtaḥ ambovāca
GE07mbh_05_u:177.005a: mama duḥkhaṃ bhagavatā vyapaneyaṃ yatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:177.005c: tat tu bhīṣmaprasūtaṃ me taṃ jahīśvara māciram
GE07mbh_05_u:177.006a: kāśikanye punar brūhi bhīṣmas te caraṇāv ubhau
GE07mbh_05_u:177.006c: śirasā vandanārho 'pi grahīṣyati girā mama ambovāca
GE07mbh_05_u:177.007a: jahi bhīṣmaṃ raṇe rāma mama ced icchasi priyam
GE07mbh_05_u:177.007c: pratiśrutaṃ ca yadi tat satyaṃ kartum ihārhasi
GE07mbh_05_u:177.008a: tayoḥ saṃvadator evaṃ rājan rāmāmbayos tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:177.009a: śaraṇāgatāṃ mahābāho kanyāṃ na tyaktum arhasi
GE07mbh_05_u:177.009c: jahi bhīṣmaṃ raṇe rāma garjantam asuraṃ yathā
GE07mbh_05_u:177.010a: yadi bhīṣmas tvayāhūto raṇe rāma mahāmune
GE07mbh_05_u:177.010c: nirjito 'smīti vā brūyāt kuryād vā vacanaṃ tava
GE07mbh_05_u:177.011a: kṛtam asyā bhavet kāryaṃ kanyāyā bhṛgunandana
GE07mbh_05_u:177.011c: vākyaṃ satyaṃ ca te vīra bhaviṣyati kṛtaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_05_u:177.012a: iyaṃ cāpi pratijñā te tadā rāma mahāmune
GE07mbh_05_u:177.012c: jitvā vai kṣatriyān sarvān brāhmaṇeṣu pratiśrutam
GE07mbh_05_u:177.013a: brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyaḥ śūdraś caiva raṇe yadi
GE07mbh_05_u:177.013c: brahmadviḍ bhavitā taṃ vai haniṣyāmīti bhārgava
GE07mbh_05_u:177.014c: na śakṣyāmi parityāgaṃ kartuṃ jīvan kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:177.015a: yaś ca kṣatraṃ raṇe kṛtsnaṃ vijeṣyati samāgatam
GE07mbh_05_u:177.015c: dṛptātmānam ahaṃ taṃ ca haniṣyāmīti bhārgava
GE07mbh_05_u:177.016a: sa evaṃ vijayī rāma bhīṣmaḥ kurukulodvahaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:177.017c: tathaiva ca kariṣyāmi yathā sāmnaiva lapsyate
GE07mbh_05_u:177.018c: gamiṣyāmi svayaṃ tatra kanyām ādāya yatra saḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:177.019a: yadi bhīṣmo raṇaślāghī na kariṣyati me vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:177.019c: haniṣyāmy enam udriktam iti me niścitā matiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:177.020a: na hi bāṇā mayotsṛṣṭāḥ sajjantīha śarīriṇām
GE07mbh_05_u:177.021a: evam uktvā tato rāmaḥ saha tair brahmavādibhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:177.022a: tatas te tām uṣitvā tu rajanīṃ tatra tāpasāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:177.023a: abhyagacchat tato rāmaḥ saha tair brāhmaṇarṣabhaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:178.001a: tatas tṛtīye divase same deśe vyavasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:178.001c: preṣayām āsa me rājan prāpto 'smīti mahāvrataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:178.002a: tam āgatam ahaṃ śrutvā viṣayāntaṃ mahābalam
GE07mbh_05_u:178.003c: ṛtvigbhir devakalpaiś ca tathaiva ca purohitaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:178.004a: sa mām abhigataṃ dṛṣṭvā jāmadagnyaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_05_u:178.004c: pratijagrāha tāṃ pūjāṃ vacanaṃ cedam abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:178.005a: bhīṣma kāṃ buddhim āsthāya kāśirājasutā tvayā
GE07mbh_05_u:178.006c: parāmṛṣṭāṃ tvayā hīmāṃ ko hi gantum ihārhati
GE07mbh_05_u:178.007a: pratyākhyātā hi śālvena tvayā nīteti bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:178.008c: na yuktam avamāno 'yaṃ kartuṃ rājñā tvayānagha
GE07mbh_05_u:178.009c: nāham enāṃ punar dadyāṃ bhrātre brahman kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:178.010a: śālvasyāham iti prāha purā mām iha bhārgava
GE07mbh_05_u:178.011a: na bhayān nāpy anukrośān na lobhān nārthakāmyayā
GE07mbh_05_u:178.011c: kṣatradharmam ahaṃ jahyām iti me vratam āhitam
GE07mbh_05_u:178.012c: na kariṣyasi ced etad vākyaṃ me kurupuṃgava
GE07mbh_05_u:178.013a: haniṣyāmi sahāmātyaṃ tvām adyeti punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:178.014a: tam ahaṃ gīrbhir iṣṭābhiḥ punaḥ punar ariṃdamam
GE07mbh_05_u:178.014c: ayācaṃ bhṛguśārdūlaṃ na caiva praśaśāma saḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:178.014d-0577_01: yadā prayācyamāno 'pi prasādaṃ na karoti me
GE07mbh_05_u:178.015a: tam ahaṃ praṇamya śirasā bhūyo brāhmaṇasattamam
GE07mbh_05_u:178.015c: abruvaṃ kāraṇaṃ kiṃ tad yat tvaṃ yoddhum ihecchasi
GE07mbh_05_u:178.017c: jānīṣe māṃ guruṃ bhīṣma na cemāṃ pratigṛhṇase
GE07mbh_05_u:178.018a: na hi te vidyate śāntir anyathā kurunandana
GE07mbh_05_u:178.019a: tathā bruvantaṃ tam ahaṃ rāmaṃ parapuraṃjayam
GE07mbh_05_u:178.019c: naitad evaṃ punar bhāvi brahmarṣe kiṃ śrameṇa te
GE07mbh_05_u:178.020c: prasādaye tvāṃ bhagavaṃs tyaktaiṣā hi purā mayā
GE07mbh_05_u:178.021a: ko jātu parabhāvāṃ hi nārīṃ vyālīm iva sthitām
GE07mbh_05_u:178.021c: vāsayeta gṛhe jānan strīṇāṃ doṣān mahātyayān
GE07mbh_05_u:178.022a: na bhayād vāsavasyāpi dharmaṃ jahyāṃ mahādyute
GE07mbh_05_u:178.022c: prasīda mā vā yad vā te kāryaṃ tat kuru māciram
GE07mbh_05_u:178.023a: ayaṃ cāpi viśuddhātman purāṇe śrūyate vibho
GE07mbh_05_u:178.025a: sa tvaṃ gurur iti premṇā mayā saṃmānito bhṛśam
GE07mbh_05_u:178.025c: guruvṛttaṃ na jānīṣe tasmād yotsyāmy ahaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_05_u:178.026a: guruṃ na hanyāṃ samare brāhmaṇaṃ ca viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:178.026c: viśeṣatas tapovṛddham evaṃ kṣāntaṃ mayā tava
GE07mbh_05_u:178.027c: yo hanyāt samare kruddho yudhyantam apalāyinam
GE07mbh_05_u:178.027e: brahmahatyā na tasya syād iti dharmeṣu niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:178.028c: yo yathā vartate yasmiṃs tathā tasmin pravartayan
GE07mbh_05_u:178.028e: nādharmaṃ samavāpnoti naraḥ śreyaś ca vindati
GE07mbh_05_u:178.029a: arthe vā yadi vā dharme samartho deśakālavit
GE07mbh_05_u:178.030c: tasmād yotsyāmi sahitas tvayā rāma mahāhave
GE07mbh_05_u:178.030e: paśya me bāhuvīryaṃ ca vikramaṃ cātimānuṣam
GE07mbh_05_u:178.031a: evaṃ gate 'pi tu mayā yac chakyaṃ bhṛgunandana
GE07mbh_05_u:178.031c: tat kariṣye kurukṣetre yotsye vipra tvayā saha
GE07mbh_05_u:178.031e: dvaṃdve rāma yatheṣṭaṃ te sajjo bhava mahāmune
GE07mbh_05_u:178.032a: tatra tvaṃ nihato rāma mayā śaraśatācitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:178.034a: api yatra tvayā rāma kṛtaṃ śaucaṃ purā pituḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:178.034c: tatrāham api hatvā tvāṃ śaucaṃ kartāsmi bhārgava
GE07mbh_05_u:178.035a: tatra gacchasva rāma tvaṃ tvaritaṃ yuddhadurmada
GE07mbh_05_u:178.036a: yac cāpi katthase rāma bahuśaḥ pariṣatsu vai
GE07mbh_05_u:178.036c: nirjitāḥ kṣatriyā loke mayaikeneti tac chṛṇu
GE07mbh_05_u:178.036d-0579_01: adharmaḥ sumahān eṣa yac chayyāmaraṇaṃ gṛhe
GE07mbh_05_u:178.036d-0579_02: yadājau nidhanaṃ yāti so 'sya dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:178.037a: na tadā jāyate bhīṣmo madvidhaḥ kṣatriyo 'pi vā
GE07mbh_05_u:178.037b-0580_01: paścāj jātāni tejāṃsi tṛṇeṣu jvalitaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_05_u:178.037c: yas te yuddhamayaṃ darpaṃ kāmaṃ ca vyapanāśayet
GE07mbh_05_u:178.038c: vyapaneṣyāmi te darpaṃ yuddhe rāma na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:179.001a: tato mām abravīd rāmaḥ prahasann iva bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:179.001c: diṣṭyā bhīṣma mayā sārdhaṃ yoddhum icchasi saṃgare
GE07mbh_05_u:179.002a: ayaṃ gacchāmi kauravya kurukṣetraṃ tvayā saha
GE07mbh_05_u:179.003a: tatra tvāṃ nihataṃ mātā mayā śaraśatācitam
GE07mbh_05_u:179.004c: mayā vinihataṃ devī rodatām adya pārthiva
GE07mbh_05_u:179.005c: yā tvām ajījanan mandaṃ yuddhakāmukam āturam
GE07mbh_05_u:179.006a: ehi gaccha mayā bhīṣma yuddham adyaiva vartatām
GE07mbh_05_u:179.007a: iti bruvāṇaṃ tam ahaṃ rāmaṃ parapuraṃjayam
GE07mbh_05_u:179.007c: praṇamya śirasā rājann evam astv ity athābruvam
GE07mbh_05_u:179.008a: evam uktvā yayau rāmaḥ kurukṣetraṃ yuyutsayā
GE07mbh_05_u:179.009c: dvijātīn vācya puṇyāhaṃ svasti caiva mahādyute
GE07mbh_05_u:179.010a: ratham āsthāya ruciraṃ rājataṃ pāṇḍurair hayaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:179.016a: te hayāś coditās tena sūtena paramāhave
GE07mbh_05_u:179.017a: gatvāhaṃ tat kurukṣetraṃ sa ca rāmaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_05_u:179.019a: tatas tatra dvijā rājaṃs tāpasāś ca vanaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:179.019c: apaśyanta raṇaṃ divyaṃ devāḥ sarṣigaṇās tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:179.020a: tato divyāni mālyāni prādurāsan muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:179.020c: vāditrāṇi ca divyāni meghavṛndāni caiva ha
GE07mbh_05_u:179.022c: mātā svarūpiṇī rājan kim idaṃ te cikīrṣitam
GE07mbh_05_u:179.023c: bhīṣmeṇa saha mā yotsīḥ śiṣyeṇeti punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:179.024a: mā maivaṃ putra nirbandhaṃ kuru vipreṇa pārthiva
GE07mbh_05_u:179.025c: viditaḥ putra rāmas te yatas tvaṃ yoddhum icchasi
GE07mbh_05_u:179.027a: yathā ca rāmo rājendra mayā pūrvaṃ prasāditaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:179.028a: tataḥ sā rāmam abhyetya jananī me mahānadī
GE07mbh_05_u:179.028c: madarthaṃ tam ṛṣiṃ devī kṣamayām āsa bhārgavam
GE07mbh_05_u:179.028e: bhīṣmeṇa saha mā yotsīḥ śiṣyeṇeti vaco 'bravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:179.029a: sa ca tām āha yācantīṃ bhīṣmam eva nivartaya
GE07mbh_05_u:179.029c: na hi me kurute kāmam ity ahaṃ tam upāgamam
GE07mbh_05_u:179.030a: tato gaṅgā sutasnehād bhīṣmaṃ punar upāgamat
GE07mbh_05_u:179.031c: āhvayām āsa ca punar yuddhāya dvijasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:180.001a: tam ahaṃ smayann iva raṇe pratyabhāṣaṃ vyavasthitam
GE07mbh_05_u:180.001c: bhūmiṣṭhaṃ notsahe yoddhuṃ bhavantaṃ ratham āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:180.002a: āroha syandanaṃ vīra kavacaṃ ca mahābhuja
GE07mbh_05_u:180.002c: badhāna samare rāma yadi yoddhuṃ mayecchasi
GE07mbh_05_u:180.003a: tato mām abravīd rāmaḥ smayamāno raṇājire
GE07mbh_05_u:180.003c: ratho me medinī bhīṣma vāhā vedāḥ sadaśvavat
GE07mbh_05_u:180.004a: sūto me mātariśvā vai kavacaṃ vedamātaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:180.005a: evaṃ bruvāṇo gāndhāre rāmo māṃ satyavikramaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:180.009c: sakhā vedavid atyantaṃ dayito bhārgavasya ha
GE07mbh_05_u:180.010a: āhvayānaḥ sa māṃ yuddhe mano harṣayatīva me
GE07mbh_05_u:180.012a: tato 'haṃ bāṇapāteṣu triṣu vāhān nigṛhya vai
GE07mbh_05_u:180.013c: abhivādya cainaṃ vidhivad abruvaṃ vākyam uttamam
GE07mbh_05_u:180.014a: yotsye tvayā raṇe rāma viśiṣṭenādhikena ca
GE07mbh_05_u:180.014c: guruṇā dharmaśīlena jayam āśāssva me vibho
GE07mbh_05_u:180.015a: evam etat kuruśreṣṭha kartavyaṃ bhūtim icchatā
GE07mbh_05_u:180.015c: dharmo hy eṣa mahābāho viśiṣṭaiḥ saha yudhyatām
GE07mbh_05_u:180.016a: śapeyaṃ tvāṃ na ced evam āgacchethā viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_05_u:180.016c: yudhyasva tvaṃ raṇe yatto dhairyam ālambya kaurava
GE07mbh_05_u:180.017a: na tu te jayam āśāse tvāṃ hi jetum ahaṃ sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:180.017c: gaccha yudhyasva dharmeṇa prīto 'smi caritena te
GE07mbh_05_u:180.018a: tato 'haṃ taṃ namaskṛtya ratham āruhya satvaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:180.019a: tato yuddhaṃ samabhavan mama tasya ca bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:180.020a: sa me tasmin raṇe pūrvaṃ prāharat kaṅkapatribhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:180.020c: ṣaṣṭyā śataiś ca navabhiḥ śarāṇām agnivarcasām
GE07mbh_05_u:180.021a: catvāras tena me vāhāḥ sūtaś caiva viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_05_u:180.022a: namaskṛtya ca devebhyo brāhmaṇebhyaś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:180.022c: tam ahaṃ smayann iva raṇe pratyabhāṣaṃ vyavasthitam
GE07mbh_05_u:180.023a: ācāryatā mānitā me nirmaryāde hy api tvayi
GE07mbh_05_u:180.023c: bhūyas tu śṛṇu me brahman saṃpadaṃ dharmasaṃgrahe
GE07mbh_05_u:180.024a: ye te vedāḥ śarīrasthā brāhmaṇyaṃ yac ca te mahat
GE07mbh_05_u:180.024c: tapaś ca sumahat taptaṃ na tebhyaḥ praharāmy aham
GE07mbh_05_u:180.025a: prahare kṣatradharmasya yaṃ tvaṃ rāma samāsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:180.026a: paśya me dhanuṣo vīryaṃ paśya bāhvor balaṃ ca me
GE07mbh_05_u:180.026c: eṣa te kārmukaṃ vīra dvidhā kurmi sasāyakam
GE07mbh_05_u:180.027c: tenāsya dhanuṣaḥ koṭiś chinnā bhūmim athāgamat
GE07mbh_05_u:180.029c: celuḥ kṣaranto rudhiraṃ nāgā iva ca te śarāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:180.030c: babhau rāmas tadā rājan merur dhātūn ivotsṛjan
GE07mbh_05_u:180.031c: babhau rāmas tadā rājan kva cit kiṃśukasaṃnibhaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:180.032c: hemapuṅkhān suniśitāñ śarāṃs tān hi vavarṣa saḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:180.033a: te samāsādya māṃ raudrā bahudhā marmabhedinaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:180.034c: śatasaṃkhyaiḥ śaraiḥ kruddhas tadā rāmam avākiram
GE07mbh_05_u:180.036c: dhig dhig ity abruvaṃ yuddhaṃ kṣatraṃ ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:180.037c: aho bata kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ mayedaṃ kṣatrakarmaṇā
GE07mbh_05_u:180.038a: gurur dvijātir dharmātmā yad evaṃ pīḍitaḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:180.038c: tato na prāharaṃ bhūyo jāmadagnyāya bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:181.001a: ātmanas tu tataḥ sūto hayānāṃ ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_05_u:181.002c: prabhāta udite sūrye tato yuddham avartata
GE07mbh_05_u:181.003a: dṛṣṭvā māṃ tūrṇam āyāntaṃ daṃśitaṃ syandane sthitam
GE07mbh_05_u:181.003c: akarod ratham atyarthaṃ rāmaḥ sajjaṃ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_05_u:181.007a: saṃkruddho jāmadagnyas tu punar eva patatriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:181.007c: preṣayām āsa me rājan dīptāsyān uragān iva
GE07mbh_05_u:181.008a: tān ahaṃ niśitair bhallaiḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:181.008c: acchidaṃ sahasā rājann antarikṣe punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:181.009a: tatas tv astrāṇi divyāni jāmadagnyaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_05_u:181.009c: mayi pracodayām āsa tāny ahaṃ pratyaṣedhayam
GE07mbh_05_u:181.010a: astrair eva mahābāho cikīrṣann adhikāṃ kriyām
GE07mbh_05_u:181.010c: tato divi mahān nādaḥ prādurāsīt samantataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:181.011c: pratyājaghne ca tad rāmo guhyakāstreṇa bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:181.012c: vāruṇenaiva rāmas tad vārayām āsa me vibhuḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:181.013c: rāmaś ca mama tejasvī divyāstravid ariṃdamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:181.014a: tato māṃ savyato rājan rāmaḥ kurvan dvijottamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:181.015c: atha māṃ kaśmalāviṣṭaṃ sūtas tūrṇam apāvahat
GE07mbh_05_u:181.016a: tato mām apayātaṃ vai bhṛśaṃ viddham acetasam
GE07mbh_05_u:181.017a: tatas tu labdhasaṃjño 'haṃ jñātvā sūtam athābruvam
GE07mbh_05_u:181.017c: yāhi sūta yato rāmaḥ sajjo 'haṃ gatavedanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:181.018a: tato mām avahat sūto hayaiḥ paramaśobhitaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:181.020a: tān āpatata evāsau rāmo bāṇān ajihmagān
GE07mbh_05_u:181.020c: bāṇair evācchinat tūrṇam ekaikaṃ tribhir āhave
GE07mbh_05_u:181.021a: tatas te mṛditāḥ sarve mama bāṇāḥ susaṃśitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:181.022a: tataḥ punaḥ śaraṃ dīptaṃ suprabhaṃ kālasaṃmitam
GE07mbh_05_u:181.023a: tena tv abhihato gāḍhaṃ bāṇacchedavaśaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:181.023c: mumoha sahasā rāmo bhūmau ca nipapāta ha
GE07mbh_05_u:181.024a: tato hāhākṛtaṃ sarvaṃ rāme bhūtalam āśrite
GE07mbh_05_u:181.025c: tapodhanās te sahasā kāśyā ca bhṛgunandanam
GE07mbh_05_u:181.026a: ta enaṃ saṃpariṣvajya śanair āśvāsayaṃs tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:181.026c: pāṇibhir jalaśītaiś ca jayāśīrbhiś ca kaurava
GE07mbh_05_u:181.027a: tataḥ sa vihvalo vākyaṃ rāma utthāya mābravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:181.027c: tiṣṭha bhīṣma hato 'sīti bāṇaṃ saṃdhāya kārmuke
GE07mbh_05_u:181.028a: sa mukto nyapatat tūrṇaṃ pārśve savye mahāhave
GE07mbh_05_u:181.029a: hatvā hayāṃs tato rājañ śīghrāstreṇa mahāhave
GE07mbh_05_u:181.029c: avākiran māṃ viśrabdho bāṇais tair lomavāhibhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:181.032a: tato vāyoḥ prakampāc ca sūryasya ca marīcibhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:181.033c: bhūmau sarve tadā rājan bhasmabhūtāḥ prapedire
GE07mbh_05_u:181.034c: ayutāny atha kharvāṇi nikharvāṇi ca kaurava
GE07mbh_05_u:181.034e: rāmaḥ śarāṇāṃ saṃkruddho mayi tūrṇam apātayat
GE07mbh_05_u:181.035a: tato 'haṃ tān api raṇe śarair āśīviṣopamaiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:181.036a: evaṃ tad abhavad yuddhaṃ tadā bharatasattama
GE07mbh_05_u:181.036c: saṃdhyākāle vyatīte tu vyapāyāt sa ca me guruḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:182.002a: tato divyāstravic chūro divyāny astrāṇy anekaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:182.003a: tāny ahaṃ tatpratīghātair astrair astrāṇi bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:182.003c: vyadhamaṃ tumule yuddhe prāṇāṃs tyaktvā sudustyajān
GE07mbh_05_u:182.004a: astrair astreṣu bahudhā hateṣv atha ca bhārgavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:182.005a: tataḥ śaktiṃ prāhiṇod ghorarūpām; astrai ruddho jāmadagnyo mahātmā
GE07mbh_05_u:182.005c: kālotsṛṣṭāṃ prajvalitām ivolkāṃ; saṃdīptāgrāṃ tejasāvṛtya lokān
GE07mbh_05_u:182.006a: tato 'haṃ tām iṣubhir dīpyamānaiḥ; samāyāntīm antakālārkadīptām
GE07mbh_05_u:182.006c: chittvā tridhā pātayām āsa bhūmau; tato vavau pavanaḥ puṇyagandhiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:182.007a: tasyāṃ chinnāyāṃ krodhadīpto 'tha rāmaḥ; śaktīr ghorāḥ prāhiṇod dvādaśānyāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:182.007c: tāsāṃ rūpaṃ bhārata nota śakyaṃ; tejasvitvāl lāghavāc caiva vaktum
GE07mbh_05_u:182.008a: kiṃ tv evāhaṃ vihvalaḥ saṃpradṛśya; digbhyaḥ sarvās tā maholkā ivāgneḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:182.008c: nānārūpās tejasogreṇa dīptā; yathādityā dvādaśa lokasaṃkṣaye
GE07mbh_05_u:182.009a: tato jālaṃ bāṇamayaṃ vivṛtya; saṃdṛśya bhittvā śarajālena rājan
GE07mbh_05_u:182.009c: dvādaśeṣūn prāhiṇavaṃ raṇe 'haṃ; tataḥ śaktīr vyadhamaṃ ghorarūpāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:182.010a: tato 'parā jāmadagnyo mahātmā; śaktīr ghorāḥ prākṣipad dhemadaṇḍāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:182.010c: vicitritāḥ kāñcanapaṭṭanaddhā; yathā maholkā jvalitās tathā tāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:182.011a: tāś cāpy ugrāś carmaṇā vārayitvā; khaḍgenājau pātitā me narendra
GE07mbh_05_u:182.011c: bāṇair divyair jāmadagnyasya saṃkhye; divyāṃś cāśvān abhyavarṣaṃ sasūtān
GE07mbh_05_u:182.012a: nirmuktānāṃ pannagānāṃ sarūpā; dṛṣṭvā śaktīr hemacitrā nikṛttāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:182.012c: prāduścakre divyam astraṃ mahātmā; krodhāviṣṭo haihayeśapramāthī
GE07mbh_05_u:182.013a: tataḥ śreṇyaḥ śalabhānām ivogrāḥ; samāpetur viśikhānāṃ pradīptāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:182.013c: samācinoc cāpi bhṛśaṃ śarīraṃ; hayān sūtaṃ sarathaṃ caiva mahyam
GE07mbh_05_u:182.014a: rathaḥ śarair me nicitaḥ sarvato 'bhūt; tathā hayāḥ sārathiś caiva rājan
GE07mbh_05_u:182.014c: yugaṃ ratheṣā ca tathaiva cakre; tathaivākṣaḥ śarakṛtto 'tha bhagnaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:182.015a: tatas tasmin bāṇavarṣe vyatīte; śaraugheṇa pratyavarṣaṃ guruṃ tam
GE07mbh_05_u:182.015c: sa vikṣato mārgaṇair brahmarāśir; dehād ajasraṃ mumuce bhūri raktam
GE07mbh_05_u:182.016a: yathā rāmo bāṇajālābhitaptas; tathaivāhaṃ subhṛśaṃ gāḍhaviddhaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:182.016c: tato yuddhaṃ vyaramac cāparāhṇe; bhānāv astaṃ prārthayāne mahīdhram
GE07mbh_05_u:183.001a: tataḥ prabhāte rājendra sūrye vimala udgate
GE07mbh_05_u:183.001c: bhārgavasya mayā sārdhaṃ punar yuddham avartata
GE07mbh_05_u:183.002a: tato bhrānte rathe tiṣṭhan rāmaḥ praharatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:183.004a: tataḥ sūtaḥ sa me 'tyarthaṃ kaśmalaṃ prāviśan mahat
GE07mbh_05_u:183.004c: pṛthivyāṃ ca śarāghātān nipapāta mumoha ca
GE07mbh_05_u:183.005c: muhūrtād iva rājendra māṃ ca bhīr āviśat tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:183.006a: tataḥ sūte hate rājan kṣipatas tasya me śarān
GE07mbh_05_u:183.007a: tataḥ sūtavyasaninaṃ viplutaṃ māṃ sa bhārgavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:183.008a: sa me jatrvantare rājan nipatya rudhirāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:183.009a: matvā tu nihataṃ rāmas tato māṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:183.009c: meghavad vyanadac coccair jahṛṣe ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:183.010a: tathā tu patite rājan mayi rāmo mudā yutaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:183.011a: mama tatrābhavan ye tu kauravāḥ pārśvataḥ sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:183.011c: āgatā ye ca yuddhaṃ taj janās tatra didṛkṣavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:183.011e: ārtiṃ paramikāṃ jagmus te tadā mayi pātite
GE07mbh_05_u:183.012a: tato 'paśyaṃ pātito rājasiṃha; dvijān aṣṭau sūryahutāśanābhān
GE07mbh_05_u:183.012c: te māṃ samantāt parivārya tasthuḥ; svabāhubhiḥ parigṛhyājimadhye
GE07mbh_05_u:183.013a: rakṣyamāṇaś ca tair viprair nāhaṃ bhūmim upāspṛśam
GE07mbh_05_u:183.013c: antarikṣe sthito hy asmi tair viprair bāndhavair iva
GE07mbh_05_u:183.014a: tatas te brāhmaṇā rājann abruvan parigṛhya mām
GE07mbh_05_u:183.014c: mā bhair iti samaṃ sarve svasti te 'stv iti cāsakṛt
GE07mbh_05_u:183.015a: tatas teṣām ahaṃ vāgbhis tarpitaḥ sahasotthitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:183.015c: mātaraṃ saritāṃ śreṣṭhām apaśyaṃ ratham āsthitām
GE07mbh_05_u:183.016a: hayāś ca me saṃgṛhītās tayā vai; mahānadyā saṃyati kauravendra
GE07mbh_05_u:183.016c: pādau jananyāḥ pratipūjya cāhaṃ; tathārṣṭiṣeṇaṃ ratham abhyaroham
GE07mbh_05_u:183.017a: rarakṣa sā mama rathaṃ hayāṃś copaskarāṇi ca
GE07mbh_05_u:183.017c: tām ahaṃ prāñjalir bhūtvā punar eva vyasarjayam
GE07mbh_05_u:183.018a: tato 'haṃ svayam udyamya hayāṃs tān vātaraṃhasaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:183.020c: jānubhyāṃ dhanur utsṛjya rāmo mohavaśaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:183.021c: āvavrur jaladā vyoma kṣaranto rudhiraṃ bahu
GE07mbh_05_u:183.022a: ulkāś ca śataśaḥ petuḥ sanirghātāḥ sakampanāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:183.022c: arkaṃ ca sahasā dīptaṃ svarbhānur abhisaṃvṛṇot
GE07mbh_05_u:183.023a: vavuś ca vātāḥ paruṣāś calitā ca vasuṃdharā
GE07mbh_05_u:183.023c: gṛdhrā baḍāś ca kaṅkāś ca paripetur mudā yutāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:183.024a: dīptāyāṃ diśi gomāyur dāruṇaṃ muhur unnadat
GE07mbh_05_u:183.025d-0582_01: tato vai sahasotthāya rāmo mām abhyavartata
GE07mbh_05_u:183.025d-0582_04: śaraṃ cāpy ṛṣayo 'thainaṃ mā rāmety abruvan vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:183.026c: niśā vyagāhat sukhaśītamārutā; tato yuddhaṃ pratyavahārayāvaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:183.027a: evaṃ rājann avahāro babhūva; tataḥ punar vimale 'bhūt sughoram
GE07mbh_05_u:183.027c: kālyaṃ kālyaṃ viṃśatiṃ vai dināni; tathaiva cānyāni dināni trīṇi
GE07mbh_05_u:184.001a: tato 'haṃ niśi rājendra praṇamya śirasā tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:184.001c: brāhmaṇānāṃ pitṝṇāṃ ca devatānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:184.002a: naktaṃcarāṇāṃ bhūtānāṃ rajanyāś ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_05_u:184.004a: na ca rāmaṃ mahāvīryaṃ śaknomi raṇamūrdhani
GE07mbh_05_u:184.005a: yadi śakyo mayā jetuṃ jāmadagnyaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_05_u:184.007a: tato 'haṃ vipramukhyais tair yair asmi patito rathāt
GE07mbh_05_u:184.007c: utthāpito dhṛtaś caiva mā bhair iti ca sāntvitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:184.008a: ta eva māṃ mahārāja svapnadarśanam etya vai
GE07mbh_05_u:184.009a: uttiṣṭha mā bhair gāṅgeya bhayaṃ te nāsti kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:184.009c: rakṣāmahe naravyāghra svaśarīraṃ hi no bhavān
GE07mbh_05_u:184.010a: na tvāṃ rāmo raṇe jetā jāmadagnyaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:184.010c: tvam eva samare rāmaṃ vijetā bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:184.011c: viditaṃ hi tavāpy etat pūrvasmin dehadhāraṇe
GE07mbh_05_u:184.012c: na hīdaṃ veda rāmo 'pi pṛthivyāṃ vā pumān kva cit
GE07mbh_05_u:184.013a: tat smarasva mahābāho bhṛśaṃ saṃyojayasva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:184.013c: na ca rāmaḥ kṣayaṃ gantā tenāstreṇa narādhipa
GE07mbh_05_u:184.014a: enasā ca na yogaṃ tvaṃ prāpsyase jātu mānada
GE07mbh_05_u:184.015a: tato jitvā tvam evainaṃ punar utthāpayiṣyasi
GE07mbh_05_u:184.016a: evaṃ kuruṣva kauravya prabhāte ratham āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:184.016c: prasuptaṃ vā mṛtaṃ vāpi tulyaṃ manyāmahe vayam
GE07mbh_05_u:184.017a: na ca rāmeṇa martavyaṃ kadā cid api pārthiva
GE07mbh_05_u:184.017c: tataḥ samutpannam idaṃ prasvāpaṃ yujyatām iti
GE07mbh_05_u:184.018a: ity uktvāntarhitā rājan sarva eva dvijottamāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:185.001c: taṃ ca saṃcintya vai svapnam avāpaṃ harṣam uttamam
GE07mbh_05_u:185.002a: tataḥ samabhavad yuddhaṃ mama tasya ca bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:185.003a: tato bāṇamayaṃ varṣaṃ vavarṣa mayi bhārgavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:185.003c: nyavārayam ahaṃ taṃ ca śarajālena bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:185.004c: hyastanenaiva kopena śaktiṃ vai prāhiṇon mayi
GE07mbh_05_u:185.006c: sā mām abhyahanat tūrṇam aṃsadeśe ca bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:185.011a: sa vakṣasi papātograḥ śaro vyāla iva śvasan
GE07mbh_05_u:185.011c: mahīṃ rājaṃs tataś cāham agacchaṃ rudhirāvilaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:185.012a: avāpya tu punaḥ saṃjñāṃ jāmadagnyāya dhīmate
GE07mbh_05_u:185.012c: prāhiṇvaṃ vimalāṃ śaktiṃ jvalantīm aśanīm iva
GE07mbh_05_u:185.013c: vihvalaś cābhavad rājan vepathuś cainam āviśat
GE07mbh_05_u:185.014a: tata enaṃ pariṣvajya sakhā vipro mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:185.016c: mayā prayuktaṃ jajvāla yugāntam iva darśayat
GE07mbh_05_u:185.017a: tayor brahmāstrayor āsīd antarā vai samāgamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:185.017c: asaṃprāpyaiva rāmaṃ ca māṃ ca bhāratasattama
GE07mbh_05_u:185.018a: tato vyomni prādurabhūt teja eva hi kevalam
GE07mbh_05_u:185.018c: bhūtāni caiva sarvāṇi jagmur ārtiṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_05_u:185.019a: ṛṣayaś ca sagandharvā devatāś caiva bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:185.020c: saṃtaptāni ca bhūtāni viṣādaṃ jagmur uttamam
GE07mbh_05_u:185.021a: prajajvāla nabho rājan dhūmāyante diśo daśa
GE07mbh_05_u:185.021c: na sthātum antarikṣe ca śekur ākāśagās tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:185.022c: idam antaram ity eva yoktukāmo 'smi bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:185.023c: cintitaṃ ca tad astraṃ me manasi pratyabhāt tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:186.001a: tato halahalāśabdo divi rājan mahān abhūt
GE07mbh_05_u:186.001c: prasvāpaṃ bhīṣma mā srākṣīr iti kauravanandana
GE07mbh_05_u:186.002a: ayuñjam eva caivāhaṃ tad astraṃ bhṛgunandane
GE07mbh_05_u:186.002c: prasvāpaṃ māṃ prayuñjānaṃ nārado vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:186.003a: ete viyati kauravya divi devagaṇāḥ sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:186.003c: te tvāṃ nivārayanty adya prasvāpaṃ mā prayojaya
GE07mbh_05_u:186.004a: rāmas tapasvī brahmaṇyo brāhmaṇaś ca guruś ca te
GE07mbh_05_u:186.004c: tasyāvamānaṃ kauravya mā sma kārṣīḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:186.005a: tato 'paśyaṃ diviṣṭhān vai tān aṣṭau brahmavādinaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:186.005c: te māṃ smayanto rājendra śanakair idam abruvan
GE07mbh_05_u:186.006a: yathāha bharataśreṣṭha nāradas tat tathā kuru
GE07mbh_05_u:186.006c: etad dhi paramaṃ śreyo lokānāṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_05_u:186.007a: tataś ca pratisaṃhṛtya tad astraṃ svāpanaṃ mṛdhe
GE07mbh_05_u:186.007c: brahmāstraṃ dīpayāṃ cakre tasmin yudhi yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_05_u:186.008a: tato rāmo ruṣito rājaputra; dṛṣṭvā tad astraṃ vinivartitaṃ vai
GE07mbh_05_u:186.008c: jito 'smi bhīṣmeṇa sumandabuddhir; ity eva vākyaṃ sahasā vyamuñcat
GE07mbh_05_u:186.009a: tato 'paśyat pitaraṃ jāmadagnyaḥ; pitus tathā pitaraṃ tasya cānyam
GE07mbh_05_u:186.009c: ta evainaṃ saṃparivārya tasthur; ūcuś cainaṃ sāntvapūrvaṃ tadānīm
GE07mbh_05_u:186.010a: mā smaivaṃ sāhasaṃ vatsa punaḥ kārṣīḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:186.011a: kṣatriyasya tu dharmo 'yaṃ yad yuddhaṃ bhṛgunandana
GE07mbh_05_u:186.011c: svādhyāyo vratacaryā ca brāhmaṇānāṃ paraṃ dhanam
GE07mbh_05_u:186.012a: idaṃ nimitte kasmiṃś cid asmābhir upamantritam
GE07mbh_05_u:186.012c: śastradhāraṇam atyugraṃ tac ca kāryaṃ kṛtaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_05_u:186.013a: vatsa paryāptam etāvad bhīṣmeṇa saha saṃyuge
GE07mbh_05_u:186.013c: vimardas te mahābāho vyapayāhi raṇād itaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:186.014a: paryāptam etad bhadraṃ te tava kārmukadhāraṇam
GE07mbh_05_u:186.015a: eṣa bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavo devaiḥ sarvair nivāritaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:186.015c: nivartasva raṇād asmād iti caiva pracoditaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:186.016a: rāmeṇa saha mā yotsīr guruṇeti punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:186.016c: na hi rāmo raṇe jetuṃ tvayā nyāyyaḥ kurūdvaha
GE07mbh_05_u:186.017a: vayaṃ tu guravas tubhyaṃ tatas tvāṃ vārayāmahe
GE07mbh_05_u:186.017c: bhīṣmo vasūnām anyatamo diṣṭyā jīvasi putraka
GE07mbh_05_u:186.018a: gāṅgeyaḥ śaṃtanoḥ putro vasur eṣa mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:186.018c: kathaṃ tvayā raṇe jetuṃ rāma śakyo nivarta vai
GE07mbh_05_u:186.021a: evam uktaḥ sa pitṛbhiḥ pitṝn rāmo 'bravīd idam
GE07mbh_05_u:186.021c: nāhaṃ yudhi nivarteyam iti me vratam āhitam
GE07mbh_05_u:186.022a: na nivartitapūrvaṃ ca kadā cid raṇamūrdhani
GE07mbh_05_u:186.022e: na tv ahaṃ vinivartiṣye yuddhād asmāt kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:186.023a: tatas te munayo rājann ṛcīkapramukhās tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:186.024c: nety avocam ahaṃ tāṃś ca kṣatradharmavyapekṣayā
GE07mbh_05_u:186.025a: mama vratam idaṃ loke nāhaṃ yuddhāt kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:186.026a: nāhaṃ lobhān na kārpaṇyān na bhayān nārthakāraṇāt
GE07mbh_05_u:186.026c: tyajeyaṃ śāśvataṃ dharmam iti me niścitā matiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:186.027a: tatas te munayaḥ sarve nāradapramukhā nṛpa
GE07mbh_05_u:186.027c: bhāgīrathī ca me mātā raṇamadhyaṃ prapedire
GE07mbh_05_u:186.028c: sthito 'ham āhave yoddhuṃ tatas te rāmam abruvan
GE07mbh_05_u:186.029a: nāvanītaṃ hi hṛdayaṃ viprāṇāṃ śāmya bhārgava
GE07mbh_05_u:186.029c: rāma rāma nivartasva yuddhād asmād dvijottama
GE07mbh_05_u:186.029e: avadhyo hi tvayā bhīṣmas tvaṃ ca bhīṣmasya bhārgava
GE07mbh_05_u:186.030a: evaṃ bruvantas te sarve pratirudhya raṇājiram
GE07mbh_05_u:186.031a: tato 'haṃ punar evātha tān aṣṭau brahmavādinaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:186.031c: adrākṣaṃ dīpyamānān vai grahān aṣṭāv ivoditān
GE07mbh_05_u:186.032a: te māṃ sapraṇayaṃ vākyam abruvan samare sthitam
GE07mbh_05_u:186.032c: praihi rāmaṃ mahābāho guruṃ lokahitaṃ kuru
GE07mbh_05_u:186.033a: dṛṣṭvā nivartitaṃ rāmaṃ suhṛdvākyena tena vai
GE07mbh_05_u:186.033c: lokānāṃ ca hitaṃ kurvann aham apy ādade vacaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:186.034c: rāmaś cābhyutsmayan premṇā mām uvāca mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:186.035c: gamyatāṃ bhīṣma yuddhe 'smiṃs toṣito 'haṃ bhṛśaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_05_u:186.036a: mama caiva samakṣaṃ tāṃ kanyām āhūya bhārgavaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:186.036c: uvāca dīnayā vācā madhye teṣāṃ tapasvinām
GE07mbh_05_u:187.001a: pratyakṣam etal lokānāṃ sarveṣām eva bhāmini
GE07mbh_05_u:187.001c: yathā mayā paraṃ śaktyā kṛtaṃ vai pauruṣaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_05_u:187.002a: na caiva yudhi śaknomi bhīṣmaṃ śastrabhṛtāṃ varam
GE07mbh_05_u:187.003a: eṣā me paramā śaktir etan me paramaṃ balam
GE07mbh_05_u:187.003c: yatheṣṭaṃ gamyatāṃ bhadre kim anyad vā karomi te
GE07mbh_05_u:187.004a: bhīṣmam eva prapadyasva na te 'nyā vidyate gatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:187.004c: nirjito hy asmi bhīṣmeṇa mahāstrāṇi pramuñcatā
GE07mbh_05_u:187.005a: evam uktvā tato rāmo viniḥśvasya mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:187.005c: tūṣṇīm āsīt tadā kanyā provāca bhṛgunandanam
GE07mbh_05_u:187.006a: bhagavann evam evaitad yathāha bhagavāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:187.006c: ajeyo yudhi bhīṣmo 'yam api devair udāradhīḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:187.007a: yathāśakti yathotsāhaṃ mama kāryaṃ kṛtaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_05_u:187.007c: anidhāya raṇe vīryam astrāṇi vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_05_u:187.008a: na caiṣa śakyate yuddhe viśeṣayitum antataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:187.008c: na cāham enaṃ yāsyāmi punar bhīṣmaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_05_u:187.009a: gamiṣyāmi tu tatrāhaṃ yatra bhīṣmaṃ tapodhana
GE07mbh_05_u:187.011a: tato mahendraṃ saha tair munibhir bhṛgusattamaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:187.011c: yathāgataṃ yayau rāmo mām upāmantrya bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:187.012e: yathāvṛttaṃ mahārāja sā ca māṃ pratyanandata
GE07mbh_05_u:187.013e: pratyāharaṃś ca me yuktāḥ sthitāḥ priyahite mama
GE07mbh_05_u:187.014a: yadaiva hi vanaṃ prāyāt kanyā sā tapase dhṛtā
GE07mbh_05_u:187.015a: na hi māṃ kṣatriyaḥ kaś cid vīryeṇa vijayed yudhi
GE07mbh_05_u:187.016a: api caitan mayā rājan nārade 'pi niveditam
GE07mbh_05_u:187.016c: vyāse caiva bhayāt kāryaṃ tau cobhau mām avocatām
GE07mbh_05_u:187.017a: na viṣādas tvayā kāryo bhīṣma kāśisutāṃ prati
GE07mbh_05_u:187.019c: ṣaṇ māsān vāyubhakṣā ca sthāṇubhūtā tapodhanā
GE07mbh_05_u:187.022a: evaṃ dvādaśa varṣāṇi tāpayām āsa rodasī
GE07mbh_05_u:187.022c: nivartyamānāpi tu sā jñātibhir naiva śakyate
GE07mbh_05_u:187.025c: cyavanasyāśrame caiva brahmaṇaḥ sthāna eva ca
GE07mbh_05_u:187.028a: eteṣu tīrtheṣu tadā kāśikanyā viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_05_u:187.028c: āplāvayata gātrāṇi tīvram āsthāya vai tapaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:187.029a: tām abravīt kauraveya mama mātā jalotthitā
GE07mbh_05_u:187.029c: kimarthaṃ kliśyase bhadre tathyam etad bravīhi me
GE07mbh_05_u:187.030c: bhīṣmo rāmeṇa samare na jitaś cārulocane
GE07mbh_05_u:187.031a: ko 'nyas tam utsahej jetum udyateṣuṃ mahīpatim
GE07mbh_05_u:187.032a: carāmi pṛthivīṃ devi yathā hanyām ahaṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_05_u:187.032c: etad vrataphalaṃ dehe parasmin syād yathā hi me
GE07mbh_05_u:187.034a: yadi bhīṣmavināśāya kāśye carasi vai vratam
GE07mbh_05_u:187.034c: vratasthā ca śarīraṃ tvaṃ yadi nāma vimokṣyasi
GE07mbh_05_u:187.036a: evam uktvā tato rājan kāśikanyāṃ nyavartata
GE07mbh_05_u:187.037a: kadā cid aṣṭame māsi kadā cid daśame tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:187.037c: na prāśnītodakam api punaḥ sā varavarṇinī
GE07mbh_05_u:187.038a: sā vatsabhūmiṃ kauravya tīrthalobhāt tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:187.039a: sā nadī vatsabhūmyāṃ tu prathitāmbeti bhārata
GE07mbh_05_u:187.040a: sā kanyā tapasā tena bhāgārdhena vyajāyata
GE07mbh_05_u:187.040c: nadī ca rājan vatseṣu kanyā caivābhavat tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:188.001a: tatas te tāpasāḥ sarve tapase dhṛtaniścayām
GE07mbh_05_u:188.001c: dṛṣṭvā nyavartayaṃs tāta kiṃ kāryam iti cābruvan
GE07mbh_05_u:188.002a: tān uvāca tataḥ kanyā tapovṛddhān ṛṣīṃs tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:188.003a: vadhārthaṃ tasya dīkṣā me na lokārthaṃ tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:188.003c: nihatya bhīṣmaṃ gaccheyaṃ śāntim ity eva niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:188.004c: patilokād vihīnā ca naiva strī na pumān iha
GE07mbh_05_u:188.005c: eṣa me hṛdi saṃkalpo yadartham idam udyatam
GE07mbh_05_u:188.006c: bhīṣme praticikīrṣāmi nāsmi vāryeti vai punaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:188.007a: tāṃ devo darśayām āsa śūlapāṇir umāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:188.007c: madhye teṣāṃ maharṣīṇāṃ svena rūpeṇa bhāminīm
GE07mbh_05_u:188.009a: tataḥ sā punar evātha kanyā rudram uvāca ha
GE07mbh_05_u:188.009c: upapadyet kathaṃ deva striyo mama jayo yudhi
GE07mbh_05_u:188.009e: strībhāvena ca me gāḍhaṃ manaḥ śāntam umāpate
GE07mbh_05_u:188.010c: yathā sa satyo bhavati tathā kuru vṛṣadhvaja
GE07mbh_05_u:188.010e: yathā hanyāṃ samāgamya bhīṣmaṃ śāṃtanavaṃ yudhi
GE07mbh_05_u:188.011a: tām uvāca mahādevaḥ kanyāṃ kila vṛṣadhvajaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:188.011c: na me vāg anṛtaṃ bhadre prāha satyaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:188.012a: vadhiṣyasi raṇe bhīṣmaṃ puruṣatvaṃ ca lapsyase
GE07mbh_05_u:188.012c: smariṣyasi ca tat sarvaṃ deham anyaṃ gatā satī
GE07mbh_05_u:188.014a: yathoktam eva kalyāṇi sarvam etad bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:188.014c: bhaviṣyasi pumān paścāt kasmāc cit kālaparyayāt
GE07mbh_05_u:188.016a: tataḥ sā paśyatāṃ teṣāṃ maharṣīṇām aninditā
GE07mbh_05_u:188.017a: citāṃ kṛtvā sumahatīṃ pradāya ca hutāśanam
GE07mbh_05_u:188.018c: jyeṣṭhā kāśisutā rājan yamunām abhito nadīm
GE07mbh_05_u:189.001a: kathaṃ śikhaṇḍī gāṅgeya kanyā bhūtvā satī tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:189.001c: puruṣo 'bhavad yudhi śreṣṭha tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_05_u:189.002a: bhāryā tu tasya rājendra drupadasya mahīpateḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:189.002c: mahiṣī dayitā hy āsīd aputrā ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_05_u:189.003a: etasminn eva kāle tu drupado vai mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:189.004c: lebhe kanyāṃ mahādevāt putro me syād iti bruvan
GE07mbh_05_u:189.005c: ity ukto devadevena strīpumāṃs te bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_05_u:189.006a: nivartasva mahīpāla naitaj jātv anyathā bhavet
GE07mbh_05_u:189.006c: sa tu gatvā ca nagaraṃ bhāryām idam uvāca ha
GE07mbh_05_u:189.007a: kṛto yatno mayā devi putrārthe tapasā mahān
GE07mbh_05_u:189.007c: kanyā bhūtvā pumān bhāvī iti cokto 'smi śaṃbhunā
GE07mbh_05_u:189.008a: punaḥ punar yācyamāno diṣṭam ity abravīc chivaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:189.008c: na tad anyad dhi bhavitā bhavitavyaṃ hi tat tathā
GE07mbh_05_u:189.009a: tataḥ sā niyatā bhūtvā ṛtukāle manasvinī
GE07mbh_05_u:189.010c: pārṣatāt sā mahīpāla yathā māṃ nārado 'bravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:189.011a: tato dadhāra taṃ garbhaṃ devī rājīvalocanā
GE07mbh_05_u:189.011c: tāṃ sa rājā priyāṃ bhāryāṃ drupadaḥ kurunandana
GE07mbh_05_u:189.011f-0584_01: sarvān abhiprāyakṛtān kāmāṃl lebhe ca kaurava
GE07mbh_05_u:189.012b-0585_01: yathākālaṃ tu sā devī mahiṣī drupadasya ha
GE07mbh_05_u:189.013a: aputrasya tu rājñaḥ sā drupadasya yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_05_u:189.013c: khyāpayām āsa rājendra putro jāto mameti vai
GE07mbh_05_u:189.014a: tataḥ sa rājā drupadaḥ pracchannāyā narādhipa
GE07mbh_05_u:189.015a: rakṣaṇaṃ caiva mantrasya mahiṣī drupadasya sā
GE07mbh_05_u:189.015c: cakāra sarvayatnena bruvāṇā putra ity uta
GE07mbh_05_u:189.015e: na hi tāṃ veda nagare kaś cid anyatra pārṣatāt
GE07mbh_05_u:189.016c: chādayām āsa tāṃ kanyāṃ pumān iti ca so 'bravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:189.017c: puṃvad vidhānayuktāni śikhaṇḍīti ca tāṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:189.018a: aham ekas tu cāreṇa vacanān nāradasya ca
GE07mbh_05_u:190.001a: cakāra yatnaṃ drupadaḥ sarvasmin svajane mahat
GE07mbh_05_u:190.001c: tato lekhyādiṣu tathā śilpeṣu ca paraṃ gatā

GE07mbh_05_u:190.012a: kṛte vivāhe tu tadā sā kanyā rājasattama

GE07mbh_05_u:190.014c: dhātrīṇāṃ ca sakhīnāṃ ca vrīḍamānā nyavedayat
GE07mbh_05_u:190.014e: kanyāṃ pañcālarājasya sutāṃ tāṃ vai śikhaṇḍinīm
GE07mbh_05_u:190.015a: tatas tā rājaśārdūla dhātryo dāśārṇikās tadā

GE07mbh_05_u:190.016c: vipralambhaṃ yathāvṛttaṃ sa ca cukrodha pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:190.017a: śikhaṇḍy api mahārāja puṃvad rājakule tadā
GE07mbh_05_u:190.018c: hiraṇyavarmā rājendra roṣād ārtiṃ jagāma ha
GE07mbh_05_u:190.020c: eka ekāntam utsārya raho vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_05_u:190.021a: daśārṇarājo rājaṃs tvām idaṃ vacanam abravīt

GE07mbh_05_u:191.007c: tathyaṃ ced bhavati hy etat kanyā rājañ śikhaṇḍinī
GE07mbh_05_u:191.009a: sa tadā dūtam ājñāya punaḥ kṣattāram īśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:191.009c: prāsthāpayat pārṣatāya hanmīti tvāṃ sthiro bhava
GE07mbh_05_u:191.010a: sa prakṛtyā ca vai bhīruḥ kilbiṣī ca narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:191.011c: sametya bhāryāṃ rahite vākyam āha narādhipaḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:191.018a: sā tvaṃ sarvavimokṣāya tattvam ākhyāhi pṛcchataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:191.018e: śikhaṇḍini ca mā bhais tvaṃ vidhāsye tatra tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_05_u:191.019c: mayā dāśārṇako rājā vañcitaś ca mahīpatiḥ

GE07mbh_05_u:192.002a: aputrayā mayā rājan sapatnīnāṃ bhayād idam

GE07mbh_05_u:192.005a: etac chrutvā drupado yajñasenaḥ; sarvaṃ tattvaṃ mantravidbhyo nivedya
GE07mbh_05_u:192.005c: mantraṃ rājā mantrayām āsa rājan; yad yad yuktaṃ rakṣaṇe vai prajānām
GE07mbh_05_u:192.006a: saṃbandhakaṃ caiva samarthya tasmin; dāśārṇake vai nṛpatau narendra
GE07mbh_05_u:192.006c: svayaṃ kṛtvā vipralambhaṃ yathāvan; mantraikāgro niścayaṃ vai jagāma

GE07mbh_05_u:192.014a: mantribhir mantritaṃ sārdhaṃ tvayā yat pṛthulocana

GE07mbh_05_u:192.016a: tasmād vidhāya nagare vidhānaṃ sacivaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_05_u:192.018a: tataḥ sā cintayām āsa matkṛte duḥkhitāv ubhau

GE07mbh_05_u:192.019a: evaṃ sā niścayaṃ kṛtvā bhṛśaṃ śokaparāyaṇā
GE07mbh_05_u:192.019c: jagāma bhavanaṃ tyaktvā gahanaṃ nirjanaṃ vanam
GE07mbh_05_u:192.020c: tadbhayād eva ca jano visarjayati tad vanam

GE07mbh_05_u:192.026a: tataḥ śikhaṇḍī tat sarvam akhilena nyavedayat

GE07mbh_05_u:193.028c: hastino 'śvāṃś ca gāś caiva dāsyo bahuśatās tathā

GE07mbh_05_u:193.049c: tam abravīt tataḥ sthūṇaḥ prīto 'smīti punaḥ punaḥ
